original: satthu sarīrato rasmiyo na nikkhantā.
analyzed: satthu sarīrataḥ rasmiyaḥ na nikkhantā

original: Catutthe pana sattāhe pacchimuttarāya disāya ratanaghare nisīdi – ratanagharaṃ nāma

analyzed: veditabbam tattha dhamma saṅgaṇim sammasantassa api sarīrato rasmiyaḥ na nikkhantā

analyzed: sammasantassa api sarīrato rasmiyaḥ na nikkhantā yadā pana mahā pakaraṇam oruyha hetu paccayo

original: ekantato mahāpakaraṇeyeva okāsaṃ labhi.
analyzed: ekantataḥ okāsam labhi

original: Satthu evaṃ laddhokāsena sabbaññutaññāṇena yathāsukhaṃ saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ sammasantassa
analyzed: satthu evam laddha ukāsena sabbaññuta ññāṇena yathāsukham saṇha sukhuma dhammam sammasantassa

original: Kesamassūhi ceva akkhīnañca nīlaṭṭhānehi nīlarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu, yāsaṃ vasena gaganatalaṃ

original: viya sampasāritamecakapaṭaṃ viya ca ahosi.
analyzed: viya sampasārita mecaka paṭam viya ca ahosi

original: Chavito ceva akkhīnañca pītaṭṭhānehi pītarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu; yāsaṃ vasena disābhāgā
analyzed: chavito ca iva akkhīnam ca pīta ṭṭhānehi pīta rasmiyaḥ nikkhamiṃsu yāsam vasena

original: suvaṇṇarasadhārābhisiñcamānā viya suvaṇṇapaṭapasāritā viya kuṅkumacuṇṇakaṇikārapupphasamparikiṇṇā viya ca virociṃsu.

original: Maṃsalohitehi ceva akkhīnañca rattaṭṭhānehi lohitarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu yāsaṃ vasena

analyzed: viya jaya sumana pāribhaddaka bandhujīvaka kusuma samparikiṇṇāḥ viya ca virociṃsu

original: Aṭṭhīhi ceva dantehi ca akkhīnañca setaṭṭhānehi odātarasmiyo nikkhamiṃsu; yāsaṃ vasena

original: viya, vītipatantarajatatālavaṇṭā viya, kundakumudasinduvārasumanamallikādikusumasañchannā viya ca virociṃsu.

original: Mañjiṭṭhapabhassarā pana tamhā tamhā sarīrappadesā nikkhamiṃsu. Iti tā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā ghanamahāpathaviṃ gaṇhiṃsu.

original: Catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā mahāpathavī niddhantasuvaṇṇapiṇḍi viya
analyzed: mahā pathavī viya

original: ahosi. Atha mahāpathaviṃ bhinditvā heṭṭhā udakaṃ gaṇhiṃsu. Pathavisandhārakaṃ aṭṭhanahutādhikacatuyojanasatasahassabahalaṃ
analyzed: ahosi atha mahā pathavim bhinditvā heṭṭhā udakam gaṇhiṃsu pathavi sandhārakam aṭṭhana huta adhika catu yojana sata sahassa bahalam

original: udakaṃ suvaṇṇakalasehi āsiñcamānavilīnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ahosi. Udakaṃ vinivijjhitvā

original: vātaṃ aggahesuṃ. Chanahutādhikanavayojanasatasahassabahalo vāto samussitasuvaṇṇakkhandho
analyzed: vātam aggahesum chana huta adhika nava yojana sata sahassa bahalaḥ vātaḥ samussita suvaṇṇa kkhandhaḥ

analyzed: viya ahosi vātam vinivijjhitvā heṭṭhā ajaṭā kāsam pakkhandiṃsu

original: Uparibhāgena uggantvāpi cātumahārājike gaṇhiṃsu. Te vinivijjhitvā tāvatiṃse tato

analyzed: yāme tato tusite tatas nimmānaratī tatas paranimmitavasavattī tatas nava brahmaloke

analyzed: tatas vehapphale tatas pañca suddhāvāse vinivijjhitvā cattāraḥ āruppe gaṇhiṃsu cattāraḥ

original: ca āruppe vinivijjhitvā ajaṭākāsaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
analyzed: ca āruppe vinivijjhitvā a jaṭā kāsam pakkhandiṃsu

original: Tiriyabhāgehi anantā lokadhātuyo pakkhandiṃsu. Ettakesu ṭhānesu candamhi candappabhā

original: Tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātuyā ālokapharaṇasamattho mahābrahmāpi sūriyuggamane khajjopanako

original: viya ahosi. Candasūriyatārakarūpadevatuyyānavimānakapparukkhānaṃ paricchedamattakameva
analyzed: viya ahosi canda sūriya tāraka rūpa deva tuyyāna vimāna kappa rukkhānam pariccheda mattakam eva

original: adhiṭṭhāniddhi, na bhāvanāmayiddhi. Saṇhasukhumadhammaṃ pana sammasato lokanāthassa

original: lohitaṃ pasīdi, vatthurūpaṃ pasīdi, chavivaṇṇo pasīdi. Cittasamuṭṭhānā vaṇṇadhātu

analyzed: samantā asīti hattha matte padese aṭṭhāsi iminā nīhārena sattāham sammasi

original: Satta rattindivāni sammasitadhammo kittako ahosīti? Ananto aparimāṇo ahosi. Ayaṃ
analyzed: satta rattindivāni sammasita dhammo kittakaḥ ahosi iti anantaḥ aparimāṇaḥ ahosi ayam

original: nikkhantaudakadhārā viya ca hutvā anantā aparimāṇā ahosi.
analyzed: nikkhanta audaka dhārā viya ca hutvā anantā aparimāṇā ahosi

analyzed: hoti kasmai buddhānam hi bhavaṅga parivāsaḥ lahukaḥ danta āvaraṇam su phusitam mukha ādānam

analyzed: ettako hoti te māsam desita dhammo pana anantaḥ aparimāṇaḥ yeva

original: Ānandatthero hi bahussuto tipiṭakadharo pañcadasa gāthāsahassāni saṭṭhi padasahassāni

analyzed: latā pupphāni ākaḍḍhantaḥ viya ṭhita padena iva ṭhatvā gaṇhāti vā vācā iti vā deseti vā

original: Ettako therassa eko uddesamaggo nāma hoti. Therassa hi anupadaṃ uddesaṃ dadamāno

analyzed: sāvako satthārā iminā nīhārena desita desanam

original: vassasataṃ vassasahassaṃ uggaṇhantopi matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti.

original: supaccakkho. Tasmā bhagavā dhammaṃ desentova manussaloke kālaṃ oloketi. So bhikkhācāravelaṃ

original: sallakkhetvā nimmitabuddhaṃ māpetvā ‘imassa cīvaraggahaṇaṃ pattaggahaṇaṃ sarakutti

original: ākappo ca evarūpo nāma hotu, ettakaṃ nāma dhammaṃ desetū’ti adhiṭṭhāya pattacīvaramādāya
analyzed: ākappaḥ ca evarūpaḥ nāma hotu ettakam nāma dhammam desetu uti adhiṭṭhāya patta cīvaram ādāya

original: anotattadahaṃ gacchati. Devatā nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ denti. Taṃ khāditvā anotattadahe
analyzed: gacchati devatāḥ nāga latā danta kaṭṭham denti tam khāditvā anotat tad ahe

original: sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā manosilātale ṭhito surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā
analyzed: sarīram paṭijaggitvā manosilā tale surat tad upaṭṭam nivāsetvā cīvaram

original: cātumahārājadattiyaṃ selamayaṃ pattaṃ ādāya uttarakuruṃ gacchati. Tato piṇḍapātaṃ

original: āharitvā anotattadahatīre nisinno taṃ paribhuñjitvā divāvihārāya candanavanaṃ gacchati.
analyzed: āharitvā tam paribhuñjitvā divāvihārāya candana vanam gacchati

original: Dhammasenāpatisāriputtattheropi tattha gantvā sammāsambuddhassa vattaṃ katvā ekamantaṃ

original: nisīdati. Athassa satthā nayaṃ deti. ‘Sāriputta, ettako dhammo mayā desito’ti ācikkhati.
analyzed: nisīdati atha assa satthā nayam deti sāriputta ettakaḥ dhammaḥ mayā desito ti ācikkhati

original: Evaṃ sammāsambuddhe nayaṃ dente paṭisambhidāppattassa aggasāvakassa velante ṭhatvā

original: hatthaṃ pasāretvā dassitasamuddasadisaṃ nayadānaṃ hoti. Therassāpi nayasatena nayasahassena

original: nayasatasahassena bhagavatā desitadhammo upaṭṭhātiyeva.
analyzed: naya sata sahassena bhagavatā desita dhammaḥ upaṭṭhātiyā iva

original: Satthā divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā dhammaṃ desetuṃ kāya velāya gacchatīti? Sāvatthivāsīnaṃ

original: kulaputtānaṃ sampattānaṃ dhammadesanavelā nāma atthi, tāya velāya gacchati. Dhammaṃ
analyzed: kula puttānam sampattānam dhamma desana velā nāma atthi tāya velāya gacchati dhammaṃ

analyzed: desetvā gacchantam vā āgacchantam vā ke jānanti ke na jānanti iti mahesakkhā devatā

original: jānanti, appesakkhā devatā na jānanti. Kasmā na jānantīti? Sammāsambuddhassa vā nimmitabuddhassa

original: vā rasmiādīsu nānattābhāvā. Ubhinnampi hi tesaṃ rasmīsu vā saresu vā vacanesu vā nānattaṃ natthi.
analyzed: vā rasmi ādīsu nānatta abhāvā ubhinnam pi hi tesam rasmīsu vā saresu vā vacanesu vā nānattam natthi

original: Sāriputtattheropi satthārā desitaṃ desitaṃ dhammaṃ āharitvā attano saddhivihārikānaṃ
analyzed: sāriputta theraḥ api satthārā desitam desitam dhammaṃ āharitvā attano saddhivihārikānam

original: dutiyaṃ anekajjhāsayānusayacariyādhimuttikā sattā yathānulomaṃ ettha sāsitāti yathānulomasāsanaṃ;
analyzed: dutiyam aneka ajjhāsaya anusaya cariyā adhimuttikā sattā yathānulomam ettha sā āsitā ati yathā anuloma sāsanam

original: tatiyaṃ dhammapuñjamatte ‘ahaṃ mamā’ti saññino sattā yathādhammaṃ ettha sāsitāti
analyzed: tatiyam dhamma puñja matte aham mama ati saññinaḥ sattā yathādhammam ettha sāsitā ati

original: yathādhammasāsananti vuccati.

original: Tathā paṭhamaṃ ajjhācārapaṭipakkhabhūto saṃvarāsaṃvaro ettha kathitoti saṃvarāsaṃvarakathā;
analyzed: tathā paṭhamam ajjhācāra paṭipakkha bhūto saṃvara asaṃvaraḥ ettha kathito ti saṃvara asaṃvara kathā

original: saṃvarāsaṃvaroti khuddako ceva mahanto ca saṃvarāsaṃvaro, kammākammaṃ viya ca phalāphalaṃ
analyzed: saṃvara asaṃvaraḥ ti khuddako ca iva mahanto ca saṃvara asaṃvaraḥ kamma akammam viya ca phala aphalam

original: viya ca; dutiyaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhipaṭipakkhabhūtā diṭṭhiviniveṭhanā ettha kathitāti
analyzed: ca dutiyam dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi paṭipakkha bhūtā diṭṭhi viniveṭhanā ettha kathitā ati

original: diṭṭhiviniveṭhanakathā; tatiyaṃ rāgādipaṭipakkhabhūto nāmarūpaparicchedo ettha kathitoti
analyzed: diṭṭhi viniveṭhana kathā tatiyam rāga ādi paṭipakkha bhūtaḥ nāma rūpa paricchedaḥ ettha kathito ti

original: nāmarūpaparicchedakathāti vuccati.
analyzed: nāma rūpa pariccheda kathā ati vuccati

original: Tīsupi cetesu tisso sikkhā tīṇi pahānāni catubbidho ca gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo. Tathā
analyzed: tīsu pi ca itesu tissaḥ sikkhā tīṇi pahānāni catubbidhaḥ ca gambhīra bhāvaḥ veditabbo tathā

original: hi vinayapiṭake visesena adhisīlasikkhā vuttā, suttantapiṭake adhicittasikkhā, abhidhammapiṭake adhipaññāsikkhā.
analyzed: hi vinaya piṭake visesena adhi sīla sikkhā vuttā suttanta piṭake adhi citta sikkhā abhidhamma piṭake adhi paññā sikkhā

original: Vinayapiṭake ca vītikkamappahānaṃ, kilesānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassa; suttantapiṭake
analyzed: vinaya piṭake ca vītikkama ppahānam kilesānam vītikkama paṭipakkha ttā sīlassa suttanta piṭake

original: Paṭhame ca tadaṅgappahānaṃ kilesānaṃ, itaresu vikkhambhanasamucchedappahānāni. Paṭhame ca duccaritasaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ, itaresu taṇhādiṭṭhisaṃkilesānaṃ pahānaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhame ca tad aṅga pahānam kilesānam itaresu vikkhambhana samuccheda ppahānāni paṭhame ca duccarita saṃkilesassa pahānam itaresu taṇhā diṭṭhi saṃkilesānam pahānam

original: Ekamekasmiñcettha catubbidhopi dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhagambhīrabhāvo veditabbo –

analyzed: tattha dhammo ti tanti attho ti desanā ati tassā manasā vavatthāpitāya

original: Aparo nayo – dhammoti hetu. Vuttañhetaṃ – “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti. Atthoti
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ dhammo ti hetu vuttam ha etam hetumhi ñāṇam dhamma paṭisambhidā ti atthaḥ ti

original: hetuphalaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā”ti. Desanāti paññatti,

original: yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpoti adhippāyo; anulomapaṭilomasaṅkhepavitthārādivasena vā

original: Tesaṃ tesaṃ vā tattha tattha vuttadhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.

original: Evampi ekamekasmiṃ ettha catubbidhopi gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo. Ettāvatā ca –

original: Desanāsāsanakathābhedaṃ tesu yathārahaṃ;

original: Ayaṃ gāthā vuttatthā hoti.

original: Ettha pana tīsu piṭakesu tividho pariyattibhedo daṭṭhabbo. Tisso hi pariyattiyo – alagaddūpamā nissaraṇatthā bhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīti.
analyzed: ettha pana tīsu piṭakesu tividhaḥ pariyatti bhedaḥ daṭṭhabbo tissaḥ hi pariyattiyaḥ nissaraṇa atthā bhaṇḍāgārika pariyattī iti

original: bhikkhave, dhammāna”nti.

original: – “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, acinteyyāni, na cintetabbāni, yāni cintento ummādassa
analyzed: cattāri imāni bhikkhave acinteyyāni na cintetabbāni yāni cintentaḥ ummādassa

original: vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti. Evametesu duppaṭipanno yathākkamena imaṃ dussīlabhāvamicchādiṭṭhitācittakkhepappabhedaṃ

original: Ayampi gāthā vuttatthā hoti. Evaṃ nānappakārato piṭakāni ñatvā tesaṃ vasena sabbampetaṃ saṅgayhamānaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni honti.

original: Kathaṃ nikāyato pañca nikāyāti? Sabbameva hetaṃ dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṃyuttanikāyo
analyzed: katham nikāyataḥ pañca nikāyā ti sabbam eva ha etam dīgha nikāyaḥ majjhima nikāyaḥ saṃyutta nikāyaḥ

original: aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcappabhedaṃ hoti. Tattha katamo dīghanikāyo?

original: Tivaggasaṅgahāni brahmajālādīni catuttiṃsa suttāni.
analyzed: ti vagga saṅgahāni brahmajāla ādīni catuttiṃsa suttāni

original: Catuttiṃseva suttantā, tivaggo yassa saṅgaho;

original: Esa dīghanikāyoti, paṭhamo anulomiko.

original: Kasmā panesa dīghanikāyoti vuccati? Dīghappamāṇānaṃ suttānaṃ samūhato nivāsato ca.

original: Samūhanivāsā hi nikāyoti vuccanti. “Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekanikāyampi samanupassāmi
analyzed: samūha nivāsāḥ hi nikāyaḥ ti vuccanti na aham bhikkhave aññam eka nikāyam pi samanupassāmi

original: evaṃ cittaṃ yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, tiracchānagatā pāṇā, poṇikanikāyo, cikkhallikanikāyo”ti.
analyzed: evam cittam yathā yidam bhikkhave tiracchāna gatā pāṇā poṇika nikāyo cikkhallika nikāyo ti

original: Evamādīni cettha sādhakāni sāsanato lokato ca. Evaṃ sesānampi nikāyabhāve vacanattho veditabbo.

original: Katamo majjhimanikāyo? Majjhimappamāṇāni pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni mūlapariyāyasuttādīni diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttāni.
analyzed: katamaḥ majjhima nikāyaḥ majjhima ppamāṇāni pañcadasa vagga saṅgahāni mūla pariyāya sutta ādīni diyaḍḍha satam dve ca suttāni

original: Diyaḍḍhasatasuttantā, dve ca suttāni yattha so;
analyzed: dve ca suttāni yattha saḥ

original: Nikāyo majjhimo pañca, dasavaggapariggaho.

analyzed: dhammadhātuyam ca vedanā vasena iva vihāsi cattāri saccāni nippadesena paṭivijjhi imaṃ

analyzed: sumedha kathā

original: Kappe ca satasahasse, caturo ca asaṅkhiye;

original: Yaṃnūnimaṃ pūtikāyaṃ, nānākuṇapapūritaṃ;

original: Atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye;
analyzed: atthi hehiti so maggaḥ na saḥ sakkā na hetuye

analyzed: pariyesissāmi tam maggam bhavataḥ parimuttiyā

analyzed: evam tividhaggi vijjante nibbānam icchitabbakam

original: Yathāpi pāpe vijjante, kalyāṇamapi vijjati;

original: Evameva jāti vijjante, ajātipicchitabbakaṃ.

original: Yathā gūthagato puriso, taḷākaṃ disvāna pūritaṃ;

original: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso taḷākassa so.

original: Evaṃ kilesamaladhove, vijjante amatantaḷe;

original: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe.
analyzed: na gavesati tam taḷākam na dosaḥ amatantaḷe

original: Yathā arīhi pariruddho, vijjante gamanampathe;

original: Na hete ettakāyeva, buddhadhammā bhavissare;

original: Pubbakehi mahesīhi, āsevitanisevitaṃ.
analyzed: pubbakehi mahesīhi āsevita nisevitam

original: Imaṃ tvaṃ navamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;

original: Mettāpāramitaṃ gantvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.

original: Na hete ettakāyeva, buddhadhammā bhavissare;

original: Ettakāyeva te loke, ye dhammā bodhipācanā;

analyzed: pavedhamānā sā tattha mucchitā sesi bhūmiyā

original: Sabbe maṃ upasaṅkamma, punāpi abhivandisuṃ.
analyzed: sabbe mama upasaṅkamma puna api abhivandisuṃ

original: Dibbaṃ mānusakaṃ pupphaṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;

analyzed: samokiranti pupphehi vuṭṭhahantassa āsanā

original: Vedayanti ca te sotthiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;
analyzed: vedayanti ca te sotthim devāḥ mānusakāḥ ubho

original: Mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, taṃ labhassu yathicchitaṃ.

original: Sabbītiyo vivajjantu, soko rogo vinassatu;

original: Yathāpi samaye patte, pupphanti pupphino dumā;

original: Tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīra, buddhañāṇena pupphasu.

original: Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, pūrayuṃ dasapāramī;

original: Tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīra, pūrehi dasapāramī.
analyzed: tathā iva tvam mahāvīra pūrehi dasa pāramī

original: Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, bodhimaṇḍamhi bujjhare;
analyzed: yathā ye sambuddhāḥ bodhimaṇḍamhi bujjhare

original: Tatheva tvaṃ mahāvīra, bujjhassu jinabodhiyaṃ.
analyzed: tathā iva tvam mahāvīra bujjhassu jina bodhiyam

original: Yathā ye keci sambuddhā, dhammacakkaṃ pavattayuṃ;

original: Puṇṇamāye yathā cando, parisuddho virocati;
analyzed: puṇṇamāye yathā candaḥ parisuddhaḥ virocati

original: Tatheva tvaṃ puṇṇamano, viroca dasasahassiyaṃ.

analyzed: sumedha kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Tadā te bhojayitvāna, sasaṅghaṃ lokanāyakaṃ;
analyzed: tadā te sa saṅgham lokanāyakam

original: Upagacchuṃ saraṇaṃ tassa, dīpaṅkarassa satthuno.

original: Saraṇāgamane kañci, nivesesi tathāgato;
analyzed: saraṇa āgamane kañci nivesesi tathāgato

original: Kañci pañcasu sīlesu, sīle dasavidhe paraṃ.
analyzed: pañcasu sīlesu sīle dasavidhe param

original: Kassaci deti sāmaññaṃ, caturo phalamuttame;
analyzed: kassaci deti sāmaññam caturaḥ phalam uttame

original: Kassaci asame dhamme, deti so paṭisambhidā.
analyzed: kassaci asame dhamme deti so paṭisambhidā

original: Kassaci varasamāpattiyo, aṭṭha deti narāsabho;
analyzed: kassaci vara samāpattiyaḥ aṭṭha deti narāsabhaḥ

original: Tisso kassaci vijjāyo, chaḷabhiññā pavecchati.
analyzed: tissaḥ kassaci chaḍabhiññā pavecchati

original: Tena yogena janakāyaṃ, ovadati mahāmuni;
analyzed: tena yogena jana kāyam ā uvadati mahā muni

original: Tena vitthārikaṃ āsi, lokanāthassa sāsanaṃ.
analyzed: tena vitthārikam āsi lokanāthassa sāsanam

original: Mahāhanusabhakkhandho, dīpaṅkarasanāmako;

original: ‘diṭṭho te rājā’ti puṭṭho disvāpi kattabbakiccassa akatattā ‘na passāmī’ti āha. Evameva
analyzed: diṭṭhaḥ te rājā iti puṭṭhaḥ disvā api kattabba kiccassa a kata ttā na passāmi iti āha evam eva

original: nibbānaṃ disvāpi kattabbassa kilesappahānassābhāvā na dassananti vuccati. Tañhi ñāṇaṃ
analyzed: nibbānam disvā api kattabbassa kilesa ppahānassa abhāvā na dassananti vuccati tat hi ñāṇam

original: maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Bhāvanāyāti sesamaggattayena. Sesamaggattayañhi
analyzed: maggassa āvajjana ṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati bhāvanāya ati sesa magga ttayena sesa magga ttayam hi

original: paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhasmiṃyeva dhamme bhāvanāvasena uppajjati, adiṭṭhapubbaṃ kiñci
analyzed: paṭhama maggena diṭṭhasmin yeva dhamme bhāvanā vasena uppajjati adiṭṭha pubbam kiñci

original: na passati, tasmā bhāvanāti vuccati. Tatiyapadaṃ ubhayapaṭikkhepavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: na passati tasmā bhāvanā iti vuccati tatiya padam ubhaya paṭikkhepa vasena vuttam

original: 9. Tadanantarattike dassanena pahātabbo hetu etesanti dassanena pahātabbahetukā.
analyzed: tad anantara ttike dassanena pahātabbaḥ hetu etesan ti dassanena pahātabba hetukā

original: Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Tatiyapade neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu etesanti
analyzed: dutiya pade pi esa iva nayaḥ tatiya pade nā iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ hetu etesan ti

original: evamatthaṃ aggahetvā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu etesaṃ atthīti evamattho
analyzed: evamattham aggahetvā na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ hetu etesam atthi iti evamatthaḥ

original: gahetabbo. Itarathā hi ahetukānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ bhaveyya; hetuyeva hi tesaṃ natthi yo
analyzed: gahetabbaḥ itarathā hi ahetukānam aggahaṇam bhaveyya hetuyā iva hi tesam natthi yaḥ

original: dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbo siyā. Sahetukesupi hetuvajjānaṃ pahānaṃ āpajjati, na hetūnaṃ;
analyzed: dassana bhāvanāhi pahātabbaḥ siyā sa hetukesu pi hetu vajjānam pahānam āpajjati na hetūnam

original: hetuyeva hi etesaṃ ‘neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbo’ti vutto, na te dhammā.
analyzed: hetuyā iva hi etesam na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ ti vuttaḥ na te dhammā

original: Ubhayampi cetaṃ anadhippetaṃ. Tasmā neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu etesaṃ
analyzed: ubhayam pi ca itam anadhippetam tasmā na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ hetu etesam

original: atthīti nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukāti ayamattho gahetabbo.
analyzed: atthi iti na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukā ati ayam atthaḥ gahetabbaḥ

original: 10. Ācayagāmittike kammakilesehi āciyatīti ācayo. Paṭisandhicutigatippavattānaṃ etaṃ
analyzed: ācaya gāmittike kamma kilesehi āciyati iti ācayaḥ paṭisandhi cuti gati pavattānam etam

original: nāmaṃ. Tassa kāraṇaṃ hutvā nipphādanakabhāvena taṃ ācayaṃ gacchanti, yassa vā pavattanti
analyzed: nāmam tassa kāraṇam hutvā nipphādanaka bhāvena tam ācayam gacchanti yassa vā pavattanti

original: taṃ puggalaṃ yathāvuttameva ācayaṃ gamentītipi ācayagāmino; sāsavakusalākusalānaṃ
analyzed: tam puggalam yathāvuttam eva ācayam ācaya gāminaḥ

original: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tato eva ācayasaṅkhātā cayā apetattā, nibbānaṃ apetaṃ cayāti apacayo.
analyzed: etam adhivacanam tatas eva ācaya saṅkhātā cayā apeta ttā nibbānam apetam cayāti apacayaḥ

original: Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanato apacayaṃ gacchantīti apacayagāmino; ariyamaggānametaṃ
analyzed: tam ārammaṇam katvā pavattanataḥ apacayam gacchanti iti apacaya gāminaḥ ariya maggānam etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Apica pākāraṃ iṭṭhakavaḍḍhakī viya pavattaṃ ācinantā gacchantīti ācayagāmino.
analyzed: adhivacanam apica pākāram iṭṭhaka vaḍḍhakī viya pavattam ācinantāḥ gacchanti iti ācaya gāminaḥ

original: Tena citaṃ citaṃ iṭṭhakaṃ viddhaṃsayamāno puriso viya tadeva pavattaṃ apacinantā
analyzed: tena citam citam iṭṭhakam viddhaṃsayamānaḥ purisaḥ viya tat eva pavattam apacinantā

original: gacchantīti apacayagāmino. Tatiyapadaṃ ubhayapaṭikkhepena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: gacchanti iti apacaya gāminaḥ tatiya padam ubhaya paṭikkhepena vuttam

original: 11. Sekkhattike tīsu sikkhāsu jātāti sekkhā. Sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ etetipi sekkhā.
analyzed: sekkhattike tīsu sikkhāsu jātā ati sekkhā sattannam sekkhānam sekkhā

original: Apariyositasikkhattā sayameva sikkhantītipi sekkhā. Upari sikkhitabbābhāvato na sekkhāti
analyzed: a pariyosita sikkha ttā sayam eva sikkhanti iti pi sekkhā upari sikkhitabba abhāvataḥ na sekkhā ati

original: asekkhā. Vuḍḍhippattā vā sekkhātipi asekkhā. Arahattaphaladhammānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: asekkhāḥ vuḍḍhi pattāḥ vā sekkhā atipi asekkhāḥ arahatta phala dhammānam etam adhivacanam

original: Tatiyapadaṃ ubhayapaṭikkhepena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tatiya padam ubhaya paṭikkhepena vuttam

original: 12. Parittattike samantato khaṇḍitattā appamattakaṃ parittanti vuccati; ‘parittaṃ
analyzed: paritta ttike samantataḥ khaṇḍita ttā appamattakam parittan ti vuccati parittam

original: gomayapiṇḍa’ntiādīsu viya. Imepi appānubhāvatāya parittā viyāti parittā; kāmāvacaradhammānametaṃ
analyzed: gomaya piṇḍa nti ādīsu ime pi appa anubhāva tāya parittā viyāti parittā kāmāvacara dhammānam etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya vipulaphalatāya dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ
analyzed: adhivacanam kilesa vikkhambhana samattha tāya vipula phala tāya dīgha santāna tāya ca mahanta bhāvam

original: gatā, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandavīriyacittapaññehi gatā paṭipannātipi mahaggatā. Pamāṇakarā
analyzed: gatā mahantehi vā uḷāra chanda vīriya citta paññehi gatā paṭipannā atipi mahaggatā pamāṇa karā

original: dhammā rāgādayo pamāṇaṃ nāma. Ārammaṇato vā sampayogato vā natthi etesaṃ pamāṇaṃ,
analyzed: dhammā rāga ādayo pamāṇam nāma ārammaṇataḥ vā sampayogataḥ vā natthi etesam pamāṇam

original: pamāṇassa ca paṭipakkhāti appamāṇā.
analyzed: pamāṇassa ca paṭipakkhāti appamāṇā

original: 13. Parittārammaṇattike parittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etesanti parittārammaṇā. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: paritta ārammaṇa ttike parittam ārammaṇam etesanti paritta ārammaṇā sesa pada dvaye pi esa iva nayo

original: 14. Hīnattike hīnāti lāmakā akusalā dhammā. Hīnappaṇītānaṃ majjhe bhavāti majjhimā. Avasesā tebhūmakā dhammā uttamaṭṭhena atappakaṭṭhena ca paṇītā; lokuttarā dhammā.
analyzed: hīna ttike lāmakāḥ akusalāḥ dhammāḥ hīna ppaṇītānam majjhe majjhimā avasesā tebhūmakāḥ dhammāḥ uttama aṭṭhena atappaka ṭṭhena ca paṇītāḥ lokuttarāḥ dhammāḥ

original: 15. Micchattattike ‘hitasukhāvahā me bhavissantī’ti evaṃ āsīsitāpi tathā abhāvato,
analyzed: micchattattike hita sukha āvahāḥ me bhavissanti iti evam tathā abhāvataḥ

original: ‘asubhādīsuyeva subha’ntiādi viparītappavattito ca micchāsabhāvāti micchattā; vipākadāne
analyzed: asubha ādīsu yā iva subha nti ādi viparīta ppavattitaḥ ca micchā sabhāvā ti micchat tā vipāka dāne

original: sati khandhabhedānantarameva vipākadānato niyatā; micchattā ca te niyatā cāti micchattaniyatā.
analyzed: sati khandha bheda anantaram eva vipāka dānataḥ niyatā micchattā ca te niyatā ca ati micchatta niyatā

original: Vuttaviparītena atthena sammāsabhāvāti sammattā; sammattā ca te niyatā ca anantarameva
analyzed: vutta viparītena atthena sammā sabhāvā ati sammattā sammattā ca te niyatā ca anantaram eva

original: phaladānenāti sammattaniyatā. Ubhayathāpi na niyatāti aniyatā.
analyzed: phala dānena ati ubhayathā api na niyatā ati aniyatā

original: 16. Maggārammaṇattike nibbānaṃ maggati, gavesati, kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggo.
analyzed: magga ārammaṇa ttike nibbānam maggati gavesati kilese vā mārentaḥ gacchati iti maggaḥ

original: Maggo ārammaṇaṃ etesanti maggārammaṇā. Aṭṭhaṅgikopi maggo paccayaṭṭhena etesaṃ hetūti
analyzed: maggaḥ ārammaṇam etesanti magga ārammaṇāḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ api maggaḥ paccaya ṭṭhena etesam hetu uti

original: maggahetukā. Maggasampayuttā vā hetū magge vā hetūti maggahetū. Te etesaṃ hetūtipi
analyzed: magga hetukāḥ magga sampayuttāḥ vā hetū magge vā hetū iti magga hetū te etesam

original: maggahetukā. Sammādiṭṭhi sayaṃ maggo ceva hetu ca. Iti maggo hetu etesantipi maggahetukā.
analyzed: magga hetukā sammādiṭṭhi sayam maggo ca iva hetu ca iti maggaḥ hetu etesan tipi magga hetukā

original: Abhibhavitvā pavattanaṭṭhena maggo adhipati etesanti maggādhipatino.
analyzed: abhibhavitvā pavattana ṭṭhena maggaḥ adhipati etesanti magga adhipatino

original: 17. Uppannattike uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā uddhaṃ pannā gatā pavattāti uppannā. Na uppannāti anuppannā. Pariniṭṭhitakāraṇekadesattā avassaṃ uppajjissantīti uppādino.
analyzed: uppanna ttike uppādataḥ paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgāḥ uddham pannā gatā pavattā ati uppannā na uppannā ati anuppannā pariniṭṭhita kāraṇa eka desa ttā avassam uppajjissanti iti uppādinaḥ

original: 18. Atītattike attano sabhāvaṃ uppādādikkhaṇaṃ vā patvā atikkantāti atītā. Tadubhayampi na āgatāti anāgatā. Taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca uppannāti paccuppannā.
analyzed: atīta ttike attanaḥ sabhāvam uppāda ādi khaṇam vā patvā atikkantā ati atītā tat ubhayam pi na āgatā ati anāgatā tam tam kāraṇam paṭicca uppannā ati paccuppannā

original: 19. Anantarattike atītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etesanti atītārammaṇā. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: anantara ttike atītam ārammaṇam etesanti atīta ārammaṇā sesa pada dvaye pi esa iva nayo

original: 20. Ajjhattattike ‘evaṃ pavattamānā mayaṃ attā’ti gahaṇaṃ, ‘gamissāmā’ti iminā viya
analyzed: ajjhatta ttike evam pavattamānāḥ mayam attā ati gahaṇam gamissāma ati iminā viya

original: adhippāyena attānaṃ adhikāraṃ katvā pavattāti ajjhattā. ‘Ajjhatta’-saddo panāyaṃ
analyzed: adhippāyena attānam adhikāram katvā pavattā ati ajjhattā ajjhatta saddo pana ayam

original: gocarajjhatte niyakajjhatte ajjhattajjhatte visayajjhatteti catūsu atthesu dissati.
analyzed: gocara ajjhatte niyaka ajjhatte ajjhatta ajjhatte visaya ajjhattā iti catūsu atthesu dissati

original: “Tenānanda, bhikkhunā tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapetabbaṃ”,
analyzed: tena ānanda bhikkhunā tasmin yeva purimasmim samādhi nimitte ajjhattam eva cittam saṇṭhapetabbam

original: “ajjhattarato samāhito”tiādīsu hi ayaṃ gocarajjhatte dissati. “Ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ”,
analyzed: ajjhattarataḥ samāhitaḥ ti ādīsu hi ayam gocara jjhatte dissati ajjhattam sampasādanam

original: “ajjhattaṃ vā dhammesu dhammānupassī viharatī”tiādīsu niyakajjhatte. “Cha ajjhattikāni
analyzed: ajjhattam vā dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharati itiādīsu niyaka ajjhatte cha ajjhattikāni

original: āyatanānī”tiādīsu ajjhattajjhatte. “Ayaṃ kho panānanda, vihāro tathāgatena abhisambuddho
analyzed: āyatanāni iti ādīsu ajjhat tajjhatte ayam kho pana ānanda vihāraḥ tathāgatena abhisambuddhaḥ

original: yadidaṃ sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ upasampajja viharatī”tiādīsu
analyzed: yat idam sabba nimittānam a manasikārā ajjhattam suññatam upasampajja viharati itiādīsu

original: visayajjhatte; issariyaṭṭhāneti attho. Phalasamāpatti hi buddhānaṃ issariyaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: visaya jjhatte issariya ṭṭhāne ti attho phala samāpatti hi buddhānam issariya ṭṭhānam

original: nāma. Idha pana niyakajjhatte adhippeto. Tasmā attano santāne pavattā pāṭipuggalikā
analyzed: nāma idha pana niyaka jjhatte adhippeto tasmai attano santāne pavattā pāṭipuggalikā

original: dhammā ajjhattāti veditabbā. Tato bāhirabhūtā pana indriyabaddhā vā anindriyabaddhā
analyzed: dhammā ajjhattā ati veditabbā tatas bāhira bhūtā pana indriya baddhā vā anindriya baddhā

original: vā bahiddhā nāma. Tatiyapadaṃ tadubhayavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vā bahiddhā nāma tatiya padam tad ubhaya vasena vuttam

original: 21. Anantarattiko teyeva tippakārepi dhamme ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanavasena vutto.
analyzed: anantara ttikaḥ te yeva tippakāre pi dhamme ārammaṇam katvā pavattana vasena vuttaḥ

original: 22. Sanidassanattike daṭṭhabbabhāvasaṅkhātena saha nidassanenāti sanidassanā. Paṭihananabhāvasaṅkhātena
analyzed: sa nidassana ttike daṭṭhabba bhāva saṅkhātena saha nidassanena ati sa nidassanā paṭihanana bhāva saṅkhātena

original: saha paṭighenāti sappaṭighā. Sanidassanā ca te sappaṭighā cāti sanidassanasappaṭighā.
analyzed: saha paṭighena ati sa paṭighā sa nidassanā ca te sa paṭighā ca ati sa nidassana sa paṭighā

original: Natthi etesaṃ daṭṭhabbabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ nidassananti anidassanā. Anidassanā ca te vuttanayeneva
analyzed: natthi etesam daṭṭhabba bhāva saṅkhātam nidassananti anidassanāḥ anidassanā ca te vutta nayena iva

original: sappaṭighā cāti anidassanasappaṭighā. Tatiyapadaṃ ubhayapaṭikkhepena vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ
analyzed: sappaṭighā ca ati anidassana sappaṭighā tatiya padam ubhaya paṭikkhepena vuttam ayam

original: tāva tikamātikāya anupubbapadavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: tāva tika mātikāya anupubba pada vaṇṇanā

original: Tikamātikāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: tikamātikā pada vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Dukamātikāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: duka mātikā pada vaṇṇanā

original: 1-6. Dukamātikāyaṃ pana tikesu anāgatapadavaṇṇanaṃyeva karissāma. Hetugocchake tāva
analyzed: duka mātikāyam pana tikesu karissāma hetu gocchake tāva

original: hetudhammāti mūlaṭṭhena hetusaṅkhātā dhammā. Hetū dhammātipi pāṭho. Na hetūti tesaṃyeva
analyzed: hetu dhammā ti mūla ṭṭhena hetu saṅkhātāḥ dhammāḥ hetū dhamma atipi pāṭhaḥ na hetu iti tesam yeva

original: paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. Sampayogato pavattena saha hetunāti sahetukā. Tatheva pavatto
analyzed: paṭikkhepa vacanam sampayogataḥ pavattena saha hetunā ati sa hetukā tathā iva pavatto

original: natthi etesaṃ hetūti ahetukā. Ekuppādāditāya hetunā sampayuttāti hetusampayuttā.
analyzed: na atthi etesam hetū ti ahetukā ekuppāda āditāya hetunā sampayuttā ati hetu sampayuttā

original: Hetunā vippayuttāti hetuvippayuttā. Imesaṃ dvinnampi dukānaṃ kiñcāpi atthato nānattaṃ
analyzed: hetunā vippayuttā ati hetu vippayuttā imesam dvinnam pi dukānam kiñca api atthataḥ nānattam

original: natthi, desanāvilāsena pana tathā bujjhantānaṃ vā puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena vuttā.
analyzed: natthi desanā vilāsena pana tathā bujjhantānam vā puggalānam ajjhāsaya vasena vuttā

original: Tato paraṃ paṭhamadukaṃ dutiyatatiyehi saddhiṃ yojetvā tesaṃ ‘hetū na hetū’tiādīnaṃ
analyzed: tatas param paṭhama dukam dutiya tatiyehi saddhim yojetvā tesam hetū na

original: padānaṃ vasena yathāsambhavato aparepi tayo dukā vuttā. Tattha yatheva ‘hetū ceva
analyzed: padānam vasena yathā sambhavataḥ apare pi tayo dukā vuttā tattha yathā iva hetū ca iva

original: dhammā sahetukā cā’ti etaṃ sambhavati, tathā ‘hetū ceva dhammā ahetukā cā’ti idampi.
analyzed: dhammā sa hetukā ca ati etam sambhavati tathā hetū ca iva dhammā ahetukā ca ati idam pi

original: Yathā ca ‘sahetukā ceva dhammā na ca hetū’ti etaṃ sambhavati, tathā ‘ahetukā ceva
analyzed: yathā ca sa hetukā ca iva dhammā na ca etam sambhavati tathā ahetukā ca iva

original: dhammā na ca hetū’ti idampi. Hetusampayuttadukena saddhiṃ yojanāyapi eseva nayo.
analyzed: dhammā na ca hetu ti saddhim esā iva nayo

original: Tatra yadetaṃ ‘na hetū dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpī’ti siddhe, ‘na hetū kho pana dhammā’ti
analyzed: tatra yat etam na hetū dhammā sa hetukā api ahetukā api iti siddhe na hetū kho pana dhammā ati

original: atirittaṃ ‘kho panā’ti padaṃ vuttaṃ, tassa vasena ayaṃ atirekattho saṅgahitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: atirittam kho pana iti padam vuttam tassa vasena ayam atireka attho saṅgahito ti veditabbo

original: Kathaṃ? Na kevalaṃ ‘na hetu dhammā atha kho aññepi na ca sahetukāpi ahetukāpi icceva,
analyzed: katham na kevalam na hetu dhammā atha kho aññe pi na ca sa hetukā api ahetukā api icca eva

original: atha kho aññathāpīti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yatheva hi ‘na hetū dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpi’,
analyzed: atha kho aññathā api iti idam vuttam hoti yathā iva hi na hetū dhammā sa hetukā api ahetukā api

original: evaṃ ‘hetū dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpi’. Yathā ca ‘na hetū dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpi’,
analyzed: evam hetū dhammā sa hetukā api ahetukā api yathā ca na hetū dhammā sa hetukā api ahetukā api

original: evaṃ ‘na hetū dhammā hetusampayuttāpi hetuvippayuttāpī’ti.
analyzed: evam na hetū dhammā hetu sampayuttā api hetu vippayuttā api iti

original: 7-13. Cūḷantaradukesu attano nipphādakena saha paccayenāti sappaccayā. Natthi etesaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ nipphādakena saha paccayena ati sappaccayā natthi etesam

original: uppāde vā ṭhitiyaṃ vā paccayoti appaccayā. Paccayehi samāgantvā katāti saṅkhatā.
analyzed: uppāde vā ṭhitiyam vā appaccayā paccayehi samāgantvā katā ati saṅkhatā

original: Na saṅkhatāti asaṅkhatā. Avinibbhogavasena rūpaṃ etesaṃ atthīti rūpino. Tathāvidhaṃ
analyzed: na asaṅkhatā ati asaṅkhatā avinibbhoga vasena rūpam etesam atthi iti rūpino tathāvidham

original: natthi etesaṃ rūpanti arūpino. Ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ vā rūpaṃ; taṃ etesaṃ atthīti rūpino.
analyzed: na atthi etesam rūpanti arūpino ruppana lakkhaṇam vā rūpam tam etesam atthi iti rūpino

original: Na rūpino arūpino. Lokiyā dhammāti loko vuccati lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena vaṭṭaṃ; tasmiṃ
analyzed: na rūpinaḥ arūpinaḥ lokiyāḥ dhammā ti lokaḥ vuccati lujjana palujjana ṭṭhena vaṭṭam tasmin

original: pariyāpannabhāvena loke niyuttāti lokiyā. Tato uttiṇṇāti uttarā; loke apariyāpannabhāvena
analyzed: pariyāpanna bhāvena loke niyuttā ati lokiyā tatas uttiṇṇā ati uttarā loke a pariyāpanna bhāvena

original: lokato uttarāti lokuttarā. Kenaci viññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇādīsu kenaci ekena cakkhuviññāṇena
analyzed: lokataḥ uttarā ati lokuttarā kenaci viññeyyā ati cakkhu viññāṇa ādīsu kenaci ekena cakkhu viññāṇena

original: vā sotaviññāṇena vā vijānitabbā. Kenaci na viññeyyāti teneva cakkhuviññāṇena vā sotaviññāṇena
analyzed: vā sota viññāṇena vā vijānitabbā kenacid na viññeyyā ati tena iva cakkhu viññāṇena vā sota viññāṇena

original: vā na vijānitabbā. Evaṃ sante dvinnampi padānaṃ atthanānattato duko hoti.
analyzed: vā na vijānitabbāḥ evam sante dvinnam pi padānam attha nānattataḥ dukaḥ hoti

original: 14-19. Āsavagocchake āsavantīti āsavā. Cakkhutopi…pe… manatopi sandanti pavattantīti
analyzed: āsava gocchake āsavanti iti āsavā manataḥ pi sandanti pavattanti iti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Dhammato yāva gotrabhuṃ, okāsato yāva bhavaggaṃ savantīti vā āsavā.
analyzed: vuttam hoti dhammataḥ yāva gotrabhum okāsataḥ yāva bhavaggam savanti iti vai āsavā

original: Ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā pavattantīti attho. Antokaraṇattho hi ayaṃ ‘ā’kāro.
analyzed: ete dhamme etam ca okāsam antokaritvā pavattanti iti atthaḥ antokaraṇa atthaḥ hi ayam ākāro

original: Cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madirādayo āsavā. Āsavā viyātipi āsavā. Lokasmiñhi cirapārivāsikā
analyzed: cirapārivāsiya ṭṭhena madirā ādayaḥ āsavāḥ āsavāḥ āsavāḥ lokasmin hi cirapārivāsikā

original: madirādayo āsavāti vuccanti. Yadi ca cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena āsavā, eteyeva bhavitumarahanti.
analyzed: madirā ādayaḥ āsavā ti vuccanti yadi ca cira pārivāsiya ṭṭhena āsavāḥ bhavitum arahanti

original: Vuttañhetaṃ – “purimā, bhikkhave, koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya, ito pubbe avijjā nāhosī”tiādi.
analyzed: vuttam ha etam purimā bhikkhave koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya itas pubbe avijjā na ahosi itiādi

original: Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā. Tato aññe no āsavā nāma. Attānaṃ
analyzed: āyatam vā saṃsāra dukkham savanti pasavanti iti pi āsavā tatas aññe no āsavā nāma attānam

original: ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattehi saha āsavehīti sāsavā. Evaṃ pavattamānā natthi etesaṃ āsavāti
analyzed: ārammaṇam katvā pavattehi saha āsavehi iti sa āsavā evam pavattamānā na atthi etesam āsavā ati

original: anāsavā. Sesaṃ hetugocchake vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – yathā tattha
analyzed: anāsavā sesam hetu gocchake vutta nayena veditabbam ayam pana visesaḥ yathā tattha

original: ‘na hetū kho pana dhammā sahetukāpi ahetukāpīti ayaṃ osānaduko paṭhamadukassa dutiyapadaṃ
analyzed: na hetū kho pana dhammā sa hetukā api ahetukā api iti ayam osāna dukaḥ paṭhama dukassa dutiya padam

original: ādimhi ṭhapetvā vutto, evaṃ idha ‘no āsavā kho pana dhammā sāsavāpi anāsavāpī’ti
analyzed: ādimhi ṭhapetvā vuttaḥ evam idha no āsavā kho pana dhammā sa āsavā api anāsavā api iti

original: na vutto. Kiñcāpi na vutto, atha kho ayañca añño ca bhedo tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: na vuttaḥ kiñcā api na vuttaḥ atha kho ayam ca añño ca bhedo tattha vutta nayena iva veditabbo

original: 20-25. Saṃyojanagocchake yassa saṃvijjanti, taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojenti bandhantīti
analyzed: saṃyojana gocchake yassa saṃvijjanti tam puggalam vaṭṭasmim saṃyojenti bandhanti iti

original: saṃyojanā. Tato aññe no saṃyojanā nāma. Ārammaṇabhāvaṃ upagantvā saṃyojanasambandhane
analyzed: saṃyojanā tatas aññe no saṃyojanā nāma ārammaṇa bhāvam upagantvā saṃyojana sambandhane

original: saṃyojanānaṃ hitāti saṃyojaniyā. Saṃyojanassa ārammaṇapaccayabhūtānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: saṃyojanānam hitā ati saṃyojaniyā saṃyojanassa ārammaṇa paccaya bhūtānam etam adhivacanam

original: Na saṃyojaniyā asaṃyojaniyā. Sesaṃ hetugocchake vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: na saṃyojaniyā asaṃyojaniyā sesam hetu gocchake vutta nayena iva yojetabbam

original: 26-31. Ganthagocchake yassa saṃvijjanti taṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena vaṭṭasmiṃ ganthenti
analyzed: gantha gocchake yassa saṃvijjanti tam cuti paṭisandhi vasena vaṭṭasmim ganthenti

original: ghaṭentīti ganthā. Tato aññe no ganthā. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena ganthehi ganthitabbāti
analyzed: ghaṭenti iti ganthā tatas aññe no ganthā ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena ganthehi ganthitabbā ati

original: ganthaniyā. Sesaṃ hetugocchake vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ. Yathā ca idha, evaṃ ito
analyzed: ganthaniyā sesam hetu gocchake vutta nayena iva yojetabbam yathā ca idha evam itas

original: paresupi vuttāvasesaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: paresu pi vutta avasesam tattha tattha vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: 32-37. Oghagocchake yassa saṃvijjanti taṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva ohananti osīdāpentīti oghā.
analyzed: ogha gocchake yassa saṃvijjanti tam vaṭṭasmin yeva ohananti osīdāpenti iti oghāḥ

original: Ārammaṇaṃ katvā atikkamanīyato oghehi atikkamitabbāti oghaniyā. Oghānaṃ ārammaṇadhammā eva veditabbā.
analyzed: ārammaṇam katvā atikkamanīyataḥ oghehi atikkamitabbā ati oghaniyāḥ oghānam ārammaṇa dhammāḥ eva veditabbā

original: 38-43. Yogagocchake vaṭṭasmiṃ yojentīti yogā. Yoganiyā oghaniyā viya veditabbā.
analyzed: yogagocchake vaṭṭasmim yojenti iti yogāḥ yoga niyā ogha niyā viya veditabbā

original: 44-49. Nīvaraṇagocchake cittaṃ nīvaranti pariyonandhantīti nīvaraṇā. Nīvaraṇiyā saṃyojaniyā viya veditabbā.
analyzed: nīvaraṇa gocchake cittam nīvaranti pariyonandhanti iti nīvaraṇā nīvaraṇiyā saṃyojaniyā viya veditabbā

original: 50-54. Parāmāsagocchake dhammānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ aniccādiākāraṃ atikkamitvā ‘nicca’nti
analyzed: parāmāsa gocchake dhammānam yathābhūtam anicca ādi ākāram atikkamitvā niccanti

original: ādivasena pavattamānā parato āmasantīti parāmāsā. Parāmāsehi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena
analyzed: ādi vasena pavattamānā paratas āmasanti iti parāmāsā parāmāsehi ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena

original: parāmaṭṭhattā parāmaṭṭhā.
analyzed: parāmaṭṭha ttā parāmaṭṭhā

original: 55-68. Mahantaradukesu ārammaṇaṃ aggahetvā appavattito saha ārammaṇenāti sārammaṇā.
analyzed: mahantara dukesu ārammaṇam aggahetvā appavattitaḥ saha ārammaṇena ati sa ārammaṇā

original: Natthi etesaṃ ārammaṇanti anārammaṇā. Cintanaṭṭhena cittā, vicittaṭṭhena vā cittā.
analyzed: natthi etesam ārammaṇanti anārammaṇā cintana ṭṭhena cittā vicitta ṭṭhena vā cittā

original: Avippayogavasena cetasi niyuttāti cetasikā. Nirantarabhāvūpagamanatāya, uppādato
analyzed: a vippayoga vasena cetasi niyuttā ati cetasikā nirantara bhāva upagamana tāya uppādato

original: yāva bhaṅgā, cittena saṃsaṭṭhāti cittasaṃsaṭṭhā. Ekato vattamānāpi nirantarabhāvaṃ
analyzed: yāva bhaṅgā cittena saṃsaṭṭhā ati citta saṃsaṭṭhā ekatas vattamānā api nirantara bhāvam

original: anupagamanatāya cittena visaṃsaṭṭhāti cittavisaṃsaṭṭhā. Samuṭṭhahanti etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: an upagamana tāya cittena visaṃsaṭṭhā ati citta visaṃsaṭṭhā samuṭṭhahanti etena ati samuṭṭhānam

original: Cittaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ etesanti cittasamuṭṭhānā. Saha bhavantīti sahabhuno. Cittena sahabhuno
analyzed: cittam samuṭṭhānam etesanti citta samuṭṭhānā saha bhavanti iti cittena

original: cittasahabhuno. Anuparivattantīti anuparivattino. Kiṃ anuparivattanti? Cittaṃ. Cittassa
analyzed: citta sahabhunaḥ anuparivattanti iti anuparivattinaḥ kim anuparivattanti cittam cittassa

original: anuparivattino cittānuparivattino. Cittasaṃsaṭṭhā ca te cittasamuṭṭhānā cāti cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā.
analyzed: anuparivattinaḥ citta anuparivattinaḥ citta saṃsaṭṭhā ca te citta samuṭṭhānā ca ati citta saṃsaṭṭha samuṭṭhānā

original: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhā ca te cittasamuṭṭhānā ca cittasahabhuno eva cāti cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno.
analyzed: citta saṃsaṭṭhā ca te citta samuṭṭhānā ca citta sahabhuno eva ca ati citta saṃsaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhuno

original: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhā ca te cittasamuṭṭhānā ca cittānuparivattino eva cāti cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino.
analyzed: citta saṃsaṭṭhā ca te citta samuṭṭhānā ca citta anuparivattinaḥ eva ca ati citta saṃsaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattinaḥ

original: Sesāni sabbapadāni vuttapadānaṃ paṭikkhepavasena veditabbāni. Ajjhattajjhattaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: sesāni sabba padāni vutta padānam paṭikkhepa vasena veditabbāni ajjhatta ajjhattam sandhāya

original: ajjhattattike vuttavasena ajjhattāva ajjhattikā. Tato bahibhūtāti bāhirā. Upādiyanteva
analyzed: ajjhatta ttike vutta vasena ajjhattā ava ajjhattikā tatas bahi bhūtā ati bāhirāḥ upādiyanta iva

original: bhūtāni, na bhūtāni viya upādiyantīti upādā. Na upādiyantevāti noupādā.
analyzed: bhūtāni na bhūtāni viyaḥ upādiyanti iti upādāḥ na upādiyanta iva ati na upādā

original: 69-74. Upādānagocchake bhusaṃ ādiyantīti upādānā; daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhantīti attho. Tato aññe noupādānā.
analyzed: upādāna gocchake bhusam ādiyanti iti upādānāḥ daḷhaggāham gaṇhanti iti attho tatas aññe no upādānā

original: 75-82. Kilesagocchake saṃkiliṭṭhattike vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
analyzed: kilesa gocchake vutta nayena iva atthaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: 83-100. Piṭṭhidukesu kāme avacarantīti kāmāvacarā rūpe avacarantīti rūpāvacarā. Arūpe
analyzed: piṭṭhidukesu kāme avacaranti iti kāma avacarāḥ rūpe avacaranti iti rūpa avacarāḥ arūpe

original: avacarantīti arūpāvacarā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana parato āvi bhavissati.
analyzed: avacaranti iti arūpāvacarāḥ ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāro pana paratas bhavissati

original: Tebhūmakavaṭṭe pariyāpannā antogadhāti pariyāpannā. Tasmiṃ na pariyāpannāti apariyāpannā.
analyzed: tebhūmakavaṭṭe pariyāpannā antogadhā ati pariyāpannā tasmin na pariyāpannā ati a pariyāpannā

original: Vaṭṭamūlaṃ chindantā nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vaṭṭato niyyantīti niyyānikā. Iminā
analyzed: vaṭṭa mūlam chindantā nibbānam ārammaṇam katvā vaṭṭataḥ niyyanti iti niyyānikāḥ iminā

original: lakkhaṇena na niyyantīti aniyyānikā. Cutiyā vā attano vā pavattiyā anantaraṃ phaladāne
analyzed: lakkhaṇena na niyyanti iti aniyyānikā cutiyā vā attanaḥ vā pavattiyā anantaram phala dāne

original: niyatattā niyatā. Tathā aniyatattā aniyatā. Aññe dhamme uttaranti pajahantīti uttarā.
analyzed: niyata ttā niyatā tathā aniyata ttā aniyatā aññe dhamme uttaranti pajahanti iti uttarā

original: Attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha uttarehīti sauttarā. Natthi etesaṃ uttarāti anuttarā.
analyzed: attānam uttaritum samatthehi saha uttarehi iti sa uttarā na atthi etesam uttarā ati anuttarā

original: Raṇanti etehīti raṇā; yehi abhibhūtā sattā nānappakārena kandanti paridevanti, tesaṃ
analyzed: raṇanti etehi iti raṇā yehi abhibhūtā sattā nānappakārena kandanti paridevanti tesam

original: rāgādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sampayogavasena pahānekaṭṭhatāvasena ca saha raṇehīti
analyzed: rāga ādīnam adhivacanam sampayoga vasena ca saha raṇehi iti

original: saraṇā. Tenākārena natthi etesaṃ raṇāti araṇā.
analyzed: saraṇā tena ākārena na atthi etesam raṇāti araṇā

original: Suttantikadukamātikāpadavaṇṇanā
101-108. Suttantikadukesu sampayogavasena vijjaṃ bhajantīti vijjābhāgino; vijjābhāge
analyzed: sutta antika dukesu sampayoga vasena vijjam bhajanti iti vijjābhāginaḥ vijjābhāge

original: vijjākoṭṭhāse vattantītipi vijjābhāgino. Tattha vipassanāñāṇaṃ, manomayiddhi, cha
analyzed: vijjā koṭṭhāse vattanti iti pi vijjā bhāginaḥ tattha vipassanā ñāṇam cha

original: abhiññāti aṭṭha vijjā. Purimena atthena tāhi sampayuttadhammāpi vijjābhāgino. Pacchimena
analyzed: abhiññāti aṭṭha vijjā purimena atthena tāhi sampayutta dhammā api vijjā bhāginaḥ pacchimena

original: atthena tāsu yā kāci ekā vijjā vijjā. Sesā vijjābhāginoti. Evaṃ vijjāpi vijjāya sampayuttadhammāpi
analyzed: atthena tāsu yā kāci ekā vijjā vijjā sesāḥ vijjā bhāgino ti evam vijjā api vijjāya sampayutta dhammā api

original: vijjābhāginotveva veditabbā. Idha pana sampayuttadhammāva adhippetā. Sampayogavaseneva
analyzed: vijjā bhāgino tu eva veditabbāḥ idha pana sampayutta dhammā ava adhippetā sampayoga vasena iva

original: avijjaṃ bhajantīti avijjābhāgino. Avijjābhāge avijjākoṭṭhāse vattantītipi avijjābhāgino.
analyzed: avijjam bhajanti iti avijjā bhāginaḥ avijjā bhāge avijjā koṭṭhāse vattanti iti pi avijjā bhāginaḥ

original: Tattha dukkhapaṭicchādakaṃ tamo samudayādipaṭicchādakanti catasso avijjā. Purimanayeneva
analyzed: tattha dukkha paṭicchādakam tamaḥ samudaya ādi paṭicchādakam ti catasso avijjā purima nayena eva

original: tāhi sampayuttadhammāpi avijjābhāgino. Tāsu yā kāci ekā avijjā avijjā. Sesā avijjābhāginoti.
analyzed: tāhi sampayutta dhammā api avijjā bhāgino tāsu yā kāci ekā avijjā avijjā sesāḥ avijjā bhāgino ti

original: Evaṃ avijjāpi avijjāya sampayuttadhammāpi avijjābhāginotveva veditabbā. Idha pana
analyzed: evam avijjā api avijjāya sampayutta dhammā api avijjā bhāgino tu eva veditabbā idha pana

original: sampayuttadhammāva adhippetā.
analyzed: sampayutta dhammā ava adhippetā

original: Puna anajjhottharaṇabhāvena kilesandhakāraṃ viddhaṃsetuṃ asamatthatāya vijju upamā
analyzed: puna an ajjhottharaṇa bhāvena kilesa andhakāram a samattha tāya upamā

original: etesanti vijjūpamā. Nissesaṃ viddhaṃsanasamatthatāya vajiraṃ upamā etesanti vajirūpamā.
analyzed: etesanti vijju upamā nissesam viddhaṃsana samattha tāya vajiram upamā etesanti vajirūpamā

original: Bālesu ṭhitattā yattha ṭhitā tadupacārena bālā. Paṇḍitesu ṭhitattā paṇḍitā. Bālakarattā
analyzed: bālesu ṭhitattā yattha ṭhitā tad upacārena bālā paṇḍitesu ṭhitattā paṇḍitā bālakarattā

original: vā bālā, paṇḍitakarattā paṇḍitā. Kaṇhāti kāḷakā, cittassa apabhassarabhāvakaraṇā.
analyzed: vā bālā paṇḍitaka rattā paṇḍitā kaṇhā ati kāḷakā cittassa apabhassara bhāva karaṇā

original: Sukkāti odātā, cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇā. Kaṇhābhijātihetuto vā kaṇhā; sukkābhijātihetuto
analyzed: sukkā ati odātā cittassa pabhassara bhāva karaṇā kaṇhā abhijāti hetutaḥ vā kaṇhā sukka abhijāti hetutaḥ

original: sukkā. Idha ceva samparāye ca tapentīti tapanīyā. Na tapanīyā atapanīyā.
analyzed: sukkāḥ idha ca iva samparāye ca tapenti iti tapanīyā na tapanīyā a tapanīyā

original: Adhivacanadukādayo tayo atthato ninnānākaraṇā; byañjanamevettha nānaṃ. Sirivaḍḍhako
analyzed: adhivacana duka ādayo atthataḥ ninnānākaraṇāḥ byañjanam eva ittha nānam sirivaḍḍhako

original: dhanavaḍḍhakoti ādayo hi vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattā adhivacanā nāma.
analyzed: ādayaḥ hi vacana mattam eva adhikāram katvā pavattā adhivacanāḥ nāma

original: Adhivacanānaṃ pathā adhivacanapathā. “Abhisaṅkharontīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā saṅkhārā”ti
analyzed: adhivacanānam pathā adhivacana pathā abhisaṅkharonti iti kho bhikkhave tasmai

original: evaṃ niddhāretvā sahetukaṃ katvā vuccamānā abhilāpā nirutti nāma. Niruttīnaṃ pathā
analyzed: evam niddhāretvā sa hetukam katvā vuccamānāḥ abhilāpāḥ nāma niruttīnam pathā

original: niruttipathā. Takko vitakko saṅkappoti evaṃ tena tena pakārena ñāpanato paññatti
analyzed: nirutti pathā takkaḥ vitakkaḥ saṅkappo ti evam tena tena pakārena ñāpanato paññatti

original: nāma. Paññattīnaṃ pathā paññattipathā. Ettha ca ekaṃ dukaṃ vatvāpi itaresaṃ vacane
analyzed: nāma paññattīnam pathā paññatti pathā ettha ca ekam dukam vatvā api itaresam vacane

original: payojanaṃ hetugocchake vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: payojanam hetu gocchake vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: 109-118. Nāmarūpaduke nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena namanaṭṭhena nāmanaṭṭhena ca nāmaṃ. Ruppanaṭṭhena

original: khaṇāyattasseva tassa kusalassa ananuṭṭhānena moghakhaṇaṃ kurumānānaṃ pamādavihāro
analyzed: khaṇa āyattassa iva tassa kusalassa an anuṭṭhānena mogha khaṇam kurumānānam pamāda vihāro

original: paṭisedhito hoti. Ayaṃ khaṇasaṅkhātena samayena attho dīpito.
analyzed: paṭisedhito hoti ayam khaṇa saṅkhātena samayena atthaḥ dīpito

original: Yo panetassa kusalacittassa pavattikālo nāma hoti, so atiparitto. Sā cassa atiparittatā
analyzed: yaḥ pana itassa kusala cittassa pavatti kālaḥ nāma hoti saḥ ati parittaḥ sā ca ssa ati paritta tā

original: “yathā ca, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa javo, yathā ca candimasūriyānaṃ javo, yathā
analyzed: yathā ca bhikkhave tassa purisassa javaḥ yathā ca candima sūriyānam javaḥ yathā

original: ca yā devatā candimasūriyānaṃ purato dhāvanti tāsaṃ devatānaṃ javo, tato sīghataraṃ
analyzed: ca yāḥ devatā candima sūriyānam puratas dhāvanti tāsam devatānam sīghataram

original: āyusaṅkhārā khīyantī”ti – imassa suttassa aṭṭhakathāvasena veditabbā. Tatra hi so
analyzed: āyu saṅkhārā khīyanti iti imassa suttassa aṭṭhakathā vasena veditabbā tatra hi so

original: rūpajīvitindriyassa tāva parittako kālo vutto. Yāva paṭuppannaṃ rūpaṃ tiṭṭhati tāva
analyzed: rūpa jīvita indriyassa tāva parittakaḥ kālaḥ vuttaḥ yāva paṭuppannam rūpam tiṭṭhati tāva

original: soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā bhijjanti. Iti tesaṃ kālaparittatāya upamāpi natthi. Tenevāha
analyzed: soḷasa cittāni uppajjitvā bhijjanti iti tesam kāla paritta tāya upamā api na atthi tena iva āha

original: – “yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, upamāpi na sukarā yāva lahuparivattaṃ citta”nti. Evametesu
analyzed: yāvat cidam bhikkhave upamā api na sukarā yāva lahu parivattam cittam ti evam etesu

original: kālasaṅkhāto samayo kusalacittappavattikālassa atiparittataṃ dīpeti. Evaṃ dīpentena
analyzed: kāla saṅkhātaḥ samayaḥ kusala citta pavatti kālassa atiparitta tam dīpeti evam dīpentena

original: cānena atiparittakālatāya, vijjulatobhāsena muttāvuṇanaṃ viya, duppaṭivijjhamidaṃ
analyzed: ca anena ati paritta kāla tāya vijju latā bhāsena muttā vuṇanam viya duppaṭivijjham idam

original: cittaṃ, tasmā etassa paṭivedhe mahāussāho ca ādaro ca kattabboti ovādo dinno hoti.
analyzed: cittam tasmai etassa paṭivedhe mahā ussāhaḥ ca ādaro ca kattabbo iti ovādaḥ dinno hoti

original: Ayaṃ kālasaṅkhātena samayena attho dīpito.
analyzed: ayam kāla saṅkhātena samayena atthaḥ dīpito

original: Samūhasaṅkhāto pana samayo anekesaṃ sahuppattiṃ dīpeti. Phassādīnañhi dhammānaṃ puñjo
analyzed: samūha saṅkhātaḥ pana samayaḥ anekesam sahuppattim dīpeti phassa ādīnam hi dhammānam puñjaḥ

original: samūhoti vutto. Tasmiñca uppajjamānaṃ cittaṃ saha tehi dhammehi uppajjatīti anekesaṃ
analyzed: samūhaḥ ti vuttaḥ tasmin ca uppajjamānam cittam saha tehi dhammehi uppajjati iti anekesam

original: sahuppatti dīpitā. Evaṃ dīpentena cānena ekasseva dhammassa uppatti paṭisedhitā hoti.
analyzed: sahuppatti dīpitā evam dīpentena ca anena ekassa iva dhammassa uppatti paṭisedhitā hoti

original: Ayaṃ samūhasaṅkhātena samayena attho dīpito.
analyzed: ayam samūha saṅkhātena samayena atthaḥ dīpito

original: Hetusaṅkhāto pana samayo parāyattavuttitaṃ dīpeti. ‘Yasmiṃ samaye’ti hi padassa yasmā
analyzed: hetu saṅkhātaḥ pana samayaḥ para āyatta vutti tam dīpeti yasmin samaya iti hi padassa yasmā

original: ‘yasmiṃ hetumhi sati’ uppannaṃ hotīti ayamattho, tasmā ‘hetumhi sati’ pavattito parāyattavuttitā
analyzed: yasmin hetumhi sati uppannam hoti iti ayam attho tasmā hetumhi sati pavattitaḥ parāyatta vutti tā

original: dīpitā. Evaṃ dīpentena cānena dhammānaṃ savasavattitābhimāno paṭisedhito hoti. Ayaṃ
analyzed: dīpitā evam dīpentena ca anena dhammānam sava savatti tā abhimāno paṭisedhito hoti ayaṃ

original: hetusaṅkhātena samayena attho dīpito.
analyzed: hetu saṅkhātena samayena atthaḥ dīpito

original: Tattha ‘yasmiṃ samaye’ti kālasaṅkhātassa samayassa vasena ‘yasmiṃ kāle’ti attho;
analyzed: tattha yasmin samaye iti kāla saṅkhātassa samayassa vasena yasmin kāle iti atthaḥ

original: samūhasaṅkhātassa ‘yasmiṃ samūhe’ti. Khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātānaṃ ‘yasmiṃ khaṇe sati,
analyzed: samūha saṅkhātassa yasmin samūhe iti khaṇa samavāya hetu saṅkhātānam yasmin khaṇe sati

original: yāya sāmaggiyā sati, yamhi hetumhi sati’ kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
analyzed: sati yamhi hetumhi sati kāmāvacaram kusalam cittam uppannam hoti

original: tasmiṃyeva sati ‘phassādayopī’ti ayamattho veditabbo. Adhikaraṇañhi kālasaṅkhāto
analyzed: tasmin yeva sati phassa ādayaḥ api iti ayam atthaḥ veditabbaḥ adhikaraṇam hi kāla saṅkhātaḥ

original: samūhasaṅkhāto ca samayo. Tattha vuttadhammānanti adhikaraṇavasenettha bhummaṃ. Khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa
analyzed: samūha saṅkhātaḥ ca samayaḥ tattha vutta dhammānam ti adhikaraṇa vasena ittha bhummam khaṇa samavāya hetu saṅkhātassa

original: ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyatīti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇavasenettha bhummaṃ.
analyzed: ca samayassa bhāvena tesam bhāvaḥ lakkhīyati iti bhāvena bhāva lakkhaṇa vasena ittha bhummam

original: Kāmāvacaranti “katame dhammā kāmāvacarā? Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ uparito paranimmitavasavattiṃ
analyzed: kāmāvacaranti katame dhammā kāmāvacarāḥ heṭṭhatas avīcinirayam uparitas paranimmitavasavattim

original: pariyantaṃ katvā”tiādinā nayena vuttesu kāmāvacaradhammesu pariyāpannaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ
analyzed: pariyantam katvā ati ādinā nayena vuttesu kāmāvacara dhammesu pariyāpannam tatra ayam

original: vacanattho – uddānato dve kāmā, vatthukāmo ca kilesakāmo ca. Tattha kilesakāmo atthato
analyzed: vacanatthaḥ uddānataḥ dve kāmā vatthu kāmo ca kilesa kāmo ca tattha kilesa kāmo atthataḥ

original: chandarāgova vatthukāmo tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ. Kilesakāmo cettha kāmetīti kāmo; itaro pana
analyzed: chanda rāga uva vatthu kāmo kilesa kāmo ca ittha kāma iti iti kāmaḥ itaro pana

original: kāmiyatīti kāmo. Yasmiṃ pana padese duvidhopeso kāmo pavattivasena avacarati, so
analyzed: kāmiyati iti kāmaḥ yasmin pana padese duvidha upeso kāmo pavatti vasena avacarati so

original: catunnaṃ apāyānaṃ, manussānaṃ, channañca devalokānaṃ vasena ekādasavidho padeso.
analyzed: catunnam apāyānam manussānam channam ca deva lokānam vasena ekādasavidhaḥ padesaḥ

original: Kāmo ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacaro, sasatthāvacaro viya. Yathā hi yasmiṃ padese sasatthā
analyzed: kāmaḥ ettha avacarati iti kāma avacaraḥ sa sattha avacaraḥ viya yathā hi yasmin padese

original: purisā avacaranti, so vijjamānesupi aññesu dvipadacatuppadesu avacarantesu, tesaṃ
analyzed: purisāḥ avacaranti saḥ vijjamānesu pi aññesu dvipada catuppadesu avacarantesu tesam

original: abhilakkhitattā ‘sasatthāvacaro’tveva vuccati, evaṃ vijjamānesupi aññesu rūpāvacarādīsu
analyzed: abhilakkhita ttā sa satthāvacaraḥ tu eva vuccati evam vijjamānesu pi aññesu rūpāvacara ādīsu

original: tattha avacarantesu, tesaṃ abhilakkhitattā ayaṃ padeso ‘kāmāvacaro’tveva vuccati.
analyzed: tattha avacarantesu tesam abhilakkhita ttā ayam padeso kāmāvacaro tu eva vuccati

original: Svāyaṃ yathā rūpabhavo rūpaṃ, evaṃ uttarapadalopaṃ katvā ‘kāmo’tveva vuccati. Evamidaṃ
analyzed: yathā rūpa bhavaḥ rūpam evam uttara pada lopam katvā vuccati evam idam

original: cittaṃ imasmiṃ ekādasapadesasaṅkhāte kāme avacaratīti kāmāvacaraṃ.
analyzed: cittam imasmin ekādasa padesa saṅkhāte kāme avacarati iti kāmāvacaram

original: Kiñcāpi hi etaṃ rūpārūpabhavesupi avacarati, yathā pana saṅgāme avacaraṇato saṅgāmāvacaroti
analyzed: kiñca api hi etam avacarati yathā pana saṅgāme avacaraṇataḥ saṅgāma avacaroti

original: laddhanāmako nāgo nagare carantopi ‘saṅgāmāvacaro’tveva vuccati, thalajalacarā ca
analyzed: laddha nāmakaḥ nāgaḥ nagare vuccati thala jala carā ca

original: pāṇā athale ajale ca ṭhitāpi ‘thalacarā jalacarā’tveva vuccanti, evamidaṃ aññattha
analyzed: pāṇāḥ a thale a jale ca thala carāḥ jala carāḥ tu eva vuccanti evam idam

original: avacarantampi kāmāvacaramevāti veditabbaṃ. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena vā ettha kāmo avacaratītipi
analyzed: avacarantam pi kāmāvacaram eva ati veditabbam ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena vā ettha kāmaḥ avacarati iti pi

original: kāmāvacaraṃ. Kāmañcesa rūpārūpāvacaresupi avacarati, yathā pana vadatīti ‘vaccho’,
analyzed: avacarati yathā pana vadati iti

original: mahiyaṃ setīti ‘mahiṃso’ti vutte, na sattā yattakā vadanti, mahiyaṃ vā senti sabbesaṃ
analyzed: mahiyam seti iti mahiṃso ti vutte na sattāḥ yattakāḥ vadanti mahiyam vā senti sabbesam

original: taṃ nāmaṃ hoti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Apica kāmabhavasaṅkhāte kāme paṭisandhiṃ
analyzed: tam nāmam hoti evaṃsampadam idam veditabbam api ca kāma bhava saṅkhāte kāme paṭisandhim

original: avacāretītipi kāmāvacaraṃ.
analyzed: avacāra iti itipi kāma avacaram

original: Kusalanti kucchitānaṃ salanādīhi atthehi kusalaṃ. Apica ārogyaṭṭhena anavajjaṭṭhena
analyzed: kusalanti salana ādīhi atthehi kusalam apica ārogya ṭṭhena anavajja ṭṭhena

original: kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena ca kusalaṃ. Yatheva hi ‘kacci nu bhoto kusala’nti rūpakāye
analyzed: kosalla sambhūta ṭṭhena ca kusalam yathā iva hi kacci nu bhoto rūpa kāye

original: anāturatāya agelaññena nibyādhitāya ārogyaṭṭhena kusalaṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ arūpadhammepi
analyzed: anātura tāya a gelaññena nibyādhitāya ārogya ṭṭhena kusalam vuttam evam arūpa dhamme pi

original: kilesāturatāya kilesagelaññassa ca kilesabyādhino abhāvena ārogyaṭṭhena kusalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: kilesa ātura tāya kilesa gelaññassa ca kilesa byādhinaḥ abhāvena ārogya ṭṭhena kusalam veditabbam

original: Kilesavajjassa pana kilesadosassa kilesadarathassa ca abhāvā anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ.
analyzed: kilesa vajjassa pana kilesa dosassa ca abhāvā anavajja ṭṭhena kusalam

original: Kosallaṃ vuccati paññā; kosallato sambhūtattā kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalaṃ.
analyzed: kosallam vuccati paññā kosallataḥ sambhūta ttā kosalla sambhūta ṭṭhena kusalam

original: ‘Ñāṇasampayuttaṃ’ tāva evaṃ hotu; ñāṇavippayuttaṃ kathanti. Tampi ruḷhīsaddena kusalameva.
analyzed: ñāṇa sampayuttam tāva evam hotu ñāṇa vippayuttam kathanti tam pi ruḷhī saddena kusalam eva

original: Yathā hi tālapaṇṇehi akatvā kilañjādīhi katampi taṃsarikkhattā ruḷhīsaddena tālavaṇṭantveva
analyzed: yathā hi tāla paṇṇehi a katvā kilañja ādīhi taṃsa rikkhattā ruḷhī saddena

original: vuccati, evaṃ ‘ñāṇavippayutta’mpi kusalantveva veditabbaṃ. Nippariyāyena pana ‘ñāṇasampayuttaṃ’
analyzed: vuccati evam ñāṇa vippayuttam pi kusalan tu eva veditabbam nippariyāyena pana ñāṇa sampayuttam

original: ārogyaṭṭhena anavajjaṭṭhena kosallasambhūtaṭṭhenāti tividhenapi kusalanti nāmaṃ labhati,
analyzed: ārogya ṭṭhena anavajja ṭṭhena kosalla sambhūta ṭṭhena ati tividhena api nāmam labhati

original: ñāṇavippayuttaṃ duvidheneva. Iti yañca jātakapariyāyena yañca bāhitikasuttapariyāyena
analyzed: ñāṇa vippayuttam duvidhena iva iti yat ca jātaka pariyāyena yat ca bāhitika sutta pariyāyena

original: yañca abhidhammapariyāyena kusalaṃ kathitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ tīhipi atthehi imasmiṃ citte labbhati.
analyzed: yat ca abhidhamma pariyāyena kusalam kathitam sabbam tam tīhi pi atthehi imasmim citte labbhati

original: Tadetaṃ lakkhaṇādivasena anavajjasukhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ, akusalaviddhaṃsanarasaṃ, vodānapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: tat etam lakkhaṇa ādi vasena anavajja sukha vipāka lakkhaṇam akusala viddhaṃsana rasam vodāna paccupaṭṭhānam

original: yonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Avajjapaṭipakkhattā vā anavajjalakkhaṇameva kusalaṃ,
analyzed: yoni soma nasikāra padaṭṭhānam avajja paṭipakkha ttā vā anavajja lakkhaṇam eva kusalam

original: vodānabhāvarasaṃ, iṭṭhavipākapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, yathāvuttapadaṭṭhānameva. Lakkhaṇādīsu
analyzed: vodāna bhāva rasam iṭṭha vipāka paccupaṭṭhānam yathā vutta padaṭṭhānam eva lakkhaṇa ādīsu

original: hi tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo vā sāmaññaṃ vā lakkhaṇaṃ nāma. Kiccaṃ vā sampatti
analyzed: hi tesam tesam dhammānam sabhāvaḥ vā sāmaññam vā lakkhaṇam nāma kiccam vā sampatti

original: vā raso nāma. Upaṭṭhānākāro vā phalaṃ vā paccupaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Āsannakāraṇaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: vā rasaḥ nāma upaṭṭhāna ākāraḥ vā phalam vā paccupaṭṭhānam nāma āsanna kāraṇam padaṭṭhānam

original: nāma. Iti yattha yattha lakkhaṇādīni vakkhāma tattha tattha imināva nayena tesaṃ
analyzed: nāma iti yattha yattha lakkhaṇa ādīni vakkhāma tattha tattha iminā ava nayena tesam

original: nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: nānattam veditabbam

original: Cittanti ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti cittaṃ; vijānātīti attho. Yasmā vā ‘citta’nti sabbacittasādhāraṇo
analyzed: cittam ti ārammaṇam cinteti iti cittam vijānāti iti atthaḥ yasmā vā cittam ti sabba citta sādhāraṇaḥ

original: esa saddo, tasmā yadettha lokiyakusalākusalakiriyacittaṃ, taṃ javanavīthivasena attano
analyzed: esa saddo tasmai yat ettha lokiya kusala akusala kiriya cittam tam javana vīthi vasena

original: santānaṃ cinotīti cittaṃ. Vipākaṃ kammakilesehi citanti cittaṃ. Apica sabbampi yathānurūpato
analyzed: santānam cinoti iti cittam vipākam kamma kilesehi citanti cittam apica sabbam pi yathā anurūpato

original: cittatāya cittaṃ. Cittakaraṇatāya cittanti evampettha attho veditabbo. Tattha yasmā
analyzed: citta tāya cittam citta karaṇa tāya cittanti evam pi ittha atthaḥ veditabbo tattha yasmā

original: aññadeva sarāgaṃ cittaṃ, aññaṃ sadosaṃ, aññaṃ samohaṃ; aññaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ, aññaṃ rūpāvacarādibhedaṃ;
analyzed: sa rāgam cittam aññam sa dosam aññam sa moham aññam kāmāvacaram aññam rūpāvacara ādi bhedam

original: aññaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ, aññaṃ saddādiārammaṇaṃ; rūpārammaṇesu cāpi aññaṃ nīlārammaṇaṃ,
analyzed: aññam rūpa ārammaṇam aññam sadda ādi ārammaṇam rūpa ārammaṇesu ca api aññam nīla ārammaṇam

original: aññaṃ pītādiārammaṇaṃ; saddādiārammaṇesupi eseva nayo; sabbesupi cetesu aññaṃ hīnaṃ
analyzed: aññam pīta ādi ārammaṇam sadda ādi ārammaṇesu pi esa iva nayaḥ sabbesu pi ca etesu aññam hīnam

original: aññaṃ majjhimaṃ aññaṃ paṇītaṃ; hīnādīsupi aññaṃ chandādhipateyyaṃ, aññaṃ vīriyādhipateyyaṃ
analyzed: aññam majjhimam aññam paṇītam hīna ādīsu pi aññam chanda ādhipateyyam aññam vīriya ādhipateyyam

original: aññaṃ cittādhipateyyaṃ, aññaṃ vīmaṃsādhipateyyaṃ, tasmā assa imesaṃ sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇahīnamajjhimapaṇītādhipatīnaṃ
analyzed: aññam citta ādhipateyyam aññam vīmaṃsā ādhipateyyam tasmai asse imesam sampayutta bhūmi ārammaṇa hīna majjhima paṇīta adhipatīnam

original: vasena cittatā veditabbā. Kāmañcettha ekameva evaṃ cittaṃ na hoti, cittānaṃ pana
analyzed: vasena citta tā veditabbā kāmam ca ittha ekam eva evam cittam na hoti cittānam pana

original: antogadhattā etesu yaṃkiñci ekampi cittatāya cittanti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Evaṃ tāva cittatāya cittaṃ.
analyzed: etesu yaṃkiñci ekam pi citta tāya cittanti vattum vaṭṭati evam tāva citta tāya cittam

original: Kathaṃ cittakaraṇatāyāti? Lokasmiñhi cittakammato uttari aññaṃ cittaṃ nāma natthi.
analyzed: katham citta karaṇa tāya ati lokasmin hi citta kammato uttari aññam cittam nāma natthi

original: Tasmimpi caraṇaṃ nāma cittaṃ aticittameva hoti. Taṃ karontānaṃ cittakārānaṃ ‘evaṃvidhāni
analyzed: caraṇam nāma cittam ati cittam eva hoti tam karontānam citta kārānam evaṃvidhāni

original: ettha rūpāni kātabbānī’ti cittasaññā uppajjati. Tāya cittasaññāya lekhāgahanarañjanaujjotanavattanādinipphādikā
analyzed: ettha rūpāni kātabbāni iti citta saññā uppajjati tāya citta saññāya lekhā gahana rañjana ujjotana vattana ādi nipphādikā

original: cittakiriyā uppajjanti, tato caraṇasaṅkhāte citte aññataraṃ vicittarūpaṃ nipphajjati.
analyzed: citta kiriyāḥ uppajjanti tatas caraṇa saṅkhāte citte aññataram vicitta rūpam nipphajjati

original: Tato ‘imassa rūpassa upari idaṃ hotu, heṭṭhā idaṃ, ubhayapasse ida’nti cintetvā yathācintitena
analyzed: tatas imassa rūpassa upari idam hotu heṭṭhā idam ubhaya passe idam ti cintetvā yathā cintitena

original: kamena sesacittarūpanipphādanaṃ hoti, evaṃ yaṃkiñci loke vicittaṃ sippajātaṃ sabbaṃ
analyzed: kamena sesa citta rūpa nipphādanam hoti evam yaṃ kiñci loke vicittam sippa jātam sabbam

original: taṃ citteneva kariyati, evaṃ imāya karaṇavicittatāya tassa tassa cittassa nipphādakaṃ

analyzed: hoti iti veditabbam imesu pana suttesu ekam vā dve vā aggahetvā sutta anurakkhaṇa tthāya

analyzed: sabbāni api gahitāni iti veditabbāni

original: “Saṃsaṭṭhāva tumhe ayye viharathā”ti avassute. “Gihi saṃsaṭṭho viharatī”ti mittasanthave.

original: “Idaṃ sukhaṃ imāya pītiyā sahagataṃ hoti sahajātaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayutta”nti sahajāte.

original: Tattha catusamuṭṭhānaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ rūpameva rūpārammaṇaṃ. Dvisamuṭṭhāno

original: “Imesaṃ kho, āvuso, pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ nānāvisayānaṃ nānāgocarānaṃ na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontānaṃ mano paṭisaraṇaṃ mano nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī”ti.

original: Etesañhi rūpārammaṇādīni gocaravisayo nāma. Tāni manena paccanubhaviyamānānipi rūpārammaṇādīniyevāti

original: dhammārammaṇāni bhavantīti vuttanayeneva ārammaṇavavatthānaṃ veditabbaṃ.

original: Tattha ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu āpāthamāgacchati. Rūpārammaṇañhi cakkhupasādaṃ

original: attho. Saddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbārammaṇesupi eseva nayo. Yathā hi sakuṇo ākāsenāgantvā

analyzed: rukkha agge nilīyamānaḥ iva rukkha sākham ca ghaṭṭeti chāyā cassa pathaviyam paṭihaññati

original: acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva hoti. Tato bhavaṅgaṃ vicchinditvā cakkhudvārādīsu uppannānaṃ
analyzed: acarimam hoti tatas bhavaṅgam vicchinditvā cakkhu dvāra ādīsu uppannānam

original: mahācittaṃ uppajjati.
analyzed: mahācittam uppajjati

original: Suddhamanodvāre pana pasādaghaṭṭanakiccaṃ natthi. Pakatiyā diṭṭhasutaghāyitasāyitaphuṭṭhavaseneva

original: pannarasa sukhumarūpāni, nibbānapaññattīti ime dhammāyatane pariyāpannā ca, apariyāpannā

original: ca, dhammā dhammārammaṇaṃ nāma. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne etesaṃ vasena yojanaṃ akatvā ojadānapānadānajīvitadānavasena
analyzed: ca dhammā dhamma ārammaṇam nāma imasmim pana ṭhāne etesam vasena yojanam a katvā oja dāna pāna dāna jīvita dāna vasena

original: kātabbā. Ojādīsu hi rajanīyaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
analyzed: kātabbāḥ oja ādīsu hi rajanīyam dhamma ārammaṇam ārammaṇam katvā heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva

original: tīhi niyamehetaṃ kusalaṃ uppajjati.
analyzed: tīhi niyameha etam kusalam uppajjati

original: Tattha yadā ‘ojadānaṃ mayha’nti sappinavanītādīni deti, pānadānanti aṭṭha pānāni
analyzed: tattha oja dānam sappi navanīta ādīni deti pāna dānam ti aṭṭha pānāni

original: deti, jīvitadānanti salākabhattasaṅghabhattādīni deti, aphāsukānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhesajjaṃ
analyzed: deti jīvita dānam ti salāka bhatta saṅgha bhatta ādīni deti a phāsukānam bhikkhūnam bhesajjam

original: deti, vejjaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpeti, jālaṃ phālāpeti, kumīnaṃ viddhaṃsāpeti, sakuṇapañjaraṃ
analyzed: deti vejjam paccupaṭṭhāpeti jālam phālāpeti kumīnam viddhaṃsāpeti sakuṇa pañjaram

original: viddhaṃsāpeti, bandhanamokkhaṃ kārāpeti, māghātabheriṃ carāpeti, aññānipi jīvitaparittāṇatthaṃ
analyzed: bandhana mokkham kārāpeti māghāta bherim carāpeti aññāni api jīvita parittāṇa ttham

original: evarūpāni kammāni karoti tadā dānamayaṃ hoti. Yadā pana ‘ojadānapānadānajīvitadānāni
analyzed: evarūpāni kammāni karoti tadā dāna mayam hoti yadā pana oja dāna pāna dāna jīvita dānāni

original: mayhaṃ kulavaṃso kulatanti kulappaveṇī’ti vattasīsena ojadānādīni pavatteti tadā
analyzed: mayham kula vaṃsaḥ kula tanti kula ppaveṇī iti vatta sīsena oja dāna ādīni tadā

original: sīlamayaṃ hoti. Yadā dhammārammaṇasmiṃ khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapeti tadā bhāvanāmayaṃ hoti.
analyzed: sīla mayam hoti yadā dhamma ārammaṇasmim khaya vayam paṭṭhapeti tadā bhāvanā mayam hoti

original: Dānamayaṃ pana hutvā pavattamānampi yadā ojadānapānadānajīvitadānāni sahatthā deti,
analyzed: dāna mayam pana hutvā pavattamānam pi yadā oja dāna pāna dāna jīvita dānāni sahatthā deti

original: tadā kāyakammaṃ hoti. Yadā puttadārādayo āṇāpetvā dāpeti, tadā vacīkammaṃ hoti. Yadā
analyzed: tadā kāya kammam hoti yadā putta dāra ādayaḥ āṇāpetvā dāpeti tadā vacī kammam hoti yadā

original: kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni acopetvā ojadānapānadānajīvitadānavasena vijjamānakavatthuṃ ‘dassāmī’ti
analyzed: kāyaṅga vācaṅgāni oja dāna pāna dāna jīvita dāna vasena vijjamānaka vatthum dassāmi iti

original: manasā cinteti, tadā manokammaṃ hoti.
analyzed: manasā cinteti tadā mano kammam hoti

original: Yadā pana vuttappakāraṃ vijjamānakavatthuṃ kulavaṃsādivasena sahatthā deti, tadā
analyzed: yadā pana vutta ppakāram vijjamānaka vatthum kula vaṃsa ādi vasena sahatthā deti tadā

original: sīlamayaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti. Yadā kulavaṃsādivaseneva puttadārādayo āṇāpetvā dāpeti,
analyzed: sīla mayam kāya kammam hoti yadā kula vaṃsa ādi vasena iva putta dāra ādayaḥ āṇāpetvā dāpeti

original: tadā vacīkammaṃ hoti. Yadā kulavaṃsādivaseneva vuttappakāraṃ vijjamānakavatthuṃ ‘dassāmī’ti
analyzed: tadā vacīkammam hoti yadā kula vaṃsa ādi vasena iva vutta ppakāram vijjamānaka vatthum dassāmi iti

original: manasāva cinteti, tadā manokammaṃ hoti.
analyzed: manasā ava cinteti tadā mano kammam hoti

original: Caṅkamitvā dhammārammaṇe khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapentassa pana bhāvanāmayaṃ kāyakammaṃ hoti.
analyzed: caṅkamitvā dhamma ārammaṇe khaya vayam paṭṭhapentassa pana bhāvanā mayam kāya kammam hoti

original: Kāyaṅgaṃ acopetvā vācāya khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapentassa vacīkammaṃ hoti. Kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni
analyzed: kāyaṅgam a copetvā vācāya khaya vayam paṭṭhapentassa vacī kammam hoti kāyaṅga vācaṅgāni

original: acopetvā manasāva dhammārammaṇe khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapentassa manokammaṃ hoti. Evaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ
analyzed: a copetvā manasā ava dhamma ārammaṇe khaya vayam paṭṭhapentassa manaḥ kammam hoti evam bhāvanā mayam

original: kāyavacīmanokammavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Evametaṃ dhammārammaṇampi kusalaṃ tividhapuññakiriyavatthuvasena
analyzed: kāya vacī manaḥ kamma vasena tividham hoti evam etam dhamma ārammaṇam pi kusalam tividha puñña kiriya vatthu vasena

original: navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā.
analyzed: navahi kammadvārehi bhājetvā dassesi dhammarājā

original: Evamidaṃ cittaṃ nānāvatthūsu nānārammaṇavasena dīpitaṃ. Idaṃ pana ekavatthusmimpi
analyzed: evam idam cittam nānā vatthūsu nānā ārammaṇa vasena dīpitam idam pana eka vatthusmim pi

original: nānārammaṇavasena labbhatiyeva. Kathaṃ? Catūsu hi paccayesu cīvare cha ārammaṇāni
analyzed: nānā ārammaṇa vasena katham catūsu hi paccayesu cīvare cha ārammaṇāni

original: labbhanti – navarattassa hi cīvarassa vaṇṇo manāpo hoti dassanīyo, idaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: labbhanti nava rattassa hi cīvarassa vaṇṇaḥ manāpaḥ hoti dassanīyaḥ idam vaṇṇa ārammaṇam

original: Paribhogakāle paṭapaṭasaddaṃ karoti, idaṃ saddārammaṇaṃ. Yo tattha kāḷakacchakādigandho,
analyzed: paribhoga kāle paṭa paṭa saddam karoti idam sadda ārammaṇam yaḥ tattha kāḷa kacchaka ādi gandho

original: idaṃ gandhārammaṇaṃ. Rasārammaṇaṃ pana paribhogarasavasena kathitaṃ. Yā tattha sukhasamphassatā,
analyzed: idam gandha ārammaṇam rasa ārammaṇam pana paribhoga rasa vasena kathitam yā tattha sukha samphassa tā

original: idaṃ phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ. Cīvaraṃ paṭicca uppannā sukhā vedanā, dhammārammaṇaṃ. Piṇḍapāte
analyzed: idam phoṭṭhabba ārammaṇam cīvaram paṭicca uppannā sukhā vedanā dhamma ārammaṇam piṇḍapāte

original: rasārammaṇaṃ nippariyāyeneva labbhati. Evaṃ catūsu paccayesu nānārammaṇavasena yojanaṃ
analyzed: rasa ārammaṇam nippariyāyena iva labbhati evam catūsu paccayesu nānā ārammaṇa vasena yojanam

original: katvā dānamayādibhedo veditabbo.
analyzed: katvā dāna maya ādi bhedaḥ veditabbo

original: Imassa pana cittassa ārammaṇameva nibaddhaṃ, vinā ārammaṇena anuppajjanato. Dvāraṃ pana anibaddhaṃ. Kasmā? Kammassa anibaddhattā. Kammasmiñhi anibaddhe dvārampi anibaddhameva hoti.
analyzed: imassa pana cittassa ārammaṇam eva nibaddham vinā ārammaṇena anuppajjanataḥ dvāram pana anibaddham kasmā kammassa anibaddha ttā kammasmin hi anibaddhe dvāram pi anibaddham eva hoti

original: Kāmāvacarakusalaṃ dvārakathā
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalam dvāra kathā

original: Kāyakammadvārakathā
analyzed: kāya kamma dvāra kathā

original: Imassa panatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ dvārakathā kathitā.
analyzed: imassa pana atthassa pakāsana attham imasmin ṭhāne mahā aṭṭhakathā ayam dvāra kathā kathitā

original: Tattha tīṇi kammāni, tīṇi kammadvārāni, pañca viññāṇāni, pañca viññāṇadvārāni, cha
analyzed: tattha tīṇi kammāni tīṇi kamma dvārāni pañca viññāṇāni pañca viññāṇa dvārāni cha

original: phassā, cha phassadvārāni, aṭṭha asaṃvarā, aṭṭha asaṃvaradvārāni, aṭṭha saṃvarā,
analyzed: phassā cha phassa dvārāni aṭṭha asaṃvarā aṭṭha asaṃvara dvārāni aṭṭha saṃvarā

original: aṭṭha saṃvaradvārāni, dasa kusalakammapathā, dasa akusalakammapathāti, idaṃ ettakaṃ

original: dvārakathāya mātikāṭhapanaṃ nāma.
analyzed: dvāra kathāya mātikāṭhapanam nāma

original: Tattha kiñcāpi tīṇi kammāni paṭhamaṃ vuttāni, tāni pana ṭhapetvā ādito tāva tīṇi
analyzed: tattha kiñcā api tīṇi kammāni paṭhamam vuttāni tāni pana ṭhapetvā āditaḥ tāva tīṇi

original: kammadvārāni bhājetvā dassitāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Kāyakammadvāraṃ, vacīkammadvāraṃ, manokammadvāranti.
analyzed: kamma dvārāni bhājetvā dassitāni katamāni tīṇi kāya kamma dvāram vacī kamma dvāram manaḥ kamma dvāran ti

original: Tattha catubbidho kāyo – upādinnako, āhārasamuṭṭhāno, utusamuṭṭhāno, cittasamuṭṭhānoti.

original: Tattha cakkhāyatanādīni jīvitindriyapariyantāni aṭṭha kammasamuṭṭhānarūpānipi, kammasamuṭṭhānāneva
analyzed: tattha cakkha āyatana ādīni jīvitindriya pariyantāni aṭṭha kamma samuṭṭhāna rūpāni pi kamma samuṭṭhānāni eva

original: catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇo gandho raso ojāti aṭṭha upādinnakakāyo nāma. Tāneva aṭṭha āhārajāni

original: āhārasamuṭṭhānikakāyo nāma. Aṭṭha utujāni utusamuṭṭhānikakāyo nāma. Aṭṭha cittajāni
analyzed: āhāra samuṭṭhānika kāyaḥ nāma aṭṭha utu jāni utu samuṭṭhānika kāyaḥ nāma aṭṭha citta jāni

original: cittasamuṭṭhānikakāyo nāma.
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānika kāyaḥ nāma

original: Tesu kāyakammadvāranti neva upādinnakakāyassa nāmaṃ na itaresaṃ. Cittasamuṭṭhānesu

analyzed: pana aṭṭhasu rūpesu ekā viññatti atthi idam kāya kamma dvāram nāma yam sandhāya vuttam

original: vā, abhikkamantassa vā paṭikkamantassa vā, ālokentassa vā vilokentassa vā, samiñjentassa

original: vā pasārentassa vā, kāyassa thambhanā santhambhanā santhambhitattaṃ, viññatti viññāpanā
analyzed: vā pasārentassa vā kāyassa thambhanā santhambhanā santhambhita ttam viññatti viññāpanā

original: viññāpitattaṃ, idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ kāyaviññattī”ti. ‘Abhikkamissāmi paṭikkamissāmī’ti

original: cāleti abhikkamāpeti paṭikkamāpeti.
analyzed: cāleti abhikkamāpeti paṭikkamāpeti

analyzed: sahajātam rūpa kāyam santhambhetum sandhāretum sakkoti apara aparam pana cāletum na

original: sakkoti. Dutiyādīsupi eseva nayo. Sattamacittena pana samuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu heṭṭhā

analyzed: nāma jāyati gamana āgamanam nāma jāyati yojanam gataḥ dasa yojanam gataḥ iti vattabbatam āpajja apeti

original: Yathā hi sattahi yugehi ākaḍḍhitabbe sakaṭe paṭhamayuge yuttagoṇā yugaṃ tāva santhambhetuṃ

original: sandhāretuṃ sakkonti, cakkaṃ pana napavaṭṭenti; dutiyādīsupi eseva nayo; sattamayuge
analyzed: sandhāretum sakkonti cakkam pana na pavaṭṭenti dutiya ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ sattama yuge

original: pana goṇe yojetvā yadā cheko sārathi dhure nisīditvā yottāni ādāya sabbapurimato
analyzed: pana goṇe yojetvā yadā cheko sārathi dhure nisīditvā yottāni ādāya sabba purimatas

analyzed: cakkāni ca pavaṭṭenti sakaṭam gahetvā dasa yojanam vīsati yojanam gatā iti vattabbatam

original: āpādenti – evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: āpādenti evaṃsampadam idam veditabbam

original: Tattha yo cittasamuṭṭhānikakāyo na so viññatti, cittasamuṭṭhānāya pana vāyodhātuyā

original: ākāravikāro atthi, ayaṃ viññatti nāma. Sā aṭṭha rūpāni viya na cittasamuṭṭhānā. Yathā
analyzed: ākāra vikāraḥ atthi ayam viññatti nāma sā aṭṭha rūpāni viya na citta samuṭṭhānā yathā

original: vuttaṃ, evaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ viññattitāya sāpi cittasamuṭṭhānā nāma hoti.

original: Viññāpanattā panesā viññattīti vuccati. Kiṃ viññāpetīti? Ekaṃ kāyikakaraṇaṃ. Cakkhupathasmiñhi
analyzed: viññāpana ttā pana esā viññattī iti vuccati kim viññāpeti iti ekam kāyika karaṇam cakkhu pathasmin hi

original: ṭhito hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā ukkhipati, sīsaṃ vā bhamukaṃ vā cāleti, ayaṃ hatthādīnaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ hattham vā pādam vā ukkhipati sīsam vā bhamukam vā cāleti ayam hattha ādīnam

original: ākāro cakkhuviññeyyo hoti. Viññatti pana na cakkhuviññeyyā manoviññeyyā eva. Cakkhunā
analyzed: ākāro cakkhu viññeyyaḥ hoti viññatti pana na cakkhu viññeyyā manaḥ viññeyyā eva cakkhunā

original: hi hatthavikārādivasena vipphandamānaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇameva passati. Viññattiṃ pana manodvārikacittena

original: cintetvā ‘idañcidañca esa kāreti maññe’ti jānāti.
analyzed: cintetvā idañcidañca esa kārā iti maññā iti jānāti

original: Yathā hi araññe nidāghasamaye udakaṭṭhāne manussā ‘imāya saññāya idha udakassa atthibhāvaṃ

original: jānissantī’ti rukkhagge tālapaṇṇādīni bandhāpenti, surāpānadvāre dhajaṃ ussāpenti,
analyzed: jānissanti iti rukkha agge tāla paṇṇa ādīni bandhāpenti surā pāna dvāre dhajam ussāpenti

original: uccaṃ vā pana rukkhaṃ vāto paharitvā cāleti, antoudake macche calante upari bubbuḷakāni

original: hoti, dvāraṃ pana vacīdvāraṃ. Evaṃ kusalaṃ manokammaṃ vacīdvāre samuṭṭhāti. Cetanā
