original: panettha abbohārikā. Kāyaṅgavācaṅgāni pana acopetvā raho nisinnassa manasāva anabhijjhādisahagatāni
analyzed: pana ittha abbohārikā kāyaṅga vācaṅgāni pana a copetvā rahaḥ nisinnassa manasā āva anabhijjhā ādi sahagatāni

original: cittāni uppādentassa kammaṃ manokammaṃ, dvārampi manodvārameva. Evaṃ kusalaṃ manokammaṃ
analyzed: cittāni uppādentassa kammam manaḥ kammam dvāram pi manaḥ dvāram eva evam kusalam manaḥ kammam

original: manodvāre samuṭṭhāti. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne cetanāpi cetanāsampayuttakā dhammāpi manodvāreyeva samuṭṭhahanti.
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre imasmin pana ṭhāne cetanā api cetanā sampayuttakāḥ dhammā api manaḥ dvāre yeva samuṭṭhahanti

original: Tattha āṇattisamuṭṭhitesu pāṇātipātaadinnādānesu kammampi kāyakammaṃ dvārampi kammavaseneva
analyzed: tattha āṇatti samuṭṭhitesu pāṇa atipāta a dinna ādānesu kammam pi kāya kammam dvāram pi kamma vasena iva

original: kāyadvāranti vadanto kammaṃ rakkhati, dvāraṃ bhindati nāma. Hatthamuddāya samuṭṭhitesu
analyzed: kāya dvāram ti vadantaḥ kammam rakkhati dvāram bhindati nāma hattha muddāya samuṭṭhitesu

original: musāvādādīsu dvārampi kāyadvāraṃ, kammampi dvāravaseneva kāyakammanti vadanto dvāraṃ
analyzed: musāvāda ādīsu dvāram pi kāya dvāram kammam pi dvāra vasena iva kāya kammanti vadantaḥ dvāram

original: rakkhati kammaṃ bhindati nāma. Tasmā ‘kammaṃ rakkhāmī’ti dvāraṃ na bhinditabbaṃ,
analyzed: rakkhati kammam bhindati nāma tasmai kammam rakkhāmi iti dvāram na bhinditabbam

original: ‘dvāraṃ rakkhāmī’ti kammaṃ na bhinditabbaṃ. Yathāvutteneva pana nayena kammañca dvārañca
analyzed: dvāram rakkhāmi iti kammam na bhinditabbam yathā vuttena iva pana nayena kammam ca dvāram ca

original: veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ kathento hi neva kammaṃ na dvāraṃ bhindatīti.
analyzed: veditabbam evam kathentaḥ hi na iva kammam na dvāram bhindati iti

original: Kammakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kamma kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Idāni ‘pañca viññāṇāni pañcaviññāṇadvārānī’tiādīsu cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ
analyzed: idāni pañca viññāṇāni pañcaviññāṇa dvārāni iti ādīsu cakkhu viññāṇam sota viññāṇam ghāna viññāṇam

original: jivhāviññāṇaṃ kāyaviññāṇanti imāni pañca viññāṇāni nāma. Cakkhuviññāṇadvāraṃ sota…
analyzed: jivhā viññāṇam kāya viññāṇanti imāni pañca viññāṇāni nāma cakkhu viññāṇa dvāram sota

original: ghāna… jivhā… kāyaviññāṇadvāranti imāni pañca viññāṇadvārāni nāma. Imesaṃ pañcannaṃ
analyzed: ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇa dvāranti imāni pañca viññāṇa dvārāni nāma imesam pañcannam

original: dvārānaṃ vasena uppannā cetanā neva kāyakammaṃ hoti, na vacīkammaṃ, manokammameva
analyzed: dvārānam vasena uppannā cetanā na iva kāya kammam hoti na vacī kammam manaḥ kammam eva

original: hotīti veditabbā. Cakkhusamphasso sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāya… manosamphassoti ime pana
analyzed: hoti iti veditabbā cakkhu samphassaḥ sota ghāna jivhā kāya manaḥ samphasso ti ime pana

original: cha samphassā nāma. Cakkhusamphassadvāraṃ sota… ghāna… jivhā… kāya… manosamphassadvāranti
analyzed: cha samphassāḥ nāma cakkhu samphassa dvāram sota ghāna jivhā kāya manaḥ samphassa dvāranti

original: imāni cha samphassadvārāni nāma.
analyzed: imāni cha samphassadvārāni nāma

original: Cakkhuasaṃvaro sota… ghāna… jivhā… pasādakāya… copanakāyaasaṃvaro vācāasaṃvaro manoasaṃvaroti
analyzed: cakkhu asaṃvaro ghāna jivhā pasāda kāya copana kāya asaṃvaraḥ vācā asaṃvaraḥ manaḥ asaṃvaraḥ

original: – ime aṭṭha asaṃvarā nāma. Te atthato ‘dussīlyaṃ muṭṭhassaccaṃ aññāṇaṃ akkhanti kosajja’nti
analyzed: ime aṭṭha asaṃvarāḥ nāma te atthataḥ dussīlyam muṭṭhassaccam aññāṇam akkhanti kosajjanti

original: ime pañca dhammā honti. Tesu ekadhammopi pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānesu cittesu
analyzed: ime pañca dhammāḥ honti tesu eka dhammaḥ api pañca dvāre voṭṭhabbana pariyosānesu cittesu

original: nuppajjati, javanakkhaṇeyeva uppajjati. Javane uppannopi pañcadvāre asaṃvaroti vuccati.
analyzed: na uppajjati javana kkhaṇe yeva uppajjati javane uppannaḥ pi pañca dvāre asaṃvaraḥ ti vuccati

original: Cakkhuviññāṇasahajāto hi phasso cakkhusamphasso nāma, cetanā manokammaṃ nāma, taṃ
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa sahajātaḥ hi phassaḥ cakkhu samphasso nāma cetanā mano kammam nāma taṃ

original: cittaṃ manokammadvāraṃ nāma. Ettha pañcavidho asaṃvaro natthi. Sampaṭicchanasahajāto
analyzed: cittam manaḥ kamma dvāram nāma ettha pañcavidhaḥ asaṃvaraḥ na atthi sampaṭicchana sahajāto

original: phasso manosamphasso nāma, cetanā manokammaṃ nāma, taṃ cittaṃ manokammadvāraṃ nāma.
analyzed: phassaḥ manaḥ samphassaḥ nāma cetanā manaḥ kammam nāma tam cittam manaḥ kamma dvāram nāma

original: Etthāpi asaṃvaro natthi. Santīraṇavoṭṭhabbanesupi eseva nayo. Javanasahajāto pana
analyzed: ettha api asaṃvaraḥ na atthi santīraṇa voṭṭhabbanesu pi esā iva nayaḥ javana sahajātaḥ pana

original: phasso manosamphasso nāma, cetanā manokammaṃ nāma, taṃ cittaṃ manokammadvāraṃ nāma.
analyzed: phassaḥ manaḥ samphassaḥ nāma cetanā manaḥ kammam nāma tam cittam manaḥ kamma dvāram nāma

original: Ettha asaṃvaro cakkhuasaṃvaro nāma hoti. Sotaghānajivhāpasādakāyadvāresupi eseva
analyzed: ettha asaṃvaro cakkhu asaṃvaro nāma hoti sota ghāna jivhā pasāda kāya dvāresu pi esā eva

original: nayo. Yadā pana rūpādīsu aññatarārammaṇaṃ manodvārikajavanaṃ vinā vacīdvārena suddhaṃ
analyzed: nayaḥ yadā pana rūpa ādīsu aññatara ārammaṇam manaḥ dvārika javanam vinā vacī dvārena suddham

original: kāyadvārasaṅkhātaṃ copanaṃ pāpayamānaṃ uppajjati, tadā tena cittena sahajāto phasso
analyzed: kāya dvāra saṅkhātam copanam pāpayamānam uppajjati tadā tena cittena sahajātaḥ phassaḥ

original: manosamphasso nāma, cetanā kāyakammaṃ nāma, taṃ pana cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ, copanassa
analyzed: manaḥ samphassaḥ nāma cetanā kāya kammam nāma tam pana cittam abbohārikam

original: uppannattā manodvāranti saṅkhyaṃ na gacchati. Ettha asaṃvaro copanakāyaasaṃvaro nāma.
analyzed: saṅkhyam na gacchati ettha asaṃvaro copana kāya asaṃvaraḥ nāma

original: Yadā tādisaṃyeva javanaṃ vinā kāyadvārena suddhaṃ vacīdvārasaṅkhātaṃ copanaṃ pāpayamānaṃ
analyzed: yadā javanam vinā kāya dvārena suddham vacī dvāra saṅkhātam copanam pāpayamānam

original: uppajjati, tadā tena cittena sahajāto phasso manosamphasso nāma, cetanā vacīkammaṃ
analyzed: uppajjati tadā tena cittena sahajātaḥ phassaḥ manaḥ samphassaḥ nāma cetanā vacī kammam

original: nāma, taṃ pana cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ, copanassa uppannattā manodvāranti saṅkhyaṃ na
analyzed: nāma tam pana cittam abbohārikam uppanna ttā manaḥ dvāranti saṅkhyam na

original: gacchati. Ettha asaṃvaro vācāasaṃvaro nāma. Yadā pana tādisaṃ javanacittaṃ vinā kāyavacīdvārehi
analyzed: gacchati ettha asaṃvaraḥ vācāasaṃvaraḥ nāma yadā pana tādisam javana cittam vinā kāya vacī dvārehi

original: suddhaṃ manodvārameva hutvā uppajjati, tadā tena cittena sahajāto phasso manosamphasso
analyzed: suddham manaḥ dvāram eva hutvā uppajjati tadā tena cittena sahajātaḥ phassaḥ manaḥ samphassaḥ

original: nāma, cetanā manokammaṃ nāma, taṃ pana cittaṃ manokammadvāraṃ nāma. Ettha asaṃvaro
analyzed: nāma cetanā manaḥ kammam nāma tam pana cittam manaḥ kamma dvāram nāma ettha asaṃvaro

original: manoasaṃvaro nāma. Iti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ asaṃvarānaṃ vasena cakkhuasaṃvaradvāraṃ,
analyzed: manaḥ asaṃvaraḥ nāma iti imesam aṭṭhannam asaṃvarānam vasena cakkhu asaṃvara dvāram

original: sota… ghāna… jivhā… pasādakāya… copanakāya… vācā… manoasaṃvaradvāranti imāni aṭṭha
analyzed: sota ghāna jivhā pasādakāya copanakāya vācā imāni aṭṭha

original: asaṃvaradvārāni veditabbāni.
analyzed: a saṃvara dvārāni veditabbāni

original: Cakkhusaṃvaro sota… ghāna… jivhā… pasādakāya… copanakāya… vācā… manosaṃvaroti ime
analyzed: cakkhu saṃvaro sota ghāna jivhā pasādakāya copanakāya vācā manaḥ saṃvaro ti ime

original: pana aṭṭha saṃvarā nāma. Te atthato ‘sīlaṃ sati ñāṇaṃ khanti vīriya’nti ime pañca
analyzed: pana aṭṭha saṃvarāḥ nāma te atthato sīlam sati ñāṇam khanti vīriyanti ime pañca

original: dhammā honti. Tesupi ekadhammopi pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanapariyosānesu cittesu nuppajjati.
analyzed: dhammāḥ honti tesu pi eka dhammaḥ api pañca dvāre voṭṭhabbana pariyosānesu cittesu nu pajjati

original: Javanakkhaṇeyeva uppajjati. Javane uppannopi pañcadvāre saṃvaroti vuccati. Tassa
analyzed: javana kkhaṇe yeva uppajjati javane uppannaḥ pi pañca dvāre saṃvaro ti vuccati tassa

original: sabbassāpi cakkhuviññāṇasahajāto hi phasso cakkhusamphassotiādinā asaṃvare vuttanayeneva
analyzed: sabbassa api cakkhu viññāṇa sahajātaḥ hi phasso cakkhu samphassaḥ ti ādinā asaṃvare vutta nayena iva

original: uppatti veditabbā. Iti imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ saṃvarānaṃ vasena cakkhusaṃvaradvāraṃ…pe…
analyzed: uppatti veditabbā iti imesam aṭṭhannam saṃvarānam vasena cakkhu saṃvara dvāraṃpe

original: manosaṃvaradvāranti imāni aṭṭha saṃvaradvārāni veditabbāni.
analyzed: manaḥ saṃvara dvāram ti imāni aṭṭha saṃvara dvārāni veditabbāni

original: Akusalakammapathakathā
analyzed: akusala kammapatha kathā

original: Pāṇātipāto, adinnādānaṃ, kāmesumicchācāro, musāvādo, pisuṇavācā, pharusavācā, samphappalāpo, abhijjhā, byāpādo, micchādiṭṭhīti ime pana dasa akusalakammapathā nāma.
analyzed: pāṇa atipātaḥ adinnādānam kāmesu micchācāraḥ musāvādo pisuṇa vācā pharusa vācā samphappalāpaḥ abhijjhā byāpādaḥ micchādiṭṭhi iti ime pana dasa akusala kammapathāḥ nāma

original: Tattha pāṇassa atipāto pāṇātipāto nāma; pāṇavadho, pāṇaghātoti vuttaṃ hoti. Pāṇoti
analyzed: tattha pāṇassa atipātaḥ pāṇātipātaḥ nāma pāṇa vadhaḥ pāṇa ghāto ti vuttam hoti pāṇo ti

original: cettha vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Tasmiṃ pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: ca ittha vohārato satto paramatthataḥ jīvitindriyam tasmim pana pāṇe pāṇa saññinaḥ jīvitindriya upacchedaka aupakkama samuṭṭhāpikā

original: kāyavacīdvārānaṃ aññataradvārappavattā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto. So guṇavirahitesu
analyzed: kāya vacī dvārānaṃ aññatara dvāra ppavattā vadhaka cetanā pāṇātipātaḥ so guṇa virahitesu

original: tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo, mahāsarīre mahāsāvajjo. Kasmā?
analyzed: tiracchāna gata ādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appa sāvajjaḥ mahā sarīre mahā sāvajjaḥ kasmā

original: Payogamahantatāya. Payogasamattepi vatthumahantatāya. Guṇavantesu manussādīsu appaguṇe
analyzed: payoga mahanta tāya payoga samatte api vatthu mahanta tāya guṇavantesu manussa ādīsu appaguṇe

original: appasāvajjo, mahāguṇe mahāsāvajjo. Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve sati kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca
analyzed: appasāvajjaḥ mahā guṇe sarīra guṇānam pana sama bhāve sati kilesānam upakkamānam ca

original: mudutāya appasāvajjo, tibbatāya mahāsāvajjoti veditabbo.
analyzed: mudu tāya appa sāvajjaḥ tibba tāya mahā sāvajjaḥ ti veditabbo

original: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – pāṇo, pāṇasaññitā, vadhakacittaṃ, upakkamo, tena maraṇanti.
analyzed: tassa pañca sambhārāḥ honti pāṇaḥ pāṇa saññitā vadhaka cittam upakkamaḥ tena maraṇanti

original: Cha payogā – sāhatthiko, āṇattiko, nissaggiyo, thāvaro, vijjāmayo, iddhimayoti. Imasmiṃ
analyzed: cha payogā sāhatthikaḥ āṇattikaḥ nissaggiyaḥ thāvaraḥ vijjā mayaḥ iddhi mayaḥ ti imasmin

original: panatthe vitthāriyamāne atipapañco hoti. Tasmā taṃ na vitthārayāma. Aññañca evarūpaṃ
analyzed: vitthāriyamāne atipapañcaḥ hoti tasmā tam na vitthārayāma aññañca evarūpam

original: atthikehi pana samantapāsādikaṃ vinayaṭṭhakathaṃ oloketvā gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: atthikehi pana samantapāsādikam vinaya ṭṭhakatham oloketvā gahetabbam

original: Adinnassa ādānaṃ ‘adinnādānaṃ’; parassaharaṇaṃ, theyyaṃ, corikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha
analyzed: adinnassa ādānam adinna ādānam parassa haraṇam theyyam corikā ati vuttam hoti tattha

original: adinnanti parapariggahitaṃ, yattha paro yathākāmakāritaṃ āpajjanto adaṇḍāraho anupavajjo
analyzed: a dinna nti para pariggahitam yattha paraḥ yathā kāma kāritam āpajjantaḥ a daṇḍa ārahaḥ an upavajjaḥ

original: ca hoti. Tasmiṃ parapariggahite parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: ca hoti tasmin para pariggahite para pariggahita saññinaḥ tad ādāyaka aupakkama samuṭṭhāpikā

original: theyyacetanā adinnādānaṃ. Taṃ hīne parasantake appasāvajjaṃ, paṇīte mahāsāvajjaṃ.
analyzed: theyya cetanā adinna ādānam tam hīne para santake appasāvajjam paṇīte mahāsāvajjam

original: Kasmā? Vatthupaṇītatāya. Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ.
analyzed: kasmā vatthu paṇīta tāya vatthu samatte sati guṇa adhikānam santake vatthusmim mahā sāvajjam

original: Taṃtaṃguṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
analyzed: taṃ taṃ guṇa adhikam upādāya tatas tatas hīna guṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjam

original: Tassa pañca sambhārā honti – parapariggahitaṃ, parapariggahitasaññitā, theyyacittaṃ,
analyzed: tassa pañca sambhārāḥ honti para pariggahitam para pariggahita saññitā theyya cittam

original: upakkamo, tena haraṇanti. Cha payogā – sāhatthikādayova. Te ca kho yathānurūpaṃ theyyāvahāro,
analyzed: upakkamaḥ tena haraṇanti cha payogā sāhatthika ādayaḥ va te ca kho yathānurūpam theyya avahāro

original: pasayhāvahāro, paṭicchannāvahāro, parikappāvahāro, kusāvahāroti imesaṃ pañcannaṃ
analyzed: pasayhāvahāro paṭicchannāvahāro parikappāvahāro kusāvahāro ti imesam pañcannam

original: avahārānaṃ vasena pavattanti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāyaṃ vutto.
analyzed: avahārānam vasena pavattanti ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthāraḥ pana samantapāsādikāyam vutto

original: ‘Kāmesu micchācāro’ti ettha pana ‘kāmesū’ti methunasamācāresu; ‘micchācāro’ti ekantanindito
analyzed: kāmesu micchācāro ti ettha pana kāmesu uti methuna samācāresu micchācāro ti ekanta ninditaḥ

original: lāmakācāro. Lakkhaṇato pana asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā kāmesumicchācāro.
analyzed: lāmaka ācāraḥ lakkhaṇato pana asat dhamma adhippāyena kāya dvāra ppavattā agamanīya ṭṭhāna vītikkama cetanā kāmesu micchā ācāro

original: Tattha agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma – purisānaṃ tāva māturakkhitā, piturakkhitā, mātāpiturakkhitā,
analyzed: tattha agamanīya ṭṭhānam nāma purisānam tāva mātu rakkhitā pitu rakkhitā mātā pitu rakkhitā

original: bhāturakkhitā, bhaginirakkhitā, ñātirakkhitā, gottarakkhitā, dhammarakkhitā, sārakkhā,
analyzed: bhātu rakkhitā bhagini rakkhitā ñāti rakkhitā gotta rakkhitā dhamma rakkhitā sārakkhā

original: saparidaṇḍāti māturakkhitādayo dasa; dhanakkītā, chandavāsinī, bhogavāsinī, paṭavāsinī,
analyzed: sa paridaṇḍā ti māturakkhitā ādayaḥ dasa dhanakkītā chanda vāsinī bhoga vāsinī paṭa vāsinī

original: odapattakinī, obhaṭacumbaṭā, dāsī ca bhariyā, kammakārī ca bhariyā, dhajāhaṭā, muhuttikāti
analyzed: odapattakinī obhaṭa cumbaṭā dāsī ca bhariyā kammakārī ca bhariyā dhajāhaṭā muhuttikā ati

original: etā dhanakkītādayo dasāti vīsati itthiyo. Itthīsu pana dvinnaṃ sārakkhasaparidaṇḍānaṃ,
analyzed: etāḥ dhanakkīta ādayaḥ dasāti vīsati itthiyaḥ itthīsu pana dvinnam

original: dasannañca dhanakkītādīnanti dvādasannaṃ itthīnaṃ aññe purisā idaṃ agamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
analyzed: dasannam ca dhanakkīta ādīnam ti dvādasannam itthīnam aññe purisāḥ idam agamanīyaṭṭhānam nāma

original: So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇarahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo, sīlādiguṇasampanne
analyzed: so pana esa micchā ācāraḥ sīla ādi guṇa rahite agamanīya ṭhāne appasāvajjo sīla ādi guṇa sampanne

original: mahāsāvajjo. Tassa cattāro sambhārā – agamanīyavatthu, tasmiṃ sevanacittaṃ, sevanappayogo,
analyzed: mahāsāvajjo tassa cattāro sambhārāḥ agamanīya vatthu tasmim sevana cittam sevana ppayogaḥ

original: maggenamaggappaṭipattiadhivāsananti. Eko payogo sāhatthiko eva.
analyzed: maggena magga ppaṭipatti adhivāsananti ekaḥ payogo sāhatthikaḥ eva

original: ‘Musā’ti visaṃvādanapurekkhārassa atthabhañjako vacīpayogo, kāyapayogo vā. Visaṃvādanādhippāyena
analyzed: musā ati visaṃvādana purekkhārassa attha bhañjakaḥ vacī payogaḥ kāya payogaḥ vā visaṃvādana adhippāyena

original: panassa paravisaṃvādakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo. Aparo nayo – ‘musā’ti
analyzed: panassa para visaṃvādaka kāya vacī payoga samuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādaḥ aparaḥ nayaḥ musā ti

original: abhūtaṃ atacchaṃ vatthu. ‘Vādo’ti tassa bhūtato tacchato viññāpanaṃ. Lakkhaṇato pana
analyzed: abhūtam ataccham vatthu vādo ti tassa bhūtato tacchataḥ viññāpanam lakkhaṇato pana

original: atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
analyzed: atatham vatthum tathatas param viññāpetu kāmassa tathā viññatti samuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādaḥ

original: So yamatthaṃ bhañjati tassa appatāya appasāvajjo, mahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Apica
analyzed: saḥ yam attham bhañjati tassa appa tāya appa sāvajjaḥ mahanta tāya mahā sāvajjaḥ apica

original: gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya ‘natthī’tiādinayappavatto appasāvajjo.
analyzed: gaha ṭṭhānam attanaḥ santakam a dātu kāma tāya natthi iti ādi naya ppavatto appa sāvajjaḥ

original: Sakkhinā hutvā atthabhañjanatthaṃ vutto mahāsāvajjo. Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ
analyzed: sakkhinā hutvā attha bhañjana attham vuttaḥ mahā sāvajjaḥ pabbajitānam appakampi telam

original: vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena ‘ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī’ti pūraṇakathānayena
analyzed: vā sappim vā labhitvā hasa adhippāyena ajja gāme telam nadī maññe sandati iti pūraṇa kathā nayena

original: pavatto appasāvajjo. Adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
analyzed: pavattaḥ appasāvajjaḥ adiṭṭham yeva pana diṭṭham ti ādinā nayena vadantānam mahāsāvajjaḥ

original: Tassa cattāro sambhārā honti – atathaṃ vatthu, visaṃvādanacittaṃ, tajjo vāyāmo, parassa
analyzed: tassa cattāro sambhārāḥ honti atatham vatthu visaṃvādana cittam tad jaḥ vā āyāmaḥ parassa

original: tadatthavijānananti. Eko payogo – sāhatthikova. So ca kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena
analyzed: tad attha vijānanam ti ekaḥ payogaḥ sāhatthikaḥ uva saḥ ca kāyena vā kāya ppaṭibaddhena

original: vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo. Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ
analyzed: vā vācāya vā para visaṃvādaka kiriyā karaṇe daṭṭhabbo tāya ce kiriyāya paraḥ tam attham

original: jānāti, ayaṃ kiriyasamuṭṭhāpikacetanākkhaṇeyeva musāvādakammunā bajjhati. Yasmā pana
analyzed: jānāti ayam musāvāda kammunā bajjhati yasmai pana

original: yathā kāyakāyappaṭibaddhavācāhi paraṃ visaṃvādeti, tathā imassa ‘imaṃ bhaṇāhī’ti
analyzed: yathā param tathā imassa imam bhaṇāhi iti

original: āṇāpentopi, paṇṇaṃ likhitvā purato nissajjantopi, ‘ayamattho evaṃ daṭṭhabbo’ti kuṭṭādīsu
analyzed: āṇāpentaḥ api paṇṇam likhitvā puratas nissajjantaḥ api ayam atthaḥ evam daṭṭhabbaḥ ti kuṭṭa ādīsu

original: likhitvā ṭhapentopi; tasmā ettha āṇattikanissaggiyathāvarāpi payogā yujjanti. Aṭṭhakathāsu
analyzed: likhitvā ṭhapentaḥ api tasmai ettha payogāḥ yujjanti aṭṭhakathāsu

original: pana anāgatattā vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbā.
analyzed: pana anāgata ttā vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbā

original: ‘Pisuṇavācā’tiādīsu yāya vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati tassa hadaye attano piyabhāvaṃ
analyzed: pisuṇa vācā ati ādīsu vācāya yassa tam vācam bhāsati tassa hadaye piya bhāvam

original: parassa ca suññabhāvaṃ karoti, sā pisuṇavācā. Yāya pana attānampi parampi pharusaṃ
analyzed: parassa ca suñña bhāvam karoti sā pisuṇa vācā yāya pana attānam pi param pi pharusam

original: karoti, yā vācā sayampi pharusā neva kaṇṇasukhā, na hadayaṅgamā, ayaṃ ‘pharusavācā’.
analyzed: karoti yā vācā sayam pi pharusā na iva kaṇṇa sukhā na hadayaṅgamā ayam pharusa vācā

original: Yena samphaṃ palapati, niratthakaṃ, so ‘samphappalāpo’. Tesaṃ mūlabhūtā cetanāpi
analyzed: yena sampham palapati niratthakam so sampha ppalāpaḥ tesam mūla bhūtā cetanā api

original: pisuṇavācādināmameva labhati. Sā eva ca idha adhippetāti.
analyzed: pisuṇa vācā ādi nāmam eva labhati sā eva ca idha adhippetā iti

original: Tattha saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
analyzed: tattha saṃkiliṭṭha cittassa paresam vā bhedāya attanaḥ piya kamyatāya vā kāya vacī payoga samuṭṭhāpikā

original: cetanā pisuṇavācā nāma. Sā yassa bhedaṃ karoti tassa appaguṇatāya appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā.
analyzed: cetanā pisuṇavācā nāma sā yassa bhedam karoti tassa appaguṇa tāya appasāvajjā mahā guṇa tāya mahā sāvajjā

original: Tassā cattāro sambhārā – ‘bhinditabbo paro’ iti ‘ime nānā bhavissa’nti vinā bhavissantīti
analyzed: tassā cattāro sambhārā bhinditabbo paraḥ iti ime nānā bhavissanti vinā bhavissanti iti

original: bhedapurekkhāratā vā, ‘iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsiko’ti piyakamyatā vā, tajjo
analyzed: bheda purekkhāra tā vā iti aham piyaḥ bhavissāmi vissāsikaḥ iti piya kamya tā vā tajjo

original: vāyāmo, tassa tadatthavijānananti. Pare pana abhinne kammapathabhedo natthi, bhinne eva hoti.
analyzed: tassa tad attha vijānanan ti pare pana abhinne kamma patha bhedaḥ natthi bhinne eva hoti

original: Parassa mammacchedakakāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā ekantapharusacetanā ‘pharusavācā’.
analyzed: parassa ekanta pharusa cetanā pharusa vācā

original: Tassā āvibhāvatthamidaṃ vatthu – eko kira dārako mātu vacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ
analyzed: tassāḥ āvibhāva attham idam vatthu ekaḥ kira dārakaḥ mātu vacanam an ādiyitvā araññam

original: gacchati. Taṃ mātā nivattetuṃ asakkontī ‘caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū’ti akkosi.
analyzed: gacchati tam mātā nivattetum a sakkontī caṇḍā tam mahiṃsī anubandhatu iti

original: Athassa tatheva araññe mahiṃsī uṭṭhāsi. Dārako ‘yaṃ mama mātā mukhena kathesi taṃ
analyzed: athassa tathā iva araññe mahiṃsī uṭṭhāsi dārakaḥ yam mama mātā mukhena kathesi taṃ

original: mā hotu, yaṃ cittena cintesi taṃ hotū’ti saccakiriyaṃ akāsi. Mahiṃsī tattheva baddhā
analyzed: mā hotu yam cittena cintesi tam hotu uti saccakiriyam akāsi mahiṃsī tattha iva baddhā

original: viya aṭṭhāsi. Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti. Mātāpitaro
analyzed: viya evam payogo citta saṇhatāya pharusa vācā na hoti mātā pitaro

original: hi kadāci puttake evampi vadanti – ‘corā vo khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karontū’ti, uppalapattampi
analyzed: hi kadāci puttake evam pi vadanti corāḥ vaḥ khaṇḍākhaṇḍikam karontu uti uppala pattam pi

original: ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti. Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti
analyzed: ca nesam upari patantam na icchanti ācariya upajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evam vadanti

original: – ‘kiṃ ime ahirikā anottappino caranti, niddhamatha ne’ti; atha ca nesaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiṃ
analyzed: kim ime ahirikāḥ anottappino caranti atha ca āgama adhigama sampattim

original: icchanti. Yathā ca cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti, evaṃ vacanasaṇhatāya apharusavācāpi
analyzed: icchanti yathā ca citta saṇhatāya pharusa vācā na evam vacana saṇhatāya a pharusa vācā api

original: na hoti. Na hi mārāpetukāmassa ‘imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā’ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā hoti.
analyzed: na hoti na hi māra apetu kāmassa imam sukham vacanam a pharusa vācā hoti

original: Cittapharusatāya panesā pharusavācāva. Sā yaṃ sandhāya pavattitā tassa appaguṇatāya
analyzed: citta pharusa tāya pana isā pharusa vācā ava sā yam sandhāya tassa appaguṇa tāya

original: appasāvajjā, mahāguṇatāya mahāsāvajjā. Tassā tayo sambhārā – akkositabbo paro, kupitacittaṃ, akkosananti.
analyzed: appasāvajjā mahā guṇa tāya mahā sāvajjā tassā tayo sambhārā akkositabbo parassa kupita cittam

original: Anatthaviññāpikā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā akusalacetanā ‘samphappalāpo’. So āsevanamandatāya
analyzed: anattha viññāpikā kāya vacī payoga samuṭṭhāpikā akusala cetanā samphappalāpaḥ saḥ āsevana manda tāya

original: appasāvajjo. Āsevanamahantatāya mahāsāvajjo. Tassa dve sambhārā – bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādiniratthakakathāpurekkhāratā,
analyzed: appasāvajjaḥ āsevana mahanta tāya mahāsāvajjaḥ tassa dve sambhārā bhārata yuddha sītā haraṇa ādi niratthaka kathā purekkhāra tā

original: tathārūpīkathākathanañcāti. Pare pana taṃ kathaṃ agaṇhante kammapathabhedo natthi,
analyzed: tathārūpī kathā kathanam ca ati pare pana tam katham a gaṇhante kamma patha bhedaḥ natthi

original: parena samphappalāpe gahiteyeva hoti.
analyzed: parena samphappalāpe hoti

original: Abhijjhāyatīti ‘abhijjhā’. Parabhaṇḍābhimukhī hutvā tanninnatāya pavattatīti attho.
analyzed: abhijjhāyati iti abhijjhā parabhaṇḍa abhimukhī hutvā tad ninna tāya pavattati iti attho

original: Sā ‘aho tava idaṃ mamassā’ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā. Adinnādānaṃ viya
analyzed: sā aho tava idam mama assa ati evam parabhaṇḍa abhijjhāyana lakkhaṇā adinnādānam viya

original: appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. Tassā dve sambhārā – parabhaṇḍaṃ, attano pariṇāmanañcāti.
analyzed: appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca tassāḥ dve sambhārā parabhaṇḍam attano pariṇāmanam ca ati

original: Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti yāva na ‘aho vata
analyzed: parabhaṇḍa vatthuke hi lobhe uppanne pi na tāva kamma patha bhedaḥ hoti yāva na aho vata

original: idaṃ mamassā’ti attano pariṇāmeti.
analyzed: idam mamassa ati attanaḥ pariṇāmeti

original: Hitasukhaṃ byāpādayatīti ‘byāpādo’. So paravināsāya manopadosalakkhaṇo. Pharusavācā
analyzed: hita sukham byāpādayati iti byāpādo saḥ para vināsāya manaḥ padosa lakkhaṇo pharusa vācā

original: viya appasāvajjo mahāsāvajjo ca. Tassa dve sambhārā – parasatto ca, tassa ca vināsacintāti.
analyzed: viya appasāvajjaḥ mahāsāvajjo ca tassa dve sambhārā parasatto ca tassa ca vināsa cintā ati

original: Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti yāva ‘aho vatāyaṃ
analyzed: para satta vatthuke hi kodhe uppanne pi na tāva kamma patha bhedaḥ hoti yāva aho vata ayam

original: ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā’ti tassa vināsanaṃ na cintesi.
analyzed: ucchijjeyya vinasseyya ati tassa vināsanam na cintesi

original: Yathābhuccagahaṇābhāvena micchā passatīti ‘micchādiṭṭhi’. Sā ‘natthi dinna’ntiādinā
analyzed: yathā abhucca gahaṇa abhāvena micchā passati iti micchādiṭṭhi sā natthi

original: nayena viparītadassanalakkhaṇā. Samphappalāpo viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca. Apica
analyzed: nayena viparīta dassana lakkhaṇā samphappalāpaḥ viya appasāvajjā mahāsāvajjā ca apica

original: aniyatā appasāvajjā, niyatā mahāsāvajjā. Tassā dve sambhārā – vatthuno ca gahitākāraviparītatā,
analyzed: aniyatāḥ appasāvajjā niyatā mahāsāvajjā tassā dve sambhārā vatthuno ca gahita ākāra viparīta tā

original: yathā ca taṃ gaṇhāti tathābhāvena tassupaṭṭhānanti. Tattha natthikāhetukaakiriyadiṭṭhīhi
analyzed: yathā ca tam gaṇhāti tathābhāvena tassa upaṭṭhānam ti tattha natthika ahetuka akiriya diṭṭhīhi

original: eva kammapathabhedo hoti, na aññadiṭṭhīhi.
analyzed: eva kamma patha bhedaḥ hoti na añña diṭṭhīhi

original: Imesaṃ pana dasannaṃ akusalakammapathānaṃ dhammato koṭṭhāsato ārammaṇato vedanāto mūlato cāti pañcahākārehi vinicchayo veditabbo –
analyzed: imesam pana dasannam akusala kamma pathānam dhammataḥ koṭṭhāsataḥ ārammaṇataḥ vedanātaḥ mūlataḥ ca ati pañcahā ākārehi vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Tattha ‘dhammato’ti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanādhammāva honti, abhijjhādayo tayo cetanāsampayuttā.
analyzed: tattha dhammato ti etesu hi paṭipāṭiyā satta cetanā dhammā ava honti abhijjhā ādayo cetanā sampayuttā

original: ‘Koṭṭhāsato’ti paṭipāṭiyā satta, micchādiṭṭhi cāti ime aṭṭha kammapathā eva honti;
analyzed: paṭipāṭiyā satta micchādiṭṭhi ca ati ime aṭṭha kammapathāḥ eva honti

original: no mūlāni. Abhijjhābyāpādā kammapathā ceva mūlāni ca. Abhijjhā hi mūlaṃ patvā ‘lobho
analyzed: no mūlāni abhijjhā abyāpādā kamma pathā ca iva mūlāni ca abhijjhā hi mūlam patvā lobho

original: akusalamūlaṃ’ hoti, byāpādo ‘doso akusalamūlaṃ’.
analyzed: a kusala mūlam hoti byāpādaḥ dosaḥ a kusala mūlam

original: ‘Ārammaṇato’ti pāṇātipāto jīvitindriyārammaṇato saṅkhārārammaṇo hoti. Adinnādānaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇato ti pāṇa atipātaḥ jīvitindriya ārammaṇato saṅkhāra ārammaṇaḥ hoti adinnādānam

original: sattārammaṇaṃ vā hoti saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ vā. Micchācāro phoṭṭhabbavasena saṅkhārārammaṇo
analyzed: satta ārammaṇam vā hoti saṅkhāra ārammaṇam vā micchācāraḥ phoṭṭhabba vasena saṅkhāra ārammaṇaḥ

original: hoti; sattārammaṇotipi eke. Musāvādo sattārammaṇo vā, saṅkhārārammaṇo vā. Tathā pisuṇavācā.
analyzed: hoti satta ārammaṇaḥ ti pi eke musāvādaḥ satta ārammaṇaḥ vā saṅkhāra ārammaṇaḥ vā tathā pisuṇa vācā

original: Pharusavācā sattārammaṇāva. Samphappalāpo diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena sattārammaṇo
analyzed: pharusa vācā satta ārammaṇā ava samphappalāpaḥ diṭṭha suta muta viññāta vasena satta ārammaṇaḥ

original: vā saṅkhārārammaṇo vā. Tathā abhijjhā. Byāpādo sattārammaṇova. Micchādiṭṭhi tebhūmakadhammavasena saṅkhārārammaṇāva.
analyzed: vā saṅkhāra ārammaṇaḥ vā tathā abhijjhā byāpādaḥ satta ārammaṇa uva micchādiṭṭhi tebhūmaka dhamma vasena saṅkhāra ārammaṇā ava

original: ‘Vedanāto’ti pāṇātipāto dukkhavedano hoti. Kiñcāpi hi rājāno coraṃ disvā hasamānāpi
analyzed: vedanāto ti pāṇātipāto dukkha vedano hoti kiñcā api hi rājāno coram disvā hasamānā api

original: ‘gacchatha naṃ ghātethā’ti vadanti, sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā pana nesaṃ dukkhasampayuttāva
analyzed: gacchatha nam ghātetha iti vadanti sanniṭṭhāpaka cetanā pana nesam dukkha sampayuttā ava

original: hoti. Adinnādānaṃ tivedanaṃ. Tañhi parabhaṇḍaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhassa gaṇhato sukhavedanaṃ
analyzed: hoti adinnādānam ti vedanam tat hi parabhaṇḍam disvā haṭṭha tuṭṭhassa gaṇhataḥ sukha vedanam

original: hoti, bhītatasitassa gaṇhato dukkhavedanaṃ. Tathā vipākanissandaphalāni paccavekkhantassa.
analyzed: hoti bhīta tasitassa gaṇhataḥ dukkha vedanam tathā vipāka nissanda phalāni paccavekkhantassa

original: Gahaṇakāle majjhattabhāve ṭhitassa pana gaṇhato adukkhamasukhavedanaṃ hotīti. Micchācāro
analyzed: gahaṇa kāle majjhatta bhāve ṭhitassa pana gaṇhataḥ adukkham asukha vedanam hoti iti micchācāraḥ

original: sukhamajjhattavasena dvivedano. Sanniṭṭhāpakacitte pana majjhattavedano na hoti.
analyzed: sukha majjhatta vasena dvi vedano sanniṭṭhāpaka citte pana majjhatta vedano na hoti

original: Musāvādo adinnādāne vuttanayeneva tivedano; tathā pisuṇavācā. Pharusavācā dukkhavedanā.
analyzed: musāvādaḥ adinnādāne vutta nayena iva ti vedanā tathā pisuṇa vācā pharusa vācā dukkha vedanā

original: Samphappalāpo tivedano. Paresu hi sādhukāraṃ dentesu celukkhepādīni khipantesu haṭṭhatuṭṭhassa
analyzed: samphappalāpaḥ ti vedanaḥ paresu hi sādhukāram dentesu celu khepa ādīni khipantesu haṭṭha tuṭṭhassa

original: sītāharaṇabhāratayuddhādīni kathanakāle so sukhavedano hoti. Paṭhamaṃ dinnavetanena
analyzed: sītā haraṇa bhārata yuddha ādīni kathana kāle saḥ sukha vedanaḥ paṭhamam dinna vetanena

original: ekena pacchā āgantvā ‘ādito paṭṭhāya kathehī’ti vutte ‘ananusandhikaṃ pakiṇṇakakathaṃ
analyzed: ekena pacchā āgantvā āditas paṭṭhāya kathehi iti vutte ananusandhikam pakiṇṇaka katham

original: kathessāmi nu kho no’ti domanassitassa kathanakāle dukkhavedano hoti, majjhattassa
analyzed: kathessāmi nu kho no ti domanassitassa kathana kāle dukkha vedano hoti majjhattassa

original: kathayato adukkhamasukhavedano hoti. Abhijjhā sukhamajjhattavasena dvivedanā; tathā
analyzed: kathayataḥ adukkham asukha vedanaḥ hoti abhijjhā sukha majjhatta vasena dvi vedanā tathā

original: micchādiṭṭhi. Byāpādo dukkhavedano.
analyzed: micchā diṭṭhi byāpādaḥ dukkha vedano

original: ‘Mūlato’ti pāṇātipāto dosamohavasena dvimūlako hoti. Adinnādānaṃ dosamohavasena vā
analyzed: pāṇa atipātaḥ dosa moha vasena dvimūlakaḥ adinnādānam dosa moha vasena vā

original: lobhamohavasena vā. Micchācāro lobhamohavasena. Musāvādo dosamohavasena vā lobhamohavasena
analyzed: lobha moha vasena vā micchā ācāraḥ lobha moha vasena musāvādaḥ dosa moha vasena vā lobha moha vasena

original: vā; tathā pisuṇavācā samphappalāpo ca. Pharusavācā dosamohavasena. Abhijjhā mohavasena

original: Akusalakammapathakathā niṭṭhitā.

original: ārabbha uppajjati eva. Evaṃ uppajjamānassa cassa ekasmiṃ bhave paṭhamaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ

original: ārabbha pavatti hoti, pacchā saddārammaṇanti ayampi kamo natthi. Rūpādīsu cāpi paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: ārabbha pavatti hoti pacchā sadda ārammaṇanti ayam pi kamaḥ natthi rūpa ādīsu ca api paṭhamam

original: nīlārammaṇaṃ pacchā pītārammaṇanti ayampi niyamo natthi. Iti imaṃ sabbārammaṇatañceva,
analyzed: nīla ārammaṇam pacchā pīta ārammaṇan ti ayam pi niyamaḥ natthi iti imam sabba ārammaṇa tam ca iva

original: kamābhāvañca, kamābhāvepi ca nīlapītādīsu niyamābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ‘yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbhā’ti

analyzed: uppannam hoti evam uppajjamānam pi ca paṭhamam rūpa ārammaṇam pacchā sadda ārammaṇam

original: nayo. Ayaṃ tāva ekā yojanā.
analyzed: nayaḥ ayam tāva ekā yojanā

original: Dhammuddesavāro
analyzed: dhammuddesa vāro

original: Phassapañcamakarāsivaṇṇanā
Tasmiṃ samayeti idaṃ aniyamaniddiṭṭhassa samayassa niyamato paṭiniddesavacanaṃ. Tasmā

original: sāmī hutvā icchiticchitaṃ bhuñjati. Tattha hi sūdassa bhattavīmaṃsanamattamiva avasesadhammānaṃ
analyzed: sāmī hutvā icchiticchitam bhuñjati tattha hi sūdassa bhatta vīmaṃsana mattam iva avasesa dhammānam

original: ārammaṇarasassa ekadesānubhavanaṃ. Yathā hi sūdo bhattekadesamattameva vīmaṃsati
analyzed: ārammaṇa rasassa eka desa anubhavanam yathā hi sūdaḥ bhatta eka desa mattam eva vīmaṃsati

original: evaṃ sesadhammāpi ārammaṇarasekadesameva anubhavanti. Yathā pana rājā issaravatāya
analyzed: evam sesa dhammā api ārammaṇa rasa eka desam eva anubhavanti yathā pana rājā issaravatāya

original: vissavitāya sāmī hutvā yadicchakaṃ bhuñjati, evaṃ vedanāpi issaravatāya vissavitāya
analyzed: vissavitāya sāmī hutvā yadicchakam bhuñjati evam vedanā api issaravatāya vissavitāya

original: sāmibhāvena ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati. Tasmā anubhavanarasāti vuccati.
analyzed: sāmi bhāvena ārammaṇa rasam anubhavati tasmai anubhavana rasā ati vuccati

original: Dutiye atthavikappe ayaṃ idha adhippetā vedanā yathā vā tathā vā ārammaṇassa iṭṭhākārameva
analyzed: dutiye attha vikappe ayam idha adhippetā vedanā yathā vā tathā vā ārammaṇassa iṭṭhākāram eva

original: sambhuñjatīti iṭṭhākārasambhogarasāti vuttā. Cetasikaassādato panesā attano sabhāveneva
analyzed: sambhuñjati iti iṭṭha ākāra sambhoga rasā ati vuttā pana esā attanaḥ sabhāvena iva

original: upaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya cetasikaassādapaccupaṭṭhānāti vuttā. Yasmā pana “passaddhikāyo
analyzed: upaṭṭhānam sandhāya cetasika assāda paccupaṭṭhānā ti vuttā yasmā pana passaddhi kāyo

original: sukhaṃ vedeti” tasmā passaddhipadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā.
analyzed: sukham vedeti tasmā passaddhi padaṭṭhānā ati veditabbā

original: Nīlādibhedaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sañjānātīti saññā. Sā sañjānanalakkhaṇā paccābhiññāṇarasā.
analyzed: nīla ādi bhedam ārammaṇam sañjānāti iti saññā sā sañjānana lakkhaṇā pacca abhiññāṇa rasā

original: Catubhūmikasaññā hi nosañjānanalakkhaṇā nāma natthi. Sabbā sañjānanalakkhaṇāva. Yā
analyzed: catu bhūmika saññā hi nosañjānana lakkhaṇā nāma natthi sabbā sañjānana lakkhaṇā ava yā

original: panettha abhiññāṇena sañjānāti sā paccābhiññāṇarasā nāma hoti.
analyzed: pana ittha abhiññāṇena sañjānāti sā paccābhiññāṇarasā nāma hoti

original: Tassā, vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇaṃ katvā puna tena abhiññāṇena taṃ paccābhijānanakāle,
analyzed: tassāḥ vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇam katvā puna tena abhiññāṇena tam paccābhijānana kāle

original: purisassa kāḷatilakādiabhiññāṇaṃ sallakkhetvā puna tena abhiññāṇena asuko nāma esoti
analyzed: purisassa kāḷa tilaka ādi abhiññāṇam sallakkhetvā puna tena abhiññāṇena asukaḥ nāma esaḥ ti

original: tassa paccābhijānanakāle, rañño piḷandhanagopakabhaṇḍāgārikassa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ piḷandhane
analyzed: tassa pacca abhijānana kāle raññaḥ piḷandhana gopaka bhaṇḍāgārikassa tasmim tasmim piḷandhane

original: nāmapaṇṇakaṃ bandhitvā ‘asukaṃ piḷandhanaṃ nāma āharā’ti vutte dīpaṃ jāletvā ratanagabbhaṃ
analyzed: nāmapaṇṇakam bandhitvā asukam piḷandhanam nāma āharāti vutte dīpam jāletvā ratana gabbham

original: pavisitvā paṇṇaṃ vācetvā tassa tasseva piḷandhanassa āharaṇakāle ca pavatti veditabbā.
analyzed: pavisitvā paṇṇam vācetvā tassa tassa iva piḷandhanassa āharaṇa kāle ca pavatti veditabbā

original: Aparo nayo – sabbasaṅgāhikavasena hi sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā. Punasañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā,
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ sabba saṅgāhika vasena hi sañjānana lakkhaṇā saññā puna sañjānana paccaya nimitta karaṇa rasā

original: dāruādīsu tacchakādayo viya. Yathāgahitanimittavasena abhinivesakaraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: dāru ādīsu tad śaka ādayaḥ yathā gahita nimitta vasena abhinivesa karaṇa paccupaṭṭhānā

original: hatthidassakaandhā viya. Ārammaṇe anogāḷhavuttitāya aciraṭṭhānapaccupaṭṭhānā vā,
analyzed: hatthi dassaka andhāḥ viya ārammaṇe anogāḷha vutti tāya acira ṭṭhāna paccupaṭṭhānāḥ vā

original: vijju viya. Yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā, tiṇapurisakesu migapotakānaṃ ‘purisā’ti
analyzed: yathā upaṭṭhita visaya padaṭṭhānā tiṇapurisakesu miga potakānam purisā ti

original: uppannasaññā viya. Yā panettha ñāṇasampayuttā hoti sā saññā ñāṇameva anuvattati.
analyzed: uppanna saññā viya yā pana ittha ñāṇa sampayuttā hoti sā saññā ñāṇam eva anuvattati

original: Sasambhārapathavīādīsu sesadhammā pathavīādīni viyāti veditabbā.
analyzed: sa sambhāra pathavī ādīsu sesa dhammā pathavī ādīni viya ati veditabbā

original: Cetayatīti cetanā saddhiṃ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
analyzed: cetayati iti cetanā saddhim attanā sampayutta dhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahati iti attho

original: Sā cetayitalakkhaṇā, cetanābhāvalakkhaṇāti attho. Āyūhanarasā. Catubhūmikacetanā
analyzed: sā cetayita lakkhaṇā cetanā bhāva lakkhaṇā ati attho āyūhana rasā catu bhūmika cetanā

original: hi nocetayitalakkhaṇā nāma natthi. Sabbā cetayitalakkhaṇāva. Āyūhanarasatā pana kusalākusalesu
analyzed: hi no cetayita lakkhaṇā nāma natthi sabbā cetayita lakkhaṇā āva āyūhana rasa tā pana kusala akusalesu

original: eva hoti. Kusalākusalakammāyūhanaṭṭhānañhi patvā sesasampayuttadhammānaṃ ekadesamattakameva
analyzed: eva hoti kusala akusala kamma āyūhana ṭṭhānam hi patvā sesa sampayutta dhammānam eka desa mattakam eva

original: kiccaṃ hoti. Cetanā pana atirekaussāhā atirekavāyāmā, diguṇussāhā diguṇavāyāmā. Tenāhu
analyzed: kiccam hoti cetanā pana atireka ossāhā atireka vāyāmā diguṇussāhā diguṇa vāyāmā tena āhu

original: porāṇā – “thāvariyasabhāvasaṇṭhitā ca panesā cetanā”ti. Thāvariyoti khettasāmī vuccati.
analyzed: porāṇā thāvariya sabhāva saṇṭhitā ca pana esā cetanā ati thāvariyā ti khetta sāmī vuccati

original: Yathā khettasāmī puriso pañcapaṇṇāsa balipurise gahetvā ‘lāyissāmī’ti ekato khettaṃ
analyzed: yathā khetta sāmī puriso pañca paṇṇāsa bali purise gahetvā lāyissāmi iti ekatas khettaṃ

original: otarati. Tassa atireko ussāho atireko vāyāmo, diguṇo ussāho diguṇo vāyāmo hoti, ‘nirantaraṃ
analyzed: otarati tassa atirekaḥ ussāhaḥ atirekaḥ vā āyāmaḥ diguṇaḥ ussāhaḥ diguṇaḥ vā āyāmaḥ hoti nirantaram

original: gaṇhathā’tiādīni vadati, sīmaṃ ācikkhati, tesaṃ surābhattagandhamālādīni jānāti,
analyzed: gaṇhatha atiādīni vadati sīmam ācikkhati tesam surā bhatta gandha mālā ādīni jānāti

original: maggaṃ samakaṃ harati. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Khettasāmipuriso viya hi cetanā.
analyzed: maggam samakam harati evaṃsampadam idam veditabbam khetta sāmi purisaḥ viya hi cetanā

original: Pañcapaṇṇāsa balipurisā viya cittaṅgavasena uppannā pañcapaṇṇāsa kusalā dhammā. Khettasāmipurisassa
analyzed: pañcapaṇṇāsa bali purisāḥ viya cittaṅga vasena uppannā pañcapaṇṇāsa kusalā dhammā khetta sāmi purisassa

original: diguṇussāhadiguṇavāyāmakaraṇakālo viya kusalākusalakammāyūhanaṭṭhānaṃ patvā cetanāya
analyzed: diguṇa ussāha diguṇa vāyāma karaṇa kālaḥ viya kusala akusala kamma āyūhana ṭṭhānam patvā cetanāya

original: diguṇussāho diguṇavāyāmo hoti. Evamassā āyūhanarasatā veditabbā.
analyzed: diguṇa ussāhaḥ diguṇa vāyāmaḥ hoti evam assāḥ āyūhana rasa tā veditabbā

original: Sā panesā saṃvidahanapaccupaṭṭhānā. Saṃvidahamānā hi ayaṃ upaṭṭhāti, sakiccaparakiccasādhakā,
analyzed: sā pana esā saṃvidahana paccupaṭṭhānā saṃvidahamānā hi ayam upaṭṭhāti sa kicca para kicca sādhakā

original: jeṭṭhasissamahāvaḍḍhakīādayo viya. Yathā hi jeṭṭhasisso upajjhāyaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ
analyzed: jeṭṭha sissa mahāvaḍḍhakī ādayaḥ yathā hi jeṭṭha sissaḥ upajjhāyam dūratas vā āgacchantam

original: disvā sayaṃ adhīyamāno itarepi dārake attano attano ajjhayanakamme pavattayati, tasmiñhi
analyzed: disvā sayam adhīyamānaḥ itare pi dārake attanaḥ attanaḥ ajjhayana kamme pavattayati tasmin hi

original: adhīyituṃ āraddhe tepi adhīyanti, tadanuvattitāya. Yathā ca mahāvaḍḍhakī sayaṃ tacchanto
analyzed: adhīyitum āraddhe te api adhīyanti tad anuvatti tāya yathā ca mahā vaḍḍhakī sayam

original: itarepi tacchake attano attano tacchanakamme pavattayati, tasmiñhi tacchituṃ āraddhe
analyzed: itare pi tad śake attanaḥ attanaḥ tad śana kamme pavattayati tasmin hi tat śitum āraddhe

original: tepi tacchanti, tadanuvattitāya. Yathā ca yodhanāyako sayaṃ yujjhamāno itarepi yodhe
analyzed: te api tat śanti tad anuvatti tāya yathā ca yodha nāyakaḥ sayam yujjhamānaḥ itare api yodhe

original: sampahāravuttiyaṃ pavattayati, tasmiñhi yujjhituṃ āraddhe tepi anivattamānā yujjhanti,
analyzed: sampahāra vuttiyam pavattayati tasmin hi yujjhitum āraddhe te api a nivattamānāḥ yujjhanti

original: tadanuvattitāya. Evamesāpi attano kiccena ārammaṇe pavattamānā aññepi sampayuttadhamme
analyzed: tad anuvatti tāya evam esā api attanaḥ kiccena ārammaṇe pavattamānā aññe pi sampayutta dhamme

original: attano attano kiriyāya pavatteti. Tassā hi attano kiccaṃ āraddhāya, taṃsampayuttāpi
analyzed: attanaḥ attanaḥ kiriyāya pavattā iti tassāḥ hi attanaḥ kiccam āraddhāya tad sampayuttā api

original: ārabhanti. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘sakiccaparakiccasādhakā, jeṭṭhasissamahāvaḍḍhakīādayo viyā’ti.
analyzed: ārabhanti tena vuttam sa kicca para kicca sādhakāḥ jeṭṭha sissa mahāvaḍḍhakī ādayaḥ viyāti

original: Accāyikakammānussaraṇādīsu ca panāyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ ussāhanabhāvena pavattamānā pākaṭā hotīti veditabbā.
analyzed: accāyika kamma anussaraṇa ādīsu ca pana ayam sampayuttānam ussāhana bhāvena pavattamānā pākaṭā hoti iti veditabbā

original: ‘Ārammaṇaṃ cintetī’ti cittanti nayena cittassa vacanattho vutto eva. Lakkhaṇādito
analyzed: ārammaṇam cinteti iti cittam ti nayena cittassa vacanatthaḥ vuttaḥ eva lakkhaṇa āditaḥ

original: pana vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ cittaṃ, pubbaṅgamarasaṃ, sandahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, nāmarūpapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: pana vijānana lakkhaṇam cittam pubbaṅgama rasam sandahana paccupaṭṭhānam nāma rūpa padaṭṭhānam

original: Catubhūmakacittañhi novijānanalakkhaṇaṃ nāma natthi. Sabbaṃ vijānanalakkhaṇameva.
analyzed: catu bhūmaka cittam hi no vijānana lakkhaṇam nāma natthi sabbam vijānana lakkhaṇam eva

original: Dvāraṃ pana patvā ārammaṇavibhāvanaṭṭhāne cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ hoti. Cakkhunā
analyzed: dvāram pana patvā ārammaṇa vibhāvana ṭhāne cittam pubbaṅgamam purecārikam hoti cakkhunā

original: hi diṭṭhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ citteneva vijānāti…pe… manena viññātaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ citteneva
analyzed: hi diṭṭham rūpa ārammaṇam cittena iva vijānāti pe manena viññātam dhamma ārammaṇam cittena iva

original: vijānāti. Yathā hi nagaraguttiko nāma nagaramajjhe siṅghāṭake nisīditvā ‘ayaṃ nevāsiko
analyzed: vijānāti yathā hi nagaraguttikaḥ nāma nagara majjhe siṅghāṭake nisīditvā ayam nevāsikaḥ

original: ayaṃ āgantuko’ti āgatāgataṃ janaṃ upadhāreti vavatthapeti – evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: ayam āgantukaḥ iti āgata āgatam janam upadhāreti vavatthapeti evaṃsampadam idam daṭṭhabbam

original: Vuttampi cetaṃ mahātherena – “yathā, mahārāja, nagaraguttiko nāma majjhe nagarassa
analyzed: vuttam pi ca itam mahā therena yathā mahā rāja nagaraguttikaḥ nāma majjhe nagarassa

original: siṅghāṭake nisinno puratthimato disato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ passeyya… pacchimato…
analyzed: siṅghāṭake nisinno puratthimataḥ disataḥ purisam āgacchantam passeyya pacchimataḥ

original: dakkhiṇato… uttarato disato purisaṃ āgacchantaṃ passeyya, evameva kho, mahārāja,
analyzed: dakkhiṇatas uttaratas disatas purisam āgacchantam passeyya evam eva kho mahā rāja

original: yaṃ cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati taṃ viññāṇena vijānāti, yaṃ sotena saddaṃ suṇāti, ghānena
analyzed: yam cakkhunā rūpam passati tam viññāṇena vijānāti yam sotena saddam suṇāti ghānena

original: gandhaṃ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṃ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṃ phusati, manasā dhammaṃ
analyzed: gandham ghāyati jivhāya rasam sāyati kāyena phoṭṭhabbam phusati manasā dhammaṃ

original: vijānāti, taṃ viññāṇena vijānātī”ti. Evaṃ dvāraṃ patvā ārammaṇavibhāvanaṭṭhāne cittameva
analyzed: vijānāti tam viññāṇena vijānāti iti evam dvāram patvā ārammaṇa vibhāvana ṭṭhāne cittam eva

original: pubbaṅgamaṃ purecārikaṃ. Tasmā pubbaṅgamarasanti vuccati.
analyzed: pubbaṅgamam purecārikam tasmā pubbaṅgamarasanti vuccati

original: Tadetaṃ pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ uppajjamānaṃ purimaṃ purimaṃ nirantaraṃ katvā sandahanameva
analyzed: tat etam pacchimam pacchimam uppajjamānam purimam purimam nirantaram katvā sandahanam eva

original: upaṭṭhātīti sandahanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Pañcavokārabhave panassa niyamato nāmarūpaṃ,
analyzed: upaṭṭhāti iti sandahana paccupaṭṭhānam pañcavokāra bhave pana assa niyamataḥ nāma rūpam

original: catuvokārabhave nāmameva padaṭṭhānaṃ. Tasmā nāmarūpapadaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: catu vokāra bhave nāmam eva padaṭṭhānam tasmā nāma rūpa padaṭṭhānam ti vuttam

original: Kiṃ panetaṃ cittaṃ purimaniddiṭṭhacittena saddhiṃ ekameva udāhu aññanti? Ekameva.
analyzed: kim pana itam cittam purima niddiṭṭha cittena saddhim ekam eva udāhu ekam eva

original: Atha kasmā purimaniddiṭṭhaṃ puna vuttanti? Avicāritaṃ etaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha
analyzed: atha kasmā purima niddiṭṭham puna vuttam ti avicāritam etam aṭṭhakathā ayam ayam pana ittha

original: yutti – yathā hi rūpādīni upādāya paññattā sūriyādayo na atthato rūpādīhi aññe honti,
analyzed: yutti yathā hi rūpa ādīni upādāya paññattā sūriya ādayaḥ na atthataḥ rūpa ādīhi aññe honti

original: teneva yasmiṃ samaye sūriyo udeti tasmiṃ samaye tassa tejasaṅkhātaṃ rūpampīti. Evaṃ
analyzed: tena iva yasmin samaye sūriyaḥ udeti tasmin samaye tassa teja saṅkhātam rūpam pi iti evam

original: vuccamānepi na rūpādīhi añño sūriyo nāma atthi. Na tathā cittaṃ; phassādayo dhamme
analyzed: vuccamāne pi na rūpa ādīhi aññaḥ sūriyaḥ nāma atthi na tathā cittam phassa ādayaḥ dhamme

original: upādāya paññāpiyati; atthato panetaṃ tehi aññameva. Tena ‘yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ uppannaṃ
analyzed: upādāya paññāpiyati atthataḥ pana itam tehi aññam eva tena yasmin samaye cittam uppannam

original: hoti ekaṃseneva tasmiṃ samaye phassādīhi atthato aññameva taṃ hotī’ti imassatthassa
analyzed: hoti ekaṃsena iva tasmin samaye phassa ādīhi atthataḥ aññam eva tam hoti iti imassa atthassa

original: dīpanatthāya etaṃ puna vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: dīpana tthāya etam puna vuttam ti veditabbam

original: Yathā ca “yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti…pe… pathavīkasiṇaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye
analyzed: yathā ca yasmin samaye rūpa upapattiyā maggam bhāvetipe pathavī kasiṇam tasmin samaye

original: phasso hoti vedanā hotī”tiādīsu pana bhāventena vavatthāpite samaye yo bhāveti na
analyzed: phassaḥ hoti vedanā hoti itiādīsu pana bhāventena vavatthāpite samaye yaḥ bhāveti na

original: so atthato uppajjati nāma, teneva tattha yathā “phasso hoti vedanā hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
analyzed: so atthataḥ uppajjati nāma tena iva tattha yathā phassaḥ hoti vedanā hoti iti vuttam

original: na evaṃ “yo bhāveti so hotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: na evam yaḥ bhāveti saḥ hoti iti vuttam yasmin samaye kāma avacaram kusalam cittam

original: uppannaṃ hotī”tiādīsu pana cittena vavatthāpite samaye samayavavatthāpitaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: uppannam hoti itiādīsu pana cittena vavatthāpite samaye samaya vavatthāpitam cittam

original: na tathā atthato nuppajjati. Yatheva pana tadā ‘phasso hoti vedanā hoti’, tathā ‘cittampi
analyzed: na tathā atthataḥ nuppajjati yathā iva pana tadā phassaḥ hoti vedanā hoti tathā cittam pi

original: hotī’ti imassapi atthassa dīpanatthamidaṃ puna vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Idaṃ panettha
analyzed: hoti iti imassa api atthassa dīpana attham idam puna vuttan ti veditabbam idam pana ittha

original: sanniṭṭhānaṃ – uddesavāre saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ niddesavāre ca vibhajanatthaṃ purimena
analyzed: sanniṭṭhānam uddesa vāre saṅgaṇhana attham niddesa vāre ca vibhajana attham purimena

original: hi ‘citta’-saddena kevalaṃ samayo vavatthāpito. Tasmiṃ pana cittena vavatthāpitasamaye
analyzed: hi citta saddena kevalam samayaḥ vavatthāpito tasmin pana cittena vavatthāpita samaye

original: ye dhammā honti tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ “phasso hotī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Cittañcāpi tasmiṃ
analyzed: ye dhammāḥ honti tesam dassana attham phassaḥ hoti itiādi āraddham cittam ca api tasmin

original: samaye hotiyeva. Tasmā tassāpi saṅgaṇhanatthametaṃ puna vuttaṃ. Imasmiñca ṭhāne etasmiṃ
analyzed: samaye tasmā tassa api saṅgaṇhana attham etam puna vuttam imasmin ca ṭhāne etasmin

original: avuccamāne “katamaṃ tasmiṃ samaye citta”nti na sakkā bhaveyya niddesavāre vibhajituṃ.
analyzed: a vuccamāne katamam tasmin samaye cittam ti na sakkā bhaveyya niddesa vāre vibhajitum

original: Evamassa vibhajanaṃyeva parihāyetha. Tasmā tassa niddesavāre vibhajanatthampi etañca
analyzed: evam assa tasmā tassa niddesa vāre vibhajana attham pi etat ca

original: vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam iti veditabbam

original: Yasmā vā “uppannaṃ hotī”ti ettha cittaṃ uppannanti etaṃ desanāsīsameva, ‘na pana
analyzed: yasmai vā uppannam hoti iti ettha cittam uppannan ti etam desanā sīsam eva na pana

original: cittaṃ ekameva uppajjatī’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vicāritaṃ, tasmā cittaṃ “uppanna”nti etthāpi
analyzed: cittam ekam eva uppajjati iti aṭṭhakathā ayam vicāritam tasmā cittam uppannanti ettha api

original: cittamattameva aggahetvā paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammehi saddhiṃyeva cittaṃ gahitaṃ. Evaṃ
analyzed: cittam attam eva aggahetvā paropaṇṇāsa kusala dhammehi saddhiṃya iva cittam gahitam evam

original: tattha saṅkhepato sabbepi cittacetasikadhamme gahetvā idha sarūpena pabhedato dassetuṃ
analyzed: tattha saṅkhepataḥ sabbe api citta cetasika dhamme gahetvā idha sarūpena pabhedataḥ dassetuṃ

original: “phasso hotī”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Iti phassādayo viya cittampi vuttamevāti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: phassaḥ hoti itiādi āraddham iti phassa ādayaḥ viya cittam pi vuttam evā ati veditabbam

original: Dhammuddesavāro
analyzed: dhammuddesa vāro

original: Jhānaṅgarāsivaṇṇanā
Vitakketīti vitakko; vitakkanaṃ vā vitakko; ūhananti vuttaṃ hoti. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇe
analyzed: vitakketi iti vitakkaḥ vitakkanam vā vitakkaḥ ūhananti vuttam hoti svāyam ārammaṇe

original: cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇo. So hi ārammaṇe cittaṃ āropeti. Yathā hi koci rājavallabhaṃ
analyzed: cittassa abhiniropana lakkhaṇo so hi ārammaṇe cittam āropeti yathā hi koci rāja vallabham

original: ñātiṃ vā mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati, evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: ñātim vā mittam vā nissāya rāja geham ārohati evam vitakkam nissāya cittam ārammaṇam

original: ārohati. Tasmā so ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropanalakkhaṇoti vutto. Nāgasenatthero
analyzed: ārohati tasmā saḥ ārammaṇe cittassa abhiniropana lakkhaṇo ti vuttaḥ nāgasena thero

original: panāha – ākoṭanalakkhaṇo vitakko. “Yathā, mahārāja, bherī ākoṭitā atha pacchā anuravati
analyzed: pana āha ākoṭana lakkhaṇaḥ vitakkaḥ yathā mahā rāja bherī ākoṭitā atha pacchā anuravati

original: anusaddāyati, evameva kho, mahārāja, yathā ākoṭanā evaṃ vitakko daṭṭhabbo. Yathā
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yathā ākoṭanā evam vitakkaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ yathā

original: pacchā anuravanā anusaddāyanā evaṃ vicāro daṭṭhabbo”ti. Svāyaṃ āhananapariyāhananaraso.
analyzed: pacchā anuravanā anusaddāyanā evam vicāraḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ ti svāyam āhanana pariyāhanana raso

original: Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati.
analyzed: tathā hi tena yogāvacaraḥ ārammaṇam vitakka āhatam vitakka pariyāhatam karoti iti vuccati

original: Ārammaṇe cittassa ānayanapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: ārammaṇe cittassa ānayana paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Ārammaṇe tena cittaṃ vicaratīti vicāro; vicaraṇaṃ vā vicāro. Anusañcaraṇanti vuttaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇe tena cittam vicarati iti vicāraḥ vicaraṇam vā vicāraḥ anusañcaraṇan ti vuttam

original: hoti. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo. Tattha sahajātānuyojanaraso. Cittassa anuppabandhapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: hoti ārammaṇa anumajjana lakkhaṇo tattha sahajāta anuyojana raso cittassa an uppabandha paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Santepi ca nesaṃ katthaci aviyoge oḷārikaṭṭhena pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena ca ghaṇṭābhighāto
analyzed: sante pi ca nesam katthaci aviyoge oḷārika ṭṭhena pubbaṅgama ṭṭhena ca ghaṇṭā abhighāto

original: viya abhiniropanaṭṭhena ca cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko. Sukhumaṭṭhena anumajjanasabhāvaṭṭhena
analyzed: viya abhiniropana ṭhena ca cetaso paṭhama abhinipātaḥ vitakko sukhuma ṭṭhena anumajjana sabhāva ṭhena

original: ca ghaṇṭānuravo viya anuppabandho vicāro. Vipphāravā cettha vitakko, paṭhamuppattikāle
analyzed: ca ghaṇṭā anuravaḥ viya an uppabandhaḥ vicāraḥ ca ittha vitakko paṭhama uppatti kāle

original: paripphandabhūto cittassa. Ākāse uppatitukāmassa pakkhino pakkhavikkhepo viya. Padumābhimukhapāto
analyzed: paripphanda bhūtaḥ cittassa ākāse uppatitu kāmassa pakkhino pakkha vikkhepaḥ viya paduma abhimukha pāto

original: viya ca gandhānubaddhacetaso bhamarassa. Santavutti vicāro nātiparipphandanabhāvo
analyzed: viya ca gandha anubaddha cetasaḥ bhamarassa vicāraḥ na ati paripphandana bhāvaḥ

original: cittassa, ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkhappasāraṇaṃ viya, paribbhamanaṃ viya ca
analyzed: cittassa ākāse uppatitassa pakkhino pakkha ppasāraṇam viya paribbhamanam viya ca

original: padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa padumassa uparibhāge.
analyzed: paduma abhimukha patitassa bhamarassa padumassa upari bhāge

original: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyam pana ākāse gacchataḥ mahā sakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātam gahetvā pakkhe

original: sannisīdāpetvā gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko.
analyzed: sannisīdāpetvā gamanam viya ārammaṇe cetasaḥ abhiniropana bhāvena pavattaḥ vitakko

original: So hi ekaggo hutvā appeti vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya.
analyzed: saḥ hi ekaggaḥ hutvā appeti vāta ggahaṇa attham pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanam viya

original: Anumajjabhāvena pavatto vicāro. So hi ārammaṇaṃ anumajjatīti vuttaṃ, taṃ anuppabandhanena
analyzed: anumajja bhāvena pavattaḥ vicāraḥ saḥ hi ārammaṇam anumajjati iti vuttam tam an uppabandhanena

original: pavattiyaṃ ativiya yujjati. So pana nesaṃ viseso paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hoti.
analyzed: ativiya yujjati saḥ pana nesam visesaḥ paṭhama dutiya jhānesu pākaṭaḥ hoti

original: Apica malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā itarena hatthena cuṇṇatelavālaṇḍupakena
analyzed: apica malagga hitam kaṃsa bhājanam ekena hatthena daḷham gahetvā itarena hatthena cuṇṇa tela vālaṇḍupakena

original: parimajjantassa daḷhaggahaṇahattho viya vitakko, parimajjanahattho viya vicāro. Tathā
analyzed: parimajjantassa daḷha ggahaṇa hatthaḥ viya vitakkaḥ parimajjana hatthaḥ viya vicāraḥ tathā

original: kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ bhamayitvā bhājanaṃ karontassa uppīḷanahattho
analyzed: kumbhakārassa daṇḍa pahārena cakkam bhamayitvā bhājanam karontassa uppīḍana hatthaḥ

original: viya vitakko, ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya vicāro. Tathā maṇḍalaṃ karontassa
analyzed: viya vitakko itas citas ca sañcaraṇa hatthaḥ viya vicāro tathā maṇḍalam karontassa

original: majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya abhiniropano vitakko, bahiparibbhamanakaṇṭako
analyzed: majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhita kaṇṭakaḥ viya abhiniropanaḥ vitakkaḥ bahi paribbhamana kaṇṭakaḥ

original: viya anumajjamāno vicāro.
analyzed: viya anumajjamānaḥ vicāraḥ

original: Piṇayatīti pīti. Sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā. Kāyacittapīṇanarasā, pharaṇarasā vā. Odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: piṇayati iti pīti sā sampiyāyana lakkhaṇā kāya citta pīṇana rasā pharaṇa rasā vā odagya paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Sā panesā khuddikāpīti, khaṇikāpīti, okkantikāpīti, ubbegāpīti, pharaṇāpītīti pañcavidhā hoti.
analyzed: sā pana esā khuddikā api iti khaṇikā api iti okkantikā api iti ubbegā api iti pharaṇā api iti iti pañcavidhā hoti

original: Tattha khuddikāpīti sarīre lomahaṃsamattameva kātuṃ sakkoti. Khaṇikāpīti khaṇe khaṇe
analyzed: tattha khuddikā api iti sarīre loma haṃsa mattam eva kātum sakkoti khaṇikā api iti khaṇe khaṇe

original: vijjuppādasadisā hoti. Okkantikāpīti, samuddatīraṃ vīci viya, kāyaṃ okkamitvā okkamitvā
analyzed: vijjuppāda sadisā hoti okkantikā api iti samudda tīram kāyam okkamitvā okkamitvā

original: bhijjati. Ubbegāpīti balavatī hoti, kāyaṃ uddhaggaṃ katvā ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇappattā.
analyzed: bhijjati ubbegā apīti balavatī hoti kāyam uddhaggam katvā ākāse laṅghāpana pamāṇa ppattā

original: Tathā hi puṇṇavallikavāsī mahātissatthero puṇṇamadivase sāyaṃ cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā
analyzed: tathā hi puṇṇavallika vāsī mahā tissa theraḥ puṇṇama divase sāyam cetiya ṅgaṇam gantvā

original: candālokaṃ disvā mahācetiyābhimukho hutvā ‘imāya vata velāya catasso parisā mahācetiyaṃ
analyzed: candālokam disvā mahā cetiya abhimukhaḥ hutvā imāya vata velāya catassaḥ parisāḥ mahā cetiyam

original: vandantī’ti pakatiyā diṭṭhārammaṇavasena buddhārammaṇaṃ ubbegaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā sudhātale
analyzed: vandanti iti pakatiyā diṭṭha ārammaṇa vasena buddha ārammaṇam ubbegam pītim uppādetvā sudhā tale

original: pahaṭacitrageṇḍuko viya ākāse uppatitvā mahācetiyaṅgaṇeyeva aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: pahaṭa citra geṇḍukaḥ viya ākāse uppatitvā aṭṭhāsi

original: Tathā girikaṇḍakavihārassa upanissaye vattakālakagāme ekā kuladhītāpi balavabuddhārammaṇāya
analyzed: tathā girikaṇḍaka vihārassa upanissaye vattakālaka gāme ekā kula dhītā api balava buddha ārammaṇāya

original: ubbegāya pītiyā ākāse laṅghesi. Tassā kira mātāpitaro sāyaṃ dhammasavanatthāya vihāraṃ
analyzed: ubbegāya pītiyā ākāse laṅghesi tassā kira mātā pitaro sāyam dhammasavana thāya vihāram

original: gacchantā ‘amma, tvaṃ garubhārā, akāle vicarituṃ na sakkosi, mayaṃ tuyhaṃ pattiṃ
analyzed: gacchantau amma tvam garu bhārāḥ akāle vicaritum na sakkosi mayam tuyham pattim

original: katvā dhammaṃ sossāmā’ti agamaṃsu. Sā gantukāmāpi tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭibāhituṃ asakkontī
analyzed: katvā dhammam sossāma ati agamaṃsu sā gantu kāmā api tesam vacanam paṭibāhitum a sakkontī

original: ghare ohīyitvā gharadvāre ṭhatvā candālokena girikaṇḍake ākāsacetiyaṅgaṇaṃ olokentī
analyzed: ghare ghara dvāre canda ālokena giri kaṇḍake

original: cetiyassa dīpapūjaṃ addasa. Catasso ca parisā mālāgandhādīhi cetiyapūjaṃ katvā padakkhiṇaṃ
analyzed: cetiyassa dīpa pūjam addasa catasso ca parisāḥ mālā gandha ādīhi cetiya pūjam katvā padakkhiṇam

original: karontiyo bhikkhusaṅghassa ca gaṇasajjhāyasaddaṃ assosi. Athassā ‘dhaññā vatime manussā
analyzed: karontiyaḥ bhikkhu saṅghassa ca gaṇa sajjhāya saddam assosi athassā dhaññāḥ vatime manussā

original: ye vihāraṃ gantvā evarūpe cetiyaṅgaṇe anusañcarituṃ evarūpañca madhuraṃ dhammakathaṃ
analyzed: ye vihāram gantvā evarūpe cetiyaṅgaṇe anusañcaritum evarūpam ca madhuram dhamma katham

original: sotuṃ labhantī’ti muttarāsisadisaṃ cetiyaṃ passantiyā eva ubbegāpīti udapādi. Sā
analyzed: sotum labhanti iti muttara asi sadisam cetiyam passantiyā eva ubbegā api iti udapādi sā

original: ākāse laṅghitvā mātāpitūnaṃ purimataraṃyeva ākāsato cetiyaṅgaṇe oruyha cetiyaṃ vanditvā
analyzed: ākāse laṅghitvā mātā pitūnam cetiyaṅgaṇe cetiyam vanditvā

original: dhammaṃ suṇamānā aṭṭhāsi. Atha naṃ mātāpitaro āgantvā ‘amma, tvaṃ katarena maggena
analyzed: dhammam suṇamānā aṭṭhāsi atha nam mātā pitaraḥ āgantvā amma tvam katarena maggena

original: āgatāsī’ti pucchiṃsu. Sā ‘ākāsena āgatāmhi, na maggenā’ti vatvā ‘amma, ākāsena nāma
analyzed: āgatā asi iti pucchiṃsu sā ākāsena āgatā amhi na maggena ati vatvā amme ākāsena nāma

original: khīṇāsavā sañcaranti, tvaṃ kathaṃ āgatā’ti puṭṭhā āha – ‘mayhaṃ candālokena cetiyaṃ
analyzed: khīṇa āsavā sañcaranti tvam katham āgatā ati puṭṭhā āha mayham canda ālokena cetiyam

original: olokentiyā ṭhitāya buddhārammaṇā balavapīti uppajjati, athāhaṃ neva attano ṭhitabhāvaṃ
analyzed: olokentiyā ṭhitāya buddha ārammaṇā balava pīti uppajjati atha aham na iva attanaḥ ṭhita bhāvam

original: na nisinnabhāvaṃ aññāsiṃ, gahitanimitteneva pana ākāsaṃ laṅghitvā cetiyaṅgaṇe patiṭṭhitāmhī’ti.
analyzed: na nisinna bhāvam gahita nimittena iva pana ākāsam laṅghitvā cetiyaṅgaṇe patiṭṭhitā amhi iti

original: Evaṃ ubbegāpīti ākāse laṅghāpanappamāṇā hoti.
analyzed: evam ubbegā apīti ākāse laṅghāpana pamāṇā hoti

original: Pharaṇapītiyā pana uppannāya sakalasarīraṃ dhamitvā pūritavatthi viya, mahatā udakoghena
analyzed: pharaṇa pītiyā pana uppannāya sakala sarīram dhamitvā pūrita vatthi viya mahatā udaka oghena

original: pakkhandapabbatakucchi viya ca anuparipphuṭaṃ hoti. Sā panesā pañcavidhā pīti gabbhaṃ
analyzed: pakkhanda pabbata kucchi viya ca anuparipphuṭam hoti sā pana isā pañcavidhā pīti gabbham

original: gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ passaddhiṃ paripūreti – kāyapassaddhiñca cittapassaddhiñca.
analyzed: gaṇhantī paripākam gacchantī duvidham passaddhim paripūreti kāya passaddhim ca citta passaddhim ca

original: Passaddhi gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī paripākaṃ gacchantī duvidhaṃ sukhaṃ paripūreti – kāyikaṃ
analyzed: passat hi gabbham gaṇhantī paripākam gacchantī duvidham sukham paripūreti kāyikam

original: cetasikañca. Sukhaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhantaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ tividhaṃ samādhiṃ paripūreti
analyzed: cetasikam ca sukham gabbham gaṇhantam paripākam gacchantam tividham samādhim paripūreti

original: – khaṇikasamādhiṃ upacārasamādhiṃ appanāsamādhinti. Tāsu ṭhapetvā appanāsamādhipūrikaṃ
analyzed: khaṇika samādhim upacāra samādhim appanā samādhin ti tāsu ṭhapetvā appanā samādhi pūrikam

original: itarā dvepi idha yujjanti.
analyzed: itarā dvepi idha yujjanti

original: Sukhayatīti sukhaṃ; yassa uppajjati taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. Suṭṭhu vā khādati,
analyzed: sukhayati iti sukham yassa uppajjati tam sukhitam karoti iti atthaḥ suṭṭhu vā khādati

original: khanati ca kāyacittābādhanti sukhaṃ. Somanassavedanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tassa lakkhaṇādīni
analyzed: khanati ca sukham somanassa vedanāya itam nāmam tassa lakkhaṇa ādīni

original: vedanāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
analyzed: vedanā pade vutta nayena iva veditabbāni

original: Aparo nayo – sātalakkhaṇaṃ sukhaṃ, sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasaṃ, anuggahaṇapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: aparaḥ nayaḥ sāta lakkhaṇam sukham sampayuttānam upabrūhana rasam anuggahaṇa paccupaṭṭhānam

original: Satipi ca nesaṃ pītisukhānaṃ katthaci avippayoge, iṭṭhārammaṇapaṭilābhatuṭṭhi pīti;
analyzed: sati pi ca nesam pīti sukhānam katthaci avippayoge iṭṭha ārammaṇa paṭilābha tuṭṭhi pīti

original: paṭiladdharasānubhavanaṃ sukhaṃ. Yattha pīti tattha sukhaṃ. Yattha sukhaṃ tattha
analyzed: paṭiladdha rasa anubhavanam sukham yattha pīti tattha sukham yattha sukham tattha

original: na niyamato pīti. Saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahitā pīti, vedanākkhandhasaṅgahitaṃ sukhaṃ.
analyzed: na niyamataḥ pi iti saṅkhāra kkhandha saṅgahitā pi iti vedanā kkhandha saṅgahitam sukham

original: Kantārakhinnassa vanantodakadassanasavanesu viya pīti. Vanacchāyāpavesanaudakaparibhogesu viya sukhaṃ.
analyzed: kantāra khinnassa vananta udaka dassana savanesu viya pīti vana chāyā pavesana odaka paribhogesu viya sukham

original: Yathā hi puriso mahākantāramaggaṃ paṭipanno ghammapareto tasito pipāsito paṭipathe
analyzed: yathā hi purisaḥ mahā kantāra maggam paṭipannaḥ ghamma paretaḥ tasitaḥ pipāsitaḥ paṭipathe

original: purisaṃ disvā ‘kattha pānīyaṃ atthī’ti puccheyya. So ‘aṭaviṃ uttaritvā jātassaravanasaṇḍo
analyzed: purisam disvā kattha pānīyam atthi iti puccheyya saḥ aṭavim uttaritvā jāta ssara vana saṇḍaḥ

original: atthi, tattha gantvā labhissasī’ti vadeyya. So tassa kathaṃ sutvā haṭṭhapahaṭṭho
analyzed: atthi tattha gantvā labhissasi iti vadeyya so tassa katham sutvā haṭṭha pahaṭṭhaḥ

original: bhaveyya. Tato gacchanto bhūmiyaṃ patitāni uppaladalanālapattādīni disvā suṭṭhutaraṃ
analyzed: tatas gacchantaḥ bhūmiyam patitāni uppala dala nāla patta ādīni disvā suṭṭhutaram

original: haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā gacchanto allavatthe allakese purise passeyya, vanakukkuṭamorādīnaṃ
analyzed: haṭṭha pahaṭṭhaḥ hutvā gacchantaḥ allavatthe alla kese purise passeyya vana kukkuṭa mora ādīnam

original: saddaṃ suṇeyya, jātassarapariyante jātaṃ maṇijālasadisaṃ nīlavanasaṇḍaṃ passeyya,
analyzed: saddam suṇeyya jātassara pariyante jātam maṇi jāla sadisam nīla vana saṇḍam passeyya

original: sare jātāni uppalapadumakumudādīni passeyya, acchaṃ vippasannaṃ udakaṃ passeyya.
analyzed: sare jātāni uppala paduma kumuda ādīni passeyya accham vippasannam udakam passeyya

original: So bhiyyo bhiyyo haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā jātassaraṃ otaritvā yathāruci nhatvā ca pivitvā

Saddahanti etāya, sayaṃ vā saddahati, saddahanamattameva vā esāti saddhā. Sāva assaddhiyassa

analyzed: nīvaraṇe vikkhambheti kilese sannisīdāpeti cittam pasādeti anāvilam karoti pasannena

analyzed: pajānana lakkhaṇā ca yathā hi catu bhittike gehe ratti bhāge dīpe jalite andhakāraḥ

analyzed: yathā mahā rāja purisaḥ andhakāre gehe padīpam paveseyya paviṭṭhaḥ padīpaḥ andhakāram

analyzed: ñāṇa ālokam vidaṃseti pākaṭāni ca ariya saccāni karoti evam kho mahā rāja obhāsana lakkhaṇā paññā ati

analyzed: evam assā pajānana lakkhaṇa tā veditabbā

original: Maggaṅgarāsivaṇṇanā

original: Ayaṃ ubhayapadavasena atthavaṇṇanā hoti.

original: Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānā hirī nāma; bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nāma. Attādhipati hirī

analyzed: ottappam nāma sappatissava lakkhaṇā hirī nāma vajja bhīruka bhaya dassāvi lakkhaṇam ottappam nāma

original: paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tathā ‘pāpakammaṃ nāmetaṃ
analyzed: paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipāta ādi pāpam a karontaḥ hirim samuṭṭhāpeti tathā pāpa kammam nāma etam

original: dubbalajātikānaṃ kammaṃ, na sūrabhāvānaṃ. Mādisassa sūrabhāvasampannassa idaṃ kammaṃ
analyzed: dubbala jātikānam kammam na sūra bhāvānam mādisassa sūra bhāva sampannassa idam kammam

original: kātuṃ na yutta’nti, evaṃ sūrabhāvaṃ paccavekkhitvā pāṇātipātādipāpaṃ akaronto hiriṃ

analyzed: na karoti evam ajjhatta samuṭṭhānā hirī nāma hoti

original: Kathaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nāma? Sace tvaṃ pāpakammaṃ karissasi catūsu parisāsu garahappatto bhavissasi.
analyzed: katham bahiddhā samuṭṭhānam ottappam nāma sace tvam pāpa kammam karissasi catūsu parisāsu garaha ppattaḥ bhavissasi

original: Garahissanti taṃ viññū, asuciṃ nāgariko yathā;
analyzed: garahissanti tam viññū asucim nāgarikaḥ yathā

original: Vajjito sīlavantehi, kathaṃ bhikkhu karissasīti.
analyzed: vajjitaḥ sīlavantehi katham bhikkhu karissasi iti

original: Evaṃ paccavekkhanto hi bahiddhāsamuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Evaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ ottappaṃ nāma hoti.
analyzed: evam paccavekkhantaḥ hi bahiddhā samuṭṭhitena ottappena pāpa kammam na karoti evam bahiddhā samuṭṭhānam ottappam nāma hoti

analyzed: pāpam na karoti evam attā adhipatiḥ hirī nāma tena āha bhagavā saḥ attā anaṃyā iva

original: pāpakammaṃ na karoti. Yathāha – “mahā kho panāyaṃ lokasannivāso. Mahantasmiṃ kho
analyzed: pāpa kammam na karoti yathā āha mahā kho pana ayam loka sannivāsaḥ mahantasmin kho

analyzed: pana loka sannivāse santi samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ iddhimantaḥ dibba cakkhukā para citta vidunaḥ

analyzed: tāḥ dūratas pi passanti āsannāḥ api na dissanti cetasā api cittam pajānanti

original: tāpi maṃ jānissanti ‘passatha bho imaṃ kulaputtaṃ, saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito

analyzed: samānaḥ vokiṇṇaḥ viharati pāpakehi akusalehi dhammehi iti saḥ lokam yā iva adhipatim jeṭṭhakam

analyzed: pariharati iti evam loka adhipatiḥ ottappam nāma hoti

analyzed: pāpa kammam na karoti

original: akaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: a karaṇam veditabbam

original: Sappatissavalakkhaṇā hirī, vajjabhīrukabhayadassāvilakkhaṇaṃ ottappanti. Idampi dvayaṃ

analyzed: hirim samuṭṭhāpetvā pāpam na karoti ekaccaḥ attā anuvāda bhayam para anuvāda bhayam daṇḍa bhayam

original: vitthāretvā kathetabbāni.
analyzed: vitthāretvā kathetabbāni

original: Mūlarāsivaṇṇanā
Na lubbhanti etena, sayaṃ vā na lubbhati, alubbhanamattameva vā tanti alobho. Adosāmohesupi
analyzed: na lubbhanti etena sayam vā na lubbhati a lubbhana mattam eva vā alobhaḥ a dosa a mohesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Tesu alobho ārammaṇe cittassa agedhalakkhaṇo, alaggabhāvalakkhaṇo vā

original: kamaladale jalabindu viya. Apariggahaṇaraso muttabhikkhu viya. Anallīnabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno
