original: asucimhi patitapuriso viya. Adoso acaṇḍikkalakkhaṇo, avirodhalakkhaṇo vā anukūlamitto
analyzed: asucimhi patita purisaḥ viya adosaḥ a caṇḍikka lakkhaṇaḥ avirodha lakkhaṇaḥ vā anukūla mitto

original: viya. Āghātavinayaraso pariḷāhavinayaraso vā candanaṃ viya. Sommabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno
analyzed: viya āghāta vinaya raso pariḷāha vinaya raso vā candanam viya somma bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno

original: puṇṇacando viya. Amoho lakkhaṇādīhi heṭṭhā paññindriyapade vibhāvito eva.
analyzed: puṇṇa candaḥ viya amohaḥ lakkhaṇa ādīhi heṭṭhā paññindriya pade vibhāvito eva

original: Imesu pana tīsu alobho maccheramalassa paṭipakkho, adoso dussīlyamalassa, amoho kusalesu
analyzed: imesu pana tīsu alobho macchera malassa paṭipakkhaḥ adosaḥ dussīlya malassa amoho kusalesu

original: dhammesu abhāvanāya paṭipakkho. Alobho cettha dānahetu, adoso sīlahetu, amoho bhāvanāhetu.
analyzed: dhammesu abhāvanāya paṭipakkhaḥ alobhaḥ ca ittha dāna hetu adosaḥ sīla hetu amohaḥ bhāvanā hetu

original: Tesu ca alobhena anadhikaṃ gaṇhāti, luddhassa adhikaggahaṇato. Adosena anūnaṃ, duṭṭhassa
analyzed: tesu ca alobhena anadhikam gaṇhāti luddhassa adhika ggahaṇataḥ adosena anūnam duṭṭhassa

original: ūnaggahaṇato. Amohena aviparītaṃ, mūḷhassa viparītaggahaṇato.
analyzed: ūna ggahaṇataḥ a mohena a viparītam mūḷhassa viparīta ggahaṇataḥ

original: Alobhena cettha vijjamānaṃ dosaṃ dosato dhārento dose pavattati; luddho hi dosaṃ
analyzed: alobhena ca ittha vijjamānam dosam dosataḥ dhārentaḥ dose pavattati luddhaḥ hi dosam

original: paṭicchādeti. Adosena vijjamānaṃ guṇaṃ guṇato dhārento guṇe pavattati; duṭṭho hi
analyzed: paṭicchādeti adosena vijjamānam guṇam guṇataḥ dhārentaḥ guṇe pavattati duṭṭhaḥ hi

original: guṇaṃ makkheti. Amohena yāthāvasabhāvaṃ yāthāvasabhāvato dhārento yāthāvasabhāve
analyzed: guṇam makkheti amohena yāthāvasa bhāvam yāthāvasa bhāvataḥ dhārentaḥ yāthāvasa bhāve

original: pavattati. Mūḷho hi ‘tacchaṃ atacchanti atacchaṃ ca taccha’nti gaṇhāti. Alobhena
analyzed: pavattati mūḍhaḥ hi taccham a tacchanti a taccham ca tacchanti gaṇhāti alobhena

original: ca piyavippayogadukkhaṃ na hoti, luddhassa piyasabhāvato piyavippayogāsahanato ca.
analyzed: ca piya vippayoga dukkham na hoti luddhassa piya sabhāvato piya vippayoga asahanato ca

original: Adosena appiyasampayogadukkhaṃ na hoti, duṭṭhassa hi appiyasabhāvato appiyasampayogāsahanato
analyzed: adosena appiya sampayoga dukkham na hoti duṭṭhassa hi appiya sabhāvataḥ appiya sampayoga a sahanato

original: ca. Amohena icchitālābhadukkhaṃ na hoti, amūḷhassa hi ‘taṃ kutettha labbhā’tievamādipaccavekkhaṇasambhavato.
analyzed: ca amohena icchitā lābha dukkham na hoti amūḷhassa hi tam kuta ittha labbha ati evamādi paccavekkhaṇa sambhavato

original: Alobhena cettha jātidukkhaṃ na hoti, alobhassa taṇhāpaṭipakkhato taṇhāmūlakattā ca
analyzed: alobhena ca ittha jāti dukkham na hoti alobhassa taṇhā paṭipakkhato taṇhā mūlaka ttā ca

original: jātidukkhassa. Adosena jarādukkhaṃ na hoti, tikkhadosassa khippaṃ jarāsambhavato.
analyzed: jāti dukkhassa adosena jarā dukkham na hoti tikkha dosassa khippam jarā sambhavato

original: Amohena maraṇadukkhaṃ na hoti, sammohamaraṇañhi dukkhaṃ, na cetaṃ amūḷhassa hoti.
analyzed: amohena maraṇa dukkham na hoti sammoha maraṇam hi dukkham na ca itam amūḷhassa hoti

original: Alobhena ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ, amohena pabbajitānaṃ, adosena pana sabbesampi sukhasaṃvāsatā hoti.
analyzed: alobhena ca gaha ṭṭhānam amohena pabbajitānam adosena pana sabbesam pi sukha saṃvāsa tā hoti

original: Visesato cettha alobhena pettivisaye upapatti na hoti. Yebhuyyena hi sattā taṇhāya
analyzed: visesataḥ ca ittha alobhena petti visaye upapatti na hoti yebhuyyena hi sattā taṇhāya

original: pettivisayaṃ upapajjanti, taṇhāya ca paṭipakkho alobho. Adosena niraye upapatti na
analyzed: petti visayam upapajjanti taṇhāya ca paṭipakkhaḥ alobho adosena niraye upapatti na

original: hoti. Dosena hi caṇḍajātitāya dosasadisaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjanti. Dosassa ca paṭipakkho
analyzed: hoti dosena hi caṇḍa jāti tāya dosa sadisam nirayam upapajjanti dosassa ca paṭipakkhaḥ

original: adoso. Amohena tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbatti na hoti. Mohena hi niccasammūḷhaṃ tiracchānayoniṃ
analyzed: adosaḥ a mohena tiracchānayoniyam nibbatti na hoti mohena hi nicca sammūḷham tiracchānayonim

original: upapajjanti. Mohassa paṭipakkho ca amoho. Etesu ca alobho rāgavasena upagamanassa
analyzed: upapajjanti mohassa paṭipakkhaḥ ca amohaḥ etesu ca alobho rāga vasena upagamanassa

original: abhāvakaro, adoso dosavasena apagamanassa, amoho mohavasena amajjhattabhāvassa.
analyzed: abhāva karaḥ adosaḥ dosa vasena apagamanassa amohaḥ moha vasena a majjhatta bhāvassa

original: Tīhipi cetehi yathāpaṭipāṭiyā nekkhammasaññā abyāpādasaññā avihiṃsāsaññāti imā tisso.
analyzed: tīhi pi ca itehi yathā paṭipāṭiyā nekkhamma saññā a byāpāda saññā a vihiṃsā saññā ati imāḥ tisso

original: Asubhasaññā appamāṇasaññā dhātusaññāti imā ca tisso saññāyo honti. Alobhena pana
analyzed: asubha saññā appamāṇa saññā dhātu saññā ati imāḥ ca tisso saññāyaḥ honti alobhena pana

original: kāmasukhallikānuyogaantassa, adosena attakilamathānuyogaantassa parivajjanaṃ hoti;
analyzed: kāma sukhallikā anuyoga antassa adosena atta kilamatha anuyoga antassa parivajjanam hoti

original: amohena majjhimāya paṭipattiyā paṭipajjanaṃ. Tathā alobhena abhijjhākāyaganthassa
analyzed: amohena majjhimāya paṭipattiyā paṭipajjanam tathā alobhena abhijjhā kāya ganthassa

original: pabhedanaṃ hoti, adosena byāpādakāyaganthassa, amohena sesaganthadvayassa. Purimāni
analyzed: pabhedanam hoti adosena byāpāda kāya ganthassa amohena sesa gantha dvayassa purimāni

original: ca dve satipaṭṭhānāni purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ ānubhāvena, pacchimāni pacchimasseva ānubhāvena ijjhanti.
analyzed: ca dve satipaṭṭhānāni purimānam dvinnam ānubhāvena pacchimāni pacchimassa iva ānubhāvena ijjhanti

original: Alobho cettha ārogyassa paccayo hoti; aluddho hi lobhanīyampi asappāyaṃ na sevati,
analyzed: alobho ca ittha ārogyassa paccayaḥ hoti a luddhaḥ hi lobhanīyam pi a sappāyam na sevati

original: tena kho arogo hoti. Adoso yobbanassa; aduṭṭho hi valipalitāvahena dosagginā aḍayhamāno
analyzed: tena kho arogaḥ hoti a dosaḥ yobbanassa a duṭṭhaḥ hi vali palita āvahena dosagginā a ḍayhamānaḥ

original: dīgharattaṃ yuvā hoti. Amoho dīghāyukatāya; amūḷho hi hitāhitaṃ ñatvā ahitaṃ parivajjanto
analyzed: dīgharattam yuvā hoti amohaḥ dīgha āyuka tāya amūḍhaḥ hi hita ahitam ñatvā ahitam parivajjantaḥ

original: hitañca paṭisevamāno dīghāyuko hoti.
analyzed: hitam ca paṭisevamānaḥ dīgha āyukaḥ hoti

original: Alobho cettha bhogasampattiyā paccayo hoti, aluddhassa hi cāgena bhogapaṭilābho.
analyzed: alobho ca ittha bhoga sampattiyāḥ paccayaḥ hoti a luddhassa hi cāgena bhoga paṭilābho

original: Adoso mittasampattiyā, mettāya mittānaṃ paṭilābhato ceva aparihānato ca. Amoho attasampattiyā,
analyzed: a dosaḥ mitta sampattiyāḥ mettāya mittānam paṭilābhataḥ ca iva a parihānataḥ ca a mohaḥ atta sampattiyāḥ

original: amūḷho hi attano hitameva karonto attānaṃ sampādeti. Alobho ca dibbavihārassa paccayo
analyzed: amūḷhaḥ hi attanaḥ hitam eva karontaḥ attānam sampādeti alobho ca dibba vihārassa paccayo

original: hoti, adoso brahmavihārassa, amoho ariyavihārassa.
analyzed: hoti adosaḥ brahmavihārassa amohaḥ ariya vihārassa

original: Alobhena cettha sakapakkhesu sattasaṅkhāresu nibbuto hoti, tesaṃ vināsena abhisaṅgahetukassa
analyzed: alobhena ca ittha saka pakkhesu satta saṅkhāresu nibbutaḥ hoti tesam vināsena abhisaṅga hetukassa

original: dukkhassa abhāvā; adosena parapakkhesu, aduṭṭhassa hi verīsupi verisaññāya abhāvato;
analyzed: dukkhassa abhāvā adosena parapakkhesu aduṭṭhassa hi verī supi veri saññāya abhāvato

original: amohena udāsīnapakkhesu, amūḷhassa sabbābhisaṅgatāya abhāvato.
analyzed: amohena udāsīna pakkhesu amūḷhassa sabba abhisaṅga tāya abhāvato

original: Alobhena ca aniccadassanaṃ hoti; luddho hi upabhogāsāya aniccepi saṅkhāre aniccato
analyzed: alobhena ca anicca dassanam hoti luddhaḥ hi anicce pi saṅkhāre aniccato

original: na passati. Adosena dukkhadassanaṃ; adosajjhāsayo hi pariccattaāghātavatthupariggaho
analyzed: na passati adosena dukkha dassanam a dosa ajjhāsayaḥ hi pariccatta āghāta vatthu pariggaho

original: saṅkhāreyeva dukkhato passati. Amohena anattadassanaṃ; amūḷho hi yāthāvagahaṇakusalo
analyzed: saṅkhāreya iva dukkhataḥ passati amohena anatta dassanam amūḷhaḥ hi yāthāva gahaṇa kusalaḥ

original: apariṇāyakaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ apariṇāyakato bujjhati. Yathā ca etehi aniccadassanādīni
analyzed: apariṇāyakam khandha pañcakam apariṇāyakataḥ bujjhati yathā ca etehi anicca dassana ādīni

original: evametepi aniccadassanādīhi honti. Aniccadassanena hi alobho hoti, dukkhadassanena
analyzed: evam ete pi anicca dassana ādīhi honti anicca dassanena hi alobhaḥ hoti dukkha dassanena

original: adoso, anattadassanena amoho hoti. Ko hi nāma ‘aniccamida’nti sammā ñatvā tassatthāya
analyzed: a dosaḥ anatta dassanena a mohaḥ hoti kaḥ hi nāma aniccam idam ti sammā ñatvā tassa atthāya

original: pihaṃ uppādeyya, saṅkhāre vā ‘dukkha’nti jānanto aparampi accantatikhiṇaṃ kodhadukkhaṃ
analyzed: piham uppādeyya saṅkhāre vā dukkhanti jānantaḥ aparam pi accanta tikhiṇam kodha dukkham

original: uppādeyya, attasuññatañca bujjhitvā puna sammohamāpajjeyyāti?
analyzed: uppādeyya atta suñña tañca bujjhitvā punar sammoham āpajjeyya ati

original: Kammapatharāsivaṇṇanā
Nābhijjhāyatīti anabhijjhā. Kāyikacetasikasukhaṃ idhalokaparalokahitaṃ guṇānubhāvapaṭiladdhaṃ
analyzed: na abhijjhāyati iti anabhijjhā kāyika cetasika sukham idhaloka paraloka hitam guṇa anubhāva paṭiladdham

original: kittisaddañca na byāpādetīti abyāpādo. Sammā passati, sobhanā vā diṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhi.
analyzed: kitti saddam ca na byāpādeti iti a byāpādaḥ sammā passati sobhanā vā diṭṭhī iti sammādiṭṭhi

original: Alobhādīnaṃyeva tāni nāmāni. Heṭṭhā panete dhammā mūlavasena gahitā, idha kammapathavasenāti veditabbā.
analyzed: tāni nāmāni heṭṭhā pana ete dhammā mūla vasena gahitāḥ idha kammapatha vasena ati veditabbā

original: Lokapāladukavaṇṇanā
analyzed: lokapāla duka vaṇṇanā

original: Hirottappānipi heṭṭhā balavasena gahitāni, idha lokapālavasena. Lokañhi ime dve dhammā pālayanti. Yathāha –
analyzed: hirottappāni pi heṭṭhā bala vasena gahitāni idha lokapāla vasena lokam hi ime dve dhammā pālayanti yathā āha

original: “Dveme, bhikkhave, sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti. Katame dve? Hirī ca ottappañca. Ime
analyzed: dve me bhikkhave sukkāḥ dhammāḥ lokam pālenti katame dve hirī ca ottappañca ime

original: kho, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti. Sace, bhikkhave, dve sukkā dhammā
analyzed: kho bhikkhave dve sukkāḥ dhammāḥ lokam pālenti sace bhikkhave dve sukkāḥ dhammāḥ

original: lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ, nayidha paññāyetha mātāti vā, mātucchāti vā, mātulānīti vā, ācariyabhariyāti
analyzed: lokam na pāleyyum paññāyetha mātā ati vā mātucchā ati vā mātulānī iti vā

original: vā, garūnaṃ dārāti vā. Sambhedaṃ loko agamissa yathā ajeḷakā kukkuṭasūkarā soṇasiṅgālā.
analyzed: vā vā sambhedam lokaḥ agamissa yathā ajeḍakā kukkuṭa sūkarā soṇa siṅgālā

original: Yasmā ca kho, bhikkhave, ime dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālenti, tasmā paññāyati mātāti
analyzed: yasmā ca kho bhikkhave ime dve sukkāḥ dhammāḥ lokam pālenti tasmā paññāyati mātā ati

original: vā mātucchāti vā mātulānīti vā ācariyabhariyāti vā garūnaṃ dārāti vā”ti.
analyzed: vā vā mātulānīti vā vā vā ati

original: Passaddhādiyugalavaṇṇanā
analyzed: passaddha ādi yugala vaṇṇanā

original: Kāyassa passambhanaṃ kāyapassaddhi. Cittassa passambhanaṃ cittapassaddhi. Kāyoti
analyzed: kāyassa passambhanam kāya passaddhi cittassa passambhanam citta passaddhi kāyoti

original: cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā. Ubhopi panetā ekato katvā kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā
analyzed: ca ittha vedanā ādayo tayo khandhā ubho api pana ekato katvā

original: kāyacittapassaddhiyo, kāyacittadarathanimmaddanarasā, kāyacittānaṃ aparipphandasītibhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: kāya citta passaddhiyaḥ kāya citta daratha nimmaddana rasā kāya cittānam a paripphanda sīti bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā. Kāyacittānaṃ avūpasamakarauddhaccādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: kāya citta padaṭṭhānā kāya cittānam a vūpasamaka rauddhacca ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa lahubhāvo kāyalahutā. Cittassa lahubhāvo cittalahutā. Tā kāyacittagarubhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: kāyassa lahu bhāvo kāya lahu tā cittassa lahu bhāvo citta lahu tā tā kāya citta garu bhāva vūpasama lakkhaṇā

original: kāyacittagarubhāvanimmaddanarasā, kāyacittānaṃ adandhatāpaccupaṭṭhānā, kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: kāya citta garu bhāva nimmaddana rasā kāya cittānam adandha tā paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā

original: Kāyacittānaṃ garubhāvakarathinamiddhādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: kāya cittānam daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa mudubhāvo kāyamudutā. Cittassa mudubhāvo cittamudutā. Tā kāyacittathaddhabhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: kāyassa mudu bhāvaḥ kāya mudu tā cittassa mudu bhāvaḥ citta mudu tā tā kāya citta thaddha bhāva vūpasama lakkhaṇā

original: kāyacittathaddhabhāvanimmaddanarasā, appaṭighātapaccupaṭṭhānā, kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: kāya citta thaddha bhāva nimmaddana rasā appaṭighāta paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā

original: Kāyacittānaṃ thaddhabhāvakaradiṭṭhimānādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: kāya cittānam thaddha bhāva kara diṭṭhi māna ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa kammaññabhāvo kāyakammaññatā. Cittassa kammaññabhāvo cittakammaññatā. Tā
analyzed: kāyassa kammañña bhāvaḥ kāya kammañña tā cittassa kammañña bhāvaḥ citta kammañña tā tā

original: kāyacittaakammaññabhāvavūpasamalakkhaṇā, kāyacittānaṃ akammaññabhāvanimmaddanarasā,
analyzed: kāya citta akammañña bhāva vūpasama lakkhaṇā kāya cittānaṃ akammañña bhāva nimmaddana rasā

original: kāyacittānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇasampattipaccupaṭṭhānā, kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā. Kāyacittānaṃ
analyzed: kāya cittānaṃ ārammaṇa karaṇa sampatti paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā kāya cittānaṃ

original: akammaññabhāvakarāvasesanīvaraṇapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā. Tā pasādanīyavatthūsu
analyzed: akammañña bhāva kara avasesa nīvaraṇa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā tā pasādanīya vatthūsu

original: pasādāvahā, hitakiriyāsu viniyogakkhemabhāvāvahā suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: pasāda āvahā hita kiriyāsu viniyoga khema bhāva āvahā suvaṇṇa visuddhi viyāti daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa pāguññabhāvo kāyapāguññatā. Cittassa pāguññabhāvo cittapāguññatā. Tā kāyacittānaṃ
analyzed: kāyassa pāguñña bhāvo kāya pāguñña tā cittassa pāguñña bhāvaḥ citta pāguñña tā tā kāya cittānam

original: agelaññabhāvalakkhaṇā, kāyacittagelaññanimmaddanarasā, nirādīnavapaccupaṭṭhānā, kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: a gelañña bhāva lakkhaṇā kāya citta gelañña nimmaddana rasā nirādīnava paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā

original: Kāyacittagelaññakaraassaddhiyādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbā

original: Kāyassa ujukabhāvo kāyujukatā. Cittassa ujukabhāvo cittujukatā. Tā kāyacittānaṃ ajjavalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: kāyassa ujuka bhāvaḥ kāya ujuka tā cittassa ujuka bhāvaḥ citta ujuka tā tā kāya cittānaṃ ajjava lakkhaṇā

original: kāyacittakuṭilabhāvanimmaddanarasā, ajimhatāpaccupaṭṭhānā, kāyacittapadaṭṭhānā. Kāyacittānaṃ
analyzed: kāya citta kuṭila bhāva nimmaddana rasā a jimha tā paccupaṭṭhānā kāya citta padaṭṭhānā kāya cittānaṃ

original: kuṭilabhāvakaramāyāsāṭheyyādikilesapaṭipakkhabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: kuṭila bhāva kara māyā sāṭheyya ādi kilesa paṭipakkha bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Saratīti sati. Sampajānātīti sampajaññaṃ; samantato pakārehi jānātīti attho. Sātthakasampajaññaṃ
analyzed: sarati iti sati sampajānāti iti sampajaññam samantataḥ pakārehi jānāti iti sa atthaka sampajaññam

original: sappāyasampajaññaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ asammohasampajaññanti imesaṃ catunnaṃ panassa
analyzed: sa pāya sampajaññam gocara sampajaññam a sammoha sampajaññanti imesam catunnam panassa

original: vasena bhedo veditabbo. Lakkhaṇādīni ca tesaṃ satindriyapaññindriyesu vuttanayeneva
analyzed: vasena bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ lakkhaṇa ādīni ca tesam satindriya paññindriyesu vutta nayena iva

original: veditabbāni. Iti heṭṭhā vuttamevetaṃ dhammadvayaṃ puna imasmiṃ ṭhāne upakāravasena gahitaṃ.
analyzed: veditabbāni iti heṭṭhā vuttam eva etam dhamma dvayam puna imasmin ṭhāne upakāra vasena gahitam

original: Kāmacchandādayo paccanīkadhamme sametīti samatho. Aniccādivasena vividhehi ākārehi
analyzed: kāmacchanda ādayo paccanīka dhamme sameti iti samathaḥ anicca ādi vasena vividhehi ākārehi

original: dhamme passatīti vipassanā. Paññāvesā atthato. Imesampi dvinnaṃ lakkhaṇādīni heṭṭhā
analyzed: dhamme passati iti vipassanā paññā vesā atthataḥ imesam pi dvinnam lakkhaṇa ādīni heṭṭhā

original: vuttāneva. Idha panete yuganaddhavasena gahitā.
analyzed: idha pana ete yuga naddha vasena gahitā

original: Sahajātadhamme paggaṇhātīti paggāho. Uddhaccasaṅkhātassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhāvato
analyzed: sahajāta dhamme paggaṇhāti iti paggāhaḥ uddhacca saṅkhātassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkha bhāvato

original: na vikkhepoti avikkhepo. Etesampi lakkhaṇādīni heṭṭhā vuttāneva. Idha panetaṃ dvayaṃ
analyzed: na vikkhepo ti avikkhepaḥ etesam pi lakkhaṇa ādīni heṭṭhā vuttāni eva idha pana etam dvayam

original: vīriyasamādhiyojanatthāya gahitanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vīriya samādhi yojana tthāya gahitan ti veditabbam

original: Yevāpanakavaṇṇanā
analyzed: yevāpanaka vaṇṇanā

original: Ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā, ime dhammā
analyzed: ye vā pana tasmin samaye aññe pi atthi paṭiccasamuppannāḥ arūpino dhammāḥ ime dhammā

original: kusalāti ‘phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hotī’ti na kevalaṃ padapaṭipāṭiyā uddiṭṭhā ime
analyzed: kusalā ti phassaḥ hoti pe avikkhepaḥ hoti iti na kevalam pada paṭipāṭiyā uddiṭṭhāḥ ime

original: paropaṇṇāsadhammā eva, atha kho yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ tihetukaṃ somanassasahagataṃ
analyzed: eva atha kho yasmin samaye kāmāvacaram ti hetukam somanassa sahagatam

original: paṭhamaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ samaye ye vā pana aññepi tehiyeva
analyzed: paṭhamam asaṅkhārikam mahācittam uppannam hoti tasmin samaye ye vā pana aññe pi tehi yeva

original: phassādīhi sampayuttā hutvā pavattamānā atthi, attano attano anurūpaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca
analyzed: phassa ādīhi sampayuttā hutvā pavattamānā atthi attanaḥ attanaḥ anurūpam paccayam paṭicca

original: samuppannā rūpābhāvena arūpino, sabhāvato upalabbhamānā dhammā sabbepi ime dhammā kusalā.
analyzed: samuppannāḥ rūpa abhāvena arūpino sabhāvataḥ upalabbhamānāḥ dhammā sabbe pi ime dhammā kusalā

original: Ettāvatā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiyaṃ āruḷhe paropaṇṇāsadhamme dīpetvā yevāpanakavasena
analyzed: ettāvatā cittaṅga vasena pāḷiyam āruḷhe paropaṇṇā sadhamme dīpetvā yevāpanaka vasena

original: aparepi nava dhamme dhammarājā dīpeti. Tesu tesu hi suttapadesu ‘chando adhimokkho
analyzed: apare pi nava dhamme dhammarājā dīpeti tesu tesu hi sutta padesu chandaḥ adhimokkho

original: manasikāro tatramajjhattatā karuṇā muditā kāyaduccaritavirati vacīduccaritavirati
analyzed: manasikāraḥ karuṇā mudi tā kāya duccarita virati vacī duccarita virati

original: micchājīvaviratī’ti ime nava dhammā paññāyanti. Imasmiñcāpi mahācitte kattukamyatākusaladhammacchando
analyzed: micchājīva virati iti ime nava dhammā paññāyanti imasmin ca api mahācitte kattu kamya tā kusala dhamma chando

original: atthi, cittaṅgavasena pana pāḷiyaṃ na āruḷho. So idha yevāpanakavasena gahito.
analyzed: atthi cittaṅga vasena pana pāḷiyam naḥ āruḷhaḥ saḥ idha yevāpanaka vasena gahito

original: Adhimokkho atthi, manasikāro atthi, tatramajjhattatā atthi. Mettāpubbabhāgo atthi;
analyzed: adhimokkhaḥ atthi manasikāraḥ atthi tatram ajjhatta tā atthi mettā pubbabhāgaḥ atthi

original: so adose gahite gahito eva hoti. Karuṇāpubbabhāgo atthi, muditāpubbabhāgo atthi.
analyzed: so adose gahite gahitaḥ eva hoti karuṇā pubbabhāgaḥ atthi muditā pubbabhāgaḥ atthi

original: Upekkhāpubbabhāgo atthi; so pana tatramajjhattatāya gahitāya gahitova hoti. Sammāvācā
analyzed: upekkhā pubbabhāgaḥ atthi saḥ pana tatram ajjhatta tāya gahitāya gahitaḥ uva hoti sammā vācā

original: atthi, sammākammanto atthi. Sammāājīvo atthi; cittaṅgavasena pana pāḷiyaṃ na āruḷho.
analyzed: atthi sammākammantaḥ atthi sammāājīvo atthi cittaṅga vasena pana pāḷiyam naḥ āruḷhaḥ

original: Sopi idha yevāpanakavasena gahito.
analyzed: saḥ upi gahitaḥ

original: Imesu pana navasu chando adhimokkho manasikāro tatramajjhattatāti ime cattārova ekakkhaṇe
analyzed: imesu pana navasu chandaḥ adhimokkhaḥ manasikāro ime cattāro eva eka kkhaṇe

original: labbhanti, sesā nānākkhaṇe. Yadā hi iminā cittena micchāvācaṃ pajahati, virativasena
analyzed: labbhanti sesāḥ nānā kkhaṇe yadā hi iminā cittena micchā vācam pajahati virati vasena

original: sammāvācaṃ pūreti, tadā chandādayo cattāro, sammāvācā cāti ime pañca ekakkhaṇe labbhanti.
analyzed: sammāvācam pūreti tadā chanda ādayo cattāro sammāvācā ca ati ime pañca eka kkhaṇe labbhanti

original: Yadā micchākammantaṃ pajahati, virativasena sammākammantaṃ pūreti…pe… micchāājīvaṃ
analyzed: yadā micchā kammantam pajahati virati vasena sammā kammantam micchā ājīvam

original: pajahati, virativasena sammāājīvaṃ pūreti…pe… yadā karuṇāya parikammaṃ karoti…pe…
analyzed: pajahati virati vasena sammāājīvam yadā karuṇāya parikammam

original: yadā muditāya parikammaṃ karoti, tadā chandādayo cattāro, muditāpubbabhāgo cāti ime
analyzed: yadā muditāya parikammam karoti tadā chanda ādayo cattāro muditā pubbabhāgaḥ ca ati ime

original: pañca ekakkhaṇe labbhanti. Ito pana muñcitvā, dānaṃ dentassa sīlaṃ pūrentassa yoge
analyzed: pañca eka kkhaṇe labbhanti itas pana muñcitvā dānam dentassa sīlam pūrentassa yoge

original: kammaṃ karontassa cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāneva labbhanti.
analyzed: kammam karontassa cattāri labbhanti

original: Evametesu navasu yevāpanakadhammesu ‘chando’ti kattukamyatāyetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tasmā
analyzed: evam etesu navasu adhivacanam tasmā

original: so kattukamyatālakkhaṇo chando, ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, ārammaṇena atthikatāpaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: so kattu kamya tā lakkhaṇaḥ chandaḥ ārammaṇa pariyesana rasaḥ ārammaṇena atthika tā paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Tadevassa padaṭṭhānaṃ. Ārammaṇassa gahaṇe cāyaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: tat evassa padaṭṭhānam ārammaṇassa gahaṇe ca ayam cetasaḥ hattha ppasāraṇam viya daṭṭhabbo

original: Adhimuccanaṃ ‘adhimokkho’. So sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo, asaṃsappanaraso, nicchayapaccupaṭṭhāno sanniṭṭhātabbadhammapadaṭṭhāno. Ārammaṇe niccalabhāvena indakhīlo viya daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: adhimuccanam adhimokkhaḥ saḥ sanniṭṭhāna lakkhaṇaḥ a saṃsappana rasaḥ nicchaya paccupaṭṭhānaḥ sanniṭṭhātabba dhamma padaṭṭhānaḥ ārammaṇe niccala bhāvena inda khīlaḥ viya daṭṭhabbaḥ

original: Kiriyā kāro, manasmiṃ kāro ‘manasikāro’. Purimamanato visadisaṃ manaṃ karotītipi
analyzed: kiriyā kāraḥ manasmin kāraḥ manasikāraḥ purima manataḥ visadisam manam karoti iti pi

original: manasikāro. Svāyaṃ ārammaṇapaṭipādako vīthipaṭipādako javanapaṭipādakoti tippakāro.
analyzed: manasikāro svāyam ārammaṇa paṭipādakaḥ vīthi paṭipādakaḥ javana paṭipādakaḥ ti tippakāro

original: Tattha ārammaṇapaṭipādako manasmiṃ kāroti manasikāro. So sāraṇalakkhaṇo, sampayuttānaṃ
analyzed: tattha ārammaṇa paṭipādakaḥ manasmim kāroti manasikāro so sāraṇa lakkhaṇo sampayuttānam

original: ārammaṇe sampayojanaraso, ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno, saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno.
analyzed: ārammaṇe sampayojana rasaḥ ārammaṇa abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpanno

original: Ārammaṇapaṭipādakattena sampayuttānaṃ sārathi viya daṭṭhabbo. Vīthipaṭipādakoti pana
analyzed: ārammaṇa paṭipādaka ttena sampayuttānam sārathi viya daṭṭhabbaḥ vīthi paṭipādakaḥ ti pana

original: pañcadvārāvajjanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Javanapaṭipādakoti manodvārāvajjanassa. Na te idha adhippetā.
analyzed: pañca dvāra āvajjanassa itam adhivacanam javana paṭipādakaḥ ti manaḥ dvāra āvajjanassa na te idha adhippetā

original: Tesu dhammesu majjhattatā ‘tatramajjhattatā’. Sā cittacetasikānaṃ samavāhitalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: tesu dhammesu majjhatta tā tatra majjhatta tā sā citta cetasikānam samavāhita lakkhaṇā

original: ūnādhikanivāraṇarasā, pakkhapātupacchedanarasā vā; majjhattabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā. Cittacetasikānaṃ
analyzed: ūna adhika nivāraṇa rasā pakkhapāta upacchedana rasā vā majjhatta bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā citta cetasikānam

original: ajjhupekkhanavasena samappavattānaṃ ājāneyyānaṃ ajjhupekkhanasārathi viya daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: ajjhupekkhana vasena sama ppavattānam ājāneyyānam ajjhupekkhana sārathi viya daṭṭhabbā

original: ‘Karuṇāmuditā’ brahmavihāraniddese āvi bhavissanti. Kevalañhi tā appanappattā rūpāvacarā, idha kāmāvacarāti ayameva viseso.
analyzed: karuṇā muditāḥ brahmavihāra niddese āvi bhavissanti kevalam hi tāḥ appana pattāḥ rūpāvacarāḥ idha kāmāvacarā ti ayam eva visesaḥ

original: Kāyaduccaritato virati ‘kāyaduccaritavirati’. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Lakkhaṇādito
analyzed: kāya duccaritataḥ virati kāya duccarita virati sesa pada dvaye pi esa iva nayaḥ lakkhaṇa āditaḥ

original: panetā tissopi kāyaduccaritādivatthūnaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇā; amaddanalakkhaṇāti vuttaṃ
analyzed: pana itā tissaḥ api kāya duccarita ādi vatthūnam a vītikkama lakkhaṇā a maddana lakkhaṇā ti vuttam

original: hoti. Kāyaduccaritādivatthuto saṅkocanarasā, akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā, saddhāhirottappaappicchatādiguṇapadaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: hoti kāya duccarita ādi vatthutaḥ saṅkocana rasā akiriya paccupaṭṭhānā saddhā hira uttappa appiccha tā ādi guṇa padaṭṭhānā

original: Pāpakiriyato cittassa vimukhībhāvabhūtāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: pāpa kiriyataḥ cittassa vimukhībhāva bhūtā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Iti phassādīni chappaññāsa yevāpanakavasena vuttāni navāti sabbānipi imasmiṃ dhammuddesavāre
analyzed: iti phassa ādīni chappaññāsa yevāpanaka vasena vuttāni navā ati sabbāni pi imasmin dhamma uddesa vāre

original: pañcasaṭṭhi dhammapadāni bhavanti. Tesu ekakkhaṇe kadāci ekasaṭṭhi bhavanti, kadāci
analyzed: dhammapadāni bhavanti tesu eka kkhaṇe kadāci ekasaṭṭhi bhavanti kadāci

original: samasaṭṭhi. Tāni hi sammāvācāpūraṇādivasena. Uppattiyaṃ pañcasu ṭhānesu ekasaṭṭhi
analyzed: tāni hi sammā vācā pūraṇa ādi vasena uppattiyam pañcasu ṭhānesu eka saṭṭhi

original: bhavanti. Tehi mutte ekasmiṃ ṭhāne samasaṭṭhi bhavanti. Ṭhapetvā pana yevāpanake
analyzed: bhavanti tehi mutte ekasmin ṭhāne bhavanti ṭhapetvā pana yevāpanake

original: pāḷiyaṃ yathārutavasena gayhamānāni chappaññāsāva honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena panettha
analyzed: pāḷiyam yathā ruta vasena gayhamānāni honti aggahita ggahaṇena pana ittha

original: phassapañcakaṃ, vitakko vicāro pīti cittekaggatā, pañcindriyāni, hiribalaṃ ottappabalanti
analyzed: phassa pañcakam vitakkaḥ vicāraḥ pīti citta ekagga tā pañca indriyāni hiri balam ottappa balanti

original: dve balāni, alobho adosoti dve mūlāni, kāyapassaddhicittapassaddhiādayo dvādasa dhammāti
analyzed: dve balāni alobhaḥ adoso ti dve mūlāni kāya passaddhi citta passaddhi ādayaḥ dvādasa dhammā ti

original: samatiṃsa dhammā honti.
analyzed: samatiṃsa dhammāḥ honti

original: Tesu samatiṃsāya dhammesu aṭṭhārasa dhammā avibhattikā honti, dvādasa savibhattikā.
analyzed: tesu samatiṃsāya dhammesu aṭṭhārasa dhammāḥ avibhattikāḥ honti dvādasa savibhattikā

original: Katame aṭṭhārasa? Phasso saññā cetanā vicāro pīti jīvitindriyaṃ, kāyapassaddhiādayo
analyzed: katame aṭṭhārasa

original: dvādasa dhammāti ime aṭṭhārasa avibhattikā. Vedanā cittaṃ vitakko cittekaggatā, saddhindriyaṃ
analyzed: dvādasa dhammā ti ime aṭṭhārasa avibhattikā vedanā cittam vitakko citta ekagga tā saddhi indriyam

original: vīriyindriyaṃ satindriyaṃ paññindriyaṃ, hiribalaṃ ottappabalaṃ, alobho adosoti ime
analyzed: vīriya indriyam sati indriyam paññā indriyam hiri balam ottappa balam alobhaḥ adoso ti ime

original: dvādasa dhammā savibhattikā. Tesu satta dhammā dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā, eko tīsu,
analyzed: dvādasa dhammā savibhattikā tesu satta dhammā dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattāḥ ekaḥ tīsu

original: dve catūsu, eko chasu, eko sattasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
analyzed: dve catūsu ekaḥ chasu ekaḥ sattasu ṭhānesu vibhatto

original: Kathaṃ? Cittaṃ vitakko saddhā hirī ottappaṃ alobho adosoti ime satta dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
analyzed: katham cittam vitakko saddhā hirī ottappam alobhaḥ adosaḥ ti ime satta dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā

original: Etesu hi cittaṃ tāva phassapañcakaṃ patvā cittaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, indriyāni patvā manindriyanti.
analyzed: etesu hi cittam tāva phassa pañcakam patvā cittam hoti iti vuttam indriyāni patvā

original: Vitakko jhānaṅgāni patvā vitakko hotīti vutto, maggaṅgāni patvā sammāsaṅkappoti.
analyzed: vitakkaḥ jhāna aṅgāni patvā vitakkaḥ hoti iti vuttaḥ magga aṅgāni patvā sammāsaṅkappo ti

original: Saddhā indriyāni patvā saddhindriyaṃ hotīti vuttā, balāni patvā saddhābalanti. Hirī
analyzed: saddhā indriyāni patvā saddhi indriyam hoti iti vuttā balāni patvā hirī

original: balāni patvā hiribalaṃ hotīti vuttā, lokapāladukaṃ patvā hirīti. Ottappepi eseva
analyzed: balāni patvā hiri balam hoti iti vuttā lokapāla dukam patvā hirī iti ottappe pi esā iva

original: nayo. Alobho mūlaṃ patvā alobho hotīti vutto, kammapathaṃ patvā anabhijjhāti. Adoso
analyzed: nayaḥ alobhaḥ mūlam patvā alobho hoti iti vutto kamma patham patvā anabhijjhāti adoso

original: mūlaṃ patvā adoso hotīti vutto, kammapathaṃ patvā abyāpādoti. Ime satta dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
analyzed: mūlam patvā adosaḥ hoti iti vutto kamma patham patvā abyāpādo ti ime satta dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā

original: Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṃ patvā vedanā hotīti vuttā, jhānaṅgāni patvā sukhanti, indriyāni patvā somanassindriyanti. Evaṃ eko dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
analyzed: vedanā pana phassa pañcakam patvā vedanā hoti iti vuttā jhāna aṅgāni patvā sukhanti indriyāni patvā somanassindriyanti evam ekaḥ dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto

original: Vīriyaṃ pana indriyāni patvā vīriyindriyaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, maggaṅgāni patvā sammāvāyāmoti,
analyzed: vīriyam pana indriyāni patvā vīriya indriyam hoti iti vuttam maggaṅgāni patvā sammāvāyāmo ti

original: balāni patvā vīriyabalanti, piṭṭhidukaṃ patvā paggāhoti. Satipi indriyāni patvā satindriyaṃ
analyzed: balāni patvā piṭṭhidukam patvā paggāho ti indriyāni patvā

original: hotīti vuttā, maggaṅgāni patvā sammāsatīti, balāni patvā satibalanti, piṭṭhidukaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti vuttā maggaṅgāni patvā sammāsatī iti balāni patvā satibalanti piṭṭhidukam

original: patvā sati hotīti vuttā. Evaṃ ime dve dhammā catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
analyzed: patvā sati hoti iti vuttā evam ime dve dhammā catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattā

original: Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā cittassekaggatā hotīti vutto, indriyāni patvā samādhindriyanti,
analyzed: pana jhāna aṅgāni patvā cittassa ekagga tā hoti iti vuttaḥ indriyāni patvā samādhindriyanti

original: maggaṅgāni patvā sammāsamādhīti. Balāni patvā samādhibalanti, piṭṭhidukaṃ patvā samatho
analyzed: maggaṅgāni patvā sammāsamādhīti balāni patvā samādhibalanti piṭṭhidukam patvā

original: avikkhepoti. Evamayaṃ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
analyzed: avikkhepo ti evam ayam ekaḥ dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhattaḥ

original: Paññā pana indriyāni patvā paññindriyaṃ hotīti vuttā, maggaṅgāni patvā sammādiṭṭhīti,
analyzed: paññā pana indriyāni patvā paññindriyam hoti iti vuttā maggaṅgāni patvā sammādiṭṭhī iti

original: balāni patvā paññābalanti, mūlāni patvā amohoti, kammapathaṃ patvā sammādiṭṭhīti,
analyzed: balāni patvā mūlāni patvā amoho ti kamma patham patvā sammādiṭṭhī iti

original: piṭṭhidukaṃ patvā sampajaññaṃ vipassanāti. Evaṃ eko dhammo sattasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
analyzed: piṭṭhidukam patvā sampajaññam vipassanā ti evam ekaḥ dhammo sattasu ṭhānesu vibhatto

original: Sace pana koci vadeyya – ‘ettha apubbaṃ nāma natthi, heṭṭhā gahitameva gaṇhitvā tasmiṃ
analyzed: sace pana koci vadeyya ettha apubbam nāma na atthi heṭṭhā gahitam eva gaṇhitvā tasmin

analyzed: tasmin ṭhāne padam pūritam an anusandhikā kathā corehi ābhata bhaṇḍa sadisā

analyzed: go yūthena gata magge ālulita tiṇa sadisā a jānitvā kathitā ati saḥ māhevanti paṭisedhetvā

analyzed: vattabbaḥ buddhānam desanā ananusandhikā nāma natthi sa anusandhikā va hoti a jānitvā

analyzed: kiccam jānāti tam ñatvā kicca vasena vibhattim āropento aṭṭhārasa dhammāḥ ekeka kiccā ti

analyzed: ñatvā ekekasmin ṭhāne vibhattim āropesi satta dhammā dve dve iccā iccā ti ñatvā dvīsu dvīsu

original: Vīriyasatīnaṃ cattāri cattāri kiccānīti ñatvā catūsu catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi.
analyzed: vīriya satīnam cattāri cattāri kiccāni iti ñatvā catūsu catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattim āropesi

original: Samādhi chakiccoti ñatvā chasu ṭhānesu vibhattiṃ āropesi. Paññā sattakiccāti ñatvā

analyzed: sattasu ṭhānesu vibhattim āropesi

original: Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – eko kira paṇḍito rājā rahogato cintesi – ‘imaṃ rājakulasantakaṃ
analyzed: tatra idam opammam ekaḥ kira paṇḍitaḥ rājā rahaḥ gataḥ cintesi imam rāja kula santakam

analyzed: na yathā vā tathā vā khāditabbam sippa anucchavikam vetanam vaḍḍhessāmi iti so sabbe

analyzed: aṭṭhārasa janāḥ uṭṭhahiṃsu tesam ekekam paṭivīsam dāpetvā vissajjesi dve dve sippāni

analyzed: cattāri sippāni jānantāḥ āgacchantu iti vutte dve janāḥ āgamaṃsu tesam cattāri cattāri

analyzed: paṭivīse dāpesi pañca sippāni jānantāḥ āgacchantu uti vutte ekaḥ api na āgacchi cha

original: sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte ekova āgacchi. Tassa cha paṭivīse dāpesi. ‘Satta
analyzed: sippāni jānantā āgacchantu uti vutte ekaḥ eva āgacchi tassa cha paṭivīse dāpesi satta

original: sippāni jānantā āgacchantū’ti vutte ekova āgacchi. Tassa satta paṭivīse dāpesi.
analyzed: sippāni jānantā āgacchantu uti vutte ekaḥ eva āgacchi tassa satta paṭivīse dāpesi

original: Tattha paṇḍito rājā viya anuttaro dhammarājā. Sippajānanakā viya cittacittaṅgavasena
analyzed: tattha paṇḍitaḥ rājā viya anuttaraḥ dhamma rājā sippa jānanakāḥ viya citta cittaṅga vasena

original: uppannā dhammā. Sippānucchavikavetanavaḍḍhanaṃ viya kiccavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ vibhattiāropanaṃ.
analyzed: uppannāḥ dhammā sippa ānucchavika vetana vaḍḍhanam viya kicca vasena tesam tesam dhammānam vibhatti āropanaṃ

original: Sabbepi panete dhammā phassapañcakavasena jhānaṅgavasena indriyavasena maggavasena

analyzed: bala vasena mūla vasena kammapatha vasena lokapāla vasena passaddhi vasena lahu tā vasena

original: mudutāvasena kammaññatāvasena pāguññatāvasena ujukatāvasena satisampajaññavasena
analyzed: mudu tā vasena kammañña tā vasena pāguñña tā vasena ujuka tā vasena sati sampajañña vasena

original: samathavipassanāvasena paggāhāvikkhepavasenāti sattarasa rāsayo hontīti.

original: Dhammuddesavārakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dhamma uddesa vāra kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Kāmāvacarakusalaṃ niddesavārakathā
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalam niddesa vāra kathā

original: 2. Idāni tāneva dhammuddesavāre pāḷiāruḷhāni chappaññāsa padāni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ‘katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotī’tiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
analyzed: idāni tāni eva dhamma uddesa vāre pāḷi āruḷhāni chappaññāsa padāni vibhajitvā dassetum katamaḥ tasmin samaye phassaḥ hoti iti ādinā nayena niddesa vāraḥ āraddhaḥ

original: Tattha pucchāya tāva ayamattho – yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ somanassasahagataṃ
analyzed: tattha pucchāya tāva ayam atthaḥ yasmin samaye kāmāvacaram kusalam somanassa sahagatam

original: tihetukaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ uppajjati, tasmiṃ samaye phasso hotīti vutto, katamo
analyzed: ti hetukam asaṅkhārikam mahācittam uppajjati tasmin samaye phassaḥ hoti iti vuttaḥ katamaḥ

original: so phassoti iminā nayena sabbapucchāsu attho veditabbo.

original: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phassoti tasmiṃ samaye yo phusanakavasena uppanno phasso, so phassoti.
analyzed: yaḥ tasmin samaye phassaḥ ti tasmin samaye yaḥ phusanaka vasena uppannaḥ phassaḥ saḥ phassaḥ iti

original: Idaṃ phassassa sabhāvadīpanato sabhāvapadaṃ nāma. Phusanāti phusanākāro. Samphusanāti
analyzed: idam phassassa sabhāva dīpanataḥ sabhāva padam nāma phusanā ati phusana ākāraḥ samphusanā ati

original: phusanākārova upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vutto. Samphusitattanti samphusitabhāvo.
analyzed: upasaggena padam vaḍḍhetvā vuttaḥ samphusita ttanti samphusita bhāvaḥ

original: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā – yo tasmiṃ samaye phusanakavasena phasso, yā tasmiṃ samaye
analyzed: ayam pana ittha yojanā yaḥ tasmin samaye phusanaka vasena phassaḥ yā tasmin samaye

original: phusanā, yā tasmiṃ samaye samphusanā, yaṃ tasmiṃ samaye samphusitattaṃ; atha vā,
analyzed: phusanā yā tasmin samaye samphusanā yam tasmin samaye atha vā

original: yo tasmiṃ samaye phusanavasena phasso, aññenāpi pariyāyena phusanā samphusanā samphusitattanti

original: pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ. Idha pana sañjātidesaṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭhānaṭṭhena
analyzed: pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatana iti ādīsu kāraṇam idha pana sañjā atidesa ṭṭhena samosaraṇa ṭhāna ṭṭhena

original: veditabbaṃ. Manindriyaṃ vuttatthameva.
analyzed: veditabbam man indriyam vutta ttham eva

analyzed: vitakka niddese takkana vasena takko tassa tittakam takkesi kumbham takkesi sakaṭam

analyzed: pasatthaḥ saṅkappo ti sammāsaṅkappo

original: 8. Vicāraniddese ārammaṇe caraṇakavasena cāro. Idamassa sabhāvapadaṃ. Vicaraṇavasena

original: āyūti vuccati. Idamassa sabhāvapadaṃ. Yasmā panete dhammā āyusmiṃyeva sati tiṭṭhanti
analyzed: āyu iti vuccati idam assa sabhāva padam yasmā pana ete dhammāḥ āyusmiṃyeva sati tiṭṭhanti

original: yapenti yāpenti iriyanti vattanti pālayanti, tasmā ṭhitītiādīni vuttāni. Vacanattho
analyzed: yapenti yāpenti iriyanti vattanti pālayanti tasmā ṭhiti iti ādīni vuttāni vacana atthaḥ

original: panettha – etāya tiṭṭhantīti ṭhiti. Yapentīti yapanā. Tathā yāpanā. Evaṃ bujjhantānaṃ
analyzed: pana ittha etāya tiṭṭhanti iti yapenti iti yapanā tathā yāpanā evam bujjhantānam

original: pana vasena purimapade rassattaṃ kataṃ. Etāya iriyantīti iriyanā. Vattantīti vattanā.
analyzed: pana vasena purima pade rassattam katam etāya iriyanti iti iriyanā vattanti iti vattanā

original: Pālayantīti pālanā. Jīvanti etenāti jīvitaṃ. Anupālanalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti jīvitindriyaṃ.
analyzed: pālayanti iti pālanāḥ jīvanti etena ati jīvitam anupālana lakkhaṇe indaṭṭham kāreti iti jīvitindriyam

original: 30. Hiribalaniddese yaṃ tasmiṃ samayeti yena dhammena tasmiṃ samaye. Liṅgavipallāsaṃ
analyzed: hiri bala niddese yam tasmim samaye iti yena dhammena tasmim samaye liṅga vipallāsam

original: vā katvā yo dhammo tasmiṃ samayetipi attho veditabbo. Hiriyitabbenāti upayogatthe
analyzed: vā katvā yaḥ dhammaḥ tasmin samaya iti pi atthaḥ veditabbaḥ hiriyitabbena ati upayoga tthe

original: karaṇavacanaṃ. Hiriyitabbayuttakaṃ kāyaduccaritādidhammaṃ hiriyati jigucchatīti attho.
analyzed: karaṇa vacanam hiriyitabba yuttakam kāya duccarita ādi dhammam hiriyati jigucchati iti atthaḥ

original: Pāpakānanti lāmakānaṃ. Akusalānaṃ dhammānanti akosallasambhūtānaṃ dhammānaṃ. Samāpattiyāti
analyzed: pāpakānam ti lāmakānam akusalānam dhammānam ti akosalla sambhūtānam dhammānam samāpattiyā ati

original: idampi upayogatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiṃ paṭilābhaṃ samaṅgībhāvaṃ
analyzed: idam pi upayoga atthe karaṇa vacanam tesam dhammānam samāpattim paṭilābham samaṅgībhāvam

original: hiriyati jigucchatīti attho.
analyzed: hiriyati jigucchati iti attho

original: 31. Ottappabalaniddese ottappitabbenāti hetvatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. Ottappitabbayuttakena
analyzed: ottappa bala niddese ottappitabbena ati hetu atthe karaṇa vacanam ottappitabba yuttakena

original: ottappassa hetubhūtena kāyaduccaritādinā vuttappakārāya ca samāpattiyā ottappassa
analyzed: ottappassa hetu bhūtena kāya duccarita ādinā vutta ppakārāya ca samāpattiyāḥ ottappassa

original: hetubhūtāya ottappati, bhāyatīti attho.
analyzed: hetu bhūtāya ottappati bhāyati iti attho

original: 32. Alobhaniddese alubbhanakavasena alobho. Na lubbhatītipi alobho. Idamassa sabhāvapadaṃ.
analyzed: alobha niddese alubbhanaka vasena alobhaḥ na lubbhati iti pi alobhaḥ idam assa sabhāva padam

original: Alubbhanāti alubbhanākāro. Lobhasamaṅgī puggalo lubbhito nāma. Na lubbhito alubbhito.
analyzed: alubbhanā ati a lubbhana ākāraḥ lobha samaṅgī puggalaḥ lubbhitaḥ nāma na lubbhitaḥ a lubbhitaḥ

original: Alubbhitassa bhāvo alubbhitattaṃ. Sārāgapaṭipakkhato na sārāgoti asārāgo. Asārajjanāti
analyzed: a lubbhitassa bhāvaḥ a lubbhita ttam sārāga paṭipakkhataḥ na sārāgaḥ ti a sārāgaḥ

original: asārajjanākāro. Asārajjitassa bhāvo asārajjitattaṃ. Na abhijjhāyatīti anabhijjhā.
analyzed: a sārajjana ākāraḥ a sārajjitassa bhāvaḥ a sārajjita ttam na abhijjhāyati iti an abhijjhā

original: Alobho kusalamūlanti alobhasaṅkhātaṃ kusalamūlaṃ. Alobho hi kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ mūlaṃ
analyzed: alobho kusala mūlanti alobha saṅkhātam kusala mūlam alobhaḥ hi kusalānam dhammānam mūlam

original: paccayaṭṭhenāti kusalamūlaṃ. Kusalañca taṃ paccayaṭṭhena mūlañcātipi kusalamūlaṃ.
analyzed: paccaya ṭṭhena ati kusala mūlam kusalam ca tam paccaya ṭṭhena mūlam ca atipi kusala mūlam

original: 33. Adosaniddese adussanakavasena adoso. Na dussatītipi adoso. Idamassa sabhāvapadaṃ.
analyzed: adosa niddese adussanaka vasena adosaḥ na dussati iti pi adosaḥ idam assa sabhāva padam

original: Adussanāti adussanākāro. Adussitassa bhāvo adussitattaṃ. Byāpādapaṭipakkhato na byāpādoti
analyzed: adussanā ati a dussana ākāraḥ a dussitassa bhāvaḥ a dussita ttam byāpāda paṭipakkhataḥ na byāpādaḥ ti

original: abyāpādo. Kodhadukkhapaṭipakkhato na byāpajjoti abyāpajjo. Adosasaṅkhātaṃ kusalamūlaṃ
analyzed: a byāpādaḥ kodha dukkha paṭipakkhataḥ na a byāpajjaḥ ti a byāpajjaḥ a dosa saṅkhātam kusala mūlam

original: adoso kusalamūlaṃ. Taṃ vuttatthameva.
analyzed: adosaḥ kusala mūlam tam vuttattham eva

original: 40-41. Kāyapassaddhiniddesādīsu yasmā kāyoti tayo khandhā adhippetā, tasmā vedanākkhandhassātiādi
analyzed: kāya passaddhi niddesa ādīsu yasmai kāyo ti tayo khandhāḥ adhippetā tasmai vedanā khandhassa atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Passambhanti etāya te dhammā, vigatadarathā bhavanti, samassāsappattāti passaddhi.
analyzed: vuttam etāya te dhammā vigata darathāḥ bhavanti samassāsa ppattā ati

original: Dutiyapadaṃ upasaggavasena vaḍḍhitaṃ. Passambhanāti passambhanākāro. Dutiyapadaṃ
analyzed: dutiya padam upasagga vasena vaḍḍhitam passambhanā ati passambhana ākāraḥ dutiya padam

original: upasaggavasena vaḍḍhitaṃ. Passaddhisamaṅgitāya paṭippassambhitassa khandhattayassa
analyzed: upasagga vasena vaḍḍhitam passaddhi samaṅgi tāya paṭippassambhitassa khandha ttayassa

original: bhāvo paṭippassambhitattaṃ. Sabbapadehipi tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ kilesadarathapaṭippassaddhi
analyzed: bhāvaḥ paṭippassambhita ttam sabba padehi pi tiṇṇam khandhānam

original: eva kathitā. Dutiyanayena viññāṇakkhandhassa darathapaṭippassaddhi kathitā.
analyzed: eva kathitā dutiya nayena viññāṇa kkhandhassa daratha paṭippassaddhi kathitā

original: 42-43. Lahutāti lahutākāro. Lahupariṇāmatāti lahupariṇāmo etesaṃ dhammānanti lahupariṇāmā;
analyzed: lahu tā ati lahu tā ākāraḥ lahu pariṇāma tā ati lahu pariṇāmo etesam dhammānam anti lahu pariṇāmā

original: tesaṃ bhāvo lahupariṇāmatā; sīghaṃ sīghaṃ parivattanasamatthatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Adandhanatāti
analyzed: tesam bhāvaḥ lahu pariṇāma tā sīgham sīgham parivattana samattha tā ti vuttam hoti adandhana tā ti

original: garubhāvapaṭikkhepavacanametaṃ; abhāriyatāti attho. Avitthanatāti mānādikilesabhārassa
analyzed: garu bhāva paṭikkhepa vacanam etam a bhāriyatā ati atthaḥ māna ādi kilesa bhārassa

original: abhāvena athaddhatā. Evaṃ paṭhamena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ lahutākāro kathito. Dutiyena
analyzed: abhāvena evam paṭhamena tiṇṇam khandhānam lahu tā ākāraḥ kathitaḥ dutiyena

original: viññāṇakkhandhassa lahutākāro kathito.
analyzed: viññāṇa kkhandhassa lahu tā ākāro kathito

original: 44-45. Mudutāti mudubhāvo. Maddavatāti maddavaṃ vuccati siniddhaṃ, maṭṭhaṃ; maddavassa
analyzed: mudu tā ati mudu bhāvaḥ maddava tā ati maddavam vuccati siniddham maṭṭham maddavassa

original: bhāvo maddavatā. Akakkhaḷatāti akakkhaḷabhāvo. Akathinatāti akathinabhāvo. Idhāpi
analyzed: bhāvaḥ maddavatā a kakkhaḷatā ati a kakkhaḷa bhāvaḥ a kathinatā ati a kathina bhāvaḥ idha api

original: purimanayena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, pacchimanayena viññāṇakkhandhassa mudutākārova kathito.
analyzed: purima nayena tiṇṇam khandhānam pacchima nayena viññāṇa kkhandhassa mudu tā ākāraḥ uva kathito

original: 46-47. Kammaññatāti kammani sādhutā; kusalakiriyāya viniyogakkhamatāti attho. Sesapadadvayaṃ
analyzed: kammañña tā ati kammani sādhu tā kusala kiriyāya viniyoga kkhama tā ati attho sesa pada dvayam

original: byañjanavasena vaḍḍhitaṃ. Padadvayenāpi hi purimanayena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, pacchimanayena
analyzed: byañjana vasena vaḍḍhitam pada dvayena api hi purima nayena tiṇṇam khandhānam pacchima nayena

original: viññāṇakkhandhassa kammaniyākārova kathito.
analyzed: viññāṇa kkhandhassa kamma niyākāraḥ uva kathito

original: 48-49. Paguṇatāti paguṇabhāvo, anāturatā niggilānatāti attho. Sesapadadvayaṃ byañjanavasena
analyzed: paguṇa tā ati paguṇa bhāvaḥ anātura tā niggilāna tā ti attho sesa pada dvayam byañjana vasena

original: vaḍḍhitaṃ. Idhāpi purimanayena tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, pacchimanayena viññāṇakkhandhassa
analyzed: vaḍḍhitam idha api purima nayena tiṇṇam khandhānam pacchima nayena viññāṇa kkhandhassa

original: niggilānākārova kathito.
analyzed: kathito

original: 50-51. Ujukatāti ujukabhāvo, ujukenākārena pavattanatāti attho. Ujukassa khandhattayassa
analyzed: ujuka tā ati ujuka bhāvaḥ ujukena ākārena pavattana tā ati attho ujukassa khandha ttayassa

original: viññāṇakkhandhassa ca bhāvo ujukatā. Ajimhatāti gomuttavaṅkabhāvapaṭikkhepo. Avaṅkatāti
analyzed: viññāṇa kkhandhassa ca bhāvaḥ ujuka tā a jimha tā ati gomutta vaṅka bhāva paṭikkhepaḥ a vaṅka tā ati

original: candalekhāvaṅkabhāvapaṭikkhepo. Akuṭilatāti naṅgalakoṭivaṅkabhāvapaṭikkhepo.
analyzed: candalekhā vaṅka bhāva paṭikkhepaḥ akuṭila tā ati naṅgala koṭi vaṅka bhāva paṭikkhepaḥ

original: Yo hi pāpaṃ katvāva ‘na karomī’ti bhāsati, so gantvā paccosakkanatāya ‘gomuttavaṅko’
analyzed: yaḥ hi pāpam katvā ava na karomi iti bhāsati saḥ gantvā gomutta vaṅkaḥ

original: nāma hoti. Yo pāpaṃ karontova ‘bhāyāmahaṃ pāpassā’ti bhāsati, so yebhuyyena kuṭilatāya
analyzed: nāma hoti yaḥ pāpam karontaḥ uva bhāyāmaham pāpassa ati bhāsati saḥ yebhuyyena kuṭila tāya

original: ‘candalekhāvaṅko’ nāma hoti. Yo pāpaṃ karontova ‘ko pāpassa na bhāyeyyā’ti bhāsati,
analyzed: candalekhāvaṅkaḥ nāma hoti yaḥ pāpam karontaḥ uva kaḥ pāpassa na bhāyeyya ati bhāsati

original: so nātikuṭilatāya ‘naṅgalakoṭivaṅko’ nāma hoti. Yassa vā tīṇipi kammadvārāni asuddhāni,
analyzed: saḥ na ati kuṭila tāya naṅgalakoṭivaṅkaḥ nāma hoti yassa vā kammadvārāni asuddhāni

original: so ‘gomuttavaṅko’ nāma hoti. Yassa yāni kānici dve, so ‘candalekhāvaṅko’ nāma. Yassa
analyzed: saḥ gomutta vaṅkaḥ nāma hoti yassa yāni kānici dve saḥ candalekhā vaṅkaḥ nāma yassa

original: yaṃkiñci ekaṃ, so ‘naṅgalakoṭivaṅko nāma.
analyzed: ekam saḥ naṅgalakoṭivaṅkaḥ nāma

original: Dīghabhāṇakā panāhu – ekacco bhikkhu sabbavaye ekavīsatiyā anesanāsu, chasu ca agocaresu
analyzed: dīghabhāṇakā pana āhu ekaccaḥ bhikkhu sabbavaye ekavīsatiyā anesanāsu chasu ca agocaresu

original: carati, ayaṃ ‘gomuttavaṅko’ nāma. Eko paṭhamavaye catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paripūreti,
analyzed: carati ayam gomuttavaṅkaḥ nāma ekaḥ paṭhama vaye catu pārisuddhi sīlam paripūreti

original: lajjī kukkuccako sikkhākāmo hoti, majjhimavayapacchimavayesu purimasadiso, ayaṃ ‘candalekhāvaṅko’
analyzed: lajjī kukkuccako sikkhā kāmo hoti majjhima vaya pacchima vayesu purima sadisaḥ ayam canda lekhā vaṅko

original: nāma. Eko paṭhamavaye majjhimavayepi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ pūreti, lajjī kukkuccako
analyzed: nāma ekaḥ paṭhama vaye majjhima vaye pi catu pārisuddhi sīlam pūreti lajjī

original: sikkhākāmo hoti, pacchimavaye purimasadiso. Ayaṃ ‘naṅgalakoṭivaṅko’ nāma.
analyzed: sikkhākāmo hoti pacchima vaye purima sadisaḥ ayam naṅgalakoṭivaṅkaḥ nāma

original: Tassa kilesavasena evaṃ vaṅkassa puggalassa bhāvo jimhatā vaṅkatā kuṭilatāti vuccati.
analyzed: tassa kilesa vasena evam vaṅkassa puggalassa bhāvaḥ jimha tā vaṅka tā kuṭila tā ti vuccati

original: Tāsaṃ paṭikkhepavasena ajimhatādikā vuttā. Khandhādhiṭṭhānāva desanā katā. Khandhānañhi
analyzed: tāsam paṭikkhepa vasena ajimha tā ādikā vuttā khandha adhiṭṭhānā ava desanā katā khandhānam hi

original: etā ajimhatādikā, no puggalassāti. Evaṃ sabbehipi imehi padehi purimanayena tiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: etāḥ ajimhata ādikāḥ no puggalassa ati evam sabbehi pi imehi padehi purima nayena tiṇṇam

original: khandhānaṃ, pacchimanayena viññāṇakkhandhassāti arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ nikkilesatāya
analyzed: khandhānam pacchima nayena viññāṇa kkhandhassa ati arūpīnam dhammānam nikkilesa tāya

original: ujutākārova kathitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: uju tā ākāraḥ uva kathitaḥ iti veditabbo

original: Idāni yvāyaṃ yevāpanāti appanāvāro vutto, tena dhammuddesavāre dassitānaṃ ‘yevāpanakānaṃ’yeva saṅkhepato niddeso kathito hotīti.
analyzed: idāni yvā ayam yevāpanā ti appanā vāraḥ vutto tena dhammuddesa vāre dassitānam yevāpanakānam yeva saṅkhepataḥ niddesaḥ kathitaḥ hoti iti

original: Niddesavārakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: niddesa vāra kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Ettāvatā pucchā samayaniddeso dhammuddeso appanāti uddesavāre catūhi paricchedehi,
analyzed: ettāvatā pucchā samaya niddesaḥ dhamma uddesaḥ uddesa vāre catūhi paricchedehi

original: pucchā samayaniddeso dhammuddeso appanāti niddesavāre catūhi paricchedehīti aṭṭhaparicchedapaṭimaṇḍito
analyzed: pucchā samaya niddesaḥ dhamma uddesaḥ appanā ati niddesa vāre catūhi paricchedehi iti aṭṭha pariccheda paṭimaṇḍito

original: dhammavavatthānavāro niṭṭhitova hoti.
analyzed: dhamma vavatthāna vāraḥ niṭṭhitaḥ eva hoti

original: Koṭṭhāsavāro
analyzed: koṭṭhāsavāro

original: 58-120. Idāni tasmiṃ kho pana samaye cattāro khandhā hontīti saṅgahavāro āraddho.
analyzed: idāni tasmin kho pana samaye cattāraḥ khandhāḥ honti iti saṅgaha vāraḥ āraddho

original: So uddesaniddesapaṭiniddesānaṃ vasena tividho hoti. Tattha ‘tasmiṃ kho pana samaye
analyzed: saḥ uddesa niddesa paṭiniddesānam vasena tividhaḥ hoti tattha tasmin kho pana samaye

original: cattāro khandhā’ti evamādiko uddeso. Katame tasmiṃ samaye cattāro khandhā’tiādiko
analyzed: cattāro khandhā ati evamādikaḥ uddeso katame tasmin samaye cattāro khandhā ati ādikaḥ

original: niddeso. Katamo tasmiṃ samaye vedanākkhandhotiādiko paṭiniddesoti veditabbo.
analyzed: niddeso katamaḥ tasmin samaye vedanā khandhaḥ ti ādiko paṭiniddeso ti veditabbo

original: Tattha uddesavāre cattāro khandhātiādayo tevīsati koṭṭhāsā honti. Tesaṃ evamattho
analyzed: tattha uddesavāre cattāro khandha ati ādayo tevīsati koṭṭhāsāḥ honti tesam evam attho

original: veditabbo – yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ paṭhamaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati, ye tasmiṃ
analyzed: veditabbaḥ yasmin samaye kāmāvacaram paṭhamam mahā kusala cittam uppajjati ye tasmin

original: samaye cittaṅgavasena uppannā, ṭhapetvā yevāpanake, pāḷiāruḷhā atirekapaṇṇāsadhammā,
analyzed: samaye cittaṅga vasena uppannā ṭhapetvā yevāpanake pāḷi āruḷhā atireka paṇṇāsa dhammā

original: te sabbepi saṅgayhamānā rāsaṭṭhena cattārova khandhā honti. Heṭṭhā vuttena āyatanaṭṭhena
analyzed: te sabbe pi saṅgayhamānāḥ rāsaṭṭhena cattāro va khandhāḥ honti heṭṭhā vuttena āyatanaṭṭhena

original: dve āyatanāni honti. Sabhāvaṭṭhena suññataṭṭhena nissattaṭṭhena dveva dhātuyo honti.
analyzed: dve āyatanāni honti sabhāva ṭṭhena suññata ṭṭhena nissatta ṭṭhena dve iva dhātuyaḥ honti

original: Paccayasaṅkhātena āhāraṭṭhena tayovettha dhammā āhārā honti. Avasesā no āhārā.
analyzed: paccaya saṅkhātena āhāra aṭṭhena dhammā āhārāḥ honti avasesāḥ no āhārā

original: ‘Kiṃ panete aññamaññaṃ vā taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa vā paccayā na hontī’ti? ‘No na honti.
analyzed: kim pana ete aññam aññam vā tad samuṭṭhāna rūpassa vā paccayāḥ na honti iti no na honti

original: Ime pana tathā ca honti, aññathā cāti samānepi paccayatte atirekapaccayā honti, tasmā
analyzed: ime pana tathā ca honti aññathā ca ati samāne pi paccaya tte atireka paccayāḥ honti tasmā

original: āhārāti vuttā. Kathaṃ? Etesu hi phassāhāro, yesaṃ dhammānaṃ avasesā cittacetasikā
analyzed: āhārā ati vuttā katham etesu hi phassa āhāraḥ yesam dhammānam avasesā citta cetasikā

original: paccayā honti, tesañca paccayo hoti, tisso ca vedanā āharati. Manosañcetanāhāro tesañca
analyzed: paccayāḥ honti tesam ca paccayo hoti tissaḥ ca vedanāḥ āharati manaḥ sañcetanā āhāro tesam ca

original: paccayo hoti tayo ca bhave āharati. Viññāṇāhāro tesañca paccayo hoti paṭisandhināmarūpañca
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti tayo ca bhave āharati viññāṇa āhāro tesam ca paccayaḥ hoti paṭisandhi nāma rūpaṃ ca

original: āharatī’ti. ‘Nanu ca so vipākova idaṃ pana kusalaviññāṇa’nti? ‘Kiñcāpi kusalaviññāṇaṃ,
analyzed: āharati iti nanu ca saḥ vipākaḥ uva idam pana kusala viññāṇam ti kiñca api kusala viññāṇam

original: taṃsarikkhatāya pana viññāṇāhāro’tveva vuttaṃ. Upatthambhakaṭṭhena vā ime tayo āhārāti
analyzed: tad sarikkha tāya pana viññāṇa āhāraḥ tu eva vuttam upatthambhaka ṭṭhena vā ime tayo āhārā ti

Tāni sabbānipi dasahi puññakiriyavatthūhi dīpetabbāni. Kathaṃ? Dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu,
analyzed: tāni sabbāni api dasahi puñña kiriya vatthūhi dīpetabbāni katham dāna mayam puñña kiriya vatthu

original: sīlamayaṃ… bhāvanāmayaṃ… apacitisahagataṃ… veyyāvaccasahagataṃ… pattānuppadānaṃ…
analyzed: sīla mayam bhāvanā mayam apaciti sahagatam veyyāvacca sahagatam patta anuppadānam

original: abbhanumodanaṃ… desanāmayaṃ… savanamayaṃ… diṭṭhijukammaṃ puññakiriyavatthūti imāni
analyzed: abbhanumodanam desanā mayam savana mayam diṭṭhi ju kammam puñña kiriya vatthu imāni

original: dasa puññakiriyavatthūni nāma. Tattha dānameva dānamayaṃ. Puññakiriyā ca sā tesaṃ
analyzed: dasa puñña kiriya vatthūni nāma tattha dānam eva dāna mayam puñña kiriyā ca sā tesam

original: tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthu cāti puññakiriyavatthu. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: tesam ānisaṃsānam vatthu ca ati puñña kiriya vatthu sesesu pi esa iva nayo

original: Tattha cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu, rūpādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu, annādīsu vā dasasu
analyzed: tattha cīvara ādīsu catūsu paccayesu rūpa ādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu anna ādīsu vā dasasu

original: dānavatthūsu, taṃ taṃ dentassa tesaṃ tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge, pariccāgakāle,
analyzed: dāna vatthūsu tam tam dentassa tesam tesam uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubba bhāge pariccāga kāle

original: pacchā somanassacittena anussaraṇakāle cāti tīsu kālesu pavattā cetanā ‘dānamayaṃ
analyzed: pacchā somanassa cittena anussaraṇa kāle ca ati tīsu kālesu pavattā cetanā dāna mayam

original: puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
analyzed: puññakiriyavatthu nāma

original: Pañcasīlaṃ aṭṭhasīlaṃ dasasīlaṃ samādiyantassa, ‘pabbajissāmī’ti vihāraṃ gacchantassa,
analyzed: pañca sīlam aṭṭha sīlam dasa sīlam samādiyantassa pabbajissāmi iti vihāram gacchantassa

original: pabbajantassa, ‘manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā pabbajito vata’mhi, ‘sādhu sādhū’ti
analyzed: pabbajantassa manoratham matthakam pāpetvā pabbajitaḥ vatamhi sādhu sādhu iti

original: āvajjentassa, pātimokkhaṃ saṃvarantassa, cīvarādayo paccaye paccavekkhantassa, āpāthagatesu
analyzed: āvajjentassa pātimokkham saṃvarantassa cīvara ādayo paccaye paccavekkhantassa āpātha gatesu

original: rūpādīsu cakkhudvārādīni saṃvarantassa, ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattā cetanā ‘sīlamayaṃ
analyzed: rūpa ādīsu cakkhu dvāra ādīni saṃvarantassa ājīvam sodhentassa ca pavattā cetanā sīla mayam

original: puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
analyzed: puññakiriyavatthu nāma

original: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa…pe…
analyzed: paṭisambhidā ayam vuttena vipassanā maggena cakkhum aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ anattataḥ

original: manaṃ… rūpe…pe… dhamme… cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇaṃ,… cakkhusamphassaṃ…pe… manosamphassaṃ,
analyzed: manam dhamme cakkhu viññāṇam pe manaḥ viññāṇam cakkhu samphassam pe manas samphassam

original: cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ…pe… manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ, …pe… rūpasaññaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ
analyzed: cakkhu samphassa jam vedanam pe manaḥ samphassa jam vedanam pe rūpa saññam pe jarā maraṇaṃ

original: aniccato dukkhato anattato bhāventassa pavattā cetanā, aṭṭhatiṃsāya vā ārammaṇesu
analyzed: aniccataḥ dukkhataḥ anattataḥ bhāventassa pavattā cetanā aṭṭhatiṃsāya vā ārammaṇesu

original: appanaṃ appattā sabbāpi cetanā ‘bhāvanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
analyzed: appanam appattā sabbā api cetanā bhāvanā mayam puñña kiriya vatthu nāma

original: Mahallakaṃ pana disvā paccuggamanapattacīvarapaṭiggahaṇaabhivādanamaggasampadānādivasena ‘apacitisahagataṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: mahallakam pana disvā paccuggamana patta cīvara paṭiggahaṇa abhivādana magga sampadāna ādi vasena apaciti sahagatam veditabbam

original: Vuḍḍhatarānaṃ vattappaṭipattikaraṇavasena gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ bhikkhuṃ disvā
analyzed: vuḍḍhatarānam vatta paṭipatti karaṇa vasena gāmam piṇḍāya paviṭṭham bhikkhum disvā

original: pattaṃ gahetvā gāme bhikkhaṃ samādapetvā upasaṃharaṇavasena, ‘gaccha bhikkhūnaṃ pattaṃ
analyzed: pattam gahetvā gāme bhikkham samādapetvā upasaṃharaṇa vasena gaccha bhikkhūnam pattam

original: āharā’ti sutvā vegena gantvā pattāharaṇādivasena ca kāyaveyyāvaṭikakāle ‘veyyāvaccasahagataṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: āharāti sutvā vegena gantvā patta āharaṇa ādi vasena ca kāya veyyāvaṭika kāle veyyāvacca sahagatam veditabbam

original: Dānaṃ datvā gandhādīhi pūjaṃ katvā ‘asukassa nāma patti hotū’ti vā, ‘sabbasattānaṃ
analyzed: dānam da tvā gandha ādīhi pūjam katvā asukassa nāma patti hotu uti vā sabba sattānam

original: hotū’ti vā pattiṃ dadato ‘pattānuppadānaṃ’ veditabbaṃ. Kiṃ panevaṃ pattiṃ dadato
analyzed: hotu uti vā pattim dadataḥ patta anuppadānam veditabbam kim pana evam pattim dadataḥ

original: puññakkhayo hotīti? Na hoti. Yathā pana ekaṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā tato dīpasahassaṃ jālentassa
analyzed: puñña kkhayaḥ hoti iti na hoti yathā pana ekam dīpam jāletvā tatas dīpa sahassam jālentassa

original: paṭhamadīpo khīṇoti na vattabbo; purimālokena pana saddhiṃ pacchimāloko ekato hutvā
analyzed: paṭhama dīpo khīṇo ti na vattabbo purima ālokena pana saddhim pacchima āloko ekatas hutvā

original: atimahā hoti. Evameva pattiṃ dadato parihāni nāma natthi. Vuḍḍhiyeva pana hotīti veditabbo.
analyzed: atimahā hoti evam eva pattim dadataḥ parihāni nāma natthi vuḍḍhiyā iva pana hoti iti veditabbo

original: Parehi dinnāya pattiyā vā aññāya vā puññakiriyāya ‘sādhu sādhū’ti anumodanavasena ‘abbhanumodanaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: parehi dinnāya pattiyā vā aññāya vā puñña kiriyāya sādhu sādhu iti anumodana vasena abbhanumodanam veditabbam

original: Eko ‘evaṃ maṃ dhammakathikoti maṃ jānissantī’ti icchāya ṭhatvā lābhagaruko hutvā
analyzed: ekaḥ evam mama dhamma kathikaḥ uti mama jānissanti iti icchāya ṭhatvā lābha garukaḥ hutvā

original: deseti, taṃ na mahapphalaṃ. Eko attano paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ apaccāsīsamāno vimuttāyatanasīsena
analyzed: deseti tam na mahapphalam ekaḥ attanaḥ paguṇam dhammam a paccāsīsamānaḥ vimutta āyatana sīsena

original: paresaṃ deseti, idaṃ ‘desanāmayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
analyzed: paresam deseti idam desanā mayam puñña kiriya vatthu nāma

original: Eko suṇanto ‘iti maṃ saddhoti jānissantī’ti suṇāti, taṃ na mahapphalaṃ. Eko ‘evaṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ suṇantaḥ iti mama saddho ti jānissanti iti suṇāti tam na mahapphalam ekaḥ evam

original: me mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī’ti hitapharaṇena muducittena dhammaṃ suṇāti, idaṃ ‘savanamayaṃ
analyzed: me mahapphalam bhavissati iti hita pharaṇena mudu cittena dhammam suṇāti idam savana mayam

original: puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma.
analyzed: puññakiriyavatthu nāma

original: Diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karontassa ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma. Dīghabhāṇakā panāhu
analyzed: diṭṭhim ujum karontassa diṭṭhi ju kammam puñña kiriya vatthu nāma dīghabhāṇakā pana āhu

original: – ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbesaṃ niyamalakkhaṇaṃ, yaṃkiñci puññaṃ karontassa hi diṭṭhiyā
analyzed: diṭṭhi ju kammam sabbesam niyama lakkhaṇam yaṃ kiñci puññam karontassa hi diṭṭhiyā

original: ujukabhāveneva mahapphalaṃ hotī’ti.
analyzed: ujuka bhāvena iva mahat phalam hoti iti

original: Etesu pana puññakiriyavatthūsu dānamayaṃ tāva ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cintentassa uppajjati,
analyzed: etesu pana puñña kiriya vatthūsu dāna mayam tāva dānam dassāmi iti cintentassa uppajjati

original: dānaṃ dadato uppajjati, ‘dinnaṃ me’ti paccavekkhantassa uppajjati. Evaṃ pubbacetanaṃ
analyzed: dānam dadataḥ uppajjati dinnam me iti paccavekkhantassa uppajjati evam pubba cetanam

original: muñcanacetanaṃ aparacetananti tissopi cetanā ekato katvā ‘dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’
analyzed: muñcana cetanam apara cetananti tissaḥ api cetanāḥ ekatas katvā dāna mayam puñña kiriya vatthu

original: nāma hoti. Sīlamayampi ‘sīlaṃ pūressāmī’ti cintentassa uppajjati, sīlapūraṇakāle
analyzed: nāma hoti sīlam ayam pi sīlam pūressāmi iti cintentassa uppajjati sīla pūraṇa kāle

original: uppajjati, ‘pūritaṃ me’ti paccavekkhantassa uppajjati. Tā sabbāpi ekato katvā ‘sīlamayaṃ
analyzed: uppajjati pūritam me iti paccavekkhantassa uppajjati tā sabbā api ekatas katvā sīla mayam

original: puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma hoti…pe… diṭṭhijukammampi ‘diṭṭhiṃ ujukaṃ karissāmī’ti cintentassa
analyzed: puñña kiriya vatthu nāma hoti pe diṭṭhi ju kammam pi diṭṭhim ujukam karissāmi iti cintentassa

original: uppajjati, diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karontassa uppajjati, ‘diṭṭhi me ujukā katā’ti paccavekkhantassa
analyzed: uppajjati diṭṭhim ujum karontassa uppajjati diṭṭhi me ujukā katā ati paccavekkhantassa

original: uppajjati. Tā sabbāpi ekato katvā ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ puññakiriyavatthu’ nāma hoti.
analyzed: uppajjati tāḥ sabbā api ekatas katvā diṭṭhi ju kammam puñña kiriya vatthu nāma hoti

original: Sutte pana tīṇiyeva puññakiriyavatthūni āgatāni. Tesu itaresampi saṅgaho veditabbo.
analyzed: sutte pana tīṇi yeva puñña kiriya vatthūni āgatāni tesu itaresam pi saṅgahaḥ veditabbo

original: Apacitiveyyāvaccāni hi sīlamaye saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. Pattānuppadānaabbhanumodanāni
analyzed: apaciti veyyāvaccāni hi sīla maye saṅgaham gacchanti patta anuppadāna abbhanumodanāni

original: dānamaye. Desanāsavanadiṭṭhijukammāni bhāvanāmaye. Ye pana ‘diṭṭhijukammaṃ sabbesaṃ
analyzed: dāna maye desanā savana diṭṭhi ju kammāni bhāvanā maye ye pana diṭṭhi ju kammam sabbesam

original: niyamalakkhaṇa’nti vadanti tesaṃ taṃ tīsupi saṅgahaṃ gacchati. Evametāni saṅkhepato
analyzed: niyama lakkhaṇan ti vadanti tesam tam tīsu pi saṅgaham gacchati evam etāni saṅkhepato

original: tīṇi hutvā vitthārato dasa honti.
analyzed: tīṇi hutvā vitthārataḥ dasa honti

original: Tesu ‘dānaṃ dassāmī’ti cintento aṭṭhannaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittānaṃ aññatareneva cinteti;
analyzed: tesu dānam dassāmi iti cintentaḥ aṭṭhannam kāmāvacara kusala cittānam aññatarena iva cinteti

original: dadamānopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena deti; ‘dānaṃ me dinna’nti paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva
analyzed: dadamānaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena deti dānam me dinnanti paccavekkhantaḥ pi tesam yeva

original: aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Sīlaṃ pūressāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti;
analyzed: aññatarena paccavekkhati sīlam pūressāmi iti cintentaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena cinteti

original: sīlaṃ pūrentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena pūreti, ‘sīlaṃ me pūrita’nti paccavekkhantopi
analyzed: sīlam pūrentaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena pūreti sīlam me pūritanti paccavekkhanto pi

original: tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Bhāvanaṃ bhāvessāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva
analyzed: tesam yeva aññatarena paccavekkhati bhāvanam bhāvessāmi iti cintentaḥ api tesam yeva

original: aññatarena cinteti; bhāventopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena bhāveti; ‘bhāvanā me bhāvitā’ti
analyzed: aññatarena cinteti bhāventaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena bhāveti bhāvanā me bhāvitā ati

original: paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati.
analyzed: paccavekkhantaḥ pi tesam yeva aññatarena paccavekkhati

original: ‘Jeṭṭhāpacitikammaṃ karissāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti, karontopi
analyzed: jeṭṭhāpaciti kammam karissāmi iti cintentaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena cinteti karontaḥ api

original: tesaṃyeva aññatarena karoti, ‘kataṃ me’ti paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati.
analyzed: tesam yeva aññatarena karoti katam me ti paccavekkhantaḥ pi tesam yeva aññatarena paccavekkhati

original: ‘Kāyaveyyāvaṭikakammaṃ karissāmī’ti cintentopi, karontopi, ‘kataṃ me’ti paccavekkhantopi
analyzed: kāya veyyāvaṭika kammam karissāmi iti cintentaḥ api karontaḥ api katam me iti paccavekkhantaḥ api

original: tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Pattiṃ dassāmī’ti cintentopi, dadantopi, ‘dinnaṃ
analyzed: tesam yeva aññatarena paccavekkhati pattim dassāmi iti cintentaḥ api dadantaḥ api dinnam

original: me’ti paccavekkhantopi, ‘pattiṃ vā sesakusalaṃ vā anumodissāmī’ti cintentopi tesaṃyeva
analyzed: mā iti paccavekkhantaḥ api pattim vā sesa kusalam vā anumodissāmi iti cintentaḥ api tesam yeva

original: aññatarena cinteti; anumodantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena anumodati, ‘anumoditaṃ me’ti
analyzed: aññatarena cinteti anumodantaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena anumodati anumoditam mā iti

original: paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Dhammaṃ desessāmī’ti cintentopi
analyzed: paccavekkhantaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena paccavekkhati dhammam desessāmi iti cintentaḥ api

original: tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti, desentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena deseti, ‘desito me’ti
analyzed: tesam yeva aññatarena cinteti desentaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena deseti desitaḥ mā iti

original: paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Dhammaṃ sossāmī’ti cintentopi
analyzed: paccavekkhantaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena paccavekkhati dhammam sossāmi iti cintentaḥ api

original: tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti, suṇantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena suṇāti, ‘suto me’ti
analyzed: tesaṃ yeva aññatarena cinteti suṇantaḥ api tesaṃ yeva aññatarena suṇāti sutaḥ mā iti

original: paccavekkhantopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena paccavekkhati. ‘Diṭṭhiṃ ujukaṃ karissāmī’ti
analyzed: paccavekkhantaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena paccavekkhati diṭṭhim ujukam karissāmi iti

original: cintentopi tesaṃyeva aññatarena cinteti, ujuṃ karonto pana catunnaṃ ñāṇasampayuttānaṃ
analyzed: cintentaḥ api tesam yeva aññatarena cinteti ujum karontaḥ pana catunnam ñāṇa sampayuttānam

original: aññatarena karoti, ‘diṭṭhi me ujukā katā’ti paccavekkhanto aṭṭhannaṃ aññatarena paccavekkhati.
analyzed: aññatarena karoti diṭṭhi me ujukā katā ati paccavekkhantaḥ aṭṭhannam aññatarena paccavekkhati

original: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne cattāri anantāni nāma gahitāni. Cattāri hi anantāni – ākāso ananto,
analyzed: imasmin ṭhāne cattāri anantāni nāma gahitāni cattāri hi anantāni ākāsaḥ ananto

original: cakkavāḷāni anantāni, sattanikāyo ananto, buddhaññāṇaṃ anantaṃ. Ākāsassa hi puratthimāya
analyzed: cakkavāḷāni anantāni satta nikāyaḥ anantaḥ buddhaññāṇam anantam ākāsassa hi puratthimāya

original: disāya vā pacchimuttaradakkhiṇāsu vā ettakāni vā yojanasatāni ettakāni vā yojanasahassānīti
analyzed: disāya vā pacchima uttara dakkhiṇāsu vā ettakāni vā yojana satāni ettakāni vā yojana sahassāni iti

original: paricchedo natthi. Sinerumattampi ayokūṭaṃ pathaviṃ dvidhā katvā heṭṭhā khittaṃ bhassetheva,
analyzed: paricchedaḥ natthi sineru mattam pi ayokūṭam pathavim dvidhā katvā heṭṭhā khittam bhassetha iva

original: no patiṭṭhaṃ labhetha, evaṃ ākāsaṃ anantaṃ nāma.
analyzed: na u patiṭṭham labhetha evam ākāsam anantam nāma

original: Cakkavāḷānampi satehi vā sahassehi vā paricchedo natthi. Sacepi hi akaniṭṭhabhavane
analyzed: cakkavāḷānam pi satehi vā sahassehi vā paricchedaḥ natthi sace pi hi akaniṭṭha bhavane

original: nibbattā, daḷhathāmadhanuggahassa lahukena sarena tiriyaṃ tālacchāyaṃ atikkamanamattena
analyzed: nibbattā daḷha thāma dhanuggahassa lahukena sarena tiriyam tāla chāyam atikkamana mattena

original: kālena cakkavāḷasatasahassaṃ atikkamanasamatthena javena samannāgatā cattāro mahābrahmāno
analyzed: kālena cakkavāḷa sata sahassam atikkamana samatthena javena samannāgatā cattāraḥ mahābrahmāno

original: ‘cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ passissāmā’ti tena javena dhāveyyuṃ, cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ adisvāva
analyzed: cakkavāḷa pariyantam passissāma ati tena javena dhāveyyum cakkavāḷa pariyantam a disvāva

original: parinibbāyeyyuṃ, evaṃ cakkavāḷāni anantāni nāma.
analyzed: parinibbāyeyyum evam cakkavāḷāni anantāni nāma

original: Ettakesu pana cakkavāḷesu udakaṭṭhakathalaṭṭhakasattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi. Evaṃ sattanikāyo ananto nāma. Tatopi buddhañāṇaṃ anantameva.
analyzed: ettakesu pana cakkavāḷesu udaka ṭṭhaka thalaṭṭhaka sattānam pamāṇam natthi evam satta nikāyaḥ anantaḥ nāma tatas pi buddha ñāṇam anantam eva

original: Evaṃ aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ kāmāvacarasomanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttaasaṅkhārikakusalacittāni
analyzed: evam aparimāṇesu cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānam sattānam kāmāvacara somanassa sahagata ñāṇa sampayutta asaṅkhārika kusala cittāni

original: ekassa bahūni uppajjanti. Bahūnampi bahūni uppajjanti. Tāni sabbānipi kāmāvacaraṭṭhena
analyzed: ekassa bahūni uppajjanti bahūnam pi bahūni uppajjanti tāni sabbāni pi kāmāvacara ṭṭhena

original: somanassasahagataṭṭhena ñāṇasampayuttaṭṭhena asaṅkhārikaṭṭhena ekattaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: somanassa sahagata ṭṭhena ñāṇa sampayutta ṭṭhena asaṅkhārika ṭṭhena ekattam gacchanti

original: Ekameva somanassasahagataṃ tihetukaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ mahācittaṃ hoti. Tathā sasaṅkhārikaṃ

original: hoti. Tattha kiñcāpi dutiyajjhāne sabbepi paṭhamajjhānadhammā na santi, aññeyeva

original: hi paṭhamajjhāne phassādayo aññe idha, oḷārikassa pana oḷārikassa aṅgassa samatikkamā

original: paṭhamajjhānato paresaṃ dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ adhigamo hotīti dīpanatthaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ

original: vūpasamāti evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Ajjhattanti idha – niyakajjhattaṃ adhippetaṃ.

original: tasmā attani jātaṃ, attano santāne nibbattanti ayamettha attho.
analyzed: tasmai attani jātam attano santāne nibbattanti ayam ettha atthaḥ

original: Sampasādananti sampasādanaṃ vuccati saddhā. Sampasādanayogato jhānampi sampasādanaṃ,
analyzed: sampasādanam ti sampasādanam vuccati saddhā sampasādana yogataḥ jhānam pi sampasādanam

original: ekodibhāvena saddhiṃ yojetabbaṃ.

original: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaṅkhātā upekkhā ayaṃ ‘vedanupekkhā’ nāma.

original: Yā “yadatthi, yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ pajahati, upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ ‘vipassanupekkhā’ nāma.
analyzed: yā yat atthi yam bhūtam tam pajahati upekkham paṭilabhati iti evam āgatā vicinane majjhatta bhūtā upekkhā ayam vipassanupekkhā nāma

original: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samavāhitabhūtā upekkhā ayaṃ, ‘tatramajjhattupekkhā’ nāma.
analyzed: yā pana chanda ādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānam samavāhita bhūtā upekkhā ayam tatra majjhattupekkhā nāma

original: Yā “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā, ayaṃ ‘jhānupekkhā’ nāma.
analyzed: yā upekkhakaḥ ca viharati iti evam āgatā agga sukhe pi tasmim a pakkhapāta jananī upekkhā ayam jhānupekkhā nāma

original: Yā “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ ‘pārisuddhupekkhā’ nāma.
analyzed: yāḥ upekkhā sati pārisuddhim catuttham jhānanti evam āgatā sabba paccanīka parisuddhā paccanīka vūpasamane pi a byāpāra bhūtā upekkhā ayam pārisuddhupekkhā nāma

original: Tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā
analyzed: tattha chaḷaṅgu pekkhā ca brahmavihāru pekkhā ca bojjhaṅgu pekkhā ca tatra ajjhattu pekkhā

original: ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā tatramajjhattupekkhāva hoti. Tena
analyzed: ca jhānupekkhā ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthataḥ ekā hoti tena

original: Catutthajjhānaṃ
165. Catutthajjhānaniddese sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānāti kāyikasukhassa

original: kāyakilamathe cittupaghāte ca sati uppajjati, vitakkavicārābhāve neva uppajjati;

original: yattha pana uppajjati tattha vitakkavicārabhāve; appahīnā eva ca dutiyajjhānupacāre
analyzed: yattha pana uppajjati tattha vitakka vicāra bhāve appahīnāḥ eva ca dutiya jhāna upacāre

original: vitakkavicārāti tatthassa siyā uppatti, natveva dutiyajjhāne, pahīnapaccayattā. Tathā
analyzed: vitakka vicārā ti tattha siyā uppatti natvā eva dutiya jhāne pahīna paccaya ttā tathā

original: tatiyajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi sukhindriyassa pītisamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyassa
analyzed: tatiya jhāna upacāre pahīnassa api sukha indriyassa pīti samuṭṭhāna paṇīta rūpa phuṭa kāyassa

original: siyā uppatti, natveva tatiyajjhāne. Tatiyajjhāne hi sukhassa paccayabhūtā pīti sabbaso
analyzed: siyā uppatti natvā eva tatiya jhāne tatiya jhāne hi sukhassa paccaya bhūtā pi iti sabbaso

original: niruddhāti. Tathā catutthajjhānupacāre pahīnassāpi somanassindriyassa āsannattā,
analyzed: niruddhā iti tathā catuttha jjhāna upacāre pahīnassa api somanassindriyassa āsanna ttā

original: appanāppattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā anatikkantattā ca, siyā uppatti, natveva
analyzed: appanā appattāya upekkhāya abhāvena sammā an atikkanta ttā ca siyā uppatti natvā eva

original: catutthajjhāne. Tasmā eva ca ‘etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī’ti
analyzed: catuttha jhāne tasmai eva ca ettha uppannam dukkhindriyam aparisesam nirujjhati iti

original: tattha tattha aparisesaggahaṇaṃ katanti.
analyzed: tattha tattha aparisesa ggahaṇam katam ti

original: Etthāha – ‘athevaṃ tassa tassa jhānassupacāre pahīnāpi etā vedanā idha kasmā samāhaṭā’ti?
analyzed: ettha āha atha ivam tassa tassa jhānassa upacāre pahīnā api etāḥ vedanā idha kasmā

original: ‘Sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ’. Yā hi ayaṃ ‘adukkhamasukha’nti ettha adukkhamasukhā vedanā vuttā,
analyzed: sukha ggahaṇa attham yā hi ayam adukkham asukhanti ettha adukkham asukhā vedanā vuttā

original: sā sukhumā, dubbiññeyyā, na sakkā sukhena gahetuṃ. Tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā
analyzed: sā sukhumā dubbiññeyyā na sakkā sukhena gahetum tasmā yathā nāma duṭṭhassa yathā

original: tathā vā upasaṅkamitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa gahaṇatthaṃ gopo ekasmiṃ vaje
analyzed: tathā vai upasaṅkamitvā gahetum a sakkuṇeyyassa goṇassa gahaṇa attham gopaḥ ekasmin vaje

original: sabbā gāvo samāharati, athekekaṃ nīharanto paṭipāṭiyā āgataṃ ‘ayaṃ so, gaṇhatha na’nti
analyzed: sabbāḥ gāvaḥ samāharati atha ekekam nīharantaḥ paṭipāṭiyā āgatam ayam saḥ gaṇhatha nanti

original: tampi gāhāpayati; evameva bhagavā sukhagahaṇatthaṃ sabbāpi etā samāharīti. Evañhi
analyzed: tam pi gāhāpayati evam eva bhagavā sukha gahaṇa attham sabbā api etā samāhari iti evam hi

original: samāhaṭā etā dassetvā yaṃ neva sukhaṃ na dukkhaṃ, na somanassaṃ na domanassaṃ, ayaṃ
analyzed: samāhaṭāḥ etāḥ dassetvā yam na iva sukham na dukkham na somanassam na domanassam ayaṃ

original: adukkhamasukhāvedanāti sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ.
analyzed: adukkham asukhā vedanā ati sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ

original: Apica adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā paccayadassanatthañcāpi etā vuttāti veditabbā.
analyzed: apica adukkham asukhāya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ paccaya dassana ttham ca api etā vuttā iti veditabbā

original: Sukhadukkhappahānādayo hi tassā paccayā. Yathāha – “cattāro kho, āvuso, paccayā adukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: sukha dukkha ppahāna ādayaḥ hi tassā paccayāḥ yathā āha cattāro kho āvuso paccayāḥ adukkhamasukhāya

original: cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā. Idhāvuso bhikkhu, sukhassa ca pahānā…pe… catutthaṃ jhānaṃ
analyzed: cetaḥ vimuttiyā samāpattiyā idha āvuso bhikkhu sukhassa ca catuttham jhānaṃ

original: upasampajja viharati, ime kho, āvuso, cattāro paccayā adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyā
analyzed: upasampajja viharati ime kho āvuso cattāro paccayāḥ adukkhamasukhāya cetaḥ vimuttiyā

original: samāpattiyā”ti. Yathā vā aññattha pahīnāpi sakkāyadiṭṭhiādayo tatiyamaggassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ
analyzed: samāpattiyā iti yathā vā aññattha pahīnā api sakkāya diṭṭhi ādayaḥ tatiya maggassa vaṇṇa bhaṇana attham

original: tattha pahīnāti vuttā, evaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthampetassa jhānassetā idha vuttāti veditabbā.
analyzed: tattha pahīnā ati vuttā evam vaṇṇa bhaṇana attham petassa jhānassa etāḥ idha vuttā iti veditabbā

original: Paccayaghātena vā ettha rāgadosānaṃ atidūrabhāvaṃ dassetumpetā vuttāti veditabbā.
analyzed: paccaya ghātena vā ettha rāga dosānam ati dūra bhāvam dassetum petā vuttā iti veditabbā

original: Etāsu hi sukhaṃ somanassassa paccayo, somanassaṃ rāgassa; dukkhaṃ domanassassa, domanassaṃ
analyzed: etāsu hi sukham somanassassa paccayaḥ somanassam rāgassa dukkham domanassassa domanassam

original: dosassa. Sukhādighātena ca sappaccayā rāgadosā hatāti atidūre hontīti.
analyzed: dosassa sukha ādi ghātena ca sappaccayāḥ rāga dosāḥ hatā ati atidūre honti iti

original: Adukkhamasukhanti dukkhābhāvena adukkhaṃ, sukhābhāvena asukhaṃ. Etenettha dukkhasukhappaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ
analyzed: adukkham asukhanti dukkha abhāvena adukkham sukha abhāvena asukham etena ittha dukkha sukha ppaṭipakkha bhūtam

original: tatiyavedanaṃ dīpeti, na dukkhasukhābhāvamattaṃ. Tatiyavedanā nāma adukkhamasukhā.
analyzed: tatiya vedanam dīpeti na dukkha sukha abhāva mattam tatiya vedanā nāma adukkham asukhā

original: Upekkhātipi vuccati. Sā iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītānubhavanalakkhaṇā, majjhattarasā, avibhūtapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: upekkhā ati pi vuccati sā iṭṭha aniṭṭha viparīta anubhavana lakkhaṇā majjhatta rasā avibhūta paccupaṭṭhānā

original: sukhanirodhapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā.
analyzed: sukha nirodha padaṭṭhānā ti veditabbā

original: Upekkhāsatipārisuddhinti upekkhāya janitasatipārisuddhiṃ. Imasmiñhi jhāne suparisuddhā
analyzed: upekkhā sati pārisuddhim ti upekkhāya janita sati pārisuddhim imasmin hi jhāne su parisuddhā

original: sati. Yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi sā upekkhāya katā, na aññena. Tasmā etaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhīti
analyzed: sati yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi sā upekkhāya katā na aññena tasmai etam upekkhā sati pārisuddhi iti

original: vuccati. Vibhaṅgepi vuttaṃ – “ayaṃ sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā,
analyzed: vuccati vibhaṅge pi vuttam ayam sati imāya upekkhāya visadā hoti parisuddhā pariyodātā

original: tena vuccati upekkhāsatipārisuddhī”ti. Yāya ca upekkhāya ettha sati pārisuddhi hoti
analyzed: tena vuccati upekkhā sati pārisuddhī iti yāya ca upekkhāya ettha sati pārisuddhi hoti

original: sā atthato tatramajjhattatāti veditabbā. Na kevalañcettha tāya satiyeva parisuddhā
analyzed: sā atthataḥ tatram ajjhatta tā ati veditabbā na kevalam ca ittha tāya satiyā iva parisuddhā

original: apica kho sabbepi sampayuttadhammā. Satisīsena pana desanā vuttā.
analyzed: apica kho sabbe pi sampayutta dhammā sati sīsena pana desanā vuttā

original: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṃ upekkhā heṭṭhāpi tīsu jhānesu vijjati – yathā pana divā sūriyappabhābhibhavā
analyzed: tattha kiñcā api ayam upekkhā heṭṭhā api tīsu jhānesu vijjati yathā pana divā sūriya ppabhā abhibhavā

original: sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā alābhā divā vijjamānāpi
analyzed: somma bhāvena ca attanaḥ upakāraka ttena vā sabhāgāya rattiyāḥ alābhā divā vijjamānā api

original: candalekhā aparisuddhā hoti apariyodātā – evamayampi tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā
analyzed: canda lekhā a parisuddhā hoti a pariyodātā evam ayam pi tatra majjhattu pekkhā canda lekhā

original: vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavā sabhāgāya ca upekkhāvedanārattiyā appaṭilābhā
