analyzed: vijjamānā api paṭhama ādi jhāna bhedesu aparisuddhā hoti tassā ca aparisuddhāya divā

original: aparisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi satiādayo aparisuddhāva honti. Tasmā
analyzed: pabhā sahajātāḥ api honti tasmā

original: tesu ekampi ‘upekkhāsatipārisuddhī’ti na vuttaṃ. Idha pana vitakkādipaccanīkadhammatejābhibhavābhāvā
analyzed: tesu ekam pi upekkhā sati pārisuddhi iti na vuttam idha pana vitakka ādi paccanīka dhamma teja abhibhava abhāvā

original: sabhāgāya ca upekkhā vedanārattiyā paṭilābhā ayaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhācandalekhā
analyzed: sa bhāgāya ca upekkhā vedanā rattiyā paṭilābhā ayam tatra majjhatta upekkhā canda lekhā

original: ativiya parisuddhā. Tassā parisuddhattā parisuddhacandalekhāya pabhā viya sahajātāpi
analyzed: parisuddhā tassā parisuddha ttā parisuddha canda lekhāya pabhā sahajātā api

original: satiādayo parisuddhā honti pariyodātā. Tasmā idameva upekkhāsatipārisuddhīti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sati ādayaḥ parisuddhāḥ honti pariyodātā tasmai idam eva upekkhā sati pārisuddhī iti vuttam ti veditabbam

original: Catutthanti gaṇanānupubbatā catutthaṃ. Idaṃ catutthaṃ samāpajjatītipi catutthaṃ.
analyzed: catuttham ti gaṇanā anupubba tā catuttham idam catuttham samāpajjati iti pi catuttham

original: Phasso hotītiādīsu phassapañcake tāva vedanāti upekkhāvedanā veditabbā. Jhānapañcakaindriyaaṭṭhakesu
analyzed: phassaḥ hoti itiādīsu phassa pañcake tāva vedanā ati upekkhā vedanā veditabbā jhāna pañcaka aindriya aṭṭhakesu

analyzed: pana upekkhā hoti upekkhindriyam hoti iti vuttam eva sesāni tatiye parihīna padāni idha api

original: parihīnāneva. Koṭṭhāsavārepi duvaṅgikaṃ jhānanti upekkhācittekaggatāvaseneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: koṭṭhāsa vāre pi duvaṅgikam jhānanti upekkhā citta ekagga tā vasena iva veditabbam

original: Sesaṃ sabbaṃ tatiyasadisamevāti.
analyzed: sesam sabbam tatiya sadisam eva ati

original: Catukkanayo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: catukka nayaḥ niṭṭhito

original: Pañcakanayo
analyzed: pañcakanayaḥ

original: 167. Idāni katame dhammā kusalāti pañcakanayo āraddho. Kasmāti ce, puggalajjhāsayavasena

original: oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi, upekkhācittekaggatā santato. Tesaṃ sappāyavasena duvaṅgikaṃ
analyzed: oḷārikataḥ upaṭṭhāsi upekkhā citta ekagga tā santataḥ tesam sa ppāya vasena duvaṅgikam

original: pañcamajjhānaṃ nāma bhājesi. Ayaṃ tāva ‘puggalajjhāsayo’.
analyzed: pañcama jhānam nāma bhājesi ayam tāva puggala jhāsayo

original: Yassā pana dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā desanāvilāsappatto nāma hoti – sā tathāgatassa
analyzed: yassā pana dhammadhātuyā su paṭividdha ttā desanā vilāsa ppattaḥ nāma hoti sā tathāgatassa

original: satthā yaṃ yaṃ aṅgaṃ labbhati tassa tassa vasena yathā yathā icchati tathā tathā

original: vicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ, bhājesi tivaṅgikaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ, bhājesi duvaṅgikaṃ

original: catutthajjhānaṃ, duvaṅgikameva pañcamajjhānaṃ bhājesi. Ayaṃ ‘desanāvilāso’ nāma.
analyzed: catuttha jhānam duvaṅgikam eva pañcama jhānam bhājesi ayam desanāvilāsaḥ nāma

original: Taṃ dassetumpi ayaṃ pañcakanayo āraddhoti veditabbo.
analyzed: tam dassetum pi ayam pañcaka nayaḥ āraddhaḥ ti veditabbo

original: Tattha dutiyajjhānaniddese phassādīsu vitakkamattaṃ parihāyati, koṭṭhāsavāre “caturaṅgikaṃ

analyzed: jhānam hoti caturaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ hoti iti ayam eva visesaḥ sesam sabbam paṭhamajjhāna sadisam eva

original: Yāni ca catukkanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthāni tāneva idha tatiyacatutthapañcamāni. Tesaṃ
analyzed: yāni ca dutiya tatiya catutthāni tāneva idha tatiya catuttha pañcamāni tesam

original: adhigamapaṭipāṭidīpanatthaṃ ayaṃ nayo veditabbo –
analyzed: adhigama paṭipāṭi dīpana attham ayam nayaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Eko kira amaccaputto rājānaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ janapadato nagaraṃ āgato. So ekadivasameva
analyzed: ekaḥ kira amacca puttaḥ rājānam upaṭṭhātum janapadataḥ nagaram āgataḥ saḥ eka divasam eva

analyzed: rājānam disvā pāna byasanena sabbam vibhava jātam na āsesi tam eka divasam surā mada mattam

original: niccoḷaṃ katvā jiṇṇakaṭasārakamattena paṭicchādetvā pānāgārato nīhariṃsu. Tamenaṃ
analyzed: niccoḷam katvā jiṇṇa kaṭasāraka mattena paṭicchādetvā pānāgārataḥ nīhariṃsu tam enam

original: thūlasāṭakayugaṃ nivāsāpetvā puna gandhodakena nhāpetvā sukhumena dukūlayugaḷena
analyzed: thūla sāṭaka yugam punar gandha udakena su khumena dukūla yugaḷena

original: acchādetvā pāsādaṃ āropetvā subhojanaṃ bhojetvā ‘evaṃ naṃ paricāreyyāthā’ti paricārake
analyzed: a chādetvā pāsādam āropetvā su bhojanam bhojetvā evam nam paricāreyyātha ati paricārake

original: paṭipādetvā pakkāmi. Atha naṃ te sayanaṃ āropesuṃ. Pānāgāragamanapaṭibāhanatthañca

original: naṃ cattāro tāva janā catūsu hatthapādesu uppīḷetvā aṭṭhaṃsu. Eko pāde parimajji.

original: Eko tālavaṇṭaṃ gahetvā bīji. Eko vīṇaṃ vādayamāno gāyanto nisīdi.

original: So sayanupagamanena vigatakilamatho thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito hatthapādanippīḷanaṃ
analyzed: so sayan upagamanena vigata kilamatho thokam niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitaḥ hattha pāda nippīḷanam

original: asahamāno ‘ko me hatthapāde uppīḷeti? Apagacchathā’ti tajjesi. Te ekavacaneneva apagacchiṃsu.
analyzed: a sahamānaḥ kaḥ me hattha pāde uppīḍeti apagacchatha ati tat jesi te ekavacanena iva apagacchiṃsu

original: Tato puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito pādaparimajjanaṃ asahamāno ‘ko me pāde parimajjati?
analyzed: tato puna thokam niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitaḥ pāda parimajjanam a sahamāno kaḥ me pāde parimajjati

original: Apagacchā’ti āha. Sopi ekavacaneneva apagacchi. Puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito vātavuṭṭhi
analyzed: apagaccha ati āha saḥ api eka vacanena iva apagacchi puna thokam niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitaḥ vāta vuṭṭhi

original: viya tālavaṇṭavātaṃ asahanto ‘ko esa? Apagacchatū’ti āha. Sopi ekavacaneneva apagacchi.
analyzed: tālavaṇṭa vātam a sahantaḥ kaḥ esa apagacchatu iti āha saḥ upi ekavacanena iva apagacchi

original: Puna thokaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhito kaṇṇasūlaṃ viya gītavāditasaddaṃ asahamāno vīṇāvādakaṃ
analyzed: puna thokam niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitaḥ kaṇṇa sūlam viya gīta vādita saddam a sahamānaḥ vīṇā vādakam

original: tajjesi. Sopi ekavacaneneva apagacchi. Athevaṃ anukkamena pahīnakilamathuppīḷanaparimajjanavātappahāragītavāditasaddupaddavo
analyzed: tat jesi saḥ api ekavacanena iva apagacchi atha ivam anukkamena pahīna kilamathu ppīḍana parimajjana vāta pahāra gīta vādita saddu paddavaḥ

original: sukhaṃ sayitvā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ agamāsi. Rājāpissa mahantaṃ issariyamadāsi.
analyzed: sukham sayitvā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikam agamāsi rājā api sa mahantam issariyam adāsi

original: So mahājanassa avassayo jāto.
analyzed: saḥ mahā janassa avassayaḥ jātaḥ

original: Tattha pānabyasanena pārijuññappatto so amaccaputto viya anekabyasanapārijuññappatto
analyzed: tattha pāna byasanena pārijuñña ppatto so amacca puttaḥ viya aneka byasana pārijuñña ppatto

original: gharāvāsagato kulaputto daṭṭhabbo. Aṅgavijjāpāṭhako puriso viya tathāgato. Tassa
analyzed: ghara āvāsa gataḥ kula putto daṭṭhabbo aṅga vijjā pāṭhako puriso viya tathāgataḥ tassa

original: purisassa ‘ayaṃ mahājanassa avassayo bhavissati, paṭijagganaṃ arahatī’ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: purisassa ayam mahājanassa avassayaḥ bhavissati paṭijagganam arahati iti sanniṭṭhānam

original: viya tathāgatassa ‘ayaṃ mahājanassa avassayo bhavissati, pabbajjaṃ arahati kulaputto’ti sanniṭṭhānakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: viya tathāgatassa ayam mahā janassa avassayaḥ bhavissati pabbajjam arahati kula putto ti sanniṭṭhāna karaṇam

original: Athassa amaccaputtassa mattikāmattena nhāpanaṃ viya kulaputtassāpi pabbajjāpaṭilābho.
analyzed: athassa amacca puttassa mattikā mattena nhāpanam viya kula puttassa api pabbajjā paṭilābhaḥ

original: Athassa thūlasāṭakanivāsanaṃ viya imassāpi dasasikkhāpadasaṅkhātasīlavatthanivāsanaṃ.
analyzed: athassa thūla sāṭaka nivāsanam viya imassa api dasa sikkhāpada saṅkhāta sīlavattha nivāsanam

original: Puna tassa gandhodakanhāpanaṃ viya imassāpi pātimokkhasaṃvarādisīlagandhodakanhāpanaṃ.
analyzed: puna tassa gandha udaka nhāpanam viya imassa api pātimokkha saṃvara ādi sīla gandha udaka nhāpanam

original: Puna tassa sukhumadukūlayugaḷacchādanaṃ viya imassāpi yathāvuttasīlavisuddhisampadāsaṅkhātadukūlacchādanaṃ.
analyzed: puna tassa sukhuma dukūla yugaḷa chādanam viya imassa api yathā vutta sīla visuddhi sampadā asaṅkhāta dukūla chādanam

original: Dukūlacchāditassa panassa pāsādāropanaṃ viya imassāpi sīlavisuddhidukūlacchāditassa
analyzed: dukūla chāditassa pana assa pāsāda āropanam viya imassa api sīla visuddhi dukūla chāditassa

original: samādhibhāvanāpāsādārohanaṃ. Tato tassa subhojanabhuñjanaṃ viya imassāpi samādhiupakārakasatisampajaññādidhammāmataparibhuñjanaṃ.
analyzed: samādhi bhāvanā pāsāda ārohanam tatas tassa su bhojana bhuñjanam viya imassa api samādhi upakāraka sati sampajaññā ādi dhamma amata paribhuñjanam

original: Bhuttabhojanassa pana tassa paricārakehi sayanāropanaṃ viya imassāpi vitakkādīhi
analyzed: bhutta bhojanassa pana tassa paricārakehi sayana āropanam viya imassa api vitakka ādīhi

original: upacārajjhānāropanaṃ. Puna tassa pānāgāragamanapaṭibāhanatthaṃ hatthapāduppīḷanakapurisacatukkaṃ
analyzed: upacāra jhāna āropanam puna tassa pānāgāra gamana paṭibāhana attham hattha pāda uppīḍanaka purisa catukkam

original: viya imassāpi kāmasaññābhimukhagamanapaṭibāhanatthaṃ ārammaṇe cittuppīḷanako nekkhammavitakko.
analyzed: viya imassa api kāma saññā abhimukha gamana paṭibāhana tham ārammaṇe citta uppīḷanakaḥ nekkhamma vitakko

original: Tassa pādaparimajjakapuriso viya imassāpi ārammaṇe cittānumajjanako vicāro. Tassa
analyzed: tassa pāda parimajjaka purisaḥ viya imassa api ārammaṇe citta anumajjanakaḥ vicāro tassa

original: tālavaṇṭavātadāyako viya imassāpi cetaso sītalabhāvadāyikā pīti.
analyzed: tāla vaṇṭa vāta dāyakaḥ viya imassa api cetasaḥ sītala bhāva dāyikā

original: Tassa sotānuggahakaro gandhabbapuriso viya imassāpi cittānuggāhakaṃ somanassaṃ. Tassa
analyzed: tassa sota anuggaha karaḥ gandhabba purisaḥ viya imassa api citta anuggāhakam somanassam tassa

original: sayanupagamanena vigatakilamathassa thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi upacārajjhānasannissayena
analyzed: sayanupagamanena vigata kilamathassa thokam niddupagamanam viya imassa api upacāra jhāna sannissayena

original: vigatanīvaraṇakilamathassa paṭhamajjhānupagamanaṃ.
analyzed: vigata nīvaraṇa kilamathassa paṭhama jhāna upagamanam

original: Athassa niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa hatthapāduppīḷanāsahanena hatthapāduppīḷakānaṃ santajjanaṃ
analyzed: athassa niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa hattha pāda uppīḍana āsahanena hattha pāda uppīḷakānam santajjanam

original: tesañca apagamanena puna thokaṃ niddupagamanaṃ viya imassāpi paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitassa
analyzed: tesam ca apagamanena puna thokam niddupagamanam viya imassa api paṭhamajjhānataḥ vuṭṭhitassa

original: cittuppīḷakavitakkāsahanena vitakkadosadassanaṃ, vitakkappahānā ca puna avitakkavicāramattadutiyajjhānupagamanaṃ.
analyzed: citta uppīḍaka vitakka asahanena vitakka dosa dassanam vitakka ppahānā ca puna avitakka vicāra matta dutiya jhāna upagamanam

original: Tato tassa punappunaṃ niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa yathāvuttena kamena pādaparimajjanādīnaṃ
analyzed: tatas tassa punappunam niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa yathā vuttena kamena pāda parimajjana ādīnam

original: asahanena paṭipāṭiyā pādaparimajjakādīnaṃ santajjanaṃ, tesaṃ tesañca apagamanena
analyzed: asahanena paṭipāṭiyā pāda parimajjaka ādīnam santajjanam tesam tesam ca apagamanena

analyzed: punappunam thokam imassa api punappunam dutiya ādīhi jhānehi vuṭṭhitassa

original: yathāvuttadosānaṃ vicārādīnaṃ asahanena paṭipāṭiyā vicārādidosadassanaṃ. Tesaṃ tesañca

original: pahānā punappunaṃ avitakkaavicāranippītika pahīnasomanassajjhānupagamanaṃ.

original: Tassa pana sayanā vuṭṭhāya rañño santikaṃ gatassa issariyappatti viya imassāpi pañcamajjhānato vuṭṭhitassa vipassanā maggaṃ upagatassa arahattappatti.

original: Tassa pattissariyassa bahūnaṃ janānaṃ avassayabhāvo viya imassāpi arahattappattassa bahūnaṃ avassayabhāvo veditabbo. Ettāvatā hi esa anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ nāma hotīti.
analyzed: tassa pattissariyassa bahūnam janānam avassaya bhāvaḥ viya imassa api arahatta ppattassa bahūnam avassaya bhāvaḥ veditabbo ettāvatā hi esa anuttaram puññakkhettam nāma hoti iti

original: Pañcakanayo niṭṭhito.
analyzed: pañcaka nayaḥ niṭṭhito

original: Ettāvatā catukkapañcakanayadvayabhedo suddhikanavako nāma pakāsito hoti. Atthato panesa pañcakanaye catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā jhānapañcako evāti veditabbo.
analyzed: ettāvatā catukka pañcaka naya dvaya bhedaḥ suddhikanavakaḥ nāma pakāsitaḥ hoti atthataḥ pana esa pañcaka naye catukka nayassa paviṭṭha ttā jhāna pañcakaḥ evā ti veditabbo

original: Paṭipadācatukkaṃ
analyzed: paṭipadā catukkam

original: 176-180. Idāni yasmā etaṃ jhānaṃ nāma paṭipadākamena sijjhati, tasmā tassa paṭipadābhedaṃ
analyzed: idāni yasmai etam jhānam nāma paṭipadā kamena sijjhati tasmai tassa paṭipadā bhedam

original: dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha dukkhā paṭipadā assāti dukkhapaṭipadaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum puna katame dhammā kusala ati ādi āraddham tattha dukkhā paṭipadā assa ati dukkha paṭipadam

original: Dandhā abhiññā assāti dandhābhiññaṃ. Iti dukkhapaṭipadanti vā dandhābhiññanti vā
analyzed: dandhā abhiññā assa ati dandha abhiññam iti dukkha paṭipadanti vā dandha abhiññanti vā

original: pathavīkasiṇanti vā tīṇipi jhānasseva nāmāni. Dukkhapaṭipadaṃ khippābhiññantiādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: vā tīṇi pi jhānassa iva nāmāni dukkha paṭipadam khippābhiññanti ādīsu pi esa iva nayo

original: Tattha paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati
analyzed: tattha paṭhama samannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāram uppajjati

analyzed: tāva pavattā jhāna bhāvanā paṭipadā ti vuccati upacārato pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā

original: tāva pavattā paññā ‘abhiññā’ti vuccati. Sā panesā paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti.
analyzed: tāva pavattā paññā abhiññā iti vuccati sā pana isā paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti

original: Nīvaraṇādipaccanīkadhammasamudācāragahanatāya kicchā asukhasevanāti attho. Ekaccassa
analyzed: nīvaraṇa ādi paccanīka dhamma samudācāra gahana tāya kicchā asukha sevanā ti atthaḥ ekaccassa

original: tadabhāvena sukhā. Abhiññāpi ekaccassa dandhā hoti, mandā, asīghappavatti. Ekaccassa
analyzed: tad abhāvena sukhā abhiññā api ekaccassa dandhā hoti mandā asīgha ppavatti ekaccassa

original: khippā amandā sīghappavatti. Tasmā yo ādito kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena
analyzed: khippā amandā sīgha ppavatti tasmai yaḥ āditas kilese vikkhambhentaḥ dukkhena sa saṅkhārena

original: sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti, tassa dukkhā paṭipadā nāma hoti. Yo pana vikkhambhitakileso
analyzed: sa ppayogena kilamantaḥ vikkhambheti tassa dukkhā paṭipadā nāma hoti yaḥ pana vikkhambhita kileso

original: appanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa dandhābhiññā nāma hoti.
analyzed: appanā parivāsam vasantaḥ cirena aṅga pātubhāvam pāpuṇāti tassa dandhābhiññā nāma hoti

original: Yo khippaṃ aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti tassa khippābhiññā nāma hoti. Yo kilese vikkhambhento
analyzed: yaḥ khippam aṅga pātubhāvam pāpuṇāti tassa khippābhiññā nāma hoti yo kilese vikkhambhento

original: sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti, tassa sukhā paṭipadā nāma hoti.
analyzed: sukhena a kilamantaḥ vikkhambheti tassa sukhā paṭipadā nāma hoti

original: Tattha yāni sappāyāsappāyāni ca palibodhupacchedādīni pubbakiccāni ca appanākosallāni
analyzed: tattha yāni sappāya asappāyāni ca palibodha upaccheda ādīni pubba kiccāni ca appanā kosallāni

original: ca visuddhimagge cittabhāvanāniddese niddiṭṭhāni, tesu yo asappāyasevī hoti, tassa
analyzed: ca visuddhi magge citta bhāvanā niddese niddiṭṭhāni tesu yaḥ asappāya sevī hoti tassa

original: dukkhā paṭipadā dandhā ca abhiññā hoti. Sappāyasevino sukhā paṭipadā khippā ca abhiññā.
analyzed: dukkhā paṭipadā dandhā ca abhiññā hoti sappāya sevino sukhā paṭipadā khippā ca abhiññā

original: Yo pana pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī hoti, pubbabhāge vā sappāyaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ pana pubbabhāge asappāyam sevitvā aparabhāge sappāya sevī hoti pubbabhāge vā sappāyam

original: sevitvā aparabhāge asappāyasevī, tassa vomissakatā veditabbā. Tathā palibodhupacchedādikaṃ
analyzed: sevitvā aparabhāge asappāya sevī tassa vomissaka tā veditabbā tathā pali bodha upaccheda ādikam

original: pubbakiccaṃ asampādetvā bhāvanaṃ anuyuttassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti, vipariyāyena sukhā.
analyzed: pubba kiccam a sampādetvā bhāvanam anuyuttassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti vipariyāyena sukhā

original: Appanākosallāni pana asampādentassa dandhā abhiññā hoti, sampādentassa khippā.
analyzed: appanā kosallāni pana a sampādentassa dandhā abhiññā hoti sampādentassa khippā

original: Apica taṇhāavijjāvasena samathavipassanākatādhikāravasena cāpi etāsaṃ pabhedo veditabbo.
analyzed: apica taṇhā avijjā vasena samatha vipassanā kata adhikāra vasena ca api etāsam pabhedaḥ veditabbo

original: Taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hoti, anabhibhūtassa sukhā. Avijjābhibhūtassa
analyzed: taṇhā abhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hoti an abhibhūtassa sukhā avijjā abhibhūtassa

original: ca dandhā abhiññā hoti, anabhibhūtassa khippā. Yo ca samathe akatādhikāro tassa dukkhā
analyzed: ca dandhā abhiññā hoti an abhibhūtassa khippā yaḥ ca samathe a kata adhikāro tassa dukkhā

original: paṭipadā hoti, katādhikārassa sukhā. Yo pana vipassanāya akatādhikāro hoti, tassa
analyzed: paṭipadā hoti kata adhikārassa sukhā yaḥ pana vipassanāya a kata adhikāraḥ hoti tassa

original: dandhā abhiññā hoti, katādhikārassa khippā.
analyzed: dandhā abhiññā hoti kata adhikārassa khippā

original: Kilesindriyavasena cāpi etāsaṃ pabhedo veditabbo. Tibbakilesassa hi mudindriyassa
analyzed: kilesa indriya vasena ca api etāsam pabhedaḥ veditabbaḥ tibba kilesassa hi mud indriyassa

original: dukkhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā, tikkhindriyassa pana khippā abhiññā. Mandakilesassa
analyzed: dukkhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiñā tikkhindriyassa pana khippā abhiññā manda kilesassa

original: ca mudindriyassa sukhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā, tikkhindriyassa pana khippā abhiññāti.
analyzed: ca mud indriyassa sukhā paṭipadā hoti dandhā ca abhiññā tikkhindriyassa pana khippā abhiññāti

original: Iti imāsu paṭipadāabhiññāsu yo puggalo dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhāya abhiññāya jhānaṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa taṃ jhānaṃ dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññanti vuccati. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: iti imāsu paṭipadā abhiññāsu yaḥ puggalaḥ dukkhāya paṭipadāya dandhāya abhiññāya jhānam pāpuṇāti tassa tam jhānam dukkha paṭipadam dandha abhiññanti vuccati sesesu pi esa eva nayo

original: Tattha ‘tadanudhammatā sati santiṭṭhati ṭhitibhāginī paññā’ti evaṃ vuttasatiyā vā
analyzed: tattha tad anudhamma tā sati santiṭṭhati ṭhiti bhāginī paññā ati evam vutta satiyā vā

original: taṃtaṃjhānanikantiyā vā vikkhambhane paṭipadā, taṃtaṃjhānupacārappattassa appanāya
analyzed: taṃ taṃ jhāna nikantiyāḥ vā vikkhambhane paṭipadā taṃ taṃ jhāna upacāra ppattassa appanāya

original: parivāse abhiññā ca veditabbā. Āgamanavasenāpi ca paṭipadā abhiññā hontiyeva. Dukkhapaṭipadañhi
analyzed: parivāse abhiññā ca veditabbā āgamana vasena api ca paṭipadāḥ abhiññāḥ honti yeva dukkha paṭipadam hi

original: dandhābhiññaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ patvā pavattaṃ dutiyampi tādisameva hoti. Tatiyacatutthesupi
analyzed: dandha abhiññam paṭhama jhānam patvā pavattam dutiyam pi tādisam eva hoti tatiya catutthesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Yathā ca catukkanaye evaṃ pañcakanayepi paṭipadāvasena catudhā bhedo
analyzed: esā iva nayaḥ yathā ca catukka naye evam pañcaka naye pi paṭipadā vasena catudhā bhedaḥ

original: veditabbo. Iti paṭipadāvasenapi cattāro navakā vuttā honti. Tesu pāṭhato chattiṃsa
analyzed: veditabbaḥ iti paṭipadā vasena api cattāraḥ navakāḥ vuttāḥ honti tesu pāṭhato chattiṃsa

original: cittāni, atthato pana pañcakanaye catukkanayassa paviṭṭhattā vīsatimeva bhavantīti.
analyzed: cittāni atthato pana pañcaka naye catukka nayassa paviṭṭhattā vīsatim eva bhavanti iti

original: Paṭipadācatukkaṃ.
analyzed: paṭipadā catukkam

original: Ārammaṇacatukkaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇa catukkam

original: 181. Idāni yasmā etaṃ jhānaṃ nāma yathā paṭipadābhedena evaṃ ārammaṇabhedenāpi catubbidhaṃ
analyzed: idāni yasmai etam jhānam nāma yathā paṭipadā bhedena evam ārammaṇa bhedena api catubbidham

original: hoti. Tasmāssa taṃ pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: hoti tasmā assa tam pabhedam dassetum puna katame dhammā kusala ati ādi āraddham tattha

original: parittaṃ parittārammaṇantiādīsu yaṃ appaguṇaṃ hoti, uparijjhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ
analyzed: parittam paritta ārammaṇa nti ādīsu yam appaguṇam hoti upari jhānassa paccayaḥ bhavitum

original: na sakkoti, idaṃ parittaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana avaḍḍhite suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā ārammaṇe
analyzed: na sakkoti idam parittam nāma yam pana avaḍḍhite su pamatte vā sarāva matte vā ārammaṇe

original: pavattaṃ, taṃ parittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ assāti parittārammaṇaṃ. Yaṃ paguṇaṃ subhāvitaṃ uparijjhānassa

original: Saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ nibbattetīti attho.

original: Parittaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ appamāṇaṃ parittārammaṇanti idha parittānīti āgatattā appamāṇārammaṇatā
analyzed: parittam paritta ārammaṇam appamāṇam paritta ārammaṇam ti idha parittāni iti āgata ttā appamāṇa ārammaṇa tā

original: na gahitā, parato appamāṇānīti āgatattā parittārammaṇatā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vuttaṃ
analyzed: na gahitā paratas appamāṇāni iti āgata ttā paritta ārammaṇa tā aṭṭhakathāyam pana vuttam

original: – ‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne cattāri cattāri ārammaṇāni aggahetvā dve dveva gahitāni. Kiṃ kāraṇā?
analyzed: imasmin ṭhāne cattāri cattāri ārammaṇāni aggahetvā dve dve iva gahitāni kim kāraṇā

original: Catūsu hi gahitesu desanā soḷasakkhattukā hoti, satthārā ca heṭṭhā soḷasakkhattukā
analyzed: catūsu hi gahitesu desanā soḷasa kkhattukā hoti satthārā ca heṭṭhā soḷasa kkhattukā

original: desanā kilañjamhi tile pattharantena viya vitthārato kathitā. Tassa imasmiṃ ṭhāne
analyzed: desanā kilañjamhi tile pattharantena viya vitthārato kathitā tassa imasmin ṭhāne

original: aṭṭhakkhattukaṃ desanaṃ kātuṃ ajjhāsayo. Tasmā dve dveyeva gahitānīti veditabbānīti.
analyzed: aṭṭhakkhattukam desanam kātum tasmā dve dveyā iva gahitāni iti veditabbāni iti

original: Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇāni. Parisuddhāni hi nīlādīni suvaṇṇāni,
analyzed: suvaṇṇa dubbaṇṇāni iti parisuddha a parisuddha vaṇṇāni parisuddhāni hi nīla ādīni suvaṇṇāni

original: aparisuddhāni ca dubbaṇṇānīti idha adhippetāni. Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana ‘suvaṇṇāni
analyzed: aparisuddhāni ca dubbaṇṇāni iti idha adhippetāni āgama aṭṭhakathāsu pana suvaṇṇāni

original: vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā, parittaappamāṇavaseneva imāni abhibhāyatanāni desitānī’ti
analyzed: vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā paritta appamāṇa vasena iva imāni abhibhāyatanāni desitāni iti

original: vuttaṃ. Imesu pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ, appamāṇaṃ mohacaritavasena,
analyzed: vuttam imesu pana catūsu parittam vitakka carita vasena āgatam appamāṇam moha carita vasena

original: suvaṇṇaṃ dosacaritavasena, dubbaṇṇaṃ rāgacaritavasena. Etesañhi etāni sappāyāni.
analyzed: su vaṇṇam dosa carita vasena dubbaṇṇam rāga carita vasena etesam hi etāni sappāyāni

original: Sā ca tesaṃ sappāyatā vitthārato visuddhimagge cariyaniddese vuttā.
analyzed: sā ca tesam sappāya tā vitthārataḥ visuddhi magge cariya niddese vuttā

original: Kasmā pana, yathā suttante “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānī”tiādi
analyzed: kasmā pana yathā suttante ajjhattam rūpa saññī ekaḥ bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni itiādi

original: vuttaṃ, evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttāti?
analyzed: vuttam evam avatvā idha catūsu pi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattam arūpa saññi tā ava vuttā ati

original: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato. Tattha vā hi idha vā bahiddhārūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni,
analyzed: ajjhatta rūpānam tattha vā hi idha vā abhibhavitabbāni

original: tasmā tāni niyamato vattabbānīti tatrapi idhapi vuttāni. Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti idaṃ
analyzed: tasmā tāni niyamataḥ vattabbāni iti tatra api idha api vuttāni ajjhattam arūpa saññi iti idam

original: pana satthu desanāvilāsamattameva. Ayaṃ tāva catūsu abhibhāyatanesu apubbapadavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: pana satthu desanā vilāsa mattam eva ayam tāva catūsu abhibhāyatanesu apubba pada vaṇṇanā

original: Suddhikanayapaṭipadābhedo panettha pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayeneva ekekasmiṃ abhibhāyatane
analyzed: pana ittha pathavī kasiṇe vutta nayena iva ekekasmin

original: veditabbo. Kevalañcettha ārammaṇacatukkaṃ ārammaṇadukaṃ hoti, soḷasakkhattukañca
analyzed: veditabbo kevalam ca ittha ārammaṇa catukkam ārammaṇa dukam hoti soḷasa kkhattukam ca

original: aṭṭhakkhattukaṃ. Sesaṃ tādisameva. Evamettha ekekasmiṃ abhibhāyatane eko suddhikanavako,
analyzed: aṭṭhakkhattukam sesam tādisam eva evam ettha ekekasmin abhibha āyatane ekaḥ suddhika navakaḥ

original: cattāro paṭipadānavakā, dve ārammaṇanavakā, ārammaṇapaṭipadāmissake aṭṭha navakāti
analyzed: cattāro paṭipadā navakā dve ārammaṇa navakā ārammaṇa paṭipad āmissake aṭṭha navakā ati

original: pannarasa navakāti catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu samasaṭṭhi navakā veditabbā.
analyzed: pannarasa navakā ati catūsu pi abhibhāyatanesu samasaṭṭhi navakā veditabbā

original: 246. Pañcamaabhibhāyatanādīsu nīlānīti sabbasaṅgāhikavasena vuttaṃ. Nīlavaṇṇānīti
vaṇṇavasena, nīlanidassanānīti nidassanavasena, apaññāyamānavivarāni, asambhinnavaṇṇāni,
analyzed: vaṇṇa vasena nīla nidassanāni iti nidassana vasena a paññāyamāna vivarāni a sambhinna vaṇṇāni

original: ekanīlāneva hutvā dissantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Nīlanibhāsānīti idaṃ pana obhāsanavasena
analyzed: eka nīlān eva hutvā dissanti iti vuttam hoti nīla nibhāsāni iti idam pana obhāsana vasena

original: vuttaṃ; nīlobhāsāni nīlappabhāyuttānīti attho. Etena nesaṃ suvisuddhataṃ dasseti.
analyzed: vuttam nīla ubhāsāni nīla ppabhā yuttāni iti attho etena nesam su visuddha tam dasseti

original: Suvisuddhavaṇṇavasena hi imāni cattāri abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni. Pītānītiādīsupi imināva
analyzed: su visuddha vaṇṇa vasena hi imāni cattāri abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni pītāni iti ādīsu pi

original: nayena attho veditabbo. Nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti. Pupphasmiṃ
analyzed: nayena atthaḥ veditabbaḥ nīla kasiṇam uggaṇhantaḥ nīlasmin nimittam gaṇhāti pupphasmin

original: vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vātiādikaṃ panettha kasiṇakaraṇañca parikammañca appanāvidhānañca
analyzed: vā vatthasmim vā vaṇṇa dhātuyā vāti ādikam pana ittha kasiṇa karaṇam ca parikammam ca appanā vidhānañca

original: sabbaṃ visuddhimagge vitthārato vuttameva. Yathā ca pathavīkasiṇe evamettha ekekasmiṃ
analyzed: sabbam visuddhi magge vitthārataḥ vuttam eva yathā ca pathavī kasiṇe evam ettha ekekasmin

original: abhibhāyatane pañcavīsati pañcavīsati navakā veditabbā.
analyzed: abhibhāyatane pañcavīsati pañcavīsati navakā veditabbā

original: Abhibhāyatanakathā.
analyzed: abhibhāyatana kathā

original: Vimokkhakathā
analyzed: vimokkha kathā

original: 248. Idāni yasmā idaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ nāma na kevalaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ āyatanānaṃ
analyzed: idāni yasmai idam rūpāvacara kusalam nāma na kevalam ārammaṇa saṅkhātānam

original: abhibhavanato abhibhāyatanavaseneva uppajjati, atha kho vimokkhavasenapi uppajjati,
analyzed: abhibhavanataḥ abhibha āyatana vasena iva uppajjati atha kho vimokkha vasena api uppajjati

original: tasmā tampi nayaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā kusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā tam pi nayam dassetum puna katame dhammā kusala ati ādi āraddham

original: Kenaṭṭhena pana vimokkho veditabboti? Adhimuccanaṭṭhena. Ko ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho
analyzed: kenaṭṭhena pana vimokkhaḥ veditabbaḥ ti adhimuccana ṭṭhena kaḥ ayam adhimuccana ṭṭho

analyzed: nāma paccanīka dhammehi ca suṭṭhu vimuccana aṭṭho ārammaṇe ca abhirati vasena suṭṭhu

original: vimuccanaṭṭho. Pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaaṅgapaccaṅgassa dārakassa sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena
analyzed: vimuccana ṭṭhaḥ pitu aṅke vissaṭṭha aṅga paccaṅgassa dārakassa sayanam viya a niggahita bhāvena

original: nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃlakkhaṇañhi vimokkhabhāvappattaṃ
analyzed: nirāsaṅka tāya ārammaṇe pavatti iti vuttam hoti evaṃlakkhaṇam hi vimokkha bhāva ppattam

original: rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ ayaṃ nayo āraddho.
analyzed: rūpāvacara kusalam dassetum ayam nayaḥ āraddho

original: Tattha rūpīti ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ, tadassatthīti rūpī.
analyzed: tattha rūpī iti ajjhattam kesa ādīsu uppāditam rūpajjhānam rūpam tat assa atthi iti rūpī

original: Ajjhattañhi nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāya vā karoti. Pītaparikammaṃ
analyzed: ajjhattam hi nīla parikammam karontaḥ kese vā pitte vā akkhi tārakāya vā karoti pīta parikammam

original: karonto mede vā chaviyā vā akkhīnaṃ pītaṭṭhāne vā karoti. Lohitaparikammaṃ karonto
analyzed: karontaḥ mede vā chaviyā vā akkhīnam pīta ṭṭhāne vā karoti lohita parikammam karontaḥ

original: maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā hatthatalapādatalesu vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
analyzed: maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā hattha tala pāda talesu vā akkhīnam ratta ṭṭhāne vā karoti

original: Odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti.
analyzed: odāta parikammam karontaḥ aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnam seta ṭṭhāne vā karoti

original: Evaṃ parikammaṃ katvā uppannajjhānasamaṅginaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Rūpāni passatīti

original: bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādirūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati. Iminā ajjhattabahiddhāvatthukesu

original: kasiṇesu jhānapaṭilābho dassito.
analyzed: kasiṇesu jhāna paṭilābho dassito

original: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti ajjhattaṃ na rūpasaññī. Attano kesādīsu anuppāditarūpāvacarajjhānoti attho. Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva paṭiladdhajjhānatā dassitā.
analyzed: ajjhattam arūpa saññī iti ajjhattam na rūpa saññī attano kesa ādīsu anuppādita rūpāvacara jjhāno ti attho iminā bahiddhā parikammam katvā bahiddhā ava paṭiladdha jjhāna tā dassitā

original: Subhanti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu jhānāni dassitāni. Tattha kiñcāpi

analyzed: antoappanāya subham ti ābhogo natthi yaḥ pana su visuddham subha kasiṇam ārammaṇam

analyzed: katvā viharati saḥ yasmai subhantipe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati tathā

analyzed: dutiya ādīni tasmai evam desanā katā paṭisambhidā magge pana katham adhimuttaḥ

original: disaṃ…pe… viharati, upekkhāya bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti, evaṃ subhantveva
analyzed: disaṃpe viharati upekkhāya bhāvita ttā sattāḥ a paṭikūlāḥ honti evam

original: adhimutto hotī”ti vimokkhoti vuttaṃ. Idha pana upari pāḷiyaṃyeva brahmavihārānaṃ
analyzed: adhimuttaḥ hoti iti vimokkho ti vuttam idha pana upari

original: āgatattā taṃ nayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sunīlakasupītakasulohitakasuodātakaparisuddhanīlakaparisuddhapītakaparisuddhalohitakaparisuddhaodātakavaseneva
analyzed: āgata ttā tam nayam paṭikkhipitvā su nīlaka su pītaka su lohitaka su odātaka parisuddha nīlaka parisuddha pītaka parisuddha lohitaka parisuddha odātaka vasena iva

original: subhavimokkho anuññāto. Iti kasiṇanti vā abhibhāyatananti vā vimokkhoti vā rūpāvacarajjhānameva.
analyzed: subha vimokkho anuññātaḥ iti kasiṇanti vā vimokkhoti vā rūpāvacara jhānam eva

original: Tañhi ārammaṇassa sakalaṭṭhena kasiṇaṃ nāma, ārammaṇaṃ abhibhavanaṭṭhena abhibhāyatanaṃ
analyzed: tat hi ārammaṇassa sakala aṭṭhena kasiṇam nāma ārammaṇam abhibhavana ṭṭhena abhibhā āyatanam

analyzed: nāma ārammaṇe adhimuccana ṭhena paccanīka dhammehi ca vimuccana ṭṭhena vimokkhaḥ nāma ati

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha kasiṇadesanā abhidhammavasena, itarā pana suttantadesanāvasena vuttāti

original: Vimokkhakathā.
analyzed: vimokkha kathā

original: Brahmavihārakathā
analyzed: brahmavihāra kathā

original: 251. Idāni mettādibrahmavihāravasena pavattamānaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ dassetuṃ puna

original: Parato karuṇāsahagatādīsupi eseva nayo. Yena panesa vidhānena paṭipanno mettādisahagatāni

original: hotīti ayaṃ viseso. Sesaṃ tādisameva.
analyzed: hoti iti ayam visesaḥ sesam tādisam eva

original: Evaṃ tāva pāḷivaseneva –
analyzed: evam tāva pāḷivasena iva

original: Brahmuttamena kathite, brahmavihāre ime iti viditvā;
analyzed: brahmuttamena kathite brahmavihāre ime iti viditvā

original: Bhiyyo etesu ayaṃ, pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā.
analyzed: bhiyyas etesu ayam pakiṇṇaka kathā api viññeyyā

original: Etāsu hi mettākaruṇāmuditāupekkhāsu atthato tāva mejjatīti mettā, siniyhatīti attho.

original: Mitte vā bhavā, mittassa vā esā pavattatīpi mettā. Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ

original: vā tanti muditā. ‘Averā hontū’tiādibyāpārappahānena majjhattabhāvūpagamanena ca upekkhatīti upekkhā.

original: Lakkhaṇādito panettha hitākārappavattilakkhaṇā ‘mettā’, hitūpasaṃhārarasā, āghātavinayapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āditaḥ pana ittha hita ākāra ppavatti lakkhaṇā mettā hitu upasaṃhāra rasā āghāta vinaya paccupaṭṭhānā

original: sattānaṃ manāpabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā. Byāpādūpasamo etissā sampatti, sinehasambhavo
analyzed: sattānam manāpa bhāva dassana padaṭṭhānā byāpāda upasamaḥ etissā sampatti sineha sambhavaḥ

original: vipatti. Dukkhāpanayanākārappavattilakkhaṇā ‘karuṇā’, paradukkhāsahanarasā, avihiṃsāpaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: vipatti dukkha apanayana ākāra ppavatti lakkhaṇā karuṇā para dukkha asahana rasā avihiṃsā paccupaṭṭhānā

original: dukkhābhibhūtānaṃ anāthabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā. Vihiṃsūpasamo tassā sampatti, sokasambhavo
analyzed: dukkha abhibhūtānam anātha bhāva dassana padaṭṭhānā vihiṃsu upasamaḥ tassā sampatti soka sambhavo

original: vipatti. Sattesu pamodanalakkhaṇā ‘muditā’, anissāyanarasā, arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: vipatti sattesu pamodana lakkhaṇā muditā a nissāyana rasā arati vighāta paccupaṭṭhānā

original: sattānaṃ sampattidassanapadaṭṭhānā. Arativūpasamo tassā sampatti, pahāsasambhavo
analyzed: sattānam sampatti dassana padaṭṭhānā arati vūpasamo tassā sampatti pahāsa sambhavo

original: vipatti. Sattesu majjhattākārappavattilakkhaṇā ‘upekkhā’, sattesu samabhāvadassanarasā,
analyzed: vipatti sattesu majjhatta ākāra ppavatti lakkhaṇā upekkhā sattesu sama bhāva dassana rasā

original: paṭighānunayavūpasamapaccupaṭṭhānā, “kammassakā sattā, te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā
analyzed: paṭigha anunaya vūpasama paccupaṭṭhānā kammassakā sattā te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā

original: bhavissanti, dukkhato vā muccissanti, pattasampattito vā na parihāyissantī”ti? Evaṃ
analyzed: bhavissanti dukkhataḥ vā muccissanti patta sampattitaḥ vā na parihāyissanti iti evam

original: pavattakammassakatādassanapadaṭṭhānā. Paṭighānunayavūpasamo tassā sampatti, gehassitāya
analyzed: pavatta kammassaka tā dassana padaṭṭhānā paṭigha anunaya vūpasamaḥ tassā sampatti geha ssitāya

original: aññāṇupekkhāya sambhavo vipatti.
analyzed: aññāṇupekkhāya sambhavaḥ vipatti

original: Catunnampi panetesaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ vipassanāsukhañceva bhavasampatti ca sādhāraṇappayojanaṃ,
analyzed: catunnam pi pana itesam brahmavihārānam vipassanā sukham ca iva bhava sampatti ca sādhāraṇa payojanam

original: byāpādādipaṭighāto āveṇikaṃ. Byāpādapaṭighātappayojanā hettha mettā, vihiṃsāaratirāgapaṭighātappayojanā
analyzed: byāpāda ādi paṭighātaḥ āveṇikam byāpāda paṭighāta payojanā hettha mettā vihiṃsā arati rāga paṭighāta payojanā

original: itarā. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
analyzed: itarā

original: “Nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, byāpādassa yadidaṃ mettācetovimutti, nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso,
analyzed: nissaraṇam ha etam āvuso byāpādassa yat idam mettā cetaḥ vimutti nissaraṇam ha etam āvuso

original: vihesāya yadidaṃ karuṇācetovimutti; nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, aratiyā yadidaṃ muditācetovimutti,
analyzed: vihesāya yat idam karuṇā cetaḥ vimutti nissaraṇam ha etam āvuso aratiyā yat idam muditā cetaḥ vimutti

original: nissaraṇañhetaṃ, āvuso, rāgassa yadidaṃ upekkhācetovimuttī”ti.
analyzed: nissaraṇam ha etam āvuso rāgassa yat idam upekkhā cetaḥ vimutti iti

original: Ekamekassa cettha āsannadūravasena dve dve paccatthikā. Mettābrahmavihārassa hi,
analyzed: ekam ekassa ca ittha āsanna dūra vasena dve dve paccatthikā mettā brahmavihārassa hi

original: samīpacāro viya purisassa sapatto, guṇadassanasabhāgatāya rāgo āsannapaccatthiko.
analyzed: samīpa cāraḥ viya purisassa sa pattaḥ guṇa dassana sabhā gatāya rāgaḥ āsanna paccatthiko

original: So lahuṃ otāraṃ labhati. Tasmā tato suṭṭhu mettā rakkhitabbā. Pabbatādigahananissito
analyzed: so lahum otāram labhati tasmā tatas suṭṭhu mettā rakkhitabbā pabbata ādi gahana nissito

original: viya purisassa sapatto sabhāvavisabhāgatāya byāpādo dūrapaccatthiko. Tasmā tato nibbhayena
analyzed: viya purisassa sa patto sabhāva visabhā gatāya byāpādaḥ dūra paccatthiko tasmā tatas nibbhayena

original: mettāyitabbaṃ. Mettāyissati ca nāma kopañca karissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
analyzed: mettāyitabbam mettāyissati ca nāma kopam ca karissati iti aṭṭhānam etam

analyzed: karuṇā brahmavihārassa cakkhu viññeyyānam rūpānam iṭṭhānam kantānam manāpānam manoramānam

original: lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ appaṭilābhaṃ vā appaṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ
analyzed: loka āmisa paṭisaṃyuttānam appaṭilābham vā appaṭilābhataḥ samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdha pubbam

original: atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato uppajjati domanassaṃ. Yaṃ evarūpaṃ domanassaṃ
analyzed: atītam niruddham vipariṇatam samanussarato uppajjati domanassam yam evarūpam domanassam

original: idaṃ vuccati gehassitaṃ domanassa”ntiādinā nayena āgataṃ gehassitaṃ domanassaṃ vipattidassanasabhāgatāya
analyzed: idam vuccati gehassitam domanassa nti ādinā nayena āgatam gehassitam domanassam vipatti dassana sabhā gatāya

analyzed: āsanna paccatthikam sabhāva visabhā gatāya vihesā dūra paccatthikā tasmai tatas nibbhayena

original: karuṇāyitabbaṃ. Karuṇañca nāma karissati pāṇiādīhi ca vihesissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
analyzed: karuṇāyitabbam karuṇam ca nāma karissati pāṇi ādīhi ca vihesissati iti aṭṭhānam etam

original: Muditābrahmavihārassa “cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpānaṃ iṭṭhānaṃ kantānaṃ manāpānaṃ manoramānaṃ
analyzed: muditā brahmavihārassa cakkhu viññeyyānam rūpānam iṭṭhānam kantānam manāpānam manoramānam

original: lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ paṭilābhaṃ vā paṭilābhato samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdhapubbaṃ
analyzed: loka āmisa paṭisaṃyuttānam paṭilābham vā paṭilābhataḥ samanupassato pubbe vā paṭiladdha pubbam

original: atītaṃ niruddhaṃ vipariṇataṃ samanussarato uppajjati somanassaṃ. Yaṃ evarūpaṃ somanassaṃ
analyzed: atītam niruddham vipariṇatam samanussarato uppajjati somanassam yam evarūpam somanassam

original: idaṃ vuccati gehassitaṃ somanassa”ntiādinā nayena āgataṃ gehassitaṃ somanassaṃ sampattidassanasabhāgatāya
analyzed: idam vuccati gehassitam somanassa nti ādinā nayena āgatam gehassitam somanassam sampatti dassana sabhā gatāya

original: āsannapaccatthikaṃ. Sabhāvavisabhāgatāya arati dūrapaccatthikā. Tasmā tato nibbhayena
analyzed: āsanna paccatthikam sabhāva visabhā gatāya arati dūra paccatthikā tasmai tatas nibbhayena

original: muditā bhāvetabbā. Pamudito ca nāma bhavissati pantasenāsanesu ca adhikusaladhammesu
analyzed: muditā bhāvetabbā pamuditaḥ ca nāma bhavissati panta senāsanesu ca adhi kusala dhammesu

original: ca ukkaṇṭhissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
analyzed: ca ukkaṇṭhissati iti aṭṭhānam etam

original: Upekkhābrahmavihārassa pana “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa
analyzed: upekkhā brahmavihārassa pana cakkhunā rūpam disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa

original: puthujjanassa anodhijinassa avipākajinassa anādīnavadassāvino assutavato puthujjanassa.
analyzed: puthujjanassa anodhi jinassa avipāka jinassa anādīnava dassāvinaḥ assutavataḥ puthujjanassa

original: Yā evarūpā upekkhā rūpaṃ sā nātivattati. Tasmā sā upekkhā gehassitāti vuccatī”tiādinā
analyzed: yā evarūpā upekkhā rūpam sā na ativattati tasmā sā upekkhā gehassitā ati vuccati itiādinā

analyzed: nayena āgatā gehassitā aññāṇupekkhā dosa guṇānaṃ avicāraṇa vasena sabhā gattā āsanna paccatthikā

original: Sabhāvavisabhāgatāya rāgapaṭighā dūrapaccatthikā. Tasmā tato nibbhayena upekkhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: sabhāva visabhā gatāya rāga paṭighā dūra paccatthikā tasmā tatas nibbhayena upekkhitabbam

original: Upekkhissati ca nāma rajjissati ca paṭihaññissati cāti aṭṭhānametaṃ.
analyzed: upekkhissati ca nāma rajjissati ca paṭihaññissati ca ati aṭṭhānam etam

analyzed: sabbesam pi ca etesam kattu kāma tā chandaḥ ādi nīvaraṇa ādi vikkhambhanam majjham appanā

original: pariyosānaṃ, paññattidhammavasena eko vā satto anekā vā sattā ārammaṇaṃ, upacāre
analyzed: pariyosānam paññatti dhamma vasena ekaḥ vā sattaḥ anekāḥ vā sattā ārammaṇam upacāre

original: vā appanāya vā pattāya ārammaṇavaḍḍhanaṃ.
analyzed: vā appanāya vā pattāya ārammaṇa vaḍḍhanam

analyzed: evam paṭhamam eva ekam āvāsam paricchinditvā tattha sattesu imasmin āvāse

analyzed: sattāḥ averāḥ hontu uti ādinā nayena mettā bhāvetabbā tattha cittam mudum kammaniyam

original: katvā dve āvāsā paricchinditabbā. Tato anukkamena tayo cattāro pañca cha satta aṭṭha
analyzed: katvā dve āvāsā paricchinditabbā tatas anukkamena tayo cattāro pañca cha satta aṭṭha

original: nava dasa, ekā racchā, upaḍḍhagāmo, gāmo, janapado, rajjaṃ, ekā disāti evaṃ yāva
analyzed: nava dasa ekā racchā upaḍḍhagāmaḥ gāmaḥ janapadaḥ rajjam ekā disāti evam yāva

analyzed: ekam cakkavāḷam tatas vā pana bhiyyas tattha tattha sattesu mettā bhāvetabbā tathā

original: karuṇādayoti. Ayamettha ārammaṇavaḍḍhanakkamo.
analyzed: karuṇā ādayaḥ ti ayam ettha ārammaṇa vaḍḍhana kkamaḥ

original: Yathā pana kasiṇānaṃ nissando āruppā, samādhīnaṃ nissando nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ,
analyzed: yathā pana kasiṇānam nissandaḥ āruppā samādhīnam nissandaḥ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam

original: vipassanānaṃ nissando phalasamāpatti, samathavipassanānaṃ nissando nirodhasamāpatti,

original: evaṃ purimabrahmavihārattayassa nissando ettha upekkhābrahmavihāro. Yathā hi thambhe
analyzed: evam purima brahmavihāra ttayassa nissandaḥ ettha upekkhā brahmavihāraḥ yathā hi thambhe

original: purimesu tatiyajjhānaṃ vinā na sakkā catutthaṃ bhāvetuṃ. Kasiṇesu pana uppannatatiyajjhānassapesā
analyzed: purimesu tatiya jhānam vinā na sakkā catuttham bhāvetum kasiṇesu pana uppanna tatiya jhānassa pesā

original: nuppajjati visabhāgārammaṇattāti.
analyzed: nuppajjati visabhāga ārammaṇa ttā ati

original: Ettha siyā – ‘kasmā panetā mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā brahmavihārāti vuccanti? Kasmā
analyzed: ettha siyā kasmā pana itā mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhā brahmavihārā ati vuccanti kasmā

original: ca, catassova? Ko ca etāsaṃ kamo? Vibhaṅge ca kasmā appamaññāti vuttā’ti? Vuccate
analyzed: ca catassā uva kaḥ ca etāsam kamaḥ vibhaṅge ca kasmai appamaññā ati vuttā ati vuccate

analyzed: yoginaḥ hutvā viharanti iti seṭṭha ṭṭhena niddosa bhāvena ca brahmavihārā ati vuccanti

original: Kasmā ca catassotiādipañhassa pana idaṃ vissajjanaṃ –
analyzed: kasmā ca catasso ti ādi pañhassa pana idam vissajjanam

original: Visuddhimaggādivasā catasso,
analyzed: visuddhi magga ādivasā catasso

original: Hitādiākāravasā panāsaṃ;
analyzed: hita ādi ākāra vasā panāsam

original: Kamo pavattanti ca appamāṇe,
analyzed: kamaḥ pavattanti ca appamāṇe

original: Tā gocare yena tadappamaññā.
analyzed: tāḥ gocare yena tat appamaññā

original: Etāsu hi yasmā mettā byāpādabahulassa, karuṇā vihiṃsābahulassa, muditā aratibahulassa,
analyzed: etāsu hi yasmā mettā byāpāda bahulassa karuṇā vihiṃsā bahulassa muditā arati bahulassa

original: upekkhā rāgabahulassa visuddhimaggo; yasmā ca hitūpasaṃhāraahitāpanayanasampattimodanaanābhogavasena

analyzed: catubbidhaḥ yā iva sattesu manasikāraḥ yasmā ca yathā mātā dahara gilāna yobbana ppatta sa kicca pasutesu

original: yobbanasampattiyā ciraṭṭhitikāmā, sakiccapasutassa kismiñcipi pariyāye abyāvaṭā hoti,

original: catassova appamaññā.
analyzed: catasso uva appamaññā

original: Yasmā pana catassopetā bhāvetukāmena paṭhamaṃ hitākārappavattivasena sattesu paṭipajjitabbaṃ,

original: ajjhupekkhakatāsaṅkhātena majjhattākārena paṭipajjitabbaṃ, majjhattākārappavattilakkhaṇā

original: upekkhāti ayaṃ kamo veditabbo.
analyzed: upekkhā ti ayam kamaḥ veditabbo

analyzed: yasmā pana sabba apetāḥ appamāṇe gocare pavattanti tasmā appamaññā iti vuccanti appamāṇā

original: evaṃ pamāṇaṃ aggahetvā sakalapharaṇavaseneva pavattāti, tena vuttaṃ –

original: Visuddhimaggādivasā catasso,
analyzed: visuddhi magga ādivasā catasso

original: Hitādiākāravasā panāsaṃ;
analyzed: hita ādi ākāra vasā panāsam

original: Kamo pavattanti ca appamāṇe,
analyzed: kamaḥ pavattanti ca appamāṇe

original: Tā gocare yena tadappamaññāti.
analyzed: tāḥ gocare yena tat appamaññāti

original: Evaṃ appamāṇagocaratāya ekalakkhaṇāsu cāpi etāsu purimā tisso tikacatukkajjhānikāva

original: rūpe saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena vuttarūpāvacarajjhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: rūpe saññā rūpa saññā ati evam saññā sīsena vutta rūpāvacara jhānassa itam adhivacanam

original: Rūpaṃ saññā assāti rūpasaññaṃ, rūpamassa nāmanti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa

analyzed: tad ārammaṇassa ca itam adhivacanan ti veditabbam

original: Samatikkamāti virāgā nirodhā ca. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Etāsaṃ kusalavipākakiriyavasena
analyzed: virāgā nirodhā ca kim vuttam hoti etāsam kusala vipāka kiriya vasena

original: ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ, sabbākārena anavasesānaṃ vā virāgā ca nirodhā ca
analyzed: ārammaṇa saṅkhātānam rūpa saññānam sabba ākārena anavasesānam vā virāgā ca nirodhā ca

analyzed: ārammaṇam samatikkantam eva hoti tasmai ārammaṇa samatikkamam avatvā tattha katamā

analyzed: rūpa saññā rūpāvacara samāpattim samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārissa

analyzed: vā saññā sañjānanā sañjāni tattaṃ imāḥ vuccanti rūpa saññāyaḥ imāḥ rūpa saññāyaḥ atikkanto

analyzed: hoti vītikkantaḥ samatikkantaḥ tena vuccati sabbaso rūpa saññānam samatikkama ati

analyzed: attha vaṇṇanā katā iti veditabbā

analyzed: samuppannā saññā paṭigha saññā rūpa saññā ādīnam etam adhivacanam yathā āha tattha

original: Tasmā tā ettha pahīnāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. Na kevalañca vattuṃ, ekaṃseneva evaṃ dhāretumpi

analyzed: nānatta saññānam a manasikārā ati nānatte gocare pavattānam saññānam nānattānam vā saññānam

original: tasmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tasmā iti vuttam hoti

analyzed: nava kiriyā saññā dasa akusala saññā ati imā sattavīsati saññā iminā jhānena nibbatte

original: Yathā pana aññattha ‘ananto ākāso’ti vuttaṃ, evamidha anantanti vā parittanti vā
analyzed: yathā pana aññattha anantaḥ ākāso ti vuttam evam idha anantanti vā parittanti vā

original: na gahitaṃ. Kasmā? Anante hi gahite parittaṃ na gayhati, paritte gahite anantaṃ na
analyzed: na gahitam kasmai anante hi gahite parittam na paritte gahite anantam na

original: gayhati. Evaṃ sante ārammaṇacatukkaṃ na pūrati, desanā soḷasakkhattukā na hoti. Sammāsambuddhassa

original: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā nayā gaṇetabbā. Sabbapaṭhamaṃ vibhatto hi eko nayo, hīnanti

original: eko, majjhimanti eko, paṇītanti eko, chandādhipateyyanti eko. Ime tāva chandādhipateyye

original: pañca nayā. Evaṃ vīriyādhipateyyādīsupīti cattāro pañcakā vīsati honti. Purimo vā

analyzed: tebhūmaka kusalam

277. Evaṃ bhavattayasampattinibbattakaṃ kusalaṃ dassetvā idāni sabbabhavasamatikkamanāya

analyzed: vipassanā nikantim pariyādiyamānaḥ dukkhena kasirena kilamantaḥ pariyādiyati nikantiñca

original: pariyādiyitvā vipassanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena maggaṃ uppādeti, evampi dukkhā paṭipadā
analyzed: pariyādiyitvā vipassanā parivāsam vasantaḥ cirena maggam uppādeti evam pi dukkhā paṭipadā

original: dandhābhiññā nāma hoti. Imaṃ vāraṃ rocesuṃ. Imassa vārassa etaṃ nāmaṃ kataṃ. Imināva
analyzed: dandhābhiññā nāma hoti imam vāram rocesuṃ imassa vārassa etam nāmam katam iminā āva

original: upāyena parato tisso paṭipadā veditabbā.
analyzed: upāyena paratas tisso paṭipadā veditabbā

original: Phasso hotītiādīsu anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvoti
analyzed: phassaḥ hoti itiādīsu anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam sammā vācā sammā kammanto sammā ājīvo ti

original: cattāri padāni adhikāni. Niddesavāre ca vitakkādiniddesesu ‘maggaṅga’ntiādīni padāni
analyzed: cattāri padāni adhikāni niddesa vāre ca vitakka ādi niddesesu maggaṅganti ādīni padāni

original: adhikāni. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttasadisameva. Bhūmantaravasena pana lokuttaratāva idha viseso.

original: Tattha anaññātaññassāmītindriyanti ‘anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭe anaññātaṃ amataṃ padaṃ

original: catusaccadhammameva vā jānissāmī’ti paṭipannassa iminā pubbābhogena uppannaṃ indriyaṃ.
analyzed: catu sacca dhammam eva vā jānissāmi iti paṭipannassa iminā pubbābhogena uppannam indriyam

original: Lakkhaṇādīni panassa heṭṭhā paññindriye vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ādīni panassa heṭṭhā paññindriye vutta nayena iva veditabbāni

original: Sundarā pasatthā vā vācā sammāvācā. Vacīduccaritasamugghāṭikāya micchāvācāviratiyā
analyzed: sundarā pasatthā vā vācā sammā vācā vacī duccarita samugghāṭikāya micchā vācā viratiyā

original: etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sā pariggahalakkhaṇā viramaṇarasā micchāvācappahānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: etam adhivacanam sā pariggaha lakkhaṇā viramaṇa rasā micchā vāca ppahāna paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Sundaro pasattho vā kammanto sammākammanto. Micchākammantasamucchedikāya pāṇātipātādiviratiyā
analyzed: sundaraḥ pasatthaḥ vā kammanto sammākammanto micchākammanta samucchedikāya pāṇātipāta ādi viratiyā

analyzed: ñāyājīva ppavatti rasaḥ micchājīva ppahāna paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Apica heṭṭhā viratittaye vuttavasenapettha lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni. Iti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ

analyzed: ca imesam abhāvaḥ ime hi tayaḥ dhammā idha

original: yevāpanakesu na gahitā. Karuṇāmuditā pana sattārammaṇā, ime dhammā nibbānārammaṇāti
analyzed: na gahitā karuṇā muditā pana satta ārammaṇāḥ ime dhammāḥ nibbāna ārammaṇā ti

analyzed: tā pā ittha na gahitāḥ ayam tāva uddesa vāre visesa ttho

original: 283. Niddesavāre pana maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpannanti ettha tāva maggassa aṅganti maggaṅgaṃ;
analyzed: niddesa vāre pana maggaṅgam magga pariyāpannanti ettha tāva maggassa aṅgam ti maggaṅgam

analyzed: magga koṭṭhāsaḥ ti attho yathā pana araññe pariyāpannam arañña pariyāpannam nāma hoti

analyzed: evam magge pariyāpannanti magga pariyāpannam magga sannissitanti attho

original: 285. Pītisambojjhaṅgoti ettha pīti eva sambojjhaṅgoti pītisambojjhaṅgo. Tattha bodhiyā
analyzed: pīti sambojjhaṅgo ti ettha pīti eva sambojjhaṅgo ti pīti sambojjhaṅgo tattha bodhiyā

analyzed: bodhissa vā aṅgaḥ iti bojjhaṅgo idam vuttam hoti yā ayam dhamma sāmaggī yāya lokuttara magga kkhaṇe

original: uppajjamānāya līnuddhaccapatiṭṭhānāyūhanakāmasukhattakilamathānuyogaucchedasassatābhinivesādīnaṃ
analyzed: uppajjamānāya

original: anekesaṃ upaddavānaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtāya satidhammavicayavīriyapītipassaddhisamādhiupekkhāsaṅkhātāya
analyzed: anekesam upaddavānam paṭipakkha bhūtāya sati dhamma vicaya vīriya pīti passaddhi samādhi upekkhā saṅkhātāya

original: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhatīti katvā bodhīti vuccati. Bujjhatīti kilesasantānaniddāya
analyzed: dhamma sāmaggiyā ariya sāvakaḥ bujjhati iti katvā bodhi iti vuccati bujjhati iti kilesa santāna niddāya

analyzed: uṭṭhahati cattāri vā ariya saccāni paṭivijjhati nibbānam eva vā sacchikaroti tassā

analyzed: bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgā ati vā bojjhaṅgā ati

original: Apica “bojjhaṅgāti kenaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgā? Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgā, bujjhantīti

analyzed: bojjhaṅgāḥ anubujjhanti iti bojjhaṅgāḥ paṭibujjhanti iti bojjhaṅgā sambujjhanti iti bojjhaṅgā ati

analyzed: iminā paṭisambhidā nayena api bojjhaṅga ttho veditabbo pasatthaḥ sundaraḥ vā bojjhaṅgo ti

analyzed: sambojjhaṅgaḥ evam pīti eva sambojjhaṅgaḥ pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ iti citta ekagga tā niddesa ādīsu pi

analyzed: iminā ava nayena atthaḥ veditabbo

original: 296. Tesaṃ dhammānanti ye tasmiṃ samaye paṭivedhaṃ gacchanti catusaccadhammā, tesaṃ
analyzed: tesam ye tasmin samaye paṭivedham gacchanti catu sacca dhammā tesam

original: dhammānaṃ. Anaññātānanti kiñcāpi paṭhamamaggena te dhammā ñātā nāma honti, yathā
analyzed: dhammānam anaññātānam ti kiñcā api paṭhama maggena te dhammāḥ ñātāḥ nāma honti yathā

original: pana pakatiyā anāgatapubbaṃ vihāraṃ āgantvā vihāramajjhe ṭhitopi puggalo pakatiyā
analyzed: pana pakatiyā anāgata pubbam vihāram āgantvā vihāra majjhe ṭhitaḥ api puggalaḥ pakatiyā

analyzed: bhojanam bhuñjitvā pakatiyā a bhutta bhāvam upādāya a bhutta pubbam bhojanam bhuttaḥ ahmi iti

analyzed: vuttam adiṭṭha ādīsu pi esa eva nayaḥ tattha adiṭṭhānam ti itas pubbe paññācakkhunā adiṭṭhānam

original: Appattānanti adhigamanavasena appattānaṃ. Aviditānanti ñāṇena apākaṭakatānaṃ. Asacchikatānanti
analyzed: appattānam ti adhigamana vasena appattānam aviditānam ti ñāṇena apākaṭakatānam a sacchikatānam

analyzed: evam sesehi pi saddhim anaññātānam ñāṇāya a diṭṭhānam dassanāya appattānam pattiyā

original: aviditānaṃ vedāyāti yojanā kātabbā.
analyzed: vedāya ati yojanā kātabbā

original: 299. Catūhi vacīduccaritehītiādīsu vacīti vacīviññatti veditabbā. Tiṇṇaṃ dosānaṃ
analyzed: catūhi vacī duccaritehi itiādīsu vacī iti vacī viññatti veditabbā tiṇṇam dosānam

original: yena kenaci duṭṭhāni caritānīti duccaritāni. Vacīto pavattāni duccaritāni vacīduccaritāni,
analyzed: yena kenacid duṭṭhāni caritāni iti duccaritāni vacītas pavattāni duccaritāni vacī duccaritāni

original: vaciyā vā nipphāditāni duccaritāni vacīduccaritāni. Tehi vacīduccaritehi. Ārakā ramatīti
analyzed: vaciyā vā nipphāditāni duccaritāni vacī duccaritāni tehi vacī duccaritehi ārakā ramati iti

original: ārati. Vinā tehi ramatīti virati. Tato tato paṭinivattāva hutvā tehi vinā ramatīti
analyzed: vinā tehi ramati iti virati tatas tatas paṭinivattā ava hutvā tehi vinā ramati iti

analyzed: paṭivirati upasagga vasena vā padam vaḍḍhitam sabbam idam oramaṇa bhāvassa iva adhivacanam

original: Veraṃ maṇati, vināsetīti veramaṇī. Idampi oramaṇasseva vevacanaṃ. Yāya pana cetanāya
analyzed: veram maṇati vināseti iti veramaṇī idam pi oramaṇassa iva vevacanam yāya pana cetanāya

original: musāvādādīni bhāsamāno karoti nāma, ayaṃ lokuttaramaggavirati. Uppajjitvā taṃ kiriyaṃ
analyzed: musāvāda ādīni bhāsamāno karoti nāma ayam lokuttara magga virati uppajjitvā tam kiriyam

original: kātuṃ na deti, kiriyāpathaṃ pacchindatīti akiriyā. Tathā taṃ karaṇaṃ kātuṃ na deti,
analyzed: kātum na deti kiriyā patham pacchindati iti akiriyā tathā tam karaṇam kātum na deti

original: karaṇapathaṃ pacchindatīti akaraṇaṃ. Yāya ca cetanāya catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ
analyzed: karaṇa patham pacchindati iti a karaṇam yāya ca cetanāya catubbidham vacīt uccaritam

original: bhāsamāno ajjhāpajjati nāma, ayaṃ uppajjitvā tathā ajjhāpajjituṃ na detīti anajjhāpatti.
analyzed: bhāsamānaḥ ajjhāpajjati nāma ayam uppajjitvā tathā ajjhāpajjitum na deti iti anajjhāpatti

original: Velāanatikkamoti ettha “tāya velāyā”tiādīsu tāva kālo velāti āgato. “Uruvelāyaṃ viharatī”ti
analyzed: velā anatikkamaḥ ti ettha tāya velāya ati ādīsu kālaḥ āgataḥ uru velāyam viharati iti

original: ettha rāsi. “Ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattatī”ti ettha sīmā. Idhāpi sīmāva. Anatikkamanīyaṭṭhena
analyzed: ettha rāsi ṭhita dhammaḥ velam na ativattati iti ettha sīmā idha api sīmā āva an atikkamanīya ṭṭhena

original: hi cattāri vacīsucaritāni velāti adhippetāni. Iti yāya cetanāya cattāri vacīduccaritāni
analyzed: hi cattāri vacī su caritāni adhippetāni iti yāya cetanāya cattāri vacī duccaritāni

original: bhāsamāno velaṃ atikkamati nāma, ayaṃ uppajjitvā taṃ velaṃ atikkamituṃ na detīti
analyzed: bhāsamānaḥ velam atikkamati nāma ayam uppajjitvā tam velam atikkamitum na deti iti

original: velāanatikkamoti vuttā. Velāyatīti vā velā, calayati viddhaṃsetīti attho. Kiṃ velāyati?
analyzed: velā anatikkamaḥ ti vuttā velāyati iti vā velā calayati viddhaṃseti iti attho kim velāyati

original: Catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ. Iti velāyanato ‘velā’. Purisassa pana hitasukhaṃ anatikkamitvā
analyzed: catubbidham vacīduccaritam iti velāyanataḥ velā purisassa pana hita sukham an atikkamitvā

original: vattatīti ‘anatikkamo’. Evamettha padadvayavasenāpi attho veditabbo.
analyzed: vattati iti anatikkamaḥ evam ettha pada dvaya vasena api atthaḥ veditabbo

original: Setuṃ hanatīti setughāto; catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ padaghāto paccayaghātoti attho.
analyzed: setum hanati iti setu ghāto catunnam vacīduccaritānam pada ghāto paccaya ghāto ti attho

original: Paccayo hi idha setūti adhippeto. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – rāgādiko catunnaṃ vacīduccaritānaṃ
analyzed: paccayaḥ hi idha setu uti adhippeto tatra ayam vacana atthaḥ rāga ādiko catunnam

original: paccayo vaṭṭasmiṃ puggalaṃ sinoti bandhatīti setu. Setussa ghāto setughāto. Vacīduccaritapaccayasamugghāṭikāya
analyzed: paccayaḥ vaṭṭasmim puggalam sinoti bandhati iti setu setussa ghāto setu ghāto vacī duccarita paccaya samugghāṭikāya

original: viratiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Ayaṃ pana sammāvācāsaṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānācittesu
analyzed: viratiyāḥ etam adhivacanam ayam pana sammāvācā saṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānā cittesu

original: labbhati. Aññeneva hi cittena musāvādā viramati, aññena pesuññādīhi. Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe
analyzed: labbhati aññena iva hi cittena musāvādāḥ viramati aññena pesuñña ādīhi lokuttara magga kkhaṇe

original: pana ekacittasmiṃyeva labbhati. Catubbidhāya hi vacīduccaritacetanāya padapacchedaṃ
analyzed: pana eka cittasmin yā iva labbhati catubbidhāya hi vacī duccarita cetanāya pada pacchedam

original: kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjati.
analyzed: kurumānā maggaṅgam pūrayamānā ekā ava virati uppajjati

original: 300. Kāyaduccaritehīti kāyato pavattehi kāyena vā nipphāditehi pāṇātipātādīhi duccaritehi.
analyzed: kāya duccaritehi iti kāyataḥ pavattehi kāyena vā nipphāditehi pāṇa atipāta ādīhi duccaritehi

original: Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayampi sammākammantasaṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānācittesu
analyzed: sesam purima nayena iva veditabbam ayam pi sammākammanta saṅkhātā virati pubbabhāge nānā cittesu

original: labbhati. Aññeneva hi cittena pāṇātipātā viramati, aññena adinnādānamicchācārehi.
analyzed: labbhati aññena iva hi cittena pāṇa atipātāḥ viramati aññena adinnādānam icchā ācārehi

original: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe pana ekacittasmiṃyeva labbhati. Tividhāya hi kāyaduccaritacetanāya
analyzed: lokuttara magga kkhaṇe pana eka cittasmin yeva labbhati tividhāya hi kāya duccarita cetanāya

original: padapacchedaṃ kurumānā maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā ekāva virati uppajjati.
analyzed: pada pacchedam kurumānā maggaṅgam pūrayamānā ekā ava virati uppajjati

original: 301. Sammāājīvaniddese akiriyātiādīsu yāya cetanāya micchājīvaṃ ājīvamāno kiriyaṃ
analyzed: sammāājīva niddese akiriya ati ādīsu yāya cetanāya micchājīvam ājīvamāno kiriyaṃ

original: karoti nāma, ayaṃ uppajjitvā taṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ na detīti akiriyāti. Iminā nayena
analyzed: karoti nāma ayam uppajjitvā tam kiriyam kātum na deti iti akiriyā ati iminā nayena

original: yojanā veditabbā. Ājīvo ca nāmesa pāṭiyekko natthi, vācākammantesu gahitesu gahitova
analyzed: yojanā veditabbā ājīvaḥ ca nāma isa pāṭiyekkaḥ natthi vācā kammantesu gahitesu gahitaḥ uva

original: hoti, tappakkhikattā. Dhuvapaṭisevanavasena panāyaṃ tato nīharitvā dassitoti. Evaṃ
analyzed: hoti tad pakkhika ttā dhuva paṭisevana vasena pana ayam tatas nīharitvā dassitaḥ ti evam

analyzed: pana rāga ādi nimittānam nicca nimitta ādīnam ca abhāvena sarasataḥ va nāmam labhati no paccanīkato

original: Na hi so saṅkhāranimittārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkho. Aniccānupassanā panassa
analyzed: na hi so saṅkhāra nimitta ārammaṇāya anicca anupassanāya paṭipakkhaḥ anicca anupassanā pana assa

original: anulomabhāve ṭhitāti. Sabbathāpi abhidhammapariyāyena animittamaggo nāma natthīti.
analyzed: anuloma bhāve ṭhitā ati sabbathā api abhidhamma pariyāyena animitta maggaḥ nāma natthi iti

original: Suttantikapariyāyena panesa evaṃ āharitvā dīpito – yasmiñhi vāre maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti,
analyzed: suttantika pariyāyena pana isaḥ evam āharitvā dīpitaḥ yasmin hi vāre magga vuṭṭhānam hoti

original: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni ekāvajjanena viya āpāthamāgacchanti, tiṇṇañca ekato āpāthagamanaṃ
analyzed: tīṇi lakkhaṇāni eka āvajjanena viya āpātham āgacchanti tiṇṇam ca ekatas āpātha gamanam

original: nāma natthi. Kammaṭṭhānassa pana vibhūtabhāvadīpanatthaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. Ādito hi yattha
analyzed: nāma natthi kammaṭṭhānassa pana vibhūta bhāva dīpana attham evam vuttam āditas hi yattha

original: katthaci abhiniveso hotu, vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā yaṃ yaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti
analyzed: katthaci abhinivesaḥ hotu vuṭṭhāna gāminī pana vipassanā yam yam sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti

original: tassa tasseva vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti. Kathaṃ? Aniccādīsu
analyzed: tassa tassa iva vasena āgamanīya ṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attanaḥ maggassa nāmam deti katham anicca ādīsu

original: hi yattha katthaci abhinivisitvā itarampi lakkhaṇadvayaṃ daṭṭhuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Ekalakkhaṇadassanamatteneva
analyzed: hi yattha katthaci abhinivisitvā itaram pi lakkhaṇa dvayam daṭṭhum vaṭṭati eva eka lakkhaṇa dassana mattena iva

original: hi maggavuṭṭhānaṃ nāma na hoti, tasmā aniccato abhiniviṭṭho bhikkhu na kevalaṃ aniccatova
analyzed: hi magga vuṭṭhānam nāma na hoti tasmai aniccataḥ abhiniviṭṭhaḥ bhikkhu na kevalam aniccataḥ va

original: vuṭṭhāti, dukkhatopi anattatopi vuṭṭhātiyeva. Dukkhato anattato abhiniviṭṭhepi eseva

original: nayo. Iti ādito yattha katthaci abhiniveso hotu, vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā yaṃ

original: yaṃ sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti tassa tasseva vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa
analyzed: yam sammasitvā vuṭṭhāti tassa tassa iva vasena āgamanīya ṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attanaḥ maggassa

original: nāmaṃ deti. Tattha aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animitto nāma hoti, dukkhato vuṭṭhahantassa
analyzed: nāmam deti tattha aniccataḥ vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animittaḥ nāma hoti dukkhataḥ vuṭṭhahantassa

original: appaṇihito, anattato vuṭṭhahantassa suññatoti. Evaṃ suttantapariyāyena āharitvā dīpito.
analyzed: appaṇihitaḥ anattataḥ vuṭṭhahantassa suññato ti evam suttanta pariyāyena āharitvā dīpitaḥ

original: Vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā kimārammaṇāti? Lakkhaṇārammaṇāti. Lakkhaṇaṃ nāma paññattigatikaṃ
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna gāminī pana vipassanā kimārammaṇā ati lakkhaṇa ārammaṇā ati lakkhaṇam nāma paññatti gatikam

original: na vattabbadhammabhūtaṃ. Yo pana aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkheti,
analyzed: na vattabba dhamma bhūtam yaḥ pana aniccam dukkham anattā ti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkheti

original: tassa pañcakkhandhā kaṇṭhe baddhakuṇapaṃ viya honti. Saṅkhārārammaṇameva ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārato

original: vuṭṭhāti. Yathā hi eko bhikkhu pattaṃ kiṇitukāmo pattavāṇijena pattaṃ ābhataṃ disvā
analyzed: vuṭṭhāti yathā hi ekaḥ bhikkhu pattam kiṇitu kāmo patta vāṇijena pattam ābhatam disvā

original: haṭṭhapahaṭṭho gaṇhissāmīti cintetvā vīmaṃsamāno tīṇi chiddāni passeyya, so na chiddesu
analyzed: haṭṭha pahaṭṭhaḥ gaṇhissāmi iti cintetvā vīmaṃsamānaḥ tīṇi chiddāni passeyya saḥ na chiddesu

original: nirālayo hoti, patte pana nirālayo hoti; evameva tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkhetvā saṅkhāresu
analyzed: nirālayaḥ hoti patte pana nirālayaḥ hoti evam eva tīṇi lakkhaṇāni sallakkhetvā saṅkhāresu

original: nirālayo hoti. Saṅkhārārammaṇeneva ñāṇena saṅkhārato vuṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ. Dussopamāyapi eseva nayo.
analyzed: nirālayaḥ hoti saṅkhāra ārammaṇena iva ñāṇena saṅkhārataḥ vuṭṭhāti iti veditabbam esa iva nayo

original: Iti bhagavā lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhājento suddhikapaṭipadāya catukkanayaṃ pañcakanayanti
analyzed: iti bhagavā lokuttaram jhānam suddhika paṭipadāya catukka nayam pañcaka nayanti

original: dvepi naye āhari. Tathā suddhikasuññatāya suññatapaṭipadāya suddhikaappaṇihitāya
analyzed: dve api naye tathā suddhika suññatāya suññata paṭipadāya suddhika appaṇihitāya

original: appaṇihitapaṭipadāyāti. Kasmā evaṃ āharīti? Puggalajjhāsayena ceva desanāvilāsena

original: ca. Tadubhayampi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetīti
analyzed: ca tat ubhayam pi heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbam evam lokuttaram jhānam bhāveti iti

original: ettha suddhikapaṭipadāya catukkapañcakavasena dve nayā, tathā sesesūti sabbesupi
analyzed: ettha suddhika paṭipadāya catukka pañcaka vasena dve nayā tathā sesesu iti sabbesu pi

original: pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu dasa nayā bhājitā.
analyzed: pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu dasa nayāḥ bhājitā

original: Lokuttarakusalaṃ pakiṇṇakakathā
analyzed: lokuttara kusalam pakiṇṇaka kathā

original: Tatridaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ –
analyzed: tatra idam pakiṇṇakam

original: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, rūpārūpesu pañcasu;
analyzed: ajjhattam ca bahiddhā ca rūpa arūpesu pañcasu

original: Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāmaṃ, nimittaṃ paṭipadāpatīti.
analyzed: satta ṭṭhaṅga pariṇāmam nimittam paṭipadā apati iti

original: Lokuttaramaggo hi ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhāti, ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā

original: ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhāti. Rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti, rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: ajjhattam vuṭṭhāti rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti

original: pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti.
analyzed: pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti

original: ‘Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāma’nti so panesa maggo aṭṭhaṅgikopi hoti sattaṅgikopi. Bojjhaṅgāpi
analyzed: satta ṭṭhaṅga pariṇāmanti so pana esa maggo aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ api hoti sattaṅgikaḥ api bojjhaṅgā api

analyzed: vā duvaṅgikam vā evam satta aṭṭha ādīnam aṅgānam pariṇāmaḥ veditabbaḥ iti attho

original: ‘Nimittaṃ paṭipadāpatī’ti nimittanti yato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti; ‘paṭipadāpatī’ti paṭipadāya ca adhipatino ca calanācalanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: nimittam paṭipadā pati iti nimittam ti yatas vuṭṭhānam hoti paṭipadā pati iti paṭipadāya ca adhipatino ca calana acalanam veditabbaṃ

original: Tattha ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā ajjhattaṃ vuṭṭhātītiādīsu tāva idhekacco āditova ajjhattaṃ

analyzed: pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisati abhinivisitvā te anicca āditas passati yasmā pana na

analyzed: vipassanā maggena saddhim ghaṭiyati evam ajjhattam abhinivisitvā ajjhattam vuṭṭhāti

analyzed: nāma sace panassa bahiddhā sammasana kāle vipassanā maggena saddhim ghaṭiyati evam

original: bahiddhā ca ajjhattañca vuṭṭhānepi.
analyzed: bahiddhā ca ajjhattam ca vuṭṭhāne pi

original: Aparo āditova rūpe abhinivisati abhinivisitvā bhūtarūpañca upādārūpañca paricchinditvā
analyzed: rūpe abhinivisati abhinivisitvā bhūta rūpam ca upādā rūpam ca paricchinditvā

analyzed: anicca āditas passati yasmā pana na suddha rūpa dassana mattena iva vuṭṭhānam hoti arūpam pi

analyzed: idam arūpanti paricchinditvā anicca āditas passati so kālena rūpam sammasati kālena

analyzed: arūpam tassa ivam sammasataḥ rūpa sammasana kāle vipassanā maggena saddhim ghaṭiyati

analyzed: evam rūpe abhinivisitvā rūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma sace panassa arūpa sammasana kāle vipassanā

analyzed: maggena saddhim evam rūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā vuṭṭhāti nāma esa nayo

original: arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā ca rūpā ca vuṭṭhānepi.
analyzed: arūpe abhinivisitvā arūpā ca rūpā ca vuṭṭhāne pi

original: “Yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti evaṃ abhinivisitvā evameva
analyzed: yaṃ kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tat nirodha dhamman ti evam abhinivisitvā evam eva

analyzed: vuṭṭhāna kāle pana eka ppahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāma ati ayam tikkha vipassakassa

analyzed: mahā paññassa bhikkhuno vipassanā

original: Yathā hi chātajjhattassa purisassa majjhe gūthapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā nānaggarasabhojanapuṇṇaṃ

analyzed: pātim upaneyyum tam gūtha piṇḍam disvā kim idanti

original: pucchitvā gūthapiṇḍoti vutte ‘dhi dhi, apanethā’ti bhattepi pātiyampi nirālayo hoti.
analyzed: pucchitvā gūtha piṇḍaḥ iti vutte dhi dhi apanetha ati bhatte pi pātiyam pi nirālayaḥ hoti

original: Evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: evaṃsampadam idam daṭṭhabbam

original: Bhojanapātidassanasmiñhi tassa attamanakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno bālaputhujjanakāle
analyzed: bhojana pāti dassanasmin hi tassa attamana kālaḥ viya imassa bhikkhunaḥ bāla puthujjana kāle

original: pañcakkhandhe ‘ahaṃ mamā’ti gahitakālo. Gūthapiṇḍassa diṭṭhakālo viya tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ

original: bhikkhuno “yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma”nti pañcahi khandhehi
analyzed: bhikkhuno yaṃ kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tat nirodha dhamman ti pañcahi khandhehi

original: ekappahārena vuṭṭhitakālo veditabbo.
analyzed: eka ppahārena vuṭṭhita kālaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: ‘Sattaṭṭhaṅgapariṇāma’nti ettha ayaṃ vuttappabhedo aṅgapariṇāmo yathā hoti tathā
analyzed: satta ṭṭhaṅga pariṇāmanti ettha ayam vutta ppabhedaḥ aṅga pariṇāmaḥ yathā hoti tathā

original: veditabbo. Saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇameva hi ariyamaggassa bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgavisesaṃ
analyzed: veditabbaḥ saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam eva hi ariya maggassa bojjhaṅga magga aṅga jhāna aṅga visesam

original: niyameti. Keci pana therā ‘bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgavisesaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ niyametī’ti
analyzed: niyameti keci pana therāḥ bojjhaṅga maggaṅga jhānaṅga visesam pādaka jjhānam niyameti iti

analyzed: vadanti keci vipassanāya ārammaṇa bhūtā khandhā niyamenti iti vadanti keci puggala jjhāsayo

original: niyametīti veditabbā.
analyzed: niyameti iti veditabbā

original: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbīkathā – vipassanāniyamena hi sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi samāpattilābhino
analyzed: tatra ayam anupubbīkathā vipassanā niyamena hi sukkha vipassakassa uppanna maggaḥ api samāpatti lābhinaḥ

original: jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā uppannamaggopi paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre
analyzed: jhānam pādakam a katvā uppanna maggaḥ api paṭhamajjhānam pādakam katvā pakiṇṇaka saṅkhāre

original: sammasitvā uppāditamaggopi paṭhamajjhānikova hoti. Sabbesu satta bojjhaṅgāni aṭṭha
analyzed: sammasitvā uppādita maggaḥ api paṭhamajjhānikaḥ va hoti sabbesu satta bojjhaṅgāni aṭṭha

original: maggaṅgāni pañca jhānaṅgāni honti. Tesañhi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi
analyzed: magga aṅgāni pañca jhāna aṅgāni honti tesam hi pubbabhāga vipassanā somanassa sahagatā api

original: upekkhāsahagatāpi hutvā vuṭṭhānakāle saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ pattā somanassasahagatāva hoti.
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatā api hutvā vuṭṭhāna kāle saṅkhāra upekkhā bhāvam pattā somanassa sahagatā va hoti

original: Pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggesu yathākkameneva
analyzed: pañcaka naye dutiya tatiya catuttha jjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppādita maggesu yathākkamena iva

original: jhānaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikañca hoti. Sabbesu pana satta maggaṅgāni honti,
analyzed: jhānam caturaṅgikam tivaṅgikam duvaṅgikam ca hoti sabbesu pana satta maggaṅgāni honti

original: catutthe cha bojjhaṅgāni. Ayaṃ viseso pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena
analyzed: catutthe cha bojjhaṅgāni ayam visesaḥ pādaka jhāna niyamena ca iva vipassanā niyamena

original: ca hoti. Tesampi hi pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatāpi upekkhāsahagatāpi hoti.
analyzed: ca hoti tesam pi hi pubbabhāga vipassanā somanassa sahagatā api upekkhā sahagatā api hoti

original: Vuṭṭhānagāminī somanassasahagatāva.
analyzed: vuṭṭhāna gāminī somanassa sahagatā ava

original: Pañcamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā nibbattitamagge pana upekkhācittekaggatāvasena dve jhānaṅgāni

original: bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgāni cha satta ceva. Ayampi viseso ubhayaniyamavasena hoti. Imasmiñhi

analyzed: upekkhā sahagatā ava arūpa jhānāni pādakāni katvā uppādita magge pi esa iva nayaḥ evam

original: Dutiyattheravāde pana yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ye ye samāpattidhamme sammasitvā

original: Sace pana kāmāvacaradhamme sammasati paṭhamajjhānikova hoti. Tatrāpi vipassanāniyamo

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

original: Tatiyattheravāde ‘aho vatāhaṃ sattaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pāpuṇeyyaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ pāpuṇeyya’nti

analyzed: pavedhati tadā hi javanam patitam nāma hoti tasmā na iva ekam hoti na pañcamam mahāpaññassa

original: Tattha tayo valāhakā viya saccapaṭicchādakathūlamajjhimasukhumakilesandhakārā. Tayo
analyzed: tattha tayaḥ valāhakāḥ viya sacca paṭicchādaka thūla majjhima sukhuma kilesa andhakārā tayaḥ

original: vātā viya tīṇi anulomacittāni. Cakkhumā puriso viya gotrabhuññāṇaṃ. Cando viya nibbānaṃ.
analyzed: vātāḥ viya tīṇi anuloma cittāni cakkhumā puriso viya gotra bhuññāṇam candaḥ viya nibbānam

original: Ekekassa vātassa yathākkamena valāhakattayaviddhaṃsanaṃ viya ekekassa anulomacittassa
analyzed: ekekassa vātassa yathākkamena ekekassa anuloma cittassa

original: saccapaṭicchādakatamavinodanaṃ. Vigatavalāhake nabhe tassa purisassa visuddhacandadassanaṃ
analyzed: sacca paṭicchādakatama vinodanam vigata valāhake nabhe tassa purisassa visuddha canda dassanam

original: viya vigate saccapaṭicchādake tame gotrabhuññāṇassa suvisuddhanibbānārammaṇakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: viya vigate sacca paṭicchādake tame gotra bhuññāṇassa su visuddha nibbāna ārammaṇa karaṇam

original: Yatheva hi tayo vātā candapaṭicchādake valāhakeyeva viddhaṃsetuṃ sakkonti, na candaṃ
analyzed: yathā iva hi tayaḥ vātā canda paṭicchādake valāhakeya iva viddhaṃsetum sakkonti na candam

original: daṭṭhuṃ, evaṃ anulomāni saccapaṭicchādakatameyeva vinodetuṃ sakkonti, na nibbānaṃ

original: ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ. Yathā so puriso candameva daṭṭhuṃ sakkoti na valāhake viddhaṃsetuṃ,
analyzed: ārammaṇam kātum yathā saḥ puriso candam eva daṭṭhum sakkoti na valāhake viddhaṃsetum

original: evaṃ gotrabhuññāṇaṃ nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti na kilesatamaṃ vinodetuṃ.

original: Evaṃ anulomaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ hoti, gotrabhu nibbānārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: evam anulomam saṅkhāra ārammaṇam hoti gotrabhu nibbāna ārammaṇam

original: Yadi hi gotrabhu anulomena gahitārammaṇaṃ gaṇheyya puna anulomaṃ taṃ anubandheyyāti
analyzed: yadi hi gotrabhu anulomena gahita ārammaṇam gaṇheyya puna anulomam tam anubandheyya ati

analyzed: magga vuṭṭhānam eva na bhaveyya gotrabhuññāṇam pana anulomassa ārammaṇam aggahetvā

original: taṃ apacchatopavattikaṃ katvā sayaṃ anāvajjanampi samānaṃ āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā evaṃ
analyzed: tam a pacchatopavattikam katvā sayam an āvajjanam pi samānam āvajjana ṭhāne ṭhatvā evam

original: nibbattāhīti maggassa saññaṃ datvā viya nirujjhati. Maggopi tena dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva

original: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – eko kira issāso dhanusatamatthake phalakasataṃ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena

analyzed: rūpa vedanā saññā saṅkhāra viññāṇa nimittam pavattam pi rūpa vedanā saññā saṅkhāra viññāṇa pavattam eva

original: Taṃ duvidhaṃ hoti – upādinnakaṃ anupādinnakanti. Tesu maggassa anupādinnakato vuṭṭhānacchāyā

original: āgatāni. Sakadāgāmissa anāgāmimaggavajjho māno atthi. So diṭṭhiṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Tasseva
analyzed: āgatāni sakadāgāmissa anāgāmi magga vajjhaḥ māno atthi saḥ diṭṭhi ṭhāne tiṭṭhati tassa eva

original: sattahi cittehi sahajātā saṅkappādayo. Tesaṃ pahānena anāgāmimagge aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ
analyzed: sattahi cittehi sahajātā saṅkappa ādayo tesam pahānena anāgāmi magge aṭṭhannam aṅgānam

original: sakiccakatā veditabbā. Anāgāmissa arahattamaggavajjho māno atthi. So diṭṭhiṭṭhāne
analyzed: sa kiccakatā veditabbā anāgāmissa arahatta magga vajjhaḥ mānaḥ atthi saḥ diṭṭhiṭṭhāne

original: tiṭṭhati. Yāni panassa pañca akusalacittāni, tehi sahajātā saṅkappādayo. Tesaṃ pahānena
analyzed: tiṭṭhati yāni panassa pañca akusala cittāni tehi sahajātā saṅkappa ādayaḥ tesam pahānena

original: arahattamagge aṭṭhannaṃ aṅgānaṃ sakiccakatā veditabbā.
analyzed: arahatta magge aṭṭhannam aṅgānam sa kiccaka tā veditabbā

original: Imesu catūsu maggesu paṭhamamaggena cattāri saccāni diṭṭhāni. ‘Uparimaggattayaṃ diṭṭhakameva
analyzed: imesu catūsu maggesu paṭhama maggena cattāri saccāni diṭṭhāni upari magga ttayam diṭṭhakam eva

original: passati, adiṭṭhakaṃ passatī’ti diṭṭhakameva passatīti ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ samānatthakathā.
analyzed: passati adiṭṭhakam passati iti diṭṭhakam eva passati iti ayam ācariyānam samāna attha kathā

original: Vitaṇḍavādī panāha ‘adiṭṭhaṃ passatī’ti. So vattabbo – ‘paṭhamamagge katamaṃ indriyaṃ
analyzed: vitaṇḍa vādī pana āha adiṭṭham passati iti so vattabbaḥ paṭhama magge katamam indriyam

original: bhājesī’ti? Jānamāno ‘anaññātaññassāmītindriya’nti vakkhati. ‘Uparimaggesu katara’nti?
analyzed: bhājesi iti jānamānaḥ vakkhati upari maggesu katarati

original: Vuttepi ‘aññindriya’nti vakkhati. So vattabbo – ‘adiṭṭhasaccadassane sati uparimaggesupi
analyzed: vutte api aññindriyanti vakkhati saḥ vattabbaḥ adiṭṭha sacca dassane sati upari maggesu pi

original: anaññātaññassāmītindriyameva bhājehi. Evaṃ te pañho samessatī’ti. ‘Kilese pana aññe
analyzed: anaññātaññassāmi iti indriyam eva bhājehi evam te pañhaḥ samessati iti kilese pana aññe

original: añño pajahati; pahīne eva pajahatī’ti? ‘Aññe añño pajahatī’ti. ‘Yadi aññe añño, appahīne
analyzed: aññaḥ pajahati pahīne eva pajahati iti aññe aññaḥ pajahati iti yadi aññe aññaḥ a pahīne

original: kilese pajahati. Saccānipi adiṭṭhāneva passatī’ti evaṃvādī puggalo pucchitabbo –
analyzed: kilese pajahati saccāni pi adiṭṭhāni eva passati iti evaṃvādī puggalaḥ pucchitabbaḥ

original: ‘saccāni nāma katī’ti? Jānanto ‘cattārī’ti vakkhati. So vattabbo – ‘tava vāde soḷasa
analyzed: saccāni nāma kati iti jānanto cattāri iti vakkhati so vattabbo tava vāde soḷasa

original: saccāni āpajjanti. Tvaṃ buddhehipi adiṭṭhaṃ passasi. Bahusaccako nāma tvaṃ. Evaṃ
analyzed: saccāni āpajjanti tvam buddhehi pi a diṭṭham passasi bahu saccakaḥ nāma tvam evam

analyzed: mā gaṇha saccadassanam nāma apubbam natthi kilese pana appahīne pajahati iti

original: gato. Puna andhakāraṃ avatthari. Dutiyavārepi tatiyavārepi tatheva akāsi. Catutthavāre
analyzed: gataḥ puna andhakāram dutiya vāre pi tatiya vāre pi tathā iva akāsi catuttha vāre

analyzed: vihate andhakāre peḷāsu kiccam katvā

original: Tattha cattāro peḷā viya cattāri saccāni. Tāsu kicce uppanne dvāravivaraṇakālo viya

original: puna pacchatopavattanakakileso nāma na hoti.
analyzed: puna pacchatopavattanaka kilesaḥ nāma na hoti

original: Tatridaṃ opammaṃ – eko kira mahārājā paccante ārakkhaṃ datvā mahānagare issariyaṃ
analyzed: tatra idam opammam ekaḥ kira mahā rājā paccante ārakkham da tvā mahā nagare issariyam

original: anubhavanto vasati. Athassa paccanto kuppi. Tasmiṃ samaye dvādasa corajeṭṭhakā anekehi
analyzed: anubhavantaḥ vasati athassa paccantaḥ kuppi tasmin samaye dvādasa cora jeṭṭhakāḥ anekehi

original: purisasahassehi saddhiṃ raṭṭhaṃ vilumpanti. Paccantavāsino mahāmattā ‘paccanto kupito’ti
analyzed: purisa sahassehi saddhim raṭṭham vilumpanti paccanta vāsinaḥ mahāmattāḥ paccantaḥ kupito ti

original: rañño pahiṇiṃsu. Rājā ‘vissaṭṭhā gaṇhatha, ahaṃ tumhākaṃ kattabbaṃ karissāmī’ti sāsanaṃ
analyzed: raññaḥ pahiṇiṃsu rājā vissaṭṭhāḥ gaṇhatha aham tumhākam kattabbam karissāmi iti sāsanam

original: pahiṇi. Te paṭhamasampahāreneva anekehi purisasahassehi saddhiṃ pañca corajeṭṭhake
analyzed: pahiṇi te paṭhama sampahārena iva anekehi purisa sahassehi saddhim pañca cora jeṭṭhake

original: ghātayiṃsu. Sesā satta janā attano attano parivāre gahetvā pabbataṃ pavisiṃsu. Amaccā
analyzed: ghātayiṃsu sesā satta janā attano attano parivāre gahetvā pabbatam pavisiṃsu amaccā

original: taṃ pavattiṃ rañño pesayiṃsu.
analyzed: tam pavattim raññaḥ pesayiṃsu

original: Rājā ‘tumhākaṃ kattabbayuttaṃ ahaṃ jānissāmi, tepi gaṇhathā’ti dhanaṃ pahiṇi. Te
analyzed: rājā tumhākam kattabba yuttam aham jānissāmi te pi gaṇhatha ati dhanam pahiṇi te

original: dutiyasampahārena dve corajeṭṭhake pahariṃsu, parivārepi tesaṃ dubbale akaṃsu. Te
analyzed: dutiya sampahārena dve cora jeṭṭhake pahariṃsu parivāre pi tesam dubbale te

original: sabbepi palāyitvā pabbataṃ pavisiṃsu. Tampi pavattiṃ amaccā rañño pesayiṃsu.
analyzed: sabbe api palāyitvā pabbatam pavisiṃsu tam pi pavattim amaccāḥ raññaḥ pesayiṃsu

original: Puna rājā ‘vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti dhanaṃ pahiṇi. Te tatiyasampahārena saddhiṃ sahāyapurisehi dve corajeṭṭhake ghātayitvā taṃ pavattiṃ rañño pesayiṃsu.
analyzed: punar rājā vissaṭṭhāḥ gaṇhantu uti dhanam pahiṇi te tatiya sampahārena saddhim sahāya purisehi dve cora jeṭṭhake ghātayitvā tam pavattim rañño pesayiṃsu

original: Puna rājā ‘avasese vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti dhanaṃ pahiṇi. Te catutthasampahārena saparivāre
analyzed: punar rājā avasese vissaṭṭhāḥ gaṇhantu uti dhanam pahiṇi te catuttha sampahārena sa parivāre

original: pañca corajeṭṭhake ghātayiṃsu. Dvādasannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: pañca cora jeṭṭhake ghātayiṃsu dvādasannam cora jeṭṭhakānam ghātita kālato paṭṭhāya

original: koci coro nāma natthi. Khemā janapadā ure putte naccentā maññe viharanti. Rājā vijitasaṅgāmehi
analyzed: koci coraḥ nāma natthi khemāḥ janapadāḥ ure putte maññe viharanti rājā vijita saṅgāmehi

original: yodhehi parivuto varapāsādagato mahāsampattiṃ anubhavi.
analyzed: yodhehi parivutaḥ vara pāsāda gataḥ mahā sampattim anubhavi

original: Tattha mahanto rājā viya dhammarājā. Paccantavāsino amaccā viya yogāvacarā kulaputtā.
analyzed: tattha mahantaḥ rājā viya dhammarājā paccanta vāsinaḥ amaccāḥ viya yogāvacarā kula puttā

original: Dvādasa corajeṭṭhakā viya dvādasa akusalacittāni. Tesaṃ sahāyā anekasahassapurisā
