analyzed: viya cittaṅga vasena uppajjanaka pāpa dhammā rañño paccantaḥ kupito ti pahita kālaḥ viya

original: ārammaṇe kilesesu uppannesu ‘bhante, kileso me uppanno’ti satthu ārocanakālo. ‘Vissaṭṭhā
analyzed: ārammaṇe kilesesu uppannesu bhante kilesaḥ me uppannaḥ ti satthu ārocana kālaḥ vissaṭṭhā

original: gaṇhantū’ti dhanadānaṃ viya ‘kilese niggaṇha bhikkhū’ti dhammarañño kammaṭṭhānācikkhanaṃ.
analyzed: gaṇhantu uti dhana dānam viya kilese niggaṇha bhikkhū iti dhammarañño kammaṭṭhāna ācikkhanam

original: Saparivārānaṃ pañcannaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ ghātitakālo viya sotāpattimaggena sampayuttānaṃ

analyzed: pañcannam akusala cittānam pahānam

analyzed: puna rañño pavatti pesanam viya sammāsambuddhassa paṭiladdha guṇa ārocanam sesake ca

analyzed: gaṇhantu uti puna dhana dānam viya bhagavato sakadāgāmi maggassa vipassanā ācikkhanam

original: Dutiyasampahārena saparivārānaṃ dvinnaṃ corajeṭṭhakānaṃ dubbalīkaraṇaṃ viya sakadāgāmimaggena

analyzed: sa sampayuttānam dvinnam domanassa cittānam tanu bhāva karaṇam

original: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya satthu paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ. ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti

analyzed: puna dhana dānam viya bhagavataḥ anāgāmi maggassa vipassanā ācikkhanam tatiya sampahārena

original: dvinnaṃ domanassacittānaṃ pahānaṃ.
analyzed: dvinnam domanassa cittānam pahānam

original: Puna rañño pavattipesanaṃ viya tathāgatassa paṭiladdhaguṇārocanaṃ. ‘Vissaṭṭhā gaṇhantū’ti

analyzed: icchiti chita phala samāpatti sukha anubhavanam veditabbanti

original: Kusalā dhammātipadassa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kusalā dhammā atipadassa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Akusalapadaṃ
analyzed: a kusala padam

original: Dhammuddesavārakathā
analyzed: dhamma uddesa vāra kathā

original: Paṭhamacittaṃ
analyzed: paṭhamacittam

original: 365. Idāni akusaladhammapadaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ katame dhammā akusalātiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: idāni akusala dhamma padam bhājetvā dassetum katame dhammā akusala ati ādi āraddham

analyzed: tattha dhamma vavatthāna ādi vāra ppabhedo ca heṭṭhā āgatānam padānam attha vinicchayo

original: ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tattha tattha pana visesamattameva vaṇṇayissāma.
analyzed: ca heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ tattha tattha pana visesa mattam eva vaṇṇayissāma

original: Tattha samayavavatthāne tāva yasmā, kusalassa viya, akusalassa bhūmibhedo natthi,
analyzed: tattha samaya vavatthāne tāva yasmā kusalassa viya akusalassa bhūmi bhedaḥ natthi

original: tasmā ekantaṃ kāmāvacarampi samānaṃ etaṃ ‘kāmāvacara’nti na vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhigatasampayuttanti
analyzed: tasmai ekantam kāmāvacaram pi samānam etam kāmāvacaram nti na vuttam diṭṭhi gata sampayuttam ti

original: ettha diṭṭhi eva diṭṭhigataṃ ‘gūthagataṃ muttagata’ntiādīni viya. Gantabbābhāvato
analyzed: ettha diṭṭhi eva diṭṭhi gatam gūtha gatam mutta gata nti ādīni viya gantabba abhāvato

original: vā diṭṭhiyā gatamattamevetantipi diṭṭhigataṃ. Tena sampayuttaṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ.
analyzed: vā diṭṭhiyā gatam attam eva etat tipi diṭṭhi gatam tena sampayuttam diṭṭhi gata sampayuttam

original: Tattha asaddhammasavanaṃ, akalyāṇamittatā, ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādīni ayoniso manasikāroti
analyzed: tattha asat dhamma savanam akalyāṇa mitta tā ariyānam adassana kāma tā ādīni ayonisaḥ manasikāraḥ ti

original: evamādīhi kāraṇehi imassa diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātassa micchādassanassa uppatti veditabbā.
analyzed: evamādīhi kāraṇehi imassa diṭṭhigata saṅkhātassa micchādassanassa uppatti veditabbā

original: Ye hi ete diṭṭhivādapaṭisaṃyuttā asaddhammā tesaṃ bahumānapubbaṅgamena atikkantamajjhattena

original: upaparikkhārahitena savanena, ye ca diṭṭhivipannā akalyāṇamittā taṃsampavaṅkatāsaṅkhātāya
analyzed: upaparikkhā rahitena savanena ye ca diṭṭhi vipannāḥ akalyāṇa mittā tad sampavaṅka tā saṅkhātāya

original: akalyāṇamittatāya, buddhādīnaṃ ariyānañceva sappurisānañca adassanakāmatāya catusatipaṭṭhānādibhede
analyzed: akalyāṇa mittatāya buddha ādīnam ariyānam ca iva sappurisānam ca a dassana kāma tāya catusati paṭṭhāna ādi bhede

original: ariyadhamme akovidattena pātimokkhasaṃvaraindriyasaṃvarasatisaṃvarañāṇasaṃvarapahānasaṃvarappabhede
analyzed: ariya dhamme a kovidattena pātimokkha saṃvara aindriya saṃvara sati saṃvara ñāṇa saṃvara pahāna saṃvara ppabhede

original: ariyadhamme ceva sappurisadhamme ca saṃvarabhedasaṅkhātena avinayena teheva kāraṇehi
analyzed: ariya dhamme ca iva sappurisa dhamme ca saṃvara bheda saṅkhātena avinayena tehi iva kāraṇehi

original: paribhāvitena ayoniso manasikārena kotūhalamaṅgalādipasutatāya ca etaṃ uppajjatīti
analyzed: paribhāvitena ayonisaḥ manasikārena kotūhala maṅgala ādi pasuta tāya ca etam uppajjati iti

original: veditabbaṃ. Asaṅkhārabhāvo panassa cittassa heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: veditabbam asaṅkhāra bhāvaḥ panassa cittassa heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ

original: Dhammuddesavāre phassoti akusalacittasahajāto phasso. Vedanādīsupi eseva nayo. Iti akusalamattameva etesaṃ purimehi viseso.
analyzed: dhamma uddesa vāre phasso ti akusala citta sahajātaḥ phassaḥ vedanā ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ iti akusala mattam eva etesam purimehi viseso

original: Cittassekaggatā hotīti pāṇātipātādīsupi avikkhittabhāvena cittassa ekaggatā hoti.
analyzed: cittassa ekagga tā hoti iti pāṇa atipāta ādīsu pi avikkhitta bhāvena cittassa ekagga tā hoti

original: Manussā hi cittaṃ samādahitvā avikkhittā hutvā avirajjhamānāni satthāni pāṇasarīresu
analyzed: manussāḥ hi cittam samādahitvā a vikkhittāḥ hutvā a virajjhamānāni satthāni pāṇa sarīresu

original: nipātenti, susamāhitā paresaṃ santakaṃ haranti, ekarasena cittena micchācāraṃ āpajjanti.
analyzed: nipātenti su samāhitā paresam santakam haranti ekarasena cittena micchācāram āpajjanti

original: Evaṃ akusalappavattiyampi cittassa ekaggatā hoti.
analyzed: evam akusala ppavattiyam pi cittassa ekagga tā hoti

original: Micchādiṭṭhīti ayāthāvadiṭṭhi, virajjhitvā gahaṇato vā vitathā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi.
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhi iti a yāthāvadiṭṭhi virajjhitvā gahaṇataḥ vā vitathā diṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhi

original: Anatthāvahattā paṇḍitehi jigucchitā diṭṭhītipi micchādiṭṭhi. Micchāsaṅkappādīsupi
analyzed: anattha avahattā paṇḍitehi jigucchitā diṭṭhi itipi micchādiṭṭhi micchā saṅkappa ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Apica micchā passanti tāya, sayaṃ vā micchā passati, micchādassanamattameva
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ apica micchā passanti tāya sayam vā micchā passati micchādassana mattam eva

original: vā esāti micchādiṭṭhi. Sā ayoniso abhinivesalakkhaṇā, parāmāsarasā, micchābhinivesapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: vā esā ati micchādiṭṭhi sā ayonisas abhinivesa lakkhaṇā parāmāsa rasā micchā abhinivesa paccupaṭṭhānā

original: ariyānaṃ adassanakāmatādipadaṭṭhānā; paramaṃ vajjanti daṭṭhabbā. Micchāsaṅkappādīsu
analyzed: ariyānam a dassana kāma tā ādi padaṭṭhānā paramam vajjanti daṭṭhabbāḥ micchā saṅkappa ādīsu

original: ‘micchā’ti padamattameva viseso. Sesaṃ kusalādhikāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: micchā ati pada mattam eva visesaḥ sesam kusala adhikāre vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: Ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalanti ettha balattho niddesavāre āvi bhavissati. Itaresu
analyzed: ahirika balam anottappa balanti ettha bala atthaḥ niddesa vāre āvi bhavissati itaresu

original: pana – na hiriyatīti ahiriko. Ahirikassa bhāvo ahirikaṃ. Na ottappaṃ anottappaṃ.
analyzed: pana na hiriyati iti ahirikaḥ ahirikassa bhāvaḥ ahirikam na ottappam anottappam

original: Tesu ahirikaṃ kāyaduccaritādīhi ajigucchanalakkhaṇaṃ, alajjālakkhaṇaṃ vā. Anottappaṃ

original: teheva asārajjanalakkhaṇaṃ anuttāsanalakkhaṇaṃ vā. Ahirikameva balaṃ ahirikabalaṃ.
analyzed: tehi iva a sārajjana lakkhaṇam an uttāsana lakkhaṇam vā ahirikam eva balam ahirika balam

original: Anottappameva balaṃ anottappabalaṃ. Ayamettha saṅkhepattho. Vitthāro pana heṭṭhā
analyzed: anottappam eva balam anottappa balam ayam ettha saṅkhepa atthaḥ vitthāraḥ pana heṭṭhā

original: vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbo.
analyzed: vutta paṭipakkha vasena veditabbaḥ

original: Lubbhanti tena, sayaṃ vā lubbhati, lubbhanamattameva vā tanti lobho. Muyhanti tena,
analyzed: lubbhanti tena sayam vā lubbhati lubbhana mattam eva vā tanti lobhaḥ muyhanti tena

original: sayaṃ vā muyhati, muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho. Tesu lobho ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇo
analyzed: sayam vā muyhati muyhana mattam eva vā tanti moho tesu lobho ārammaṇa ggahaṇa lakkhaṇo

original: makkaṭālepo viya, abhisaṅgaraso tattakapāle khittamaṃsapesi viya, apariccāgapaccupaṭṭhāno
analyzed: makkaṭa ālepaḥ viya abhisaṅga rasaḥ tatta kapāle khitta maṃsa pesi viya a pariccāga paccupaṭṭhāno

original: telañjanarāgo viya, saṃyojaniyadhammesu assādadassanapadaṭṭhāno. So taṇhānadībhāvena

analyzed: vaḍḍhamānaḥ sīghasotā nadī viya mahā samuddam apāyam eva gahetvā gacchati iti daṭṭhabbo

original: Moho cittassa andhabhāvalakkhaṇo aññāṇalakkhaṇo vā, asampaṭivedharaso ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaraso
analyzed: moho cittassa andha bhāva lakkhaṇaḥ aññāṇa lakkhaṇaḥ vā asampaṭivedha rasaḥ ārammaṇa sabhā avacchādana rasaḥ

original: vā, asammāpaṭipattipaccupaṭṭhāno andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno vā, ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: vā asammāpaṭipatti paccupaṭṭhānaḥ andhakāra paccupaṭṭhānaḥ vā ayoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhāno

original: Sabbākusalānaṃ mūlanti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: sabba akusalānam mūlan ti daṭṭhabbaḥ

original: Abhijjhāyanti tāya, sayaṃ vā abhijjhāyati, abhijjhāyanamattameva vā esāti abhijjhā.
analyzed: abhijjhāyanti tāya sayam vai abhijjhāyati abhijjhāyana mattam eva vai esā ati abhijjhā

original: Sā parasampattīnaṃ sakakaraṇaicchālakkhaṇā, tenākārena esanabhāvarasā, parasampatti-abhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: sā para sampattīnam saka karaṇa ecchā lakkhaṇā tena ākārena esana bhāva rasā para sampatti abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā

original: parasampattīsu abhiratipadaṭṭhānā. Parasampattiabhimukhā eva hi sā upaṭṭhahati. Tāsu
analyzed: para sampattīsu abhirati pada ṭṭhānā para sampatti abhimukhā eva hi sā upaṭṭhahati tāsu

original: ca abhiratiyā sati pavattati, parasampattīsu cetaso hatthappasāroviyāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: ca abhiratiyā sati pavattati para sampattīsu cetasaḥ daṭṭhabbā

original: Samatho hotītiādīsu aññesu kiccesu vikkhepasamanato samatho. Akusalappavattiyaṃ cittaṃ paggaṇhātīti paggāho. Na vikkhipatīti avikkhepo.
analyzed: samathaḥ hoti itiādīsu aññesu kiccesu vikkhepa samanataḥ samathaḥ akusala ppavattiyam cittam paggaṇhāti iti paggāhaḥ na vikkhipati iti avikkhepaḥ

original: Imasmiṃ citte saddhā, sati, paññā, cha yugaḷakānīti ime dhammā na gahitā. Kasmā?
analyzed: imasmin citte saddhā sati paññā cha yugaḷakāni iti ime dhammā na gahitā kasmā

original: Assaddhiyacitte pasādo nāma natthi. Tasmā tāva saddhā na gahitā. Kiṃ pana diṭṭhigatikā
analyzed: assaddhiya citte pasādaḥ nāma natthi tasmā tāva saddhā na gahitā kim pana diṭṭhi gatikā

original: attano attano satthārānaṃ na saddahantīti? Saddahanti. Sā pana saddhā nāma na hoti,
analyzed: attanaḥ attanaḥ satthārānam na saddahanti iti saddahanti sā pana saddhā nāma na hoti

original: vacanasampaṭicchanamattamevetaṃ. Atthato anupaparikkhā vā hoti, diṭṭhi vā. Asatiyacitte
analyzed: vacana sampaṭicchana mattam eva etam atthataḥ anupaparikkhā vā hoti diṭṭhi vā asatiya citte

original: pana sati natthīti na gahitā. Kiṃ diṭṭhigatikā attanā katakammaṃ na sarantīti? Saranti.
analyzed: pana sati natthi iti na gahitā kim diṭṭhi gatikāḥ attanā kata kammam na saranti iti saranti

original: Sā pana sati nāma na hoti. Kevalaṃ tenākārena akusalacittappavatti. Tasmā sati na
analyzed: sā pana sati nāma na hoti kevalam tena ākārena akusala citta ppavatti tasmā sati na

original: gahitā. Atha kasmā “micchāsatī”ti suttante vuttā? Sā pana akusalakkhandhānaṃ sativirahitattā
analyzed: gahitā atha kasmā micchā satī ti suttante vuttā sā pana akusala khandhānam sati virahita ttā

original: satipaṭipakkhattā ca micchāmaggamicchattānaṃ pūraṇatthaṃ tattha pariyāyena desanā
analyzed: sati paṭipakkha ttā ca micchāmagga micchat tānam pūraṇa attham tattha pariyāyena desanā

original: katā. Nippariyāyena panesā natthi. Tasmā na gahitā. Andhabālacitte pana paññā natthīti
analyzed: katā nippariyāyena pana esā natthi tasmā na gahitā andha bāla citte pana paññā natthi iti

original: na gahitā. Kiṃ diṭṭhigatikānaṃ vañcanāpaññā natthīti? Atthi. Na panesā paññā, māyā
analyzed: na gahitā kim diṭṭhi gatikānam vañcanā paññā natthi iti atthi na pana esā paññā māyā

original: nāmesā hoti. Sā atthato taṇhāva. Idaṃ pana cittaṃ sadarathaṃ garukaṃ bhāriyaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ
analyzed: nāma isā hoti sā atthataḥ idam pana cittam sadaratham garukam bhāriyam kakkhaḷam

original: thaddhaṃ akammaññaṃ gilānaṃ vaṅkaṃ kuṭilaṃ. Tasmā passaddhādīni cha yugaḷakāni na gahitāni.
analyzed: thaddham akammaññam gilānam vaṅkam kuṭilam tasmā passaddha ādīni cha yugaḷakāni na gahitāni

original: Ettāvatā padapaṭipāṭiyā cittaṅgavasena pāḷiāruḷhāni dvattiṃsa padāni dassetvā idāni
analyzed: ettāvatā pada paṭipāṭiyā cittaṅga vasena pāḷi āruḷhāni dvattiṃsa padāni dassetvā idāni

original: yevāpanakadhamme dassetuṃ ye vā pana tasmiṃ samayetiādimāha. Tattha sabbesupi akusalacittesu
analyzed: yevāpanaka dhamme dassetum ye vā pana tasmin samaya iti ādim āha tattha sabbesu pi akusala cittesu

original: chando adhimokkho manasikāro māno issā macchariyaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ uddhaccaṃ kukkuccanti
analyzed: chandaḥ adhimokkhaḥ manasikāraḥ mānaḥ issā macchariyam thinam middham uddhaccam kukkuccanti

original: ime daseva yevāpanakā honti dhammā, suttāgatā, suttapadesu dissareti vuttā. Imasmiṃ
analyzed: ime dasa iva yevāpanakā honti dhammā sutta āgatā sutta padesu vuttā imasmin

original: pana citte chando adhimokkho manasikāro uddhaccanti ime apaṇṇakaṅgasaṅkhātā cattārova yevāpanakā honti.
analyzed: pana citte chandaḥ adhimokkhaḥ manasikāraḥ uddhaccanti ime apaṇṇaka aṅga saṅkhātā cattāro iva honti

original: Tattha chandādayo heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbā. Kevalañhi te kusalā, ime akusalā.
analyzed: tattha chanda ādayaḥ heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbā kevalañhi te kusalāḥ ime akusalāḥ

original: Itaraṃ pana uddhatassa bhāvo ‘uddhaccaṃ’. Taṃ cetaso avūpasamalakkhaṇaṃ vātābhighātacalajalaṃ
analyzed: itaram pana uddhatassa bhāvaḥ uddhaccam tam cetasaḥ a vūpasama lakkhaṇam vāta abhighāta cala jalam

original: viya, anavaṭṭhānarasaṃ vātābhighātacaladhajapaṭākā viya, bhantattapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: viya anavaṭṭhāna rasam vāta abhighāta cala dhaja paṭākā viya bhantatta paccupaṭṭhānam

original: pāsāṇābhighātasamuddhatabhasmā viya, cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: pāsāṇa abhighāta samuddhata bhasmā cetasaḥ a vūpasame a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānam

original: Cittavikkhepoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: citta vikkhepaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Iti phassādīni dvattiṃsa, yevāpanakavasena vuttāni cattārīti sabbānipi imasmiṃ dhammuddesavāre
analyzed: iti phassa ādīni dvattiṃsa yevāpanaka vasena vuttāni cattāri iti sabbāni pi imasmin dhamma uddesa vāre

original: chattiṃsa dhammapadāni bhavanti. Cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni hāpetvā pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni dvattiṃsameva.
analyzed: chattiṃsa dhamma padāni bhavanti cattāri apaṇṇaka aṅgāni hāpetvā pāḷiyam āgatāni dvattiṃsam eva

original: Aggahitaggahaṇena panettha phassapañcakaṃ, vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ
analyzed: aggahita ggahaṇena pana ittha phassa pañcakam vitakkaḥ vicāraḥ pi iti cittassa ekagga tā vīriya indriyam

original: jīvitindriyaṃ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobho mohoti soḷasa dhammā honti.
analyzed: jīvitindriyam micchādiṭṭhi ahirikam anottappam lobhaḥ mohaḥ ti soḷasa dhammāḥ honti

original: Tesu soḷasasu satta dhammā avibhattikā nava savibhattikā honti. Katame satta? Phasso
analyzed: tesu soḷasasu satta dhammā avibhattikāḥ nava savibhattikāḥ honti katame satta

original: saññā cetanā vicāro pīti jīvitindriyaṃ mohoti ime satta avibhattikā. Vedanā cittaṃ
analyzed: saññā cetanā vicāro pīti jīvitindriyam moho ti ime satta avibhattikā vedanā cittam

original: vitakko cittassekaggatā vīriyindriyaṃ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobhoti ime nava savibhattikā.
analyzed: vitakko cittassa ekagga tā vīriya indriyam micchādiṭṭhi ahirikam anottappam lobho ti ime nava sa vibhattikā

original: Tesu cha dhammā dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā, eko tīsu, eko catūsu, eko chasu. Kathaṃ?
analyzed: tesu cha dhammā dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattāḥ ekaḥ tīsu ekaḥ catūsu ekaḥ chasu katham

original: Cittaṃ vitakko micchādiṭṭhi ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ lobhoti ime cha dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
analyzed: cittam vitakkaḥ micchādiṭṭhi ahirikam anottappam lobho ti ime cha dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā

original: Tesu hi cittaṃ tāva phassapañcakaṃ patvā cittaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, indriyāni patvā manindriyanti.
analyzed: tesu hi cittam tāva phassa pañcakam patvā cittam hoti iti vuttam indriyāni patvā

original: Vitakko jhānaṅgāni patvā vitakko hotīti vutto, maggaṅgāni patvā micchāsaṅkappoti.
analyzed: vitakkaḥ jhāna aṅgāni patvā vitakkaḥ hoti iti vuttaḥ magga aṅgāni patvā micchā saṅkappo ti

original: Micchādiṭṭhi maggaṅgesupi kammapathesupi micchādiṭṭhiyeva. Ahirikaṃ balāni patvā
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhi maggaṅgesu pi kamma pathesu pi micchādiṭṭhiyā iva ahirikam balāni patvā

original: ahirikabalaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, lokanāsakadukaṃ patvā ahirikanti. Anottappepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: ahirika balam hoti iti vuttam lokanāsaka dukam patvā ahirikan ti anottappe pi esa eva nayo

original: Lobho mūlaṃ patvā lobho hotīti vutto. Kammapathaṃ patvā abhijjhāti. Ime cha dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
analyzed: lobhaḥ mūlam patvā lobhaḥ hoti iti vutto kamma patham patvā abhijjhāti ime cha dvīsu ṭhānesu vibhattā

original: Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṃ patvā vedanā hotīti vuttā, jhānaṅgāni patvā sukhanti, indriyāni patvā somanassindriyanti. Evaṃ ekova dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
analyzed: vedanā pana phassa pañcakam patvā vedanā hoti iti vuttā jhāna aṅgāni patvā sukhanti indriyāni patvā somanassindriyanti evam ekaḥ iva dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto

original: Vīriyaṃ pana indriyāni patvā vīriyindriyaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ, maggaṅgāni patvā micchāvāyāmo
analyzed: vīriyam pana indriyāni patvā vīriya indriyam hoti iti vuttam maggaṅgāni patvā micchāvāyāmaḥ

original: hotīti, balāni patvā vīriyabalanti, piṭṭhidukaṃ patvā paggāho hotīti. Evaṃ ayaṃ eko
analyzed: hoti iti balāni patvā vīriya balanti piṭṭhidukam patvā paggāhaḥ hoti iti evam ayam ekaḥ

original: dhammo catūsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
analyzed: dhammo catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattaḥ

original: Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā cittassekaggatā hotīti vutto, indriyāni patvā samādhindriyanti,
analyzed: pana jhāna aṅgāni patvā cittassa ekagga tā hoti iti vuttaḥ indriyāni patvā samādhindriyanti

original: maggaṅgāni patvā micchāsamādhīti, balāni patvā samādhibalanti, piṭṭhidukaṃ patvā
analyzed: maggaṅgāni patvā micchāsamādhī iti balāni patvā samādhibalanti piṭṭhidukam patvā

original: dutiyaduke ekakavaseneva samathoti, tatiye avikkhepoti. Evamayaṃ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
analyzed: dutiya duke ekaka vasena iva tatiye avikkhepo ti evam ayam ekaḥ dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto

original: Sabbepi panete dhammā phassapañcakavasena jhānaṅgavasena indriyavasena maggaṅgavasena
analyzed: sabbe pi pana ete dhammā phassa pañcaka vasena jhāna aṅga vasena indriya vasena magga aṅga vasena

original: balavasena mūlavasena kammapathavasena lokanāsakavasena piṭṭhidukavasenāti nava rāsayo
analyzed: bala vasena mūla vasena kammapatha vasena lokanāsaka vasena piṭṭhiduka vasena ati nava rāsayo

original: honti. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ paṭhamakusalacittaniddese vuttamevāti.
analyzed: honti tattha yam vattabbam tam paṭhama kusala citta niddese vuttam eva ati

original: Dhammuddesavārakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dhamma uddesa vāra kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Niddesavārakathā
analyzed: niddesa vāra kathā

original: 375. Niddesavāre cittassekaggatāniddese tāva saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitīti. Idaṃ dvayaṃ ṭhitivevacanameva.
analyzed: niddesa vāre cittassa ekagga tā niddese tāva saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti iti idam dvayam ṭhiti vevacanam eva

original: Yaṃ pana kusalaniddese ‘ārammaṇaṃ ogāhetvā anupavisitvā tiṭṭhatīti avaṭṭhitī’ti vuttaṃ,
analyzed: yam pana kusala niddese ārammaṇam ogāhetvā an upavisitvā tiṭṭhati iti avaṭṭhitī iti vuttam

original: taṃ idha na labbhati. Akusalasmiñhi dubbalā cittassekaggatāti heṭṭhā dīpitameva.
analyzed: tam idha na labbhati akusalasmin hi dubbalā cittassa ekagga tā ti heṭṭhā dīpitam eva

original: 384. Uddhaccavicikicchāvasena pavattassa visāhārassa paṭipakkhato avisāhāroti evarūpopi
analyzed: uddhacca vicikicchā vasena pavattassa visāhārassa paṭipakkhataḥ avisāhāraḥ ti evarūpaḥ api

original: attho idha na labbhati. Sahajātadhamme pana na visāharatīti avisāhāro. Na vikkhipatīti
analyzed: atthaḥ idha na labbhati sahajāta dhamme pana na visāharati iti a visāhāraḥ na vikkhipati iti

original: avikkhepo. Akusalacittekaggatāvasena avisāhaṭassa mānasassa bhāvo avisāhaṭamānasatā.
analyzed: avikkhepaḥ akusala citta ekagga tā vasena avisāhaṭassa mānasassa bhāvaḥ avisāhaṭa mānasa tā

original: Sahajātadhammesu na kampatīti samādhibalaṃ. Ayāthāvasamādhānato micchāsamādhīti evamidha attho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: sahajāta dhammesu na kampati iti samādhi balam a yāthāva samādhānataḥ micchāsamādhi iti evam idha atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: 385. Vīriyindriyaniddese yo heṭṭhā ‘nikkamo ceso kāmānaṃ panudanāyā’tiādi nayo vutto, so idha na labbhati. Sahajātadhammesu akampanaṭṭheneva vīriyabalaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vīriya indriya niddese yaḥ heṭṭhā nikkamo ceso kāmānam panudanāya atiādi nayaḥ vutto saḥ idha na labbhati sahajāta dhammesu akampana ṭṭhena iva vīriya balam veditabbam

original: 386. Micchādiṭṭhiniddese ayāthāvadassanaṭṭhena micchādiṭṭhi. Diṭṭhīsu gataṃ idaṃ
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhi niddese a yāthāva dassana aṭṭhena micchādiṭṭhi diṭṭhīsu gatam idam

original: dassanaṃ, dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiantogatattāti diṭṭhigataṃ. Heṭṭhāpissa attho vuttoyeva.
analyzed: dassanam dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi antogata ttā ti diṭṭhi gatam heṭṭhā api ssa atthaḥ vuttaḥ yeva

original: Diṭṭhiyeva duratikkamanaṭṭhena diṭṭhigahanaṃ, tiṇagahanavanagahanapabbatagahanāni
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā iva duratikkamana ṭṭhena diṭṭhi gahanam tiṇa gahana vana gahana pabbata gahanāni

original: viya. Diṭṭhiyeva sāsaṅkasappaṭibhayaṭṭhena diṭṭhikantāro, corakantāravāḷakantāramarukantāranirudakakantāradubbhikkhakantārā
analyzed: viya diṭṭhiyā iva sa āsaṅka sa paṭibhaya ṭṭhena diṭṭhi kantāro cora kantāra vāḷa kantāra maru kantāra nirudaka kantāra dubbhikkha kantārā

original: viya. Sammādiṭṭhiyā vinivijjhanaṭṭhena vilomanaṭṭhena ca diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ. Micchādassanañhi
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhiyāḥ vinivijjhana ṭhena vilomana ṭṭhena ca diṭṭhi visūkāyikam micchā dassanam hi

original: uppajjamānaṃ sammādassanaṃ vinivijjhati ceva vilometi ca. Kadāci sassatassa kadāci
analyzed: uppajjamānam sammādassanam vinivijjhati ca iva vilomā iti ca kadāci sassatassa kadāci

original: ucchedassa gahaṇato diṭṭhiyā virūpaṃ phanditanti diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ. Diṭṭhigatiko
analyzed: ucchedassa gahaṇataḥ diṭṭhiyā virūpam phanditan ti diṭṭhi vipphanditam diṭṭhi gatikaḥ

original: hi ekasmiṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, kadāci sassataṃ anupatati kadāci ucchedaṃ. Diṭṭhiyeva
analyzed: hi ekasmin patiṭṭhātum na sakkoti kadāci sassatam anupatati kadāci ucchedam diṭṭhiyā iva

original: bandhanaṭṭhena saṃyojananti diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ.
analyzed: bandhana ṭṭhena saṃyojanan ti diṭṭhi saṃyojanam

original: Susumārādayo viya purisaṃ, ārammaṇaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti gāho. Patiṭṭhahanato patiṭṭhāho.
analyzed: susumāra ādayaḥ viya purisam ārammaṇam daḷham gaṇhāti iti gāho patiṭṭhahanataḥ patiṭṭhāho

original: Ayañhi balavappavattibhāvena patiṭṭhahitvā gaṇhāti. Niccādivasena abhinivisatīti
analyzed: ayan hi balava pavatti bhāvena patiṭṭhahitvā gaṇhāti nicca ādi vasena abhinivisati iti

original: abhiniveso. Dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā niccādivasena parato āmasatīti parāmāso. Anatthāvahattā
analyzed: abhinivesaḥ dhamma sabhāvam atikkamitvā nicca ādi vasena paratas āmasati iti parāmāsaḥ anattha āvahattā

original: kucchito maggo, kucchitānaṃ vā apāyānaṃ maggoti kummaggo. Ayāthāvapathato micchāpatho.
analyzed: kucchitaḥ maggo kucchitānam vā apāyānam maggo ti kummaggaḥ a yāthāvapathataḥ micchāpatho

original: Yathā hi disāmūḷhena ayaṃ asukagāmassa nāma pathoti gahitopi taṃ gāmaṃ na sampāpeti,
analyzed: yathā hi disāmūḷhena ayam asuka gāmassa nāma pathoti gahitaḥ api tam gāmam na sampāpeti

original: evaṃ diṭṭhigatikena sugatipathoti gahitāpi diṭṭhi sugatiṃ na pāpetīti ayāthāvapathato,
analyzed: evam diṭṭhigatikena sugati pathā iti gahitā api diṭṭhi sugatim na pāpā iti iti a yāthāvapathato

original: micchāpatho. Micchāsabhāvato micchattaṃ. Tattheva paribbhamanato taranti ettha bālāti
analyzed: micchā pathaḥ micchā sabhāvataḥ micchattam tattha iva paribbhamanataḥ taranti ettha bālā ati

original: titthaṃ. Titthañca taṃ anatthānañca āyatananti titthāyatanaṃ. Titthiyānaṃ vā sañjātidesaṭṭhena
analyzed: tittham tittham ca tam anatthānam ca āyatananti titthāyatanam titthiyānam vā

original: nivāsaṭhānaṭṭhena ca āyatanantipi titthāyatanaṃ. Vipariyesabhūto gāho, vipariyesato
analyzed: nivāsa ṭhāna ṭṭhena ca tittha āyatanam vipariyesa bhūtaḥ gāhaḥ vipariyesato

original: vā gāhoti vipariyesaggāho; vipallattha gāhoti attho.
analyzed: vā gāho ti vipariyesa gāhaḥ vipallattha gāho ti attho

original: 387-388. Ahirikānottappaniddesesu hirottappaniddesavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. Sahajātadhammesu pana akampanaṭṭheneva ahirikabalaṃ anottappabalañca veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ahirika anottappa niddesesu hirottappa niddesa vipariyāyena atthaḥ veditabbo sahajāta dhammesu pana akampana ṭṭhena iva ahirika balam anottappa balañca veditabbam

original: 389. Lobhamohaniddesesu lubbhatīti lobho. Lubbhanāti lubbhanākāro. Lobhasampayuttacittaṃ,
analyzed: lobha moha niddesesu lubbhati iti lobhaḥ lubbhanā ati lubbhana ākāraḥ lobha sampayutta cittam

original: puggalo vā lubbhito; lubbhitassa bhāvo lubbhitattaṃ. Sārajjatīti sārāgo. Sārajjanākāro
analyzed: puggalaḥ vā lubbhitaḥ lubbhitassa bhāvaḥ lubbhitattam sārajjati iti sārāgaḥ sārajjana ākāro

original: sārajjanā. Sārajjitassa bhāvo sārajjitattaṃ. Abhijjhāyanaṭṭhena abhijjhā. Puna ‘lobha’-vacane
analyzed: sārajjanā sārajjitassa bhāvaḥ sārajjitattam abhijjhāyana ṭṭhena abhijjhā puna lobha vacane

original: kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Akusalañca taṃ mūlañca akusalānaṃ vā mūlanti akusalamūlaṃ.
analyzed: kāraṇam vuttam eva akusalam ca tam mūlam ca akusalānam vā mūlanti akusala mūlam

original: 390. Ñāṇadassanapaṭipakkhato aññāṇaṃ adassanaṃ. Abhimukho hutvā dhammena na sameti,
analyzed: ñāṇa dassana paṭipakkhataḥ aññāṇam adassanam abhimukhaḥ hutvā dhammena na sameti

original: na samāgacchatīti anabhisamayo. Anurūpato dhamme bujjhatīti anubodho. Tappaṭipakkhatāya
analyzed: na samāgacchati iti anabhisamayaḥ anurūpatas dhamme bujjhati iti anubodhaḥ tad paṭipakkha tāya

original: ananubodho. Aniccādīhi saddhiṃ yojetvā na bujjhatīti asambodho. Asantaṃ asamañca
analyzed: ananubodhaḥ anicca ādīhi saddhim yojetvā na bujjhati iti asambodhaḥ asantam asamañca

original: bujjhatītipi asambodho. Catusaccadhammaṃ nappaṭivijjhatīti appaṭivedho. Rūpādīsu
analyzed: bujjhati iti pi asambodhaḥ catu sacca dhammam na paṭivijjhati iti appaṭivedhaḥ rūpa ādīsu

original: ekadhammampi aniccādisāmaññato na saṅgaṇhātīti asaṃgāhanā. Tameva dhammaṃ na pariyogāhatīti
analyzed: eka dhammam pi anicca ādi sāmaññataḥ na saṅgaṇhāti iti asaṃgāhanā tam eva dhammam na pariyogāhati iti

original: apariyogāhanā. Na samaṃ pekkhatīti asamapekkhaṇā. Dhammānaṃ sabhāvaṃ pati na apekkhatīti apaccavekkhaṇā.
analyzed: a pariyogāhanā na samam pekkhati iti asamapekkhaṇā dhammānam sabhāvam na apekkhati iti apaccavekkhaṇā

original: Kusalākusalakammesu viparītavuttiyā sabhāvaggahaṇābhāvena vā ekampi kammaṃ etassa
analyzed: kusala akusala kammesu viparīta vuttiyā sabhāva ggahaṇa abhāvena vā ekam pi kammam etassa

original: paccakkhaṃ natthi, sayaṃ vā kassaci kammassa paccakkhakaraṇaṃ nāma na hotīti appaccakkhakammaṃ.
analyzed: paccakkham natthi sayam vā kassaci kammassa paccakkha karaṇam nāma na hoti iti appaccakkha kammam

original: Yaṃ etasmiṃ anuppajjamāne cittasantānaṃ mejjhaṃ bhaveyya, suci, vodānaṃ, taṃ duṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: yam etasmin an uppajjamāne citta santānam mejjham bhaveyya suci vodānam tam duṭṭham

original: mejjhaṃ imināti dummejjhaṃ. Bālānaṃ bhāvoti bālyaṃ. Muyhatīti moho. Balavataro moho
analyzed: mejjham dummejjham bālānam bālyam muyhati iti mohaḥ balavataraḥ mohaḥ

original: pamoho. Samantato muyhatīti sammoho. Vijjāya paṭipakkhabhāvato na vijjāti avijjā.
analyzed: pamohaḥ samantataḥ muyhati iti sammohaḥ vijjāya paṭipakkha bhāvataḥ na vijjāti avijjā

original: Oghayogattho vuttoyeva. Thāmagataṭṭhena anusetīti anusayo. Cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti, abhibhavatīti
analyzed: ogha yoga tthaḥ thāma gata ṭṭhena anuseti iti anusayaḥ cittam pariyuṭṭhāti abhibhavati iti

original: pariyuṭṭhānaṃ. Hitaggahaṇābhāvena hitābhimukhaṃ gantuṃ na sakkoti, aññadatthu laṅgatiyevāti
analyzed: pariyuṭṭhānam hita ggahaṇa abhāvena hita abhimukham gantum na sakkoti añña datthu laṅgatiyā iva ati

original: laṅgī; khañjatīti attho. Durugghāṭanaṭṭhena vā laṅgī. Yathā hi mahāpalighasaṅkhātā
analyzed: laṅgī khañjatī iti atthaḥ durugghāṭana ṭṭhena vā laṅgī yathā hi mahā paligha saṅkhātā

original: laṅgī durugghāṭā hoti, evamayampi laṅgī viyāti laṅgī. Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Saṅgahavārasuññatavārāpi
analyzed: laṅgī durugghāṭā hoti evam ayam pi laṅgī viyāti laṅgī sesam uttāna attham eva saṅgaha vāra suññata vārā api

original: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva atthato veditabbāti.
analyzed: heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva atthataḥ veditabbā ti

original: Dutiyacittaṃ
analyzed: dutiya cittam

original: 399. Dutiyacitte sasaṅkhārenāti padaṃ visesaṃ. Tampi heṭṭhā vuttatthameva. Idaṃ pana
analyzed: dutiya citte sa saṅkhārena ati padam visesam tam pi heṭṭhā vutta ttham eva idam pana

original: cittaṃ kiñcāpi chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā
analyzed: cittam kiñca api chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobham uppādetvā satto satto tiādinā

original: nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati, tathāpi sasaṅkhārikattā sappayogena saupāyena uppajjanato
analyzed: nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati tathā api sa saṅkhārika ttā sa payogena sa upāyena uppajjanato

original: – yadā kulaputto micchādiṭṭhikassa kulassa kumārikaṃ pattheti. Te ca ‘aññadiṭṭhikā
analyzed: yadā kula puttaḥ micchādiṭṭhikassa kulassa kumārikam pattheti te ca añña diṭṭhikā

original: tumhe’ti kumārikaṃ na denti. Athaññe ñātakā ‘yaṃ tumhe karotha tamevāyaṃ karissatī’ti
analyzed: tumhe iti kumārikam na denti athaññe ñātakāḥ yam tumhe karotha tam eva ayam karissati iti

original: dāpenti. So tehi saddhiṃ titthiye upasaṅkamati. Āditova vematiko hoti. Gacchante
analyzed: dāpenti saḥ tehi saddhim titthiye upasaṅkamati āditas uva vematikaḥ hoti gacchante

original: gacchante kāle etesaṃ kiriyā manāpāti laddhiṃ roceti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti – evarūpe kāle
analyzed: gacchante kāle etesam kiriyā manāpā ati laddhim roceti diṭṭhim gaṇhāti evarūpe kāle

original: idaṃ labbhatīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: idam labbhati iti veditabbam

original: Yevāpanakesu panettha thinamiddhaṃ adhikaṃ. Tattha thinanatā ‘thinaṃ’. Middhanatā
analyzed: yevāpanakesu pana ittha thinam iddham adhikam tattha thina natā thinam middha natā

original: ‘middhaṃ’; anussāhasaṃhananatā asattivighāto cāti attho. Thinañca middhañca thinamiddhaṃ.
analyzed: middham anussāha saṃhanana tā asatti vighāto ca ati attho thinam ca middham ca thinamiddham

original: Tattha thinaṃ anussāhalakkhaṇaṃ, vīriyavinodanarasaṃ, saṃsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Middhaṃ
analyzed: tattha thinam anussāha lakkhaṇam vīriya vinodana rasam saṃsīdana paccupaṭṭhānam middham

original: akammaññatālakkhaṇaṃ, onahanarasaṃ, līnabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: akammañña tā lakkhaṇam onahana rasam līna bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam pacalāyikā niddā paccupaṭṭhānam

original: vā. Ubhayampi aratitandīvijambhitādīsu ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānanti.
analyzed: vā ubhayam pi arati tandīvijambhi tā ādīsu a yonisoma nasikāra padaṭṭhānanti

original: Tatiyacittaṃ
analyzed: tatiya cittam

original: 400. Tatiyaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto satto’tiādinā
analyzed: tatiyam chasu ārammaṇesu somanassitassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā satto satto tiādinā

original: nayena aparāmasantassa nārāyaṇavirājanamallayuddhanaṭasamajjādīni passato manāpiyasaddasavanādipasutassa

original: vā uppajjati. Idha mānena saddhiṃ pañca apaṇṇakaṅgāni honti. Tattha maññatīti ‘māno’.
analyzed: vā uppajjati idha mānena saddhim pañca apaṇṇakaṅgāni honti tattha maññati iti māno

original: So unnatilakkhaṇo, sampaggaharaso, ketukamyatāpaccupaṭṭhāno, diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno,

original: ummādo viya daṭṭhabboti.
analyzed: ummādaḥ viya daṭṭhabbaḥ ti

original: Catutthacittaṃ
402. Catutthaṃ vuttappakāresu eva ṭhānesu yadā sīse kheḷaṃ khipanti, pādapaṃsuṃ okiranti,
analyzed: catuttham vutta ppakāresu eva ṭhānesu yadā sīse kheḷam khipanti pāda paṃsum okiranti

analyzed: tadā tassa pariharaṇa attham saussāhena antarantarā olokentānam rāja nāṭakesu nikkhantesu

original: ussāraṇāya vattamānāya tena tena chiddena olokentānañcāti evamādīsu ṭhānesu uppajjati.

original: Idha pana thinamiddhehi saddhiṃ satta yevāpanakā honti. Ubhayatthāpi micchādiṭṭhi
analyzed: idha pana thinamiddhehi saddhim satta yevāpanakāḥ honti ubhayattha api micchādiṭṭhi

original: parihāyati. Taṃ ṭhapetvā sesānaṃ vasena dhammagaṇanā veditabbāti.
analyzed: parihāyati tam ṭhapetvā sesānam vasena dhamma gaṇanā veditabbā ti

original: Pañcamacittaṃ
403. Pañcamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattassa lobhaṃ uppādetvā ‘satto
analyzed: pañcamam chasu ārammaṇesu vedanā vasena majjhattassa lobham uppādetvā satto

analyzed: satto tiādinā nayena parāmasantassa uppajjati somanassa ṭṭhāne pana ittha upekkhā vedanā

original: hoti, pītipadaṃ parihāyati. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ paṭhamacittasadisameva.
analyzed: hoti pīti padam parihāyati sesam sabbam paṭhama citta sadisam eva

original: Chaṭṭhacittādi
analyzed: chaṭṭha citta ādi

original: 409-412. Chaṭṭhasattamaṭṭhamānipi vedanaṃ parivattetvā pītipadañca hāpetvā dutiyatatiyacatutthesu
analyzed: chaṭṭha sattama ṭṭhamāni pi vedanam parivattetvā pīti padam ca hāpetvā dutiya tatiya catutthesu

analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbāni imesu aṭṭhasu lobha sahagata cittesu sahajāta adhipati ārammaṇa adhipati iti

original: dvepi adhipatayo labbhanti.
analyzed: dve api adhipatayaḥ labbhanti

original: Navamacittaṃ
analyzed: navamacittam

original: 413. Navamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu domanassitassa paṭighaṃ uppādayato uppajjati. Tassa
analyzed: navamam chasu ārammaṇesu domanassitassa paṭigham uppādayato uppajjati tassa

analyzed: samaya vavatthāna vāre tāva duṭṭhu manaḥ hīna vedanattā vā kucchitam dummano

original: dummanassa bhāvo domanassaṃ. Tena sahagatanti domanassasahagataṃ. Asampiyāyanabhāvena
analyzed: dummanassa bhāvaḥ domanassam tena sahagatanti domanassa sahagatam a sampiyāyana bhāvena

original: ārammaṇasmiṃ paṭihaññatīti paṭighaṃ. Tena sampayuttanti paṭighasampayuttaṃ.
analyzed: ārammaṇasmim paṭihaññati iti paṭigham tena sampayuttanti paṭigha sampayuttam

original: Dhammuddese tīsupi ṭhānesu domanassavedanāva āgatā. Tattha vedanāpadaṃ vuttameva.
analyzed: dhamma uddese tīsu pi ṭhānesu domanassa vedanā ā āgatā tattha vedanā padam vuttam eva

original: Tathā dukkhadomanassapadāni lakkhaṇādito pana aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ domanassaṃ,
analyzed: tathā dukkha domanassa padāni lakkhaṇa āditaḥ pana aniṭṭha ārammaṇa anubhavana lakkhaṇam domanassam

original: yathātathā vā aniṭṭhākārasambhogarasaṃ, cetasikābādhapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, ekanteneva hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: yathā tathā vā aniṭṭha ākāra sambhoga rasam cetasika ābādha paccupaṭṭhānam ekantena iva hadaya vatthu padaṭṭhānam

original: Mūlakammapathesu yathā purimacittesu lobho hoti, abhijjhā hotīti āgataṃ, evaṃ doso
analyzed: mūla kamma pathesu yathā purima cittesu lobhaḥ hoti abhijjhā hoti iti āgatam evam doso

original: hoti, byāpādo hotīti vuttaṃ. Tattha dussanti tena, sayaṃ vā dussati, dussanamattameva
analyzed: hoti byāpādaḥ hoti iti vuttam tattha dussanti tena sayam vā dussati dussana mattam eva

original: vā tanti doso so caṇḍikkalakkhaṇo pahaṭāsiviso viya, visappanaraso visanipāto viya,
analyzed: vā doso so caṇḍikka lakkhaṇo pahaṭa asi visaḥ viya visappana rasaḥ visa nipātaḥ viya

original: attano nissayadahanaraso vā dāvaggi viya, dussanapaccupaṭṭhāno laddhokāso viya sapatto,
analyzed: attanaḥ nissaya dahana rasaḥ vā dāvaggi viya dussana paccupaṭṭhāno laddha ukāsaḥ viya sa patto

original: āghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: āghāta vatthu padaṭṭhānaḥ visa saṃsaṭṭha pūti muttam viya daṭṭhabbo

original: Byāpajjati tena cittaṃ, pūtibhāvaṃ upagacchati, byāpādayati vā vinayācārarūpasampattihitasukhādīnīti
analyzed: byāpajjati tena cittam pūti bhāvam upagacchati byāpādayati vā vinaya ācāra rūpa sampatti hita sukha ādīni iti

original: byāpādo. Atthato panesa dosoyeva. Idha padapaṭipāṭiyā ekūnatiṃsa padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena
analyzed: byāpādaḥ atthato pana isa doso yā iva idha pada paṭipāṭiyā ekūnatiṃsa padāni honti aggahita ggahaṇena

original: cuddasa. Tesaṃ vasena savibhattikāvibhattikarāsibhedo veditabbo.
analyzed: tesam vasena sa vibhattika avibhattika rāsi bhedaḥ veditabbo

original: Yevāpanakesu chandādhimokkhamanasikārauddhaccāni niyatāni. Issāmacchariyakukkuccesu
analyzed: yevāpanakesu chanda adhimokkha manasikāra auddhaccāni niyatāni issā macchariya kukkuccesu

original: pana aññatarena saddhiṃ pañca pañca hutvāpi uppajjanti. Evamepi tayo dhammā aniyatayevāpanakā
analyzed: pana aññatarena saddhim pañca pañca hutvā api uppajjanti evam epi tayo dhammā

original: nāma. Tesu issatīti ‘issā’. Sā parasampattīnaṃ usūyanalakkhaṇā, tattheva anabhiratirasā,
analyzed: nāma tesu issati iti issā sā para sampattīnam usūyana lakkhaṇā tattha eva an abhirati rasā

original: tato vimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā, parasampattipadaṭṭhānā. Saṃyojananti daṭṭhabbā. Maccherabhāvo
analyzed: tatas vimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānā para sampatti padaṭṭhānā saṃyojanan ti daṭṭhabbā maccherabhāvo

original: ‘macchariyaṃ’. Taṃ laddhānaṃ vā labhitabbānaṃ vā attano sampattīnaṃ nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ,
analyzed: macchariyam tam laddhānam vā labhitabbānam vā attanaḥ sampattīnam nigūhana lakkhaṇam

original: tāsaṃyeva parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaakkhamanarasaṃ, saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ kaṭukañcukatāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tāsam yeva parehi sādhāraṇa bhāva akkhamana rasam saṅkocana paccupaṭṭhānam kaṭu kañcuka tā paccupaṭṭhānam

original: vā, attasampattipadaṭṭhānaṃ. Cetaso virūpabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukataṃ.
analyzed: vā atta sampatti padaṭṭhānam cetasaḥ virūpa bhāvaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam kucchitam katam ku katam

original: Tassa bhāvo ‘kukkuccaṃ’. Taṃ pacchānutāpalakkhaṇaṃ, katākatānusocanarasaṃ, vippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: tassa bhāvaḥ kukkuccam tam pacchā anutāpa lakkhaṇam kata akata anusocana rasam vippaṭisāra paccupaṭṭhānam

original: katākatapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Dāsabyaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva uddesavāre viseso.
analyzed: kata akata padaṭṭhānam dāsabyam viya daṭṭhabbam ayam tāva uddesa vāre viseso

original: 415. Niddesavāre vedanāniddese asātaṃ sātapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: niddesa vāre vedanā niddese asātam sāta paṭipakkha vasena veditabbam

original: 418. Dosaniddese dussatīti doso. Dussanāti dussanākāro. Dussitattanti dussitabhāvo.
analyzed: dosa niddese dussati iti dosaḥ dussanā ati dussana ākāraḥ dussita ttanti dussita bhāvaḥ

original: Pakatibhāvavijahanaṭṭhena byāpajjanaṃ byāpatti. Byāpajjanāti byāpajjanākāro. Virujjhatīti
analyzed: pakati bhāva vijahana ṭṭhena byāpajjanam byāpatti byāpajjanāti byāpajjana ākāraḥ virujjhati iti

original: virodho. Punappunaṃ virujjhatīti paṭivirodho. Viruddhākārapaṭiviruddhākāravasena
analyzed: virodhaḥ punappunam virujjhati iti paṭivirodhaḥ viruddha ākāra paṭiviruddha ākāra vasena

original: vā idaṃ vuttaṃ. Caṇḍiko vuccati caṇḍo, thaddhapuggalo; tassa bhāvo caṇḍikkaṃ. Na
analyzed: vā idam vuttam caṇḍikaḥ vuccati caṇḍaḥ thaddha puggalo tassa bhāvaḥ caṇḍikkam na

original: etena suropitaṃ vacanaṃ hoti, duruttaṃ aparipuṇṇameva hotīti asuropo. Kuddhakāle
analyzed: etena su ropitam vacanam hoti duruttam a paripuṇṇam eva hoti iti a suropaḥ kuddha kāle

original: hi paripuṇṇavacanaṃ nāma natthi. Sacepi kassaci hoti taṃ appamāṇaṃ. Apare pana assujananaṭṭhena
analyzed: hi paripuṇṇa vacanam nāma natthi sace pi kassaci hoti tam appamāṇam apare pana assu janana ṭṭhena

original: assuropanato assuropoti vadanti. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ, somanassassāpi assujananato. Heṭṭhā
analyzed: assuropanataḥ assuropaḥ iti vadanti tam akāraṇam somanassassa api assu jananato heṭṭhā

original: vuttaattamanatāpaṭipakkhato na attamanatāti anattamanatā. Sā pana yasmā cittasseva,
analyzed: vutta attamana tā paṭipakkhato na attamana tā ati anattamana tā sā pana yasmā cittassa iva

original: na sattassa, tasmā cittassāti vuttaṃ. Sesamettha saṅgahasuññatavāresu ca heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
analyzed: na sattassa tasmā cittassa ati vuttam sesam ettha saṅgaha suññata vāresu ca heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbanti

original: Dasamacittaṃ
analyzed: dasama cittam

original: 421. Dasamaṃ sasaṅkhārattā parehi ussāhitassa vā, paresaṃ vā aparādhaṃ sāritassa, sayameva vā paresaṃ aparādhaṃ anussaritvā kujjhamānassa uppajjati.
analyzed: dasamam sa saṅkhāra ttā parehi ussāhitassa vā paresam vā aparādham sāritassa sayam eva vā paresam aparādham anussaritvā kujjhamānassa uppajjati

original: Idhāpi padapaṭipāṭiyā ekūnatiṃsa, aggahitaggahaṇena ca cuddaseva padāni honti. Yevāpanakesu
analyzed: idha api pada paṭipāṭiyā ekūnatiṃsa aggahita ggahaṇena ca cuddasa iva padāni honti yevāpanakesu

original: pana thinamiddhampi labbhati. Tasmā ettha vinā issāmacchariyakukkuccehi cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni
analyzed: pana thinam iddham pi labbhati tasmai ettha vinā issā macchariya kukkuccehi cattāri apaṇṇakaṅgāni

original: thinamiddhanti ime cha issādīnaṃ uppattikāle tesu aññatarena saddhiṃ satta yevāpanakā
analyzed: thinamiddhanti ime cha issa ādīnam uppatti kāle tesu aññatarena saddhim satta

original: ekakkhaṇe uppajjanti. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ sabbavāresu navamasadisameva. Imesu pana dvīsu
analyzed: eka kkhaṇe uppajjanti sesam sabbam sabba vāresu navama sadisam eva imesu pana dvīsu

original: domanassacittesu sahajātādhipatiyeva labbhati, na ārammaṇādhipati. Na hi kuddho kiñci garuṃ karotīti.
analyzed: domanassa cittesu sahajāta adhipatiyā iva labbhati na ārammaṇa adhipati na hi kuddhaḥ kiñci garum karoti iti

original: Ekādasamacittaṃ
analyzed: ekādasama cittam

original: 422. Ekādasamaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattassa kaṅkhāpavattikāle uppajjati.
analyzed: ekādasamam chasu ārammaṇesu vedanā vasena majjhattassa kaṅkhā pavatti kāle uppajjati

original: Tassa samayavavatthāne vicikicchāsampayuttanti padaṃ apubbaṃ. Tassattho – vicikicchāya
analyzed: tassa samaya vavatthāne vicikicchā sampayuttanti padam apubbam tassa atthaḥ vicikicchāya

original: sampayuttanti vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ. Dhammuddese ‘vicikicchā hotī’ti padameva viseso.
analyzed: sampayuttan ti vicikicchā sampayuttam dhamma uddese vicikicchā hoti iti padam eva visesaḥ

original: Tattha vigatā cikicchāti vicikicchā. Sabhāvaṃ vā vicinanto etāya kicchati kilamatīti
analyzed: tattha vigatā cikicchāti vicikicchā sabhāvam vā vicinantaḥ etāya kicchati kilamati iti

original: vā, ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhānā. Paṭipattiantarāyakarāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: vā a yoniso manasikāra padaṭṭhānā paṭipatti antarāya karā ati daṭṭhabbā

original: Idha padapaṭipāṭiyā tevīsati padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena cuddasa. Tesaṃ vasena savibhattikāvibhattikarāsivinicchayo veditabbo. Manasikāro uddhaccanti dveyeva yevāpanakā.
analyzed: idha pada paṭipāṭiyā tevīsati padāni honti aggahita ggahaṇena cuddasa tesam vasena sa vibhattika avibhattika rāsi vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ manasikāraḥ

original: 424. Niddesavārassa cittassekaggatāniddese yasmā idaṃ dubbalaṃ cittaṃ pavattiṭṭhitimattakamevettha
analyzed: niddesa vārassa cittassa ikagga tā niddese yasmai idam dubbalam cittam pavatti ṭṭhiti mattakam eva ittha

original: hoti, tasmā ‘saṇṭhitī’tiādīni avatvā cittassa ‘ṭhitī’ti ekameva padaṃ vuttaṃ. Teneva

original: ca kāraṇena uddesavārepi ‘samādhindriya’ntiādi na vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ca kāraṇena uddesa vāre pi samādhi indriya nti ādi na vuttam

original: 425. Vicikicchāniddese kaṅkhanavasena kaṅkhā. Kaṅkhāya āyanāti kaṅkhāyanā. Purimakaṅkhā
analyzed: vicikicchā niddese kaṅkhana vasena kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyaḥ āyanā ati kaṅkhāyanā purima kaṅkhā

analyzed: āyita ttā kaṅkhāyitam nāma tassa bhāvaḥ kaṅkhāyita ttam namati vicikicchā

original: vuttatthā eva. Kampanaṭṭhena dvidhā eḷayatīti dveḷhakaṃ. Paṭipattinivāraṇena dvidhāpatho

analyzed: ogāhitum a sakkontī parisamantataḥ sappati iti parisappanā pariyogāhitum a samattha tāya

analyzed: a pariyogāhanā nicchaya vasena ārammaṇe pavattitum asamattha tāya thambhita ttam cittassa

original: sabbattha uttānatthameva.

original: Dvādasamacittaṃ
analyzed: dvādasama cittam

analyzed: dvādasamassa samaya vavatthāne uddhaccena sampayuttan ti uddhacca sampayuttam

original: Idañhi cittaṃ chasu ārammaṇesu vedanāvasena majjhattaṃ hutvā uddhataṃ hoti. Idha

original: padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena cuddasa. Tesaṃ vasena savibhattikāvibhattikarāsividhānaṃ
analyzed: padāni honti aggahita ggahaṇena cuddasa tesam vasena sa vibhattika avibhattika rāsi vidhānam

original: veditabbaṃ. Adhimokkho manasikāroti dveyeva yevāpanakā.
analyzed: veditabbam adhimokkhaḥ manasikāraḥ ti

analyzed: vipphandanam kathitam uddhaccam hi eka ārammaṇe vipphandati vicikicchā nānā ārammaṇe

analyzed: sesam sabba vāresu heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbam

analyzed: kati iti hi vutte imān eva dve ti vattabbam tattha vicikicchā sahagatam ekantena

analyzed: ekantena iva pavaṭṭati caturasso patiṭṭhāya patiṭṭhāya pavaṭṭati evaṃsampadam idam

analyzed: paṭṭhāne ca paṭisiddhataḥ

analyzed: akusalāḥ dhammā atipadassa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: a byākata padam

original: Ahetukakusalavipāko
analyzed: ahetuka kusala vipākaḥ

analyzed: vipāka abyākate pi kusala vipākam tasmin pi paritta vipākam tasmin pi ahetukam tasmin pi

original: pañcaviññāṇaṃ. Tasmimpi dvārapaṭipāṭiyā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Tassāpi, ṭhapetvā dvārārammaṇādisādhāraṇapaccayaṃ,
analyzed: pañca viññāṇam tasmim pi dvāra paṭipāṭiyā cakkhu viññāṇam tassa api ṭhapetvā dvāra ārammaṇa ādi sādhāraṇa paccayam

analyzed: kata ttā atiādi vuttam tattha kata ttā ati kata kāraṇā upacita ttā ati ācita ttā vaḍḍhita kāraṇā

analyzed: vā nissitam viññāṇanti cakkhu viññāṇam paratas sota viññāṇa ādīsu pi esa eva nayo

original: Tattha cakkhusannissitarūpavijānanalakkhaṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, rūpamattārammaṇarasaṃ,
analyzed: tattha cakkhu sannissita rūpa vijānana lakkhaṇam cakkhu viññāṇam rūpa matta ārammaṇa rasam

analyzed: rūpa abhimukha bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam rūpa ārammaṇāya kiriya manaḥ dhātuyāḥ apagama padaṭṭhānam

original: Parato āgatāni sotādisannissitasaddādivijānanalakkhaṇāni sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni

analyzed: kiriya manaḥ dhātūnam apagama padaṭṭhānāni

original: Idha padapaṭipāṭiyā dasa padāni honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena satta. Tesu pañca avibhattikāni,
analyzed: idha pada paṭipāṭiyā dasa padāni honti aggahita ggahaṇena satta tesu pañca a vibhattikāni

original: dve savibhattikāni. Tesu cittaṃ phassapañcakavasena ceva indriyavasena ca dvīsu ṭhānesu
analyzed: dve savibhattikāni tesu cittam phassa pañcaka vasena ca iva indriya vasena ca dvīsu ṭhānesu

analyzed: vibhattim gacchati vedanā

original: imeva tayo honti. Yevāpanako eko manasikāro eva.
analyzed: ime iva tayaḥ honti ekaḥ manasikāraḥ eva

original: 436. Niddesavāre cakkhuviññāṇaṃ paṇḍaranti vatthuto vuttaṃ. Kusalañhi attano parisuddhatāya paṇḍaraṃ nāma, akusalaṃ bhavaṅganissandena, vipākaṃ vatthupaṇḍarattā.
analyzed: niddesa vāre cakkhu viññāṇam paṇḍaranti vatthutaḥ vuttam kusalam hi attanaḥ parisuddha tāya paṇḍaram nāma akusalam bhavaṅga nissandena vipākam vatthu paṇḍara ttā

original: 439. Cittassekaggatāniddese cittassa ṭhitīti ekameva padaṃ vuttaṃ. Idampi hi dubbalaṃ

analyzed: cittam pavatti ṭṭhitimattam eva ittha labbhati saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti bhāvam pāpuṇitum

original: na sakkoti. Saṅgahavāre jhānaṅgamaggaṅgāni na uddhaṭāni. Kasmā? Vitakkapacchimakañhi
analyzed: na sakkoti saṅgaha vāre jhānaṅga maggaṅgāni na uddhaṭāni kasmā

original: jhānaṃ nāma, hetupacchimako maggo nāma. Pakatiyā avitakkacitte jhānaṅgaṃ na labbhati,
analyzed: jhānam nāma hetu pacchimakaḥ maggo nāma pakatiyā avitakka citte jhāna aṅgam na labbhati

original: ahetukacitte ca maggaṅgāni. Tasmā idha ubhayampi na uddhaṭaṃ. Saṅkhārakkhandhopettha
analyzed: ahetuka citte ca maggaṅgāni tasmai idha ubhayam pi na uddhaṭam saṅkhāra kkhandha upettha

original: caturaṅgikoyeva bhājito. Suññatavāro pākatikoyeva. Sotaviññāṇādiniddesāpi imināva nayena veditabbā.
analyzed: caturaṅgikaḥ yā iva bhājitaḥ suññata vāro pākatikaḥ yā iva sota viññāṇa ādi niddesā api iminā ava nayena veditabbā

original: Kevalañhi cakkhuviññāṇādīsu ‘upekkhā’ bhājitā, kāyaviññāṇe ‘sukha’nti, ayamettha
analyzed: kevalam hi cakkhu viññāṇa ādīsu upekkhā bhājitā kāya viññāṇe sukhanti ayam ettha

original: viseso. Sopi ca ghaṭṭanavasena hotīti veditabbo. Cakkhudvārādīsu hi catūsu upādārūpameva
analyzed: visesaḥ saḥ api ca ghaṭṭana vasena hoti iti veditabbo cakkhu dvāra ādīsu hi catūsu upādā rūpam eva

original: upādārūpaṃ ghaṭṭeti, upādārūpeyeva upādārūpaṃ ghaṭṭente paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso balavā

analyzed: vipāka uddhāra kathā

original: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe lobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva luddho ceva hoti dandho ca, sukhasīlako pana hoti akkodhano.

original: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva appakileso hoti, dibbārammaṇampi disvā niccalo, duṭṭho pana hoti dandhapañño cāti.

original: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhādosamohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti, sukhasīlako ca, dandho pana hoti.
analyzed: yassa pana kamma āyūhana kkhaṇe alobhā dosa mohāḥ balavantaḥ honti itare mandā so purima nayena iva aluddhaḥ ca iva hoti sukha sīlako ca dandhaḥ pana hoti

original: ‘Tathā yassa kammāyūhanakkhaṇe alobhadosāmohā balavanto honti itare mandā, so purimanayeneva aluddho ceva hoti paññavā ca, duṭṭho ca pana hoti kodhano.

original: ‘Yassa pana kammāyūhanakkhaṇe tayopi alobhādayo balavanto honti lobhādayo mandā, so mahāsaṅgharakkhitatthero viya aluddho aduṭṭho paññavā ca hotī’ti.

original: Aparampi imasmiṃ ṭhāne hetukittanaṃ nāma gahitaṃ. Tihetukakammañhi tihetukampi duhetukampi

original: Tato hatthaṃ pasāretvā phalaṃ gahetvā madditvā upasiṅghitvā paribhuñji.
analyzed: tatas hattham pasāretvā phalam gahetvā madditvā upasiṅghitvā paribhuñji

original: Tattha, tassa purisassa ambarukkhamūle niddāyanakālo viya bhavaṅgasamaṅgikālo. Ambapakkassa
analyzed: tattha tassa purisassa amba rukkha mūle niddāyana kālaḥ viya bhavaṅga samaṅgi kālaḥ amba pakkassa

original: vaṇṭato muccitvā kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ puñchamānassa patanakālo viya ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanakālo.
analyzed: vaṇṭataḥ muccitvā kaṇṇa sakkhalim puñchamānassa patana kālaḥ viya ārammaṇassa pasāda ghaṭṭana kālo

original: Tena saddena pabuddhakālo viya kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo. Ummīletvā
analyzed: tena saddena pabuddha kālaḥ viya kiriya manodhātuyāḥ bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭita kālaḥ ummīletvā

original: olokitakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa dassanakiccasādhanakālo. Hatthaṃ pasāretvā gahitakālo
analyzed: olokita kālaḥ viya cakkhu viññāṇassa dassana kicca sādhana kālaḥ hattham pasāretvā gahita kālaḥ

original: viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo. Gahetvā madditakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā
analyzed: viya vipāka manaḥ dhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchita kālaḥ gahetvā maddita kālaḥ viya vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā

original: ārammaṇassa santīraṇakālo. Upasiṅghitakālo viya kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa
analyzed: ārammaṇassa santīraṇa kālo upasiṅghita kālo viya kiriya manas viññāṇa dhātuyā ārammaṇassa

original: vavatthāpitakālo. Paribhuttakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitakālo. Ayaṃ
analyzed: vavatthāpita kālo paribhutta kālaḥ viya javanassa ārammaṇa rasam anubhavita kālaḥ ayaṃ

original: upamā kiṃ dīpeti? Ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanameva kiccaṃ. Tena pasāde ghaṭṭite kiriyamanodhātuyā
analyzed: upamā kim dīpeti ārammaṇassa pasāda ghaṭṭanam eva kiccam tena pasāde ghaṭṭite kiriya manaḥ dhātuyā

original: bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanameva, cakkhuviññāṇassa dassanamattakameva, vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇasampaṭicchanamattakameva,
analyzed: bhavaṅga avaṭṭanam eva cakkhu viññāṇassa dassana mattakam eva vipāka manaḥ dhātuyā ārammaṇa sampaṭicchana mattakam eva

original: vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇasantīraṇamattakameva, kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇavavatthāpanamattakameva
analyzed: vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyāḥ ārammaṇa santīraṇa mattakam eva kiriya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyāḥ ārammaṇa vavatthāpana mattakam eva

original: kiccaṃ. Ekantena pana ārammaṇarasaṃ javanameva anubhavatīti dīpeti.
analyzed: kiccam ekantena pana ārammaṇa rasam javanam eva anubhavati iti dīpeti

original: Ettha ca ‘tvaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ nāma hohi, tvaṃ āvajjanaṃ nāma, tvaṃ dassanaṃ nāma, tvaṃ
analyzed: ettha ca tvam bhavaṅgam nāma hohi tvam āvajjanam nāma tvam dassanam nāma tvam

original: sampaṭicchanaṃ nāma, tvaṃ santīraṇaṃ nāma, tvaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ nāma, tvaṃ javanaṃ nāma,
analyzed: sampaṭicchanam nāma tvam santīraṇam nāma tvam voṭṭhabbanam nāma tvam javanam nāma

original: hohī’ti koci kattā vā kāretā vā natthi.
analyzed: hohi iti koci kattā vā kāretā vā natthi

original: Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne pañcavidhaṃ niyāmaṃ nāma gaṇhiṃsu – bījaniyāmaṃ utuniyāmaṃ kammaniyāmaṃ
analyzed: imasmin pana ṭhāne pañcavidham niyāmam nāma gaṇhiṃsu bīja niyāmam utu niyāmam kamma niyāmam

original: dhammaniyāmaṃ cittaniyāmanti. Tattha kulatthagacchassa uttaraggabhāvo, dakkhiṇavalliyā
analyzed: dhamma niyāmam citta niyāmam ti tattha kulatthagacchassa uttaragga bhāvaḥ dakkhiṇa valliyā

original: dakkhiṇato rukkhapariharaṇaṃ, sūriyāvaṭṭapupphānaṃ sūriyābhimukhabhāvo, māluvalatāya
analyzed: dakkhiṇatas rukkha pariharaṇam sūriya avaṭṭa pupphānam sūriya abhimukha bhāvaḥ māluva latāya

original: rukkhābhimukhagamanameva, nāḷikerassa matthake chiddasabbhāvoti tesaṃ tesaṃ bījānaṃ
analyzed: rukkha abhimukha gamanam eva nāḷikerassa matthake chidda sabbhāvaḥ ti tesam tesam bījānam

original: taṃtaṃsadisaphaladānaṃ bījaniyāmo nāma. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye tesaṃ tesaṃ rukkhānaṃ
analyzed: taṃ taṃ sadisa phala dānam bījaniyāmaḥ nāma tasmin tasmin samaye tesam tesam rukkhānam

original: ekappahāreneva pupphaphalapallavaggahaṇaṃ utuniyāmo nāma. Tihetukakammaṃ tihetukaduhetukāhetukavipākaṃ
analyzed: eka ppahārena iva puppha phala pallava ggahaṇam utuniyāmaḥ nāma ti hetuka kammam ti hetuka duhetuka ahetuka vipākam

original: deti. Duhetukakammaṃ duhetukāhetukavipākaṃ deti, tihetukaṃ na detīti, evaṃ tassa
analyzed: deti du hetuka kammam du hetuka ahetuka vipākam deti ti hetukam na deti iti evam tassa

original: tassa kammassa taṃtaṃsadisavipākadānameva kammaniyāmo nāma.
analyzed: tassa kammassa taṃ taṃsa disa vipāka dānam eva kammaniyāmaḥ nāma

original: Aparopi kammasarikkhakavipākavaseneva kammaniyāmo hoti. Tassa dīpanatthamidaṃ vatthuṃ
analyzed: aparaḥ api kamma sarikkhaka vipāka vasena iva kamma niyāmaḥ hoti tassa dīpana attham idam vatthum

original: kathenti – sammāsambuddhakāle sāvatthiyā dvāragāmo jhāyi. Tato pajjalitaṃ tiṇakaraḷaṃ
analyzed: kathenti sammāsambuddha kāle sāvatthiyāḥ dvāra gāmaḥ jhāyi tatas pajjalitam tiṇa karaḷam

original: uṭṭhahitvā ākāsena gacchato kākassa gīvāya paṭimuñci. So viravanto bhūmiyaṃ patitvā
analyzed: uṭṭhahitvā ākāsena gacchataḥ kākassa gīvāya paṭimuñci saḥ viravantaḥ bhūmiyam patitvā

original: kālamakāsi. Mahāsamuddepi ekā nāvā niccalā aṭṭhāsi. Heṭṭhā kenaci niruddhabhāvaṃ
analyzed: kālam akāsi mahā samudde pi ekā nāvā niccalā aṭṭhāsi heṭṭhā kenacid niruddha bhāvam

original: apassantā kāḷakaṇṇisalākaṃ vicāresuṃ. Sā nāvikasseva upāsikāya hatthe pati. Tato
analyzed: a passantā kāḷa kaṇṇi salākam vicāresum sā nāvikassa iva upāsikāya hatthe pati tatas

original: ekissā kāraṇā mā sabbe nassantu, udake naṃ khipāmāti āhaṃsu. Nāviko ‘na sakkhissāmi
analyzed: ekissā kāraṇā mā sabbe nassantu udake nam khipāma ati āhaṃsu nāvikaḥ na sakkhissāmi

original: etaṃ udake uppilavamānaṃ passitu’nti vālikāghaṭaṃ gīvāyaṃ bandhāpetvā khipāpesi.
analyzed: etam udake uppilavamānam passitunti vālikā ghaṭam bandhāpetvā khipāpesi

original: Taṅkhaṇaññeva nāvā khittasaro viya pakkhandi. Eko bhikkhu leṇe vasati. Mahantaṃ pabbatakūṭaṃ
analyzed: taṅkhaṇaññā iva nāvā khitta saraḥ viya pakkhandi ekaḥ bhikkhu leṇe vasati mahantam pabbata kūṭaṃ

original: patitvā dvāraṃ pidahi. Taṃ sattame divase sayameva apagataṃ. Sammāsambuddhassa jetavane
analyzed: patitvā dvāram tam sattame divase sayam eva apagatam sammāsambuddhassa jetavane

original: nisīditvā dhammaṃ kathentassa imāni tīṇi vatthūni ekappahāreneva ārocesuṃ. Satthā
analyzed: nisīditvā dhammam kathentassa imāni tīṇi vatthūni eka ppahārena iva ārocesum satthā

original: ‘na etaṃ aññehi kataṃ, tehi katakammameva ta’nti atītaṃ āharitvā dassento āha –
analyzed: na etam aññehi katam tehi kata kammam eva tanti atītam āharitvā dassentaḥ āha

original: Kāko purimattabhāve manusso hutvā ekaṃ duṭṭhagoṇaṃ dametuṃ asakkonto gīvāya palālaveṇiṃ
analyzed: kāko purimatta bhāve manussaḥ hutvā ekam duṭṭha goṇam dametum a sakkontaḥ gīvāya palāla veṇim

original: bandhitvā aggiṃ adāsi. Goṇo teneva mato. Idāni taṃ kammaṃ etassa ākāsena gacchatopi
analyzed: bandhitvā aggim adāsi goṇo tena iva mataḥ idāni tam kammam etassa ākāsena gacchataḥ pi

original: na muccituṃ adāsi. Sāpi itthī purimattabhāve ekā itthīyeva. Eko kukkuro tāya paricito
analyzed: na muccitum adāsi sā api itthī purimatta bhāve ekā itthīyā iva ekaḥ kukkuro tāya paricito

original: hutvā araññaṃ gacchantiyā saddhiṃ gacchati, saddhimevāgacchati. Manussā ‘nikkhanto
analyzed: hutvā araññam gacchantiyā saddhim gacchati saddhim eva āgacchati manussāḥ nikkhantaḥ

original: idāni amhākaṃ sunakhaluddako’ti uppaṇḍenti. Sā tena aṭṭīyamānā kukkuraṃ nivāretuṃ
analyzed: idāni amhākam su nakha luddakā iti uppaṇḍenti sā tena aṭṭīyamānā kukkuram nivāretum

original: asakkontī vālikāghaṭaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā udake khipi. Taṃ kammaṃ tassā samuddamajjhe
analyzed: a sakkontī vālikā ghaṭam gīvāya bandhitvā udake tam kammam tassā samudda majjhe

original: muccituṃ nādāsi. Sopi bhikkhu purimattabhāve gopālako hutvā bilaṃ paviṭṭhāya godhāya
analyzed: muccitum na adāsi saḥ api bhikkhu purimatta bhāve gopālakaḥ hutvā bilam paviṭṭhāya godhāya

original: sākhābhaṅgamuṭṭhiyā dvāraṃ thakesi. Tato sattame divase sayaṃ āgantvā vivari. Godhā
analyzed: sākhā bhaṅga muṭṭhiyā dvāram thakesi tatas sattame divase sayam āgantvā vivari godhā

original: kampamānā nikkhami. Karuṇāya taṃ na māresi. Taṃ kammaṃ tassa pabbatantaraṃ pavisitvā
analyzed: kampamānā nikkhami karuṇāya tam na māresi tam kammam tassa pabbata antaram pavisitvā

original: nisinnassa muccituṃ nādāsīti. Imāni tīṇi vatthūni samodhānetvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
analyzed: nisinnassa muccitum na adāsi iti imāni tīṇi vatthūni samodhānetvā imam gātham āha

original: “Na antalikkhe na samuddamajjhe,
analyzed: na antalikkhe na samudda majjhe

original: Na pabbatānaṃ vivaraṃ pavissa;
analyzed: na pabbatānam vivaram pavissa

original: Na vijjate so jagatippadeso,
analyzed: na vijjate saḥ jagati padesaḥ

original: Yatthaṭṭhito mucceyya pāpakammā”ti. ;
analyzed: yatthaṭṭhitaḥ mucceyya pāpa kamma ati

original: Ayampi kammaniyāmoyeva nāma. Aññānipi evarūpāni vatthūni kathetabbāni.
analyzed: ayam pi kammaniyāmo yā iva nāma aññāni pi evarūpāni vatthūni kathetabbāni

original: Bodhisattānaṃ pana paṭisandhiggahaṇe, mātukucchito nikkhamane, abhisambodhiyaṃ tathāgatassa
analyzed: bodhisattānam pana paṭisandhi ggahaṇe mātukucchitaḥ nikkhamane abhisambodhiyam tathāgatassa

original: dhammacakkappavattane, āyusaṅkhārassa ossajjane, parinibbāne ca dasasahassacakkavāḷakampanaṃ dhammaniyāmo nāma.
analyzed: dhammacakka ppavattane āyu saṅkhārassa ossajjane parinibbāne ca dasa sahassa cakkavāḷa kampanam dhammaniyāmaḥ nāma

original: Ārammaṇena pana pasāde ghaṭṭite ‘tvaṃ āvajjanaṃ nāma hohi…pe… tvaṃ javanaṃ nāma hohī’ti
analyzed: ārammaṇena pana pasāde ghaṭṭite tvam āvajjanam nāma hohipe tvam javanam nāma hohi iti

original: koci kattā vā kāretā vā natthi, attano attano pana dhammatāya eva ārammaṇena pasādassa
analyzed: koci kattā vā kāretā vā natthi attano attano pana dhamma tāya eva ārammaṇena pasādassa

original: ghaṭṭitakālato paṭṭhāya kiriyamanodhātucittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ

analyzed: dassana kiccam sādheti vipāka manaḥ dhātu sampaṭicchana kiccam sādheti vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: santīraṇakiccaṃ sādheti, kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ sādheti, javanaṃ
analyzed: santīraṇa kiccam sādheti kiriya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu voṭṭhabbana kiccam sādheti javanam

original: ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavatīti ayaṃ cittaniyāmo nāma. Ayaṃ idha adhippeto.
analyzed: ārammaṇa rasam anubhavati iti ayam citta niyāmaḥ nāma ayam idha adhippeto

original: Sasaṅkhārikatihetukakusalenāpi upekkhāsahagatehi asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikakusalacittehipi
analyzed: sa saṅkhārika ti hetuka kusalena api upekkhā sahagatehi asaṅkhārika sa saṅkhārika kusala cittehi pi

original: kamme āyūhite taṃsadisavipākacittehi ādinnāya paṭisandhiyā eseva nayo. Upekkhāsahagatadvaye
analyzed: kamme āyūhite tad sadisa vipāka cittehi ādinnāya paṭisandhiyā esa eva nayaḥ upekkhā sahagata dvaye

original: pana paṭhamaṃ ‘iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇavasena’ pavattiṃ dassetvā pacchā ‘iṭṭhārammaṇavasena’ dassetabbā.

original: Evampi ekekasmiṃ dvāre dvādasa dvādasa hutvā samasaṭṭhi honti. Aggahitaggahaṇena soḷasa vipākacittāni uppajjanti.
analyzed: evam pi ekekasmin dvāre dvādasa dvādasa hutvā samasaṭṭhi honti aggahita ggahaṇena soḷasa vipāka cittāni uppajjanti

original: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne pañcaucchunāḷiyantopamaṃ nāma gaṇhiṃsu. Ucchupīḷanasamaye kira ekasmā

original: gāmā ekādasa yantavāhā nikkhamitvā ekaṃ ucchuvāṭaṃ disvā tassa paripakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā

original: ucchusāmikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ‘yantavāhā maya’nti ārocesuṃ. So ‘ahaṃ tumheyeva pariyesāmī’ti

analyzed: ucchusālam te gahetvā agamāsi te tattha nāḷiyantam sajjetvā mayam ekādasa janā

original: aparampi ekaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, vetanena gaṇhathā’ti āhaṃsu. Ucchusāmiko ‘ahameva
analyzed: aparam pi ekam laddhum vaṭṭati vetanena gaṇhatha iti āhaṃsu ucchu sāmikaḥ aham eva

original: sahāyo bhavissāmī’ti ucchūnaṃ sālaṃ pūrāpetvā tesaṃ sahāyo ahosi. Te attano attano
analyzed: sahāyaḥ bhavissāmi iti ucchūnam sālam pūrāpetvā tesam sahāyaḥ ahosi te attanaḥ attanaḥ

original: kiccāni katvā, phāṇitapācakena ucchurase pakke, guḷabandhakena baddhe, ucchusāmikena
analyzed: kiccāni katvā phāṇitapācakena ucchu rase pakke guḷa bandhakena baddhe ucchu sāmikena

original: tulayitvā bhāgesu dinnesu, attano attano bhāgaṃ ādāya ucchusālaṃ sāmikassa paṭicchāpetvā,
analyzed: tulayitvā bhāgesu dinnesu attanaḥ attanaḥ bhāgam ādāya ucchu sālam sāmikassa paṭicchāpetvā

original: eteneva upāyena aparāsupi catūsu sālāsu kammaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.

original: Tattha pañca yantasālā viya pañca pasādā daṭṭhabbā. Pañca ucchuvāṭā viya pañca ārammaṇāni.
analyzed: tattha pañca yantasālā viya pañca pasādāḥ daṭṭhabbā pañca ucchuvāṭāḥ viya pañca ārammaṇāni

original: Ekādasa vicaraṇakayantavāhā viya ekādasa vipākacittāni. Pañca ucchusālāsāmino viya
analyzed: ekādasa vicaraṇaka yantavāhāḥ ekādasa vipāka cittāni pañca

original: pañcaviññāṇāni. Paṭhamakasālāyaṃ sāmikena saddhiṃ dvādasannaṃ janānaṃ ekatova hutvā
