original: katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya ekādasannaṃ vipākacittānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ
analyzed: kata kammānam bhāga ggahaṇa kālo viya ekādasannam vipāka cittānam cakkhu viññāṇena saddhiṃ

original: ekato hutvā cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo. Sālāsāmikassa sālāya
analyzed: ekatas hutvā cakkhu dvāre rūpa ārammaṇe saka saka kicca karaṇa kālo sālā sāmikassa sālāya

original: sampaṭicchanakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ. Dutiya tatiya catuttha
analyzed: sampaṭicchana kālaḥ viya cakkhu viññāṇassa dvāra saṅkanti akaraṇam

original: pañcamasālāya dvādasannaṃ ekato hutvā katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya ekādasannaṃ
analyzed: pañcama sālāya dvādasannam ekatas hutvā kata kammānam bhāga ggahaṇa kālaḥ viya ekādasannam

original: vipākacittānaṃ kāyaviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo.
analyzed: vipāka cittānam kāya viññāṇena saddhim ekatas hutvā kāya dvāre phoṭṭhabba ārammaṇe sakasaka kicca karaṇa kālo

original: Sālāsāmikassa sālāya sampaṭicchanakālo viya kāyaviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: sālā sāmikassa sālāya sampaṭicchana kālaḥ viya kāya viññāṇassa dvāra saṅkanti a karaṇam

original: veditabbaṃ. Ettāvatā tihetukakammena paṭisandhi tihetukā hotīti vāro kathito. Yā
analyzed: veditabbam ettāvatā ti hetuka kammena paṭisandhi ti hetukā hoti iti vāraḥ kathitaḥ yā

original: pana tena duhetukapaṭisandhi hoti, sā paṭicchannāva hutvā gatā.
analyzed: pana tena du hetuka paṭisandhi hoti sā paṭicchannā ava hutvā gatā

original: Idāni duhetukakammena duhetukā paṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathetabbo. Duhetukena hi somanassasahagataasaṅkhārikacittena
analyzed: idāni du hetuka kammena du hetukā paṭisandhi hoti iti vāraḥ kathetabbaḥ du hetukena hi somanassa sahagata asaṅkhārika cittena

original: kamme āyūhite taṃsadiseneva duhetukavipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa vuttanayeneva
analyzed: kamme āyūhite tad sadisena iva du hetuka vipāka cittena gahita paṭisandhikassa vutta nayena iva

original: cakkhudvāre ‘iṭṭhārammaṇe’ āpāthamāgate tayo moghavārā. Duhetukasomanassasahagataasaṅkhārikajavanāvasāne
analyzed: cakkhu dvāre iṭṭha ārammaṇe āpātham āgate tayaḥ moghavārāḥ du hetuka somanassa sahagata asaṅkhārika javana avasāne

original: taṃsadisameva mūlabhavaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ. Sasaṅkhārikajavanāvasāne taṃsadisameva
analyzed: taṃsadisam eva mūla bhavaṅga saṅkhātam tad ārammaṇam sa saṅkhārika javana avasāne taṃsadisam eva

original: āgantukabhavaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ. ‘Iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ dvinnaṃ upekkhāsahagatajavanānaṃ
analyzed: āgantuka bhavaṅga saṅkhātam tad ārammaṇam iṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇe dvinnam upekkhā sahagata java nānam

original: avasāne tādisāneva dve tadārammaṇāni uppajjanti. Idha ekekasmiṃ dvāre aṭṭha aṭṭha
analyzed: avasāne dve tad ārammaṇāni uppajjanti idha eka ekasmin dvāre aṭṭha aṭṭha

original: katvā samacattālīsa cittāni. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre aṭṭha, sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni
analyzed: katvā sama cattālīsa cittāni aggahita ggahaṇena pana cakkhu dvāre aṭṭha sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇāni

original: cattārīti dvādasa honti. Evaṃ ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite dvādasa vipākacittāni
analyzed: cattāri iti dvādasa honti evam ekāya cetanāya kamme dvādasa vipāka cittāni

original: uppajjanti. Ambopamapañcaniyāmakathā pākatikā eva. Duhetukasesacittattayasadisavipākena
analyzed: uppajjanti ambā upama pañca niyāma kathā pākatikā eva du hetuka sesa citta ttaya sadisa vipākena

original: gahitapaṭisandhikepi eseva nayo. Yantavāhopamāya panettha satta yantavāhā. Tehi tattha
analyzed: gahita paṭisandhike pi esā iva nayaḥ yantavāha upamāya pana ittha satta yantavāhā tehi tattha

original: yante nāma sajjite sālāsāmikaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā vuttanayānusārena yojanā veditabbā.
analyzed: yante nāma sajjite sālā sāmikam aṭṭhamam katvā vutta naya anusārena yojanā veditabbā

original: Ettāvatā duhetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathito.
analyzed: ettāvatā du hetuka kammena du hetuka paṭisandhi hoti iti vāro kathito

original: Idāni ahetukapaṭisandhikathā hoti – catunnañhi duhetukakusalacittānaṃ aññatarena
analyzed: idāni ahetuka paṭisandhi kathā hoti catunnam hi du hetuka kusala cittānam aññatarena

original: kamme āyūhite kusalavipākaupekkhāsahagatāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātucittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa
analyzed: kamme āyūhite kusala vipāka aupekkhā sahagata ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu cittena gahita paṭisandhikassa

original: paṭisandhi kammasadisāti na vattabbā. Kammañhi duhetukaṃ paṭisandhi ahetukā. Tassa
analyzed: paṭisandhi kamma sadisā ti na vattabbā kammañhi du hetukam paṭisandhi ahetukā tassa

original: vuḍḍhippattassa cakkhudvāre ‘iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ āpāthamāgate purimanayeneva tayo
analyzed: vuḍḍhi pattassa cakkhu dvāre iṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇe purima nayena iva tayo

original: moghavārā veditabbā. Catunnaṃ pana duhetukakusalacittānaṃ aññatarajavanassa pariyosāne
analyzed: mogha vārā veditabbā catunnam pana du hetuka kusala cittānam aññatara javanassa pariyosāne

original: ahetukacittaṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena patiṭṭhāti. Taṃ ‘mūlabhavaṅgaṃ’‘tadārammaṇa’nti
analyzed: ahetuka cittam tad ārammaṇa bhāvena patiṭṭhāti tam mūla bhavaṅgam tad ārammaṇam ti

original: dve nāmāni labhati. Evamettha cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ
analyzed: dve nāmāni labhati evam ettha cakkhu viññāṇam sampaṭicchanam upekkhā sahagata santīraṇam

original: tadārammaṇampi upekkhāsahagatamevāti tesu ekaṃ gahetvā gaṇanūpagāni tīṇeva honti.
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam pi upekkhā sahagatam eva ati tesu ekam gahetvā gaṇanā upagāni tīṇi iva honti

original: ‘Iṭṭhārammaṇe’ pana santīraṇampi tadārammaṇampi somanassasahagatameva. Tesu ekaṃ
analyzed: iṭṭha ārammaṇe pana santi īraṇam pi tad ārammaṇam pi somanassa sahagatam eva tesu ekam

original: gahetvā purimāni tīṇi cattāri honti. Evaṃ pañcasu dvāresu cattāri cattāri katvā ekāya
analyzed: gahetvā purimāni tīṇi cattāri honti evam pañcasu dvāresu cattāri cattāri katvā ekāya

original: cetanāya kamme āyūhite vīsati vipākacittāni uppajjantīti veditabbāni. Aggahitaggahaṇena
analyzed: cetanāya kamme āyūhite vīsati vipāka cittāni uppajjanti iti veditabbāni aggahita ggahaṇena

original: pana cakkhudvāre cattāri sotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni cattārīti aṭṭha honti. Idaṃ
analyzed: pana cakkhu dvāre cattāri sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇāni cattāri iti aṭṭha honti idam

original: ‘ahetukaṭṭhakaṃ’ nāma. Idaṃ manussalokena gahitaṃ.
analyzed: ahetukaṭṭhakam nāma idam manussa lokena gahitam

original: Catūsu pana apāyesu pavatte labbhati. Yadā hi mahāmoggallānatthero niraye padumaṃ
analyzed: catūsu pana apāyesu pavatte labbhati yadā hi mahā moggallāna ttheraḥ niraye padumam

original: māpetvā padumakaṇṇikāya nisinno nerayikānaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi, tadā tesaṃ theraṃ
analyzed: māpetvā paduma kaṇṇikāya nisinnaḥ nerayikānam dhamma katham kathesi tadā tesam theram

original: passantānaṃ kusalavipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjati. Saddaṃ suṇantānaṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ,
analyzed: passantānam kusala vipākam cakkhu viññāṇam uppajjati saddam suṇantānam sota viññāṇam

original: candanavane divāvihāraṃ nisīditvā gatassa cīvaragandhaghāyanakāle ghānaviññāṇaṃ,
analyzed: candanavane divāvihāram nisīditvā gatassa cīvara gandha ghāyana kāle ghāna viññāṇam

original: nirayaggiṃ nibbāpetuṃ devaṃ vassāpetvā pānīyadānakāle jivhāviññāṇaṃ, mandamandavātasamuṭṭhāpanakāle
analyzed: nirayaggim nibbāpetum devam vassāpetvā pānīya dāna kāle jivhā viññāṇam manda manda vāta samuṭṭhāpana kāle

original: kāyaviññāṇanti evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīni pañca, ekaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ, dve santīraṇānīti
analyzed: kāya viññāṇan ti evam cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni pañca ekam sampaṭicchanam dve santīraṇāni iti

original: ahetukaṭṭhakaṃ labbhati. Nāgasupaṇṇavemānikapetānampi akusalena paṭisandhi hoti.
analyzed: ahetuka ṭṭhakam labbhati nāga supaṇṇa vemānika petānam pi akusalena paṭisandhi hoti

original: Pavatte kusalaṃ vipaccati. Tathā cakkavattino maṅgalahatthiassādīnaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva ‘iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇesu’
analyzed: pavatte kusalam vipaccati tathā cakkavattinaḥ maṅgalahatthi assa ādīnam ayam tāva iṭṭha aiṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇesu

original: kusalajavanavasena kathāmaggo.
analyzed: kusala javana vasena kathā maggo

original: ‘Iṭṭhārammaṇe’ pana catūsu somanassasahagatākusalacittesu javitesu kusalavipākaṃ
analyzed: iṭṭha ārammaṇe pana catūsu somanassa sahagata akusala cittesu kusala vipākam

original: somanassasahagatāhetukacittaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti. ‘Iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ catūsu upekkhāsahagatalobhasampayuttesu
analyzed: somanassa sahagata ahetuka cittam tad ārammaṇam hoti iṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇe catūsu upekkhā sahagata lobha sampayuttesu

original: javitesu kusalavipākaṃ upekkhāsahagatāhetukacittaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti. Yaṃ pana ‘javanena
analyzed: javitesu kusala vipākam upekkhā sahagata ahetuka cittam tad ārammaṇam hoti yam pana javanena

original: tadārammaṇaṃ niyametabba’nti vuttaṃ taṃ kusalaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Domanassasahagatajavanānantaraṃ
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam niyametabbam ti vuttam tam kusalam sandhāya vuttan ti veditabbam domanassa sahagata javana anantaram

original: tadārammaṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ kiṃ uppajjatīti? Akusalavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātucittaṃ uppajjati.
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam uppajjamānam kim uppajjati iti akusala vipāka ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu cittam uppajjati

original: Idaṃ pana javanaṃ kusalatthāya vā akusalatthāya vā ko niyāmetīti? Āvajjanañceva voṭṭhabbanañca.
analyzed: idam pana javanam kusala tthāya vā akusala tthāya vā kaḥ niyāmeti iti āvajjanam ca iva voṭṭhabbanañca

original: Āvajjanena hi yoniso āvaṭṭite voṭṭhabbanena yoniso vavatthāpite javanaṃ akusalaṃ
analyzed: āvajjanena hi yonisas āvaṭṭite voṭṭhabbanena yonisas vavatthāpite javanam akusalam

original: bhavissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ. Āvajjanena ayoniso āvaṭṭite voṭṭhabbanena ayoniso vavatthāpite
analyzed: bhavissati iti aṭṭhānam etam āvajjanena ayonisas āvaṭṭite voṭṭhabbanena ayonisas vavatthāpite

original: javanaṃ kusalaṃ bhavissatītipi aṭṭhānametaṃ. Ubhayena pana yoniso āvaṭṭite vavatthāpite
analyzed: javanam kusalam bhavissati iti pi aṭṭhānam etam ubhayena pana yonisas āvaṭṭite vavatthāpite

original: ca javanaṃ kusalaṃ hoti, ayoniso akusalanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca javanam kusalam hoti ayonisas akusalanti veditabbam

original: ‘Iṭṭhārammaṇe’ pana kaṅkhato uddhatassa ca tadārammaṇaṃ kiṃ hotīti? Iṭṭhārammaṇasmiṃ
analyzed: iṭṭha ārammaṇe pana kaṅkhataḥ uddhatassa ca tad ārammaṇam kim hoti iti iṭṭha ārammaṇasmiṃ

original: kaṅkhatu vā mā vā, uddhato vā hotu mā vā, kusalavipākāhetukasomanassacittameva tadārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: kaṅkhatu vā mā vā uddhataḥ vā hotu mā vā kusala vipāka ahetuka somanassa cittam eva tad ārammaṇam

original: hoti, ‘iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ ‘kusalavipākāhetukaupekkhāsahagata’nti, ayaṃ panettha
analyzed: hoti iṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇe kusala vipāka ahetuka aupekkhā sahagatan ti ayam pana ittha

original: saṅkhepato atthadīpano mahādhammarakkhitattheravādo nāma. Somanassasahagatasmiñhi
analyzed: saṅkhepataḥ attha dīpanaḥ mahādhammarakkhita thera vādaḥ nāma somanassa sahagatasmin hi

original: javane javite pañca tadārammaṇāni gavesitabbānīti. Upekkhāsahagatasmiṃ javane javite
analyzed: javane javite pañca tad ārammaṇāni gavesitabbāni iti upekkhā sahagatasmim javane javite

original: cha gavesitabbānīti.
analyzed: cha gavesitabbāni iti

original: Atha yadā somanassasahagatapaṭisandhikassa pavatte jhānaṃ nibbattetvā pamādena parihīnajjhānassa
analyzed: atha yadā somanassa sahagata paṭisandhikassa pavatte jhānam nibbattetvā pamādena parihīna jjhānassa

original: ‘paṇītadhammo me naṭṭho’ti paccavekkhato vippaṭisāravasena domanassaṃ uppajjati,
analyzed: paṇīta dhammo me naṭṭho ti paccavekkhato vippaṭisāra vasena domanassam uppajjati

original: tadā kiṃ uppajjati? ‘Somanassānantarañhi domanassaṃ domanassānantarañca somanassaṃ’
analyzed: tadā kim uppajjati somanassa anantaram hi domanassam domanassa anantaram ca somanassam

original: paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhaṃ. Mahaggatadhammaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇampi tattheva
analyzed: paṭṭhāne paṭisiddham mahaggata dhammaṃ ārabbha javane javite tad ārammaṇam pi tattha eva

original: paṭisiddhanti? Kusalavipākā vā akusalavipākā vā upekkhāsahagatāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: paṭisiddhanti kusala vipākāḥ vā akusala vipākāḥ vā upekkhā sahagata ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: uppajjati, kimassā āvajjananti? ‘Bhavaṅgāvajjanānaṃ viya natthassā āvajjanakicca’nti.
analyzed: uppajjati kim assāḥ āvajjananti bhavaṅga āvajjanānam viya na atthi assāḥ āvajjana kiccanti

original: ‘Etāni tāva attano ninnattā ca ciṇṇattā ca samudācārattā ca uppajjantu, ayaṃ kathaṃ
analyzed: etāni tāva attanaḥ ninnattā ca ciṇṇattā ca samudācārattā ca uppajjantu ayam katham

original: uppajjatī’ti? ‘Yathā nirodhassa anantarapaccayaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ, nirodhā
analyzed: uppajjati iti yathā nirodhassa anantara paccayam nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam nirodhā

original: vuṭṭhahantassa phalasamāpatticittaṃ, ariyamaggacittaṃ, maggānantarāni phalacittāni,
analyzed: vuṭṭhahantassa phala samāpatti cittam ariya magga cittam magga anantarāni phala cittāni

original: evaṃ asantepi āvajjane, ninnaciṇṇasamudācārabhāvena uppajjati. Vinā hi āvajjanena
analyzed: evam asante api āvajjane ninna ciṇṇa samudācāra bhāvena uppajjati vinā hi āvajjanena

original: cittaṃ uppajjati, ārammaṇena pana vinā nuppajjatī’ti. ‘Atha kimassārammaṇa’nti? ‘Rūpādīsu
analyzed: cittam uppajjati ārammaṇena pana vinā nuppajjati iti atha kim assa ārammaṇanti rūpa ādīsu

original: parittadhammesu aññataraṃ. Etesu hi yadeva tasmiṃ samaye āpāthamāgataṃ hoti, taṃ
analyzed: paritta dhammesu aññataram etesu hi yat eva tasmin samaye āpātham āgatam hoti tam

original: ārabbha etaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī’ti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ārabbha etam cittam uppajjati iti veditabbam

original: Idāni sabbesampi etesaṃ cittānaṃ pākaṭabhāvatthaṃ ayaṃ pakiṇṇakanayo vutto –
analyzed: idāni sabbesam pi etesam cittānam pākaṭa bhāva attham ayam pakiṇṇaka nayaḥ vutto

original: Suttaṃ dovāriko ca, gāmillo ambo koliyakena ca;
analyzed: suttam dovārikaḥ ca gāmillaḥ ambo koliyakena ca

original: Jaccandho pīṭhasappī ca, visayaggāho ca upanissayamatthasoti.
analyzed: pīṭhasappī ca visayaggāho ca

original: Tattha ‘sutta’nti, eko panthamakkaṭako pañcasu disāsu suttaṃ pasāretvā jālaṃ katvā
analyzed: tattha sutta nti ekaḥ pantha makkaṭako pañcasu disāsu suttam pasāretvā jālam katvā

original: majjhe nipajjati. Paṭhamadisāya pasāritasutte pāṇakena vā paṭaṅgena vā makkhikāya
analyzed: majjhe nipajjati paṭhama disāya pasārita sutte pāṇakena vā paṭaṅgena vā makkhikāya

original: vā pahaṭe nipannaṭṭhānato calitvā nikkhamitvā suttānusārena gantvā tassa yūsaṃ pivitvā
analyzed: vā pahaṭe nipanna ṭṭhānataḥ calitvā nikkhamitvā sutta anusārena gantvā tassa yūsam pivitvā

original: punaāgantvā tattheva nipajjati. Dutiyadisādīsu pahaṭakālepi evameva karoti.
analyzed: puna āgantvā tattha eva nipajjati dutiya disa ādīsu pahaṭa kāle pi evam eva karoti

original: Tattha pañcasu disāsu pasāritasuttaṃ viya pañcapasādā. Majjhe nipannamakkaṭako viya
analyzed: tattha pañcasu disāsu pasārita suttam viya pañca pasādā majjhe nipanna makkaṭakaḥ viya

original: cittaṃ. Pāṇakādīhi suttaghaṭṭanakālo viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭitakālo. Majjhe
analyzed: cittam pāṇaka ādīhi sutta ghaṭṭana kālaḥ viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭita kālaḥ majjhe

original: nipannamakkaṭakassa calanaṃ viya pasādaghaṭṭanakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kiriyamanodhātuyā
analyzed: nipanna makkaṭakassa calanam viya pasāda ghaṭṭanakam ārammaṇam gahetvā kiriya manaḥ dhātuyā

original: bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo. Suttānusārena gamanakālo viya vīthicittappavatti. Sīse
analyzed: bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭita kālo sutta anusārena gamana kālo viya vīthi citta ppavatti sīse

original: vijjhitvā yūsapivanaṃ viya javanassa ārammaṇe javitakālo. Punaāgantvā majjhe nipajjanaṃ
analyzed: vijjhitvā yūsa pivanam viya javanassa ārammaṇe javita kālo puna āgantvā majjhe nipajjanam

original: viya cittassa hadayavatthumeva nissāya pavattanaṃ.
analyzed: viya cittassa hadaya vatthum eva nissāya pavattanam

original: Idaṃ opammaṃ kiṃ dīpeti? Ārammaṇena pasāde ghaṭṭite pasādavatthukacittato hadayarūpavatthukacittaṃ
analyzed: idam opammam kim dīpeti ārammaṇena pasāde ghaṭṭite pasāda vatthuka cittataḥ hadaya rūpa vatthuka cittam

original: paṭhamataraṃ uppajjatīti dīpeti. Ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu āpāthamāgacchatītipi.
analyzed: paṭhamataram uppajjati iti dīpeti ekekam ārammaṇam dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu āpātham āgacchati iti pi

original: ‘Dovāriko’ti, eko rājā sayanagato niddāyati. Tassa paricārako pāde parimajjanto nisīdi.
analyzed: dovārikaḥ ti ekaḥ rājā sayana gataḥ niddāyati tassa paricārakaḥ pāde parimajjantaḥ nisīdi

original: Badhiradovāriko dvāre ṭhito. Tayo paṭihārā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā. Atheko paccantavāsī
analyzed: badhira dovārikaḥ dvāre ṭhito tayo paṭihārā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhitā atha ekaḥ paccanta vāsī

original: manusso paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgantvā dvāraṃ ākoṭesi. Badhiradovāriko saddaṃ na suṇāti.
analyzed: manussaḥ paṇṇākāram ādāya āgantvā dvāram ākoṭesi badhira dovārikaḥ saddam na suṇāti

original: Pādaparimajjako saññaṃ adāsi. Tāya saññāya dvāraṃ vivaritvā passi. Paṭhamapaṭihāro
analyzed: pāda parimajjakaḥ saññam adāsi tāya saññāya dvāram vivaritvā passi paṭhama paṭihāro

original: paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā dutiyassa adāsi, dutiyo tatiyassa, tatiyo rañño. Rājā paribhuñji.
analyzed: paṇṇa ākāram gahetvā dutiyassa adāsi dutiyaḥ tatiyassa tatiyaḥ raññaḥ rājā paribhuñji

original: Tattha so rājā viya javanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Pādaparimajjako viya āvajjanaṃ. Badhiradovāriko
analyzed: tattha saḥ rājā viya javanam daṭṭhabbam pāda parimajjakaḥ viya āvajjanam badhira dovārikaḥ

original: viya cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Tayo paṭihārā viya sampaṭicchanādīni tīṇi vīthicittāni. Paccantavāsino
analyzed: viya cakkhu viññāṇam tayo paṭihārāḥ viya sampaṭicchana ādīni tīṇi vīthi cittāni paccanta vāsino

original: paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya āgantvā dvārākoṭanaṃ viya ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ. Pādaparimajjakena
analyzed: paṇṇākāram ādāya āgantvā dvāra ākoṭanam viya ārammaṇassa pasāda ghaṭṭanam pāda parimajjakena

original: saññāya dinnakālo viya kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo. Tena dinnasaññāya
analyzed: saññāya dinna kālaḥ viya kiriya manaḥ dhātuyāḥ bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭita kālo tena dinna saññāya

original: badhiradovārikassa dvāravivaraṇakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇe dassanakiccasādhanakālo.
analyzed: badhira dovārikassa dvāra vivaraṇa kālaḥ viya cakkhu viññāṇassa ārammaṇe dassana kicca sādhana kālo

original: Paṭhamapaṭihārena paṇṇākārassa gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo.
analyzed: paṭhama paṭihārena paṇṇākārassa gahita kālo viya vipāka manodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchita kālo

original: Paṭhamena dutiyassa dinnakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīraṇakālo.
analyzed: paṭhamena dutiyassa dinna kālaḥ viya vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīraṇa kālo

original: Dutiyena tatiyassa dinnakālo viya kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpitakālo.
analyzed: dutiyena tatiyassa dinna kālaḥ viya kiriya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpita kālo

original: Tatiyena rañño dinnakālo viya voṭṭhabbanena javanassa niyyāditakālo. Rañño paribhogakālo
analyzed: tatiyena rañño dinna kālaḥ viya voṭṭhabbanena javanassa niyyādita kālaḥ rañño paribhoga kālo

original: viya javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanakālo.
analyzed: javanassa ārammaṇa rasa anubhavana kālaḥ

original: Idaṃ opammaṃ kiṃ dīpeti? Ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭamattanameva kiccaṃ, kiriyamanodhātuyā
analyzed: idam opammam kim dīpeti ārammaṇassa pasāda ghaṭṭa mattanam eva kiccam kiriya manaḥ dhātuyā

original: bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanamattameva, cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ dassanasampaṭicchanasantīraṇavavatthāpanamattāneva
analyzed: bhavaṅga avaṭṭana mattam eva cakkhu viññāṇa ādīnam dassana sampaṭicchana santīraṇa vavatthāpana mattāna eva

original: kiccāni. Ekantena pana javanameva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhotīti dīpeti.
analyzed: kiccāni ekantena pana javanam eva ārammaṇa rasam anubhoti iti dīpeti

original: ‘Gāmillo’ti, sambahulā gāmadārakā antaravīthiyaṃ paṃsukīḷaṃ kīḷanti. Tatthekassa
analyzed: gāmillo ti sambahulāḥ gāma dārakāḥ antara vīthiyam paṃsukīḷam kīḷanti tattha ekassa

original: hatthe kahāpaṇo paṭihaññi. So ‘mayhaṃ hatthe paṭihataṃ, kiṃ nu kho eta’nti āha. Atheko
analyzed: hatthe kahāpaṇaḥ paṭihaññi saḥ mayham hatthe paṭihatam kim nu kho etat ti āha atha ekaḥ

original: ‘paṇḍaraṃ eta’nti āha. Aparo saha paṃsunā gāḷhaṃ gaṇhi. Añño ‘puthulaṃ caturassaṃ
analyzed: paṇḍaram etat ti āha aparaḥ saha paṃsunā gāḷham gaṇhi aññaḥ puthulam catur assam

original: eta’nti āha. Aparo ‘kahāpaṇo eso’ti āha. Atha naṃ āharitvā mātu adāsi. Sā kamme upanesi.
analyzed: etat iti āha aparaḥ kahāpaṇaḥ eso iti āha atha nam āharitvā mātu adāsi sā kamme upanesi

original: Tattha sambahulānaṃ dārakānaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ kīḷantānaṃ nisinnakālo viya bhavaṅgacittappavatti
analyzed: tattha sambahulānam dārakānam antara vīthiyam kīḷantānam nisinna kālaḥ viya bhavaṅga citta ppavatti

original: daṭṭhabbā. Kahāpaṇassa hatthe paṭihatakālo viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭitakālo.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbā kahāpaṇassa hatthe paṭihata kālaḥ viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭita kālaḥ

original: ‘Kiṃ nu kho eta’nti vuttakālo viya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa
analyzed: kim nu kho etat ti vutta kālaḥ viya tam ārammaṇam gahetvā kiriya manaḥ dhātuyā bhavaṅgassa

original: āvaṭṭitakālo. ‘Paṇḍaraṃ eta’nti vuttakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇena dassanakiccassa sādhitakālo.
analyzed: āvaṭṭita kālaḥ paṇḍaram etat ti vutta kālaḥ viya cakkhu viññāṇena dassana kiccassa sādhita kālaḥ

original: Saha paṃsunā gāḷhaṃ gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo.
analyzed: saha paṃsunā gāḷham gahita kālaḥ viya vipāka manaḥ dhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchita kālaḥ

original: ‘Puthulaṃ caturassaṃ eta’nti vuttakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa
analyzed: puthulam catur assam etat ti vutta kālaḥ viya vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā ārammaṇassa

original: santīraṇakālo. ‘Eso kahāpaṇo’ti vuttakālo viya kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa
analyzed: santi īraṇa kālo eso kahāpaṇaḥ ti vutta kālo viya kiriya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā ārammaṇassa

original: vavatthāpitakālo. Mātarā kamme upanītakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vavatthāpita kālaḥ mātarā kamme upanīta kālaḥ viya javanassa ārammaṇa rasa anubhavanam veditabbaṃ

original: Idaṃ opammaṃ kiṃ dīpeti? Kiriyamanodhātu adisvāva bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭeti, vipākamanodhātu
analyzed: idam opammam kim dīpeti kiriya manaḥ dhātu a disvā ava bhavaṅgam āvaṭṭeti vipāka manaḥ dhātu

original: adisvāva sampaṭicchati, vipākamanoviññāṇadhātu adisvāva santīreti, kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: a disvā u ava sampaṭicchati vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu a disvā u santīreti kiriya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: adisvāva vavatthāpeti, javanaṃ adisvāva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhoti. Ekantena pana cakkhuviññāṇameva
analyzed: a disvāva vavatthāpeti javanam a disvāva ārammaṇa rasam anubhoti ekantena pana cakkhu viññāṇam eva

original: dassanakiccaṃ sādhetīti dīpeti.
analyzed: dassana kiccam sādheti iti dīpeti

original: ‘Ambo koliyakena cā’ti, idaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ambopamañca ucchusālāsāmikopamañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ambo koliyakena ca iti idam heṭṭhā vuttam amba upamam ca ucchusālā sāmika upamam ca sandhāya vuttam

original: ‘Jaccandho pīṭhasappī cā’ti, ubhopi kira te nagaradvāre sālāyaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Tattha
analyzed: pīṭhasappī ca ati ubhau api kira te nagara dvāre nisīdiṃsu tattha

original: pīṭhasappī āha – ‘bho andhaka, kasmā tvaṃ idha sussamāno vicarasi, asuko padeso subhikkho
analyzed: pīṭhasappī āha bho andhaka kasmā tvam idha sussamānaḥ vicarasi asukaḥ padesaḥ subhikkho

original: bahvannapāno, kiṃ tattha gantvā sukhena jīvituṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti? ‘Mayhaṃ tāva tayā
analyzed: bahu anna pānaḥ kim tattha gantvā sukhena jīvitum na vaṭṭati iti mayham tāva tayā

original: ācikkhitaṃ, tuyhaṃ pana tattha gantvā sukhena jīvituṃ kiṃ na vaṭṭatī’ti? ‘Mayhaṃ
analyzed: ācikkhitam tuyham pana tattha gantvā sukhena jīvitum kim na vaṭṭati iti mayham

original: gantuṃ pādā natthī’ti. ‘Mayhampi passituṃ cakkhūni natthī’ti. ‘Yadi evaṃ, tava pādā
analyzed: gantum pādā na atthi iti mayham pi passitum cakkhūni na atthi iti yadi evam tava pādā

original: hontu, mama cakkhūnī’ti ubhopi ‘sādhū’ti sampaṭicchitvā jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ khandhaṃ
analyzed: hontu mama cakkhūni iti ubho pi sādhu iti sampaṭicchitvā jat candho pīṭha sappim khandhaṃ

original: āropesi. So tassa khandhe nisīditvā vāmahatthenassa sīsaṃ parikkhipitvā dakkhiṇahatthena
analyzed: āropesi saḥ tassa khandhe nisīditvā vāma hatthena assa sīsam parikkhipitvā dakkhiṇa hatthena

original: ‘imasmiṃ ṭhāne mūlaṃ āvaritvā ṭhitaṃ, imasmiṃ pāsāṇo, vāmaṃ muñca dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇha,
analyzed: imasmin ṭhāne mūlam āvaritvā ṭhitam imasmin pāsāṇaḥ vāmam muñca dakkhiṇam gaṇha

original: dakkhiṇaṃ muñca vāmaṃ gaṇhā’ti maggaṃ niyametvā ācikkhati. Evaṃ jaccandhassa pādā
analyzed: dakkhiṇam muñca vāmam gaṇhāti maggam niyametvā ācikkhati evam jat candhassa pādā

original: pīṭhasappissa cakkhūnīti ubhopi sampayogena icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sukhena jīviṃsu.
analyzed: pīṭhasappissa cakkhūni iti ubho pi sampayogena icchita ṭṭhānam gantvā sukhena jīviṃsu

original: Tattha jaccandho viya rūpakāyo, pīṭhasappī viya arūpakāyo. Pīṭhasappinā vinā jaccandhassa
analyzed: tattha jaccandhaḥ viya rūpa kāyaḥ pīṭhasappī viya arūpa kāyaḥ pīṭhasappinā vinā jaccandhassa

original: disaṃ gantuṃ gamanābhisaṅkhārassa anibbattitakālo viya rūpassa arūpena vinā ādānagahaṇacopanaṃ
analyzed: disam gantum gamana abhisaṅkhārassa a nibbattita kālaḥ viya rūpassa arūpena vinā ādāna gahaṇa copanam

original: pāpetuṃ asamatthatā. Jaccandhena vinā pīṭhasappissa disaṃ gantuṃ gamanābhisaṅkhārassa
analyzed: asamattha tā jat candhena vinā pīṭha sappissa disam gantum gamana abhisaṅkhārassa

original: appavattanaṃ viya pañcavokāre rūpaṃ, vinā arūpassa appavatti. Dvinnampi sampayogena
analyzed: appavattanam viya pañcavokāre rūpam vinā arūpassa appavatti dvinnam pi sampayogena

original: icchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sukhena jīvitakālo viya rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aññamaññayogena sabbakiccesu
analyzed: icchita ṭṭhānam gantvā sukhena jīvita kālaḥ viya rūpa arūpa dhammānam aññamañña yogena sabba kiccesu

original: pavattisambhāvoti. Ayaṃ pañho pañcavokārabhavavasena kathito.
analyzed: ayam pañho pañcavokāra bhava vasena kathito

original: ‘Visayaggāho’ cāti, cakkhu rūpavisayaṃ gaṇhāti. Sotādīni saddādivisaye.
analyzed: visaya ggāhaḥ ca ati cakkhu rūpa visayam gaṇhāti sota ādīni sadda ādi visaye

original: ‘Upanissayamatthaso’ti, ‘upanissayato’ ca ‘atthato’ ca. Tattha asambhinnattā cakkhussa,
analyzed: upanissayam atthaso ti upanissayato ca atthato ca tattha asambhinna tā cakkhussa

original: āpāthagatattā rūpānaṃ, ālokasannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ catūhi paccayehi uppajjati
analyzed: āpātha gata ttā rūpānam āloka sannissitam manasikāra hetukam catūhi paccayehi uppajjati

original: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha matassāpi cakkhu sambhinnaṃ hoti.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam saddhim sampayutta dhammehi tattha matassa api cakkhu sambhinnam hoti

original: Jīvato niruddhampi, pittena vā semhena vā ruhirena vā palibuddhampi, cakkhuviññāṇassa
analyzed: jīvataḥ niruddham pi pittena vā semhena vā ruhirena vā palibuddham pi cakkhu viññāṇassa

original: paccayo bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ ‘sambhinnaṃ’ nāma hoti. Sakkontaṃ asambhinnaṃ nāma. Sotādīsupi
analyzed: paccayaḥ bhavitum a sakkontam sambhinnam nāma hoti sakkontam asambhinnam nāma sota ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Cakkhusmiṃ pana asambhinnepi bahiddhā rūpārammaṇe āpāthaṃ anāgacchante
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ cakkhusmim pana asambhinne pi bahiddhā rūpa ārammaṇe āpātham anāgacchante

original: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati. Tasmiṃ pana āpāthaṃ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam na uppajjati tasmin pana āpātham āgacchante pi āloka sannissaye asati

original: nuppajjati. Tasmiṃ santepi kiriyamanodhātuyā bhavaṅge anāvaṭṭite nuppajjati. Āvaṭṭiteyeva
analyzed: na uppajjati tasmin sante pi kiriya manaḥ dhātuyāḥ bhavaṅge an āvaṭṭite na uppajjati āvaṭṭite iya eva

original: uppajjati. Evaṃ uppajjamānaṃ sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃyeva uppajjati. Iti ime cattāro
analyzed: uppajjati evam uppajjamānam sampayutta dhammehi saddhiṃ yeva uppajjati iti ime cattāro

original: paccaye labhitvā uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
analyzed: paccaye labhitvā uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇam

original: Asambhinnattā sotassa, āpāthagatattā saddānaṃ, ākāsasannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ
analyzed: a sambhinna ttā sotassa āpātha gata ttā saddānam ākāsa sannissitam manasikāra hetukam

original: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha ‘ākāsasannissita’nti
analyzed: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati sota viññāṇam saddhim sampayutta dhammehi tattha ākāsa sannissitanti

original: ākāsasannissayaṃ laddhāva uppajjati, na vinā tena. Na hi pihitakaṇṇacchiddassa sotaviññāṇaṃ
analyzed: ākāsa sannissayam uppajjati na vinā tena na hi pihita kaṇṇa chiddassa sota viññāṇam

original: pavattati. Sesaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Yathā cettha evaṃ ito paresupi. Visesamattaṃ pana vakkhāma.
analyzed: pavattati sesam purima nayena iva veditabbam yathā ca ittha evam itas paresu pi visesa mattam pana vakkhāma

original: Asambhinnattā ghānassa, āpāthagatattā gandhānaṃ, vāyosannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ
analyzed: a sambhinna ttā ghānassa āpātha gata ttā gandhānam vāyo sannissitam manasikāra hetukam

original: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha ‘vāyosannissita’nti
analyzed: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati ghāna viññāṇam saddhim sampayutta dhammehi tattha vāyo sannissitanti

original: ghānabilaṃ vāyumhi pavisanteyeva uppajjati, tasmiṃ asati nuppajjatīti attho.
analyzed: ghāna bilam vāyumhi pavisantā iya iva uppajjati tasmin asati na uppajjati iti attho

original: Asambhinnattā jivhāya, āpāthagatattā rasānaṃ, āposannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ catūhi
analyzed: a sambhinna ttā jivhāyaḥ āpātha gata ttā rasānaṃ āpaḥ sannissitam manasikāra hetukam catūhi

original: paccayehi uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha ‘āposannissita’nti
analyzed: paccayehi uppajjati jivhā viññāṇam saddhim sampayutta dhammehi tattha āpo sannissitanti

original: jivhātemanaṃ āpaṃ laddhāva uppajjati, na vinā tena. Sukkhajivhānañhi sukkhakhādanīye
analyzed: jivhā temanam āpam uppajjati na vinā tena sukkha jivhānam hi sukkha khādanīye

original: jivhāya ṭhapitepi jivhāviññāṇaṃ nuppajjateva.
analyzed: jivhāya ṭhapite pi jivhā viññāṇam na uppajjateva

original: Asambhinnattā kāyassa, āpāthagatattā phoṭṭhabbānaṃ, pathavisannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ
analyzed: asambhinna ttā kāyassa āpātha gata ttā phoṭṭhabbānam pathavi sannissitam manasikāra hetukam

original: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha ‘pathavisannissita’nti
analyzed: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati kāya viññāṇam saddhim sampayutta dhammehi tattha pathavi sannissitanti

original: kāyapasādapaccayaṃ pathavisannissayaṃ laddhāva uppajjati, na tena vinā. Kāyadvārasmiñhi
analyzed: kāya pasāda paccayam pathavi sannissayam uppajjati na tena vinā kāyadvārasmin hi

original: bahiddhāmahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikaṃ kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
analyzed: bahiddhā mahābhūta ārammaṇam ajjhattikam kāya pasādam ghaṭṭetvā pasāda paccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati

original: Asambhinnattā manassa, āpāthagatattā dhammānaṃ, vatthusannissitaṃ, manasikārahetukaṃ
analyzed: asambhinna ttā manassa āpātha gata ttā dhammānam vatthu sannissitam manasikāra hetukam

original: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃ, saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi. Tattha ‘mano’ti
analyzed: catūhi paccayehi uppajjati manaḥ viññāṇam saddhim sampayutta dhammehi tattha manaḥ ti

original: bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Taṃ niruddhampi, āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandathāmagatameva
analyzed: bhavaṅga cittam tam niruddham pi āvajjana cittassa paccayaḥ bhavitum asamattham manda thāma gatam eva

original: pavattamānampi, sambhinnaṃ nāma hoti. Āvajjanassa pana paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ
analyzed: pavattamānam pi sambhinnam nāma hoti āvajjanassa pana paccayaḥ bhavitum samattham

original: asambhinnaṃ nāma. ‘Āpāthagatattā dhammāna’nti dhammārammaṇe āpāthagate. ‘Vatthusannissita’nti
analyzed: asambhinnam nāma āpāthagata ttā dhammānanti dhamma ārammaṇe āpāthagate vatthu sannissitanti

original: hadayavatthusannissayaṃ laddhāva uppajjati, na tena vinā. Ayampi pañho pañcavokārabhavaṃ
analyzed: hadaya vatthu sannissayam uppajjati na tena vinā ayam pi pañho pañcavokāra bhavam

original: sandhāya kathito. ‘Manasikārahetuka’nti kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātuyā bhavaṅge āvaṭṭiteyeva
analyzed: sandhāya kathitaḥ manasikāra hetukan ti kiriya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā bhavaṅge āvaṭṭitā iya iva

original: uppajjatīti attho. Ayaṃ tāva ‘upanissayamatthaso’ti ettha upanissayavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: uppajjati iti atthaḥ ayam tāva upanissayam atthaso ti ettha upanissaya vaṇṇanā

original: ‘Atthato’ pana cakkhu dassanatthaṃ, sotaṃ savanatthaṃ, ghānaṃ ghāyanatthaṃ, jivhā
analyzed: atthato pana cakkhu dassana attham sotam savana attham ghānam ghāyana attham jivhā

original: sāyanatthā, kāyo phusanattho, mano vijānanattho. Tattha dassanaṃ attho assa. Tañhi
analyzed: kāyaḥ phusana atthaḥ manaḥ vijānana atthaḥ tattha dassanam atthaḥ assa tañhi

original: tena nipphādetabbanti dassanatthaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo. Ettāvatā tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravāde
analyzed: tena nipphādetabban ti dassana attham sesesu pi esa iva nayaḥ ettāvatā tipiṭaka cūḷa nāga tthera vāde

original: soḷasakamaggo niṭṭhito, saddhiṃ dvādasakamaggena ceva ahetukaṭṭhakena cāti.
analyzed: soḷasaka maggaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ saddhim dvādasaka maggena ca iva ahetukaṭṭhakena ca ati

original: Idāni moravāpīvāsīmahādattattheravāde dvādasakamaggakathā hoti. Tattha sāketapañhaussadakittanahetukittanāni
analyzed: idāni mora vāpī vāsī mahādatta thera vāde dvādasaka magga kathā hoti tattha sāketa pañha ussada kittana hetu kittanāni

original: pākatikāneva. Ayaṃ pana thero asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikesu dosaṃ disvā ‘asaṅkhārikaṃ
analyzed: ayam pana theraḥ asaṅkhārika sasaṅkhārikesu dosam disvā asaṅkhārikam

original: asaṅkhārikameva vipākaṃ deti, no sasaṅkhārikaṃ; sasaṅkhārikampi sasaṅkhārikameva
analyzed: asaṅkhārikam eva vipākam deti no sa saṅkhārikam sa saṅkhārikam pi sa saṅkhārikam eva

original: no asaṅkhārika’nti āha. Javanena cesa cittaniyāmaṃ na katheti. Ārammaṇena pana vedanāniyāmaṃ
analyzed: no asaṅkhārikanti āha javanena ca isa citta niyāmam na katheti ārammaṇena pana vedanā niyāmam

original: katheti. Tenassa vipākuddhāre dvādasakamaggo nāma jāto. Dasakamaggopi, ahetukaṭṭhakampi ettheva paviṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: kathā iti tena assa vipāka uddhāre dvādasaka maggaḥ nāma jātaḥ dasaka maggaḥ api ahetuka ṭṭhakam pi ettha iva paviṭṭham

original: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – somanassasahagatatihetukaasaṅkhārikacittena hi kamme āyūhite tādiseneva
analyzed: tatra ayam nayaḥ somanassa sahagata ti hetuka asaṅkhārika cittena hi kamme āyūhite tādisena iva

original: vipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa vuḍḍhippattassa cakkhudvāre ‘iṭṭhārammaṇe’ āpāthagate
analyzed: vipāka cittena gahita paṭisandhikassa vuḍḍhi ppattassa cakkhu dvāre iṭṭha ārammaṇe āpātha gate

original: heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tayo moghavārā honti. Tassa kusalato cattāri somanassasahagatāni,
analyzed: heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva tayo moghavārāḥ honti tassa kusalato cattāri somanassa sahagatāni

original: akusalato cattāri, kiriyato pañcāti imesaṃ terasannaṃ cittānaṃ aññatarena javitapariyosāne
analyzed: akusalato cattāri kiriyato pañca ati imesam terasannam cittānam aññatarena javita pariyosāne

original: tadārammaṇaṃ patiṭṭhahamānaṃ somanassasahagataasaṅkhārikatihetukacittampi duhetukacittampi
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam patiṭṭhahamānam somanassa sahagata asaṅkhārika ti hetuka cittam pi du hetuka cittam pi

original: patiṭṭhāti. Evamassa cakkhudvāre cakkhuviññāṇādīni tīṇi, tadārammaṇāni dveti, pañca
analyzed: patiṭṭhāti evam assa cakkhu dvāre cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni tīṇi tad ārammaṇāni dve ti pañca

original: gaṇanūpagacittāni honti.
analyzed: gaṇanūpaga cittāni honti

original: Ārammaṇena pana vedanaṃ parivattetvā kusalato catunnaṃ, akusalato catunnaṃ, kiriyato
analyzed: ārammaṇena pana vedanam parivattetvā kusalato catunnam akusalato catunnam kiriyato

original: catunnanti, dvādasannaṃ upekkhāsahagatacittānaṃ aññatarena javitāvasāne upekkhāsahagatatihetukaasaṅkhārikavipākampi
analyzed: catunnam ti dvādasannam upekkhā sahagata cittānam aññatarena javita avasāne upekkhā sahagata ti hetuka asaṅkhārika vipākam pi

original: duhetukaasaṅkhārikavipākampi tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā uppajjati. Evamassa cakkhudvāre upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ,
analyzed: du hetuka asaṅkhārika vipākam pi tad ārammaṇam hutvā uppajjati evam assa cakkhu dvāre upekkhā sahagata santīraṇam

original: imāni dve tadārammaṇānīti, tīṇi gaṇanūpagacittāni honti. Tāni purimehi pañcahi saddhiṃ
analyzed: imāni dve tad ārammaṇāni iti tīṇi gaṇanūpaga cittāni honti tāni purimehi pañcahi saddhiṃ

original: aṭṭha. Sotadvārādīsupi aṭṭha aṭṭhāti ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite samacattālīsa cittāni
analyzed: aṭṭha sotadvāra ādīsu pi aṭṭha aṭṭha ati ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite sama cattālīsa cittāni

original: uppajjanti. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre aṭṭha, sotaviññāṇādīni cattārīti,
analyzed: uppajjanti aggahita ggahaṇena pana cakkhu dvāre aṭṭha sota viññāṇa ādīni cattāri iti

original: dvādasa honti. Tattha ‘mūlabhavaṅgatā’‘āgantukabhavaṅgatā’‘ambopamaniyāmakathā’ ca
analyzed: dvādasa honti tattha ca

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbā

original: Somanassasahagatatihetukasasaṅkhārikakusalacittena kamme āyūhitepi upekkhāsahagatatihetukaasaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikehi
analyzed: somanassa sahagata ti hetuka sa saṅkhārika kusala cittena kamme āyūhite pi upekkhā sahagata ti hetuka asaṅkhārika sa saṅkhārikehi

original: kamme āyūhitepi eseva nayo. Tattha yantopamāpi ettha pākatikā eva. Ettāvatā tihetukakammena
analyzed: kamme āyūhite pi esā iva nayaḥ tattha yanta upamā api ettha pākatikā eva ettāvatā ti hetuka kammena

original: tihetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathito. Tihetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhi hotīti
analyzed: ti hetuka paṭisandhi hoti iti vāro kathito ti hetuka kammena du hetuka paṭisandhi hoti iti

original: vāro pana paṭicchanno hutvā gato.
analyzed: vāro pana paṭicchannaḥ hutvā gataḥ

original: Idāni duhetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhikathā hoti. Somanassasahagataduhetukaasaṅkhārikacittena
analyzed: idāni du hetuka kammena du hetuka paṭisandhi kathā hoti somanassa sahagata du hetuka asaṅkhārika cittena

original: hi kamme āyūhite tādiseneva vipākacittena gahitapaṭisandhikassa vuḍḍhippattassa cakkhudvāre
analyzed: hi kamme āyūhite tādisena iva vipāka cittena gahita paṭisandhikassa vuḍḍhi ppattassa cakkhu dvāre

original: iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva tayo moghavārā honti. Duhetukassa pana
analyzed: iṭṭha ārammaṇe āpātha gate heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva tayaḥ moghavārāḥ honti du hetukassa pana

original: javanakiriyā natthi. Tasmā kusalato cattāri somanassasahagatāni, akusalato cattārīti
analyzed: javana kiriyā natthi tasmā kusalato cattāri somanassa sahagatāni akusalato cattāri iti

original: imesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ aññatarena javitapariyosāne duhetukameva somanassasahagataasaṅkhārikaṃ
analyzed: imesam aṭṭhannam aññatarena javita pariyosāne du hetukam eva somanassa sahagata asaṅkhārikam

original: tadārammaṇaṃ hoti. Evamassa cakkhuviññāṇādīni tīṇi, idañca tadārammaṇanti, cattāri
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam hoti evam assa cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni tīṇi idam ca tad ārammaṇanti cattāri

original: gaṇanūpagacittāni honti. ‘Iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’ pana kusalato upekkhāsahagatānaṃ
analyzed: gaṇanā upaga cittāni honti iṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇe pana kusalataḥ upekkhā sahagatānam

original: catunnaṃ, akusalato catunnanti, aṭṭhannaṃ aññatarena javitapariyosāne duhetukameva
analyzed: catunnam akusalato catunnan ti aṭṭhannam aññatarena javita pariyosāne du hetukam eva

original: upekkhāsahagataṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti. Evamassa upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ,
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam asaṅkhārikam tad ārammaṇam hoti evam assa upekkhā sahagata santīraṇam

original: idañca tadārammaṇanti, dve gaṇanūpagacittāni honti. Tāni purimehi catūhi saddhiṃ
analyzed: idam ca dve gaṇan upaga cittāni honti tāni purimehi catūhi saddhiṃ

original: cha. Sotadvārādīsupi cha chāti ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite samatiṃsa cittāni uppajjanti.
analyzed: cha sotadvāra ādīsu pi cha cha ati ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite cittāni uppajjanti

original: Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre cha, sotaviññāṇādīni cattārīti dasa honti. Ambopamaniyāmakathā
analyzed: aggahita ggahaṇena pana cakkhu dvāre cha sota viññāṇa ādīni cattāri iti dasa honti ambā upama niyāma kathā

original: pākatikā eva. Yantopamā idha na labbhatīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pākatikā eva yantā upamā idha na labbhati iti vuttam

original: Somanassasahagataduhetukasasaṅkhārikakusalacittena kamme āyūhitepi upekkhāsahagataduhetukaasaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikehi
analyzed: somanassa sahagata du hetuka sasaṅkhārika kusala cittena kamme āyūhite pi upekkhā sahagata du hetuka asaṅkhārika sasaṅkhārikehi

original: kamme āyūhitepi eseva nayo. Ettāvatā duhetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro kathito.
analyzed: kamme āyūhite pi esā iva nayo ettāvatā du hetuka kammena du hetuka paṭisandhi hoti iti vāro kathito

original: Ahetukapaṭisandhi hotīti vāro pana evaṃ veditabbo – kusalato catūhi ñāṇavippayuttehi
analyzed: ahetuka paṭisandhi hoti iti vāraḥ pana evam veditabbaḥ kusalato catūhi ñāṇa vippayuttehi

original: kamme āyūhite, kusalavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyā upekkhāsahagatāya paṭisandhiyā
analyzed: kamme āyūhite kusala vipāka ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā upekkhā sahagatāya paṭisandhiyā

original: gahitāya, kammasadisā paṭisandhīti na vattabbā. Ito paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
analyzed: gahitāya kamma sadisā paṭisandhi iti na vattabbā itas paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva

original: kathetvā iṭṭhepi iṭṭhamajjhattepi cittappavatti veditabbā. Imassa hi therassa vāde
analyzed: kathetvā iṭṭhe pi iṭṭha majjhatte pi citta ppavatti veditabbā imassa hi therassa vāde

original: piṇḍajavanaṃ javati. Sesā idaṃ pana javanaṃ kusalatthāya vā akusalatthāya vā ko niyāmetītiādikathā
analyzed: piṇḍa javanam sesāḥ idam pana javanam kusala tthāya vā akusala tthāya vā kaḥ

original: sabbā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāti. Ettāvatā moravāpīvāsīmahādattattheravāde
analyzed: sabbā heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbā ati ettāvatā moravāpīvāsīmahādatta thera vāde

original: dvādasakamaggo niṭṭhito saddhiṃ dasakamaggena ceva ahetukaṭṭhakena ca.
analyzed: dvādasaka maggaḥ niṭṭhitaḥ saddhim dasaka maggena ca iva ahetukaṭṭhakena ca

original: Idāni mahādhammarakkhitattheravāde dasakamaggakathā hoti. Tattha sāketapañhaussadakittanāni
analyzed: idāni mahādhammarakkhita thera vāde dasaka magga kathā hoti tattha sāketa pañha ussada kittanāni

original: pākatikāneva. Hetukittane pana ayaṃ viseso. Tihetukakammaṃ tihetukavipākampi duhetukavipākampi
analyzed: hetu kittane pana ayam visesaḥ ti hetuka kammam ti hetuka vipākam pi du hetuka vipākam pi

original: ahetukavipākampi deti. Duhetukakammaṃ tihetukameva na deti, itaraṃ deti. Tihetukakammena
analyzed: ahetuka vipākam pi deti du hetuka kammam ti hetukam eva na deti itaram deti ti hetuka kammena

original: paṭisandhi tihetukāva hoti; duhetukāhetukā na hoti. Duhetukakammena duhetukāhetukā
analyzed: paṭisandhi ti hetukā ava hoti du hetukā ahetukā na hoti du hetuka kammena du hetukā ahetukā

original: hoti, tihetukā na hoti. Asaṅkhārikakammaṃ vipākaṃ asaṅkhārikameva deti, no sasaṅkhārikaṃ.
analyzed: hoti ti hetukā na hoti asaṅkhārika kammam vipākam asaṅkhārikam eva deti no sa saṅkhārikam

original: Sasaṅkhārikampi sasaṅkhārikameva deti, no asaṅkhārikaṃ. Ārammaṇena vedanā parivattetabbā.
analyzed: sa saṅkhārikam pi sa saṅkhārikam eva deti no asaṅkhārikam ārammaṇena vedanā parivattetabbā

original: Javanaṃ piṇḍajavanameva javati. Ādito paṭṭhāya cittāni kathetabbāni.
analyzed: javanam piṇḍa javanam eva javati āditaḥ paṭṭhāya cittāni kathetabbāni

original: Tatrāyaṃ kathā – eko paṭhamakusalacittena kammaṃ āyūhati, paṭhamavipākacitteneva
analyzed: tatra ayam kathā ekaḥ paṭhama kusala cittena kammam āyūhati paṭhama vipāka cittena iva

original: paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhāti. Ayaṃ kammasadisā paṭisandhi. Tassa vuḍḍhippattassa cakkhudvāre
analyzed: paṭisandhim gaṇhāti ayam kamma sadisā paṭisandhi tassa vuḍḍhi ppattassa cakkhu dvāre

original: ‘iṭṭhārammaṇe’ āpāthagate vuttanayeneva tayo moghavārā honti. Athassa heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ
analyzed: iṭṭha ārammaṇe āpātha gate vutta nayena iva tayaḥ moghavārāḥ honti athassa heṭṭhā vuttānam

original: terasannaṃ somanassasahagatajavanānaṃ aññatarena javitapariyosāne paṭhamavipākacittameva
analyzed: somanassa sahagata javanānam aññatarena javita pariyosāne paṭhama vipāka cittam eva

original: tadārammaṇaṃ hoti. Taṃ ‘mūlabhavaṅgaṃ’ ‘tadārammaṇa’nti dve nāmāni labhati. Evamassa
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam hoti tam mūla bhavaṅgam tad ārammaṇanti dve nāmāni labhati evam assa

original: cakkhuviññāṇādīni tīṇi, idañca tadārammaṇanti, cattāri gaṇanūpagacittāni honti. ‘Iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe’
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni tīṇi idam ca tad ārammaṇam ti cattāri gaṇana upaga cittāni honti iṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇe

original: heṭṭhā vuttānaṃyeva dvādasannaṃ upekkhāsahagatajavanānaṃ aññatarena javitapariyosāne
analyzed: heṭṭhā vuttānam yeva dvādasannam upekkhā sahagata javanānam aññatarena javita pariyosāne

original: upekkhāsahagataṃ tihetukaṃ asaṅkhārikacittaṃ tadārammaṇatāya pavattati. Taṃ ‘āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ’‘tadārammaṇa’nti
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatam ti hetukam asaṅkhārika cittam tad ārammaṇa tāya pavattati tam āgantuka bhavaṅgam tad ārammaṇam ti

original: dve nāmāni labhati. Evamassa upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇaṃ idañca tadārammaṇanti dve
analyzed: dve nāmāni labhati evam assa upekkhā sahagata santīraṇam idam ca dve

original: gaṇanūpagacittāni. Tāni purimehi catūhi saddhiṃ cha honti. Evaṃ ekāya cetanāya kamme
analyzed: gaṇanā upaga cittāni tāni purimehi catūhi saddhim cha honti evam ekāya cetanāya kamme

original: āyūhite pañcasu dvāresu samatiṃsa cittāni uppajjanti. Aggahitaggahaṇena pana cakkhudvāre
analyzed: āyūhite pañcasu dvāresu cittāni uppajjanti aggahita ggahaṇena pana cakkhu dvāre

original: cha, sotaviññāṇādīni cattārīti dasa honti. Ambopamaniyāmakathā pākatikāyeva.
analyzed: cha sota viññāṇa ādīni cattāri iti dasa honti ambā upama niyāma kathā

original: Dutiyatatiyacatutthakusalacittehi kamme āyūhitepi ettakāneva vipākacittāni honti.
analyzed: dutiya tatiya catuttha kusala cittehi kamme āyūhite pi ettakān eva vipāka cittāni honti

original: Catūhi upekkhāsahagatacittehi āyūhitepi eseva nayo. Idha pana paṭhamaṃ iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: catūhi upekkhā sahagata cittehi esa eva nayaḥ idha pana paṭhamam iṭṭham ajjhatta ārammaṇam

original: dassetabbaṃ. Pacchā iṭṭhārammaṇena vedanā parivattetabbā. Ambopamaniyāmakathā pākatikā
analyzed: dassetabbam pacchā iṭṭha ārammaṇena vedanā parivattetabbā amba upama niyāma kathā pākatikā

original: eva. Yantopamā na labbhati. ‘Kusalato pana catunnaṃ ñāṇavippayuttānaṃ aññatarena
analyzed: eva yantā upamā na labbhati kusalato pana catunnam ñāṇa vippayuttānam aññatarena

original: kamme āyūhite’ti ito paṭṭhāya sabbaṃ vitthāretvā ahetukaṭṭhakaṃ kathetabbaṃ. Ettāvatā
analyzed: kamme āyūhitā iti itas paṭṭhāya sabbam vitthāretvā ahetukaṭṭhakam kathetabbam ettāvatā

original: mahādhammarakkhitattheravāde dasakamaggo niṭṭhito hoti, saddhiṃ ahetukaṭṭhakenāti.
analyzed: mahādhammarakkhita thera vāde dasaka maggo niṭṭhitaḥ hoti saddhim ahetuka ṭṭhakena ati

original: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ katarassa vādo gahetabboti? Na kassaci ekaṃsena. Sabbesaṃ
analyzed: imesam pana tiṇṇam therānam katarassa vādaḥ gahetabbo ti na kassaci ekaṃsena sabbesam

original: pana vādesu yuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Paṭhamavādasmiñhi sasaṅkhārāsaṅkhāravidhānaṃ paccayabhedato
analyzed: pana vādesu yuttam gahetabbam paṭhama vādasmin hi sa saṅkhāra asaṅkhāra vidhānam paccaya bhedato

original: adhippetaṃ. Tenettha, asaṅkhārikakusalassa dubbalapaccayehi uppannaṃ sasaṅkhārikavipākaṃ,
analyzed: adhippetam tena ittha asaṅkhārika kusalassa dubbala paccayehi uppannam sasaṅkhārika vipākam

original: sasaṅkhārikakusalassa balavapaccayehi uppannaṃ asaṅkhārikavipākañca gahetvā, labbhamānānipi
analyzed: sa saṅkhārika kusalassa balava paccayehi uppannam asaṅkhārika vipākam ca gahetvā labbhamānāni pi

original: kiriyajavanāni pahāya, kusalajavanena tadārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇena ca vedanaṃ niyāmetvā,
analyzed: kiriya javanāni pahāya kusala javanena tad ārammaṇam ārammaṇena ca vedanam niyāmetvā

original: sekkhaputhujjanavasena soḷasakamaggo kathito. Yaṃ panettha akusalajavanāvasāne ahetukavipākameva
analyzed: sekkha puthujjana vasena soḷasaka maggaḥ kathitaḥ yam pana ittha akusala javana avasāne ahetuka vipākam eva

original: tadārammaṇaṃ dassitaṃ, taṃ itaresu na dassitameva. Tasmā taṃ tattha tesu vuttaṃ sahetukavipākañca,
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam dassitam tam itaresu na dassitam eva tasmā tam tattha tesu vuttam sa hetuka vipākam ca

original: etthāpi sabbamidaṃ labbhateva. Tatrāyaṃ nayo – yadā hi kusalajavanānaṃ antarantarā
analyzed: ettha api sabbam idam tatra ayam nayaḥ yadā hi antar antarā

original: akusalaṃ javati, tadā kusalāvasāne āciṇṇasadisameva, akusalāvasāne sahetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: akusalam tadā kusala avasāne āciṇṇa sadisam eva akusala avasāne sa hetukam tad ārammaṇam

original: yuttaṃ. Yadā nirantaraṃ akusalameva tadā ahetukaṃ. Evaṃ tāva paṭhamavāde yuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: yuttam yadā nirantaram akusalam eva tadā ahetukam evam tāva paṭhama vāde yuttam gahetabbam

original: Dutiyavāde pana kusalato sasaṅkhārāsaṅkhāravidhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Tenettha asaṅkhārikakusalassa
analyzed: dutiya vāde pana kusalataḥ sa saṅkhāra asaṅkhāra vidhānam adhippetam tena ittha asaṅkhārika kusalassa

original: asaṅkhārikameva vipākaṃ, sasaṅkhārikakusalassa ca sasaṅkhārikameva gahetvā, javanena
analyzed: asaṅkhārikam eva vipākam sa saṅkhārika kusalassa ca sa saṅkhārikam eva gahetvā javanena

original: tadārammaṇaniyāmaṃ akatvā, sabbesampi sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ uppattiraho piṇḍajavanavaseneva
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa niyāmam a katvā sabbesam pi sekkha asekkha puthujjanānam uppatti raho piṇḍa javana vasena iva

original: dvādasakamaggo kathito. Tihetukajavanāvasāne panettha tihetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ yuttaṃ.
analyzed: dvādasaka maggo kathito ti hetuka javana avasāne pana ittha ti hetukam tad ārammaṇam yuttam

original: Duhetukajavanāvasāne duhetukaṃ, ahetukajavanāvasāne ahetukaṃ bhājetvā pana na vuttaṃ.
analyzed: du hetuka javana avasāne du hetukam ahetuka javana avasāne ahetukam bhājetvā pana na vuttam

original: Evaṃ dutiyavāde yuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam dutiya vāde yuttam gahetabbam

original: Tatiyavādepi kusalatova asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. ‘Tihetukakammaṃ tihetukavipākampi
analyzed: tatiya vāde pi kusalato va asaṅkhāra sa saṅkhāra vidhānam adhippetam ti hetuka kammam ti hetuka vipākam pi

original: duhetukavipākampi ahetukavipākampi detī’ti pana vacanato asaṅkhārikatihetukapaṭisandhikassa
analyzed: du hetuka vipākam pi ahetuka vipākam pi deti iti pana vacanataḥ asaṅkhārika ti hetuka paṭisandhikassa

original: asaṅkhārikaduhetukenapi tadārammaṇena bhavitabbaṃ. Taṃ adassetvā hetusadisameva tadārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: asaṅkhārika duhetukena api tad ārammaṇena bhavitabbam tam a dassetvā hetu sadisam eva tad ārammaṇam

original: dassitaṃ. Taṃ purimāya hetukittanaladdhiyā na yujjati. Kevalaṃ dasakamaggavibhāvanatthameva
analyzed: dassitam tam purimāya hetu kittana laddhiyā na yujjati kevalam dasaka magga vibhāvana attham eva

original: vuttaṃ. Itarampi pana labbhateva. Evaṃ tatiyavādepi yuttaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Ayañca sabbāpi
analyzed: vuttam itaram pi pana labbhate iva evam tatiya vāde pi yuttam gahetabbam ayam ca sabbā api

original: paṭisandhijanakasseva kammassa vipākaṃ sandhāya tadārammaṇakathā. ‘Sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ
analyzed: paṭisandhi janakassa iva kammassa vipākam sandhāya tad ārammaṇa kathā sa hetukam bhavaṅgam

original: ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo’ti vacanato pana nānākammena ahetukapaṭisandhikassāpi
analyzed: ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantara paccayena paccayaḥ ti vacanato pana nānā kammena ahetuka paṭisandhikassa api

original: sahetukavipākaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ uppajjati. Tassa uppattividhānaṃ mahāpakaraṇe āvi bhavissatīti.
analyzed: sa hetuka vipākam tad ārammaṇam uppajjati tassa uppatti vidhānam mahā apakaraṇe āvi bhavissati iti

original: Kāmāvacarakusalavipākakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusala vipāka kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaravipākakathā
analyzed: rūpāvacara arūpāvacara vipāka kathā

original: 499. Idāni rūpāvacarādivipākaṃ dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: idāni rūpāvacara ādi vipākam dassetum puna katame dhammāḥ abyākatā ati ādi āraddham

original: Tattha yasmā kāmāvacaravipākaṃ attano kusalena sadisampi hoti, asadisampi, tasmā

original: na taṃ kusalānugatikaṃ katvā bhājitaṃ. Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaravipākaṃ pana yathā hatthiassapabbatādīnaṃ

original: chāyā hatthiādisadisāva honti, tathā attano kusalasadisameva hotīti kusalānugatikaṃ
analyzed: chāyā hatthi ādi sadisā ava honti tathā attano kusala sadisam eva hoti iti kusala anugatikam

original: katvā bhājitaṃ. Kāmāvacarakammañca yadā kadāci vipākaṃ deti, rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṃ
analyzed: katvā bhājitam kāmāvacara kammam ca yadā kadācid vipākam deti rūpāvacara arūpāvacaram

original: pana anantarāyena, dutiyasmiṃyeva attabhāve, vipākaṃ detītipi kusalānugatikameva
analyzed: pana anantarāyena atta bhāve vipākam kusala anugatikam eva

original: katvā bhājitaṃ. Sesaṃ kusale vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ pana viseso – paṭipadādibhedo
analyzed: katvā bhājitam sesam kusale vutta nayena iva veditabbam ayam pana visesaḥ paṭipadā ādi bhedaḥ

original: ca hīnapaṇītamajjhimabhāvo ca etesu jhānāgamanato veditabbo. Chandādīnaṃ pana aññataraṃ

original: dhuraṃ katvā anuppādanīyattā niradhipatikāneva etānīti.
analyzed: dhuram katvā an uppādanīya ttā niradhipatikāni eva etāni iti

original: Rūpāvacarārūpāvacaravipākakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: rūpāvacara arūpāvacara vipāka kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Lokuttaravipākakathā
analyzed: lokuttara vipāka kathā

original: 505. Lokuttaravipākampi kusalasadisattā kusalānugatikameva katvā bhājitaṃ. Yasmā
analyzed: lokuttara vipākam pi kusala sadisattā kusala anugatikam eva katvā bhājitam yasmai

original: pana tebhūmakakusalaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena vaṭṭaṃ ācināti vaḍḍheti, tasmā tattha
analyzed: pana tebhūmaka kusalam cuti paṭisandhi vasena vaṭṭam ācināti vaḍḍheti tasmā

original: katattā upacitattāti vuttaṃ. Lokuttaraṃ pana tena ācitampi apacināti, sayampi cutipaṭisandhivasena
analyzed: kata ttā upacita ttā iti vuttam lokuttaram pana tena ācitam pi apacināti sayam pi cuti paṭisandhi vasena

original: na ācināti, tenettha ‘katattā upacitattā’ti avatvā katattā bhāvitattāti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: na ācināti tena itthā kata ttā upacita ttā iti avatvā kata ttā bhāvita ttā iti vuttam

original: Suññatantiādīsu ‘maggo’ tāva ‘āgamanato saguṇato ārammaṇatoti tīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ
analyzed: suññata nti ādīsu maggo tāva āgamanataḥ saguṇataḥ ārammaṇato ti tīhi kāraṇehi nāmam

original: labhatī’ti, idaṃ heṭṭhā kusalādhikāre vitthāritaṃ. Tattha suttantikapariyāyena saguṇatopi

original: ārammaṇatopi nāmaṃ labhati. Pariyāyadesanā hesā. Abhidhammakathā pana nippariyāyadesanā.
analyzed: ārammaṇataḥ pi nāmam labhati pariyāya desanā hesā abhidhammakathā pana nippariyāya desanā

original: Tasmā idha saguṇato vā ārammaṇato vā nāmaṃ na labhati, āgamanatova labhati. Āgamanameva

original: hi dhuraṃ. Taṃ duvidhaṃ hoti – vipassanāgamanaṃ maggāgamananti.
analyzed: hi dhuram tam duvidham hoti vipassanā āgamanam magga āgamanan ti

original: Tattha maggassa āgataṭṭhāne vipassanāgamanaṃ dhuraṃ, phalassa āgataṭṭhāne maggāgamanaṃ

original: dhuranti veditabbaṃ. So panesa maggo āgamanato ‘suññata’nti nāmaṃ labhitvā saguṇato
analyzed: dhuranti veditabbam saḥ pana isa maggaḥ āgamanataḥ suññatam ti nāmam labhitvā sa guṇataḥ

original: ca ārammaṇato ca ‘animitto’‘appaṇihito’tipi vuccati. Tasmā sayaṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhāne
analyzed: ca ārammaṇato ca vuccati tasmā sayam āgamanīya ṭhāne

original: ṭhatvā attano phalassa tīṇi nāmāni deti. Kathaṃ? Ayañhi suddhāgamanavaseneva laddhanāmo

analyzed: suññata maggaḥ sayam āgamanīya ṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attanaḥ phalassa nāmam dadamāno suññata nti

original: nāmāni maggānantare phalacittasmiṃyeva iminā nayena labbhanti, no aparabhāge vaḷañjanakaphalasamāpattiyā.
analyzed: nāmāni magga anantare phala cittasmiṃ yeva iminā nayena labbhanti no apara bhāge vaḷañjanaka phala samāpattiyā

original: Aparabhāge pana aniccatādīhi tīhi vipassanāhi vipassituṃ sakkoti. Athassa vuṭṭhitavuṭṭhitavipassanāvasena

original: vipākacittāni veditabbāni.
analyzed: vipāka cittāni veditabbāni

analyzed: labhāpetum sakkonti

original: maggaṃ upādāya maggo nāma; phalaṅgaṃ phalapariyāpannanti vattumpi vaṭṭati. Magge
analyzed: maggam upādāya maggaḥ nāma phalaṅgam phala pariyāpannanti vattum pi vaṭṭati magge

original: bujjhanakassa aṅgoti sambojjhaṅgo, phale buddhassa aṅgoti sambojjhaṅgo. Magge āramaṇaviramaṇavaseneva
analyzed: bujjhanakassa aṅgo ti sambojjhaṅgo phale buddhassa aṅgo ti sambojjhaṅgo magge āramaṇa viramaṇa vasena iva

original: ārati virati. Phale pana ārativirativasenāti.
analyzed: ārati virati phale ārati virati vasena ati

original: Lokuttaravipākakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: lokuttara vipāka kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Akusalavipākakathā
analyzed: akusala vipāka kathā

original: 556. Ito parāni akusalavipākāni – pañca cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇāni, ekā manodhātu,
analyzed: itas parāni akusala vipākāni pañca cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāya viññāṇāni ekā manaḥ dhātu

original: ekā manoviññāṇadhātūti imāni satta cittāni – pāḷito ca atthato ca heṭṭhā vuttehi
analyzed: ekā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uti imāni satta cittāni pāḷito ca atthato ca heṭṭhā vuttehi

original: tādiseheva kusalavipākacittehi sadisāni.
analyzed: tādisehi iva kusala vipāka cittehi sadisāni

original: Kevalañhi tāni kusalakammapaccayāni imāni akusalakammapaccayāni. Tāni ca iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattesu
analyzed: kevalañhi tāni kusala kamma paccayāni imāni akusala kamma paccayāni tāni ca iṭṭha aiṭṭha majjhattesu

original: ārammaṇesu vattanti, imāni aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattesu. Tattha ca sukhasahagataṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ,
analyzed: ārammaṇesu vattanti imāni aniṭṭha aniṭṭha majjhattesu tattha ca sukha sahagatam kāya viññāṇam

original: idha dukkhasahagataṃ. Tattha ca upekkhāsahagatā manoviññāṇadhātu manussesu jaccandhādīnaṃ
analyzed: idha dukkha sahagatam tattha ca upekkhā sahagatā manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu manussesu jaccandha ādīnam

analyzed: paṭisandhim ādim katvā pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccati idha pana ekādasavidhena api akusala cittena

analyzed: kamme āyūhite kamma kamma nimitta gati nimittesu aññataram ārammaṇam katvā catūsu apāyesu

original: paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati; dutiyavārato paṭṭhāya yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā, aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇāya
analyzed: paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati dutiya vārataḥ paṭṭhāya yāvatāyukam bhavaṅgam hutvā aniṭṭha aniṭṭha majjhatta ārammaṇāya

original: pañcaviññāṇavīthiyā santīraṇaṃ hutvā, balavārammaṇe chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā,

original: maraṇakāle cuti hutvāti, evaṃ pañcasu eva ṭhānesu vipaccatīti.
analyzed: maraṇa kāle hutvā ati evam pañcasu eva ṭhānesu vipaccati iti

original: Akusalavipākakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: akusala vipāka kathā niṭṭhitā

original: Kiriyābyākatavaṇṇanā
Manodhātucittaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dhātu cittam

original: 566. Idāni kiriyābyākataṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: idāni kiriyā abyākatam bhājetvā dassetum puna katame dhammā abyākata ati ādi āraddham

original: Tattha kiriyāti karaṇamattaṃ. Sabbesuyeva hi kiriyacittesu yaṃ javanabhāvaṃ appattaṃ
analyzed: tattha kiriyā ti karaṇa mattam sabbesu yeva hi kiriya cittesu yam javana bhāvam appattam

original: taṃ vātapupphaṃ viya. Yaṃ javanabhāvappattaṃ taṃ chinnamūlakarukkhapupphaṃ viya aphalaṃ
analyzed: tam vāta puppham viya yam javana bhāva ppattam tam chinna mūlaka rukkha puppham viya aphalam

original: hoti, taṃtaṃ kiccasādhanavasena pavattattā pana karaṇamattameva hoti. Tasmā kiriyāti
analyzed: hoti taṃtam kicca sādhana vasena pavatta tā pana karaṇam attam eva hoti tasmā kiriyā ati

original: vuttaṃ. Nevakusalānākusalātiādīsu kusalamūlasaṅkhātassa kusalahetuno abhāvā ‘nevakusalā’;
analyzed: vuttam nevakusala anākusala ati ādīsu kusala mūla saṅkhātassa kusala hetuno abhāvā nevakusalā

original: akusalamūlasaṅkhātassa akusalahetuno abhāvā ‘nevaakusalā’; yonisomanasikāraayonisomanasikārasaṅkhātānampi
analyzed: akusala mūla saṅkhātassa akusala hetuno abhāvāḥ na iva akusalāḥ yoniso manasikāra ayonisoma nasikāra saṅkhātānam pi

original: kusalākusalapaccayānaṃ abhāvā ‘nevakusalānākusalā’. Kusalākusalasaṅkhātassa janakahetuno
analyzed: kusala akusala paccayānaṃ abhāvā nevakusala anākusalā kusala akusala saṅkhātassa janaka hetuno

original: abhāvā nevakammavipākā.
analyzed: abhāvā na iva kamma vipākā

original: Idhāpi cittassekaggatāniddese pavattiṭṭhitimattameva labbhati. Dve pañcaviññāṇāni,
analyzed: idha api cittassa ekagga tā niddese pavatti ṭṭhitimattam eva labbhati dve pañca viññāṇāni

original: tisso manodhātuyo, tisso manoviññāṇadhātuyo, vicikicchāsahagatanti imesu sattarasasu
analyzed: tissaḥ manaḥ dhātuyaḥ tissaḥ manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyaḥ vicikicchā sahagatanti imesu sattarasasu

original: cittesu dubbalattā saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitiādīni na labbhanti. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ vipākamanodhātuniddese
analyzed: cittesu dubbala ttā saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti ādīni na labbhanti sesam sabbam vipāka manaḥ dhātu niddese

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, aññatra uppattiṭṭhānā. Tañhi cittaṃ pañcaviññāṇānantaraṃ
analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbam aññatra uppatti ṭṭhānā tat hi cittam pañca viññāṇa anantaram

original: uppajjati. Idaṃ pana pañcadvāre vaḷañjanakappavattikāle sabbesaṃ pure uppajjati.
analyzed: uppajjati idam pana pañca dvāre vaḷañjana kappa vatti kāle sabbesam pure uppajjati

original: Kathaṃ? Cakkhudvāre tāva iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattesu rūpārammaṇesu
analyzed: katham cakkhu dvāre tāva iṭṭha eṭṭha majjhatta aniṭṭha aniṭṭha majjhattesu rūpa ārammaṇesu

original: yena kenaci pasāde ghaṭṭite taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjanavasena purecārikaṃ hutvā
analyzed: yena kenacid pasāde ghaṭṭite tam ārammaṇam gahetvā āvajjana vasena purecārikam hutvā

original: bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭayamānaṃ uppajjati. Sotadvārādīsupi eseva nayoti.
analyzed: bhavaṅgam āvaṭṭayamānam uppajjati sota dvāra ādīsu pi esā iva

original: Kiriyamanodhātucittaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: kiriya manaḥ dhātu cittam niṭṭhitam

original: Kiriyamanoviññāṇadhātucittāni
analyzed: kiriya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu cittāni

original: 568. Manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā hoti…pe… somanassasahagatāti, idaṃ cittaṃ aññesaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ.
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu uppannā hoti pe somanassa sahagatā ti idam cittam aññesam asādhāraṇam

original: Khīṇāsavasseva pāṭipuggalikaṃ. Chasu dvāresu labbhati. Cakkhudvāre hi padhānasāruppaṃ
analyzed: khīṇāsavassa iva pāṭipuggalikam chasu dvāresu labbhati cakkhu dvāre hi padhāna sāruppam

original: ṭhānaṃ disvā khīṇāsavo iminā cittena somanassito hoti. Sotadvāre bhaṇḍabhājanīyaṭṭhānaṃ

original: patvā mahāsaddaṃ katvā luddhaluddhesu gaṇhantesu ‘evarūpā nāma me loluppataṇhā pahīnā’ti
analyzed: patvā mahā saddam katvā luddha luddhesu gaṇhantesu evarūpā nāma me loluppa taṇhā pahīnā ati

original: iminā cittena somanassito hoti. Ghānadvāre gandhehi vā pupphehi vā cetiyaṃ pūjento
analyzed: iminā cittena somanassitaḥ hoti ghāna dvāre gandhehi vā pupphehi vā cetiyam pūjento

original: iminā cittena somanassito hoti. Jivhādvāre rasasampannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ laddhā bhājetvā
analyzed: iminā cittena somanassitaḥ hoti jivhā dvāre rasa sampannam piṇḍapātam laddhā bhājetvā

original: paribhuñjanto ‘sāraṇīyadhammo vata me pūrito’ti iminā cittena somanassito hoti. Kāyadvāre
analyzed: paribhuñjanto sāraṇīya dhammo vata me pūrito ti iminā cittena somanassitaḥ hoti kāyadvāre

original: abhisamācārikavattaṃ karonto ‘kāyadvāre me vattaṃ pūrita’nti iminā cittena somanassito
analyzed: abhisamācārika vattam karonto kāyadvāre me vattam pūritanti iminā cittena somanassito

original: hoti. Evaṃ tāva pañcadvāre labbhati.
analyzed: evam tāva pañca dvāre labbhati

original: Manodvāre pana atītānāgatamārabbha uppajjati. Jotipālamāṇava magghadevarāja kaṇhatāpasādikālasmiñhi
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pana atīta anāgatam ārabbha uppajjati jotipāla māṇava magghadevarāja kaṇha tāpasa ādi kālasmin hi

original: kataṃ kāraṇaṃ āvajjetvā tathāgato sitaṃ pātvākāsi. Taṃ pana pubbenivāsañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ
analyzed: katam kāraṇam āvajjetvā tathāgataḥ sitam pātvā akāsi tam pana pubbenivāsa ñāṇa sabbaññuta ññāṇānam

analyzed: kiccam tesam pana dvinnam ñāṇānam ciṇṇa pariyante idam cittam hāsayamānam uppajjati

original: Anāgate ‘tantissaro mudiṅgassaro paccekabuddho bhavissatī’ti sitaṃ pātvākāsi. Tampi
analyzed: anāgate tantissaraḥ mudiṅgassaraḥ paccekabuddho bhavissati iti sitam pātvā akāsi

original: anāgataṃsañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ kiccaṃ. Tesaṃ pana dvinna ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante

original: idaṃ cittaṃ hāsayamānaṃ uppajjati.
analyzed: idam cittam hāsayamānam uppajjati

original: Niddesavāre panassa sesaahetukacittehi balavataratāya cittekaggatā samādhibalaṃ pāpetvā
analyzed: niddesa vāre panassa sesa ahetuka cittehi balavatara tāya citta ekagga tā samādhi balam pāpetvā

analyzed: vīriyam pi vīriya balam uddesa vāre pana samādhi balam hoti vīriya balam

analyzed: balam tasmā saṅgaha vāre pi dve balāni honti iti na vuttam sesam sabbam somanassa sahagata ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu niddese

original: vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: 574. Upekkhāsahagatāti idaṃ cittaṃ tīsu bhavesu sabbesaṃ sacittakasattānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: upekkhā sahagatā ti idam cittam tīsu bhavesu sabbesam sacittaka sattānam sādhāraṇam

analyzed: manaḥ dvāre āvajjanam iminā gahita ārammaṇam eva gaṇhanti

original: Mahāgajaṃ nāmetaṃ cittaṃ; imassa anārammaṇaṃ nāma natthi. ‘Asabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇagatikaṃ
analyzed: mahāgajam nāma etam cittam imassa anārammaṇam nāma natthi asabbaññu taññāṇam sabbaññu taññāṇa gatikam

analyzed: nāma kataman ti vutte idam ti vattabbam sesam ettha purima citte vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: Kevalañhi tattha sappītikattā navaṅgiko saṅkhārakkhandho vibhatto. Idha nippītikattā aṭṭhaṅgiko.
analyzed: kevalam hi tattha sappītikattā navaṅgikaḥ saṅkhāra kkhandho vibhattaḥ idha nippītikattā aṭṭhaṅgiko

analyzed: idāni yāni kusalataḥ aṭṭha khīṇāsavassa uppajjanatāya kiriyāni jātāni tasmā tāni kusala niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbāni

original: Idha ṭhatvā hasanakacittāni samodhānetabbāni. Kati panetāni hontīti? Vuccate terasa.
analyzed: idha ṭhatvā hasanaka cittāni samodhānetabbāni kati pana etāni honti iti vuccate terasa

original: Puthujjanā hi kusalato catūhi somanassasahagatehi, akusalato catūhīti, aṭṭhahi cittehi
analyzed: puthujjanāḥ hi kusalato catūhi somanassa sahagatehi akusalato catūhi iti aṭṭhahi cittehi

analyzed: somanassa sahagatehi iti chahi cittehi hasanti khīṇa āsavā kiriyataḥ pañcahi somanassa sahagatehi hasanti iti

original: imasmiṃyeva attabhāve, sukhavihāramattaṃ. Tattha khīṇāsavassa puthujjanakāle nibbattitā

analyzed: cittuppāda kaṇḍa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 2. Rūpakaṇḍo

original: Uddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: uddesa vaṇṇanā

original: Idāni rūpakaṇḍaṃ bhājetvā dassetuṃ puna katame dhammā abyākatātiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: idāni rūpa kaṇḍam bhājetvā dassetum puna katame dhammā abyākatā ati ādi āraddham tattha

original: kiñcāpi heṭṭhā cittuppādakaṇḍe vipākābyākatañceva kiriyābyākatañca nissesaṃ katvā

original: kusalākusalānanti catubhūmakakusalānañceva akusalānañca. Evaṃ tāva vipākābyākataṃ

original: kusalavipākākusalavipākavasena dvīhi padehi pariyādiyitvā dassitaṃ. Yasmā pana taṃ
analyzed: kusala vipāka akusala vipāka vasena dvīhi padehi dassitam yasmai pana tam

analyzed: sabbam pi kāmāvacaram vā hoti rūpāvacara ādīsu vā aññataram tasmā kāmāvacara ati ādinā

original: pariyādiyitvā dassitaṃ.

analyzed: duvidha rūpa saṅgahaḥ

original: na paññāyeyya. Tasmā asampattagocarāneva tāni.

original: Ahiādisamānāni cetāni. Yathā hi ahi nāma bahi sittasammaṭṭhaṭṭhāne nābhiramati, saṅkāraṭṭhānatiṇapaṇṇagahanavammikāniyeva
analyzed: ahi ādi samānāni ca itāni yathā hi ahi nāma bahi sitta sammaṭṭha ṭṭhāne na abhiramati

original: pana pavisitvā nipannakāle abhiramati, ekaggataṃ āpajjati, evameva cakkhupetaṃ visamajjhāsayaṃ

original: maṭṭhesu suvaṇṇabhittiādīsu nābhiramati, oloketumpi na icchati, rūpacittapupphalatādicittesuyeva
analyzed: na abhiramati oloketum pi na icchati rūpa citta puppha latā ādi cittesu yā iva

original: pana abhiramati. Tādisesu hi ṭhānesu cakkhumhi appahonte mukhampi vivaritvā oloketukāmā honti.
analyzed: pana abhiramati tādisesu hi ṭhānesu cakkhumhi appahonte mukham pi vivaritvā oloketu kāmāḥ honti

original: Susumāropi bahi nikkhanto gahetabbaṃ na passati, akkhīni nimmīletvāva carati. Yadā
analyzed: susumāraḥ api bahi nikkhantaḥ gahetabbam na passati akkhīni nimmīletvā ava carati yadā

original: pana byāmasatamattaṃ udakaṃ ogāhitvā bilaṃ pavisitvā nipanno hoti, tadā tassa cittaṃ
analyzed: pana byāma sata mattam udakam ogāhitvā bilam pavisitvā nipannaḥ hoti tadā tassa cittam

original: ekaggaṃ hoti sukhaṃ supati, evameva sotaṃ tampe bilajjhāsayaṃ ākāsasannissitaṃ kaṇṇacchiddakūpakeyeva

original: ajjhāsayaṃ karoti. Kaṇṇacchiddākāsoyeva tassa saddasavane paccayo hoti. Ajaṭākāsopi
analyzed: ajjhāsayam karoti kaṇṇa chidda ākāsaḥ yā iva tassa sadda savane paccayaḥ hoti a jaṭā ākāsaḥ pi

original: vaṭṭatiyeva. Antoleṇasmiñhi sajjhāye kariyamāne na leṇacchadanaṃ bhinditvā saddo
analyzed: vaṭṭatiyā iva antar leṇasmin hi sajjhāye kariyamāne na leṇa chadanam bhinditvā saddaḥ

original: bahi nikkhamati, dvāravātapānacchiddehi pana nikkhamitvā dhātuparamparāyeva ghaṭṭento
analyzed: bahi nikkhamati dvāra vāta pāna chiddehi pana nikkhamitvā dhātu paramparāyā iva ghaṭṭento

original: gantvā sotapasādaṃ ghaṭṭeti. Atha tasmiṃ kāle ‘asuko nāma sajjhāyatī’ti leṇapiṭṭhe nisinnā jānanti.
analyzed: gantvā sa utapasādam ghaṭṭa iti atha tasmin kāle asukaḥ nāma sajjhāyati iti leṇa piṭṭhe nisinnāḥ jānanti

original: Evaṃ sante sampattagocaratā hoti. ‘Kiṃ panetaṃ sampattagocara’nti? ‘Āma, sampattagocaraṃ’.
analyzed: evam sante sampatta gocara tā hoti kim pana itam sampatta gocaranti sampatta gocaram

original: ‘Yadi evaṃ, dūre bherīādīsu vajjamānesu dūre saddoti jānanaṃ na bhaveyyā’ti? ‘No
analyzed: yadi evam dūre bherī ādīsu vajjamānesu dūre saddo ti jānanam na bhaveyya ati no

original: na bhavati. Sotapasādasmiñhi ghaṭṭite dūre saddo āsanne saddo, paratīre orimatīreti

original: tathā tathā jānanākāro hoti. Dhammatā esā’ti. ‘Kiṃ etāya dhammatāya? Yato yato chiddaṃ

original: tato tato savanaṃ hoti, candimasūriyādīnaṃ dassanaṃ viyāti asampattagocaramevetaṃ’.
analyzed: tato tato savanam hoti candima sūriya ādīnam dassanam viyāti a sampatta gocaram eva etam

original: Pakkhīpi rukkhe vā bhūmiyaṃ vā na ramati. Yadā pana ekaṃ vā dve vā leḍḍupāte atikkamma

analyzed: vātam an ākaḍḍhantaḥ na iva tassa gandham jānāti

original: Kukkuropi bahi vicaranto khemaṭṭhānaṃ na passati leḍḍupahārādīhi upadduto hoti. Antogāmaṃ

original: sakkā kheḷena atemitassa rasaṃ jānituṃ.
analyzed: sakkā kheḷena a temitassa rasam jānitum

original: Siṅgālopi bahi caranto ratiṃ na vindati, āmakasusāne manussamaṃsaṃ khāditvā nipannasseva

analyzed: ajjhattika bāhirā ca ssa pathavī ārammaṇa ggahaṇe paccayaḥ hoti su santhatassa api hi sayanassa

analyzed: jānitunti ajjhattika bāhirā pathavī etassa kāya pasādassa phoṭṭhabba jānane paccayaḥ

original: 616. Rūpāyatananiddese vaṇṇova vaṇṇanibhā; nibhātīti vā nibhā. Cakkhuviññāṇassa pākaṭā
analyzed: rūpa āyatana niddese vaṇṇaḥ uva vaṇṇa nibhā nibhāti iti vā nibhā cakkhu viññāṇassa pākaṭā

original: passitabbanti attho. Saddhiṃ paṭighena sappaṭighaṃ, paṭighaṭṭananighaṃsajanakanti

original: Imāni satta vatthuṃ anāmasitvā sabhāveneva dassitāni.

original: nippariyāyena dīghaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ; tathā rassādīni. Taṃ taṃ nissāya pana tathā tathā

original: Chāyā ātapoti idaṃ aññamaññaparicchinnaṃ; tathā āloko andhakāro ca. Abbhā mahikātiādīni

original: Tattha candamaṇḍalādīnaṃ vatthūnaṃ evaṃ viseso veditabbo – maṇimayaṃ rajatapaṭicchannaṃ
