original: tesaṃ tesaṃ devaputtānaṃ vimānāni tārakarūpāni nāma.
analyzed: tesam tesam deva puttānam vimānāni tāraka rūpāni nāma

original: Tattha heṭṭhā cando, sūriyo upari, ubhinnamantaraṃ yojanaṃ hoti. Candassa heṭṭhimantato
analyzed: tattha heṭṭhā cando sūriyaḥ upari ubhinnam antaram yojanam hoti candassa

original: sūriyassa uparimanto yojanasataṃ hoti. Dvīsu passesu nakkhattatārakā gacchanti. Etesu
analyzed: sūriyassa uparimantaḥ yojana satam hoti dvīsu passesu nakkhatta tārakāḥ gacchanti etesu

original: pana tīsu cando dandhagamano, sūriyo sīghagamano, nakkhattatārakā sabbasīghagamanā.
analyzed: pana tīsu cando dandha gamanaḥ sūriyo sīgha gamanaḥ nakkhatta tārakā sabba sīgha gamanā

original: Kālena candimasūriyānaṃ purato honti kālena pacchā.
analyzed: kālena candima sūri yānam puratas honti kālena pacchā

original: Ādāsamaṇḍalanti kaṃsamayaṃ. Maṇīti ṭhapetvā veḷuriyaṃ seso jotirasādianekappabhedo.
analyzed: kaṃsa mayam maṇi iti ṭhapetvā veḷuriyam sesaḥ joti rasa ādi aneka ppabhedo

original: Saṅkhoti sāmuddiko; muttā sāmuddikāpi, sesāpi. Veḷuriyoti veḷuvaṇṇamaṇi. Jātarūpaṃ
analyzed: saṅkhaḥ iti sāmuddikaḥ muttā sāmuddikā api sesā api veḷuriyā ti veḷu vaṇṇa maṇi jātarūpam

original: vuccati satthuvaṇṇo. Satthā hi suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, suvaṇṇampi satthuvaṇṇaṃ. Rajataṃ vuccati
analyzed: vuccati satthu vaṇṇaḥ satthā hi suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ suvaṇṇam pi satthu vaṇṇam rajatam vuccati

original: kahāpaṇo – lohamāsako dārumāsako jatumāsako, ye ‘vohāraṃ gacchantī’ti vuttaṃ taṃ
analyzed: kahāpaṇaḥ loha māsakaḥ dāru māsakaḥ jatu māsakaḥ ye vohāram gacchanti iti vuttam tam

original: sabbampi idha gahitaṃ.
analyzed: sabbam pi idha gahitam

original: Yaṃ vā panaññampīti iminā pāḷiāgataṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ taṭṭikapilotikakaṇṇikavaṇṇādibhedaṃ rūpaṃ gahitaṃ. Tañhi sabbaṃ yevāpanakesu paviṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: yam vā pana aññam pi iti iminā pāḷi āgatam ṭhapetvā sesam taṭṭika pilotika kaṇṇika vaṇṇa ādi bhedam rūpam gahitam tat hi sabbam yevāpanakesu paviṭṭham

original: Evametaṃ nīlādinā bhedena bhinnampi rūpaṃ sabbaṃ lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnameva. Sabbañhetaṃ
analyzed: evam etam nīla ādinā bhedena bhinnam pi rūpam sabbam lakkhaṇa ādīhi abhinnam eva sabbam ha etam

original: cakkhupaṭihananalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ, cakkhuviññāṇassa visayabhāvarasaṃ, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: cakkhu paṭihanana lakkhaṇam rūpam cakkhu viññāṇassa visaya bhāva rasam tassa iva gocara paccupaṭṭhānam

original: catumahābhūtapadaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā cetaṃ tathā sabbānipi upādārūpāni. Yattha pana viseso
analyzed: catu mahābhūta padaṭṭhānam yathā cetam tathā sabbāni api upādā rūpāni yattha pana viseso

original: atthi tattha vakkhāma. Sesamettha cakkhāyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Kevalañhi
analyzed: atthi tattha vakkhāma sesam ettha cakkhāyatana niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbam kevalam hi

original: tattha cakkhupubbaṅgamo niddeso idha rūpapubbaṅgamo. Tattha ‘cakkhuṃ peta’ntiādīni
analyzed: tattha cakkhu pubbaṅgamaḥ niddesaḥ idha rūpa pubbaṅgamaḥ tattha cakkhum peta nti ādīni

original: cuddasa nāmāni, idha ‘rūpaṃpeta’ntiādīni tīṇi. Sesaṃ tādisameva. Yathā hi catūhi
analyzed: nāmāni tīṇi sesam tādisam eva yathā hi

original: catūhi nayehi paṭimaṇḍetvā cakkhuṃ vavatthāpetuṃ terasa vārā vuttā, idhāpi te tatheva vuttāti.
analyzed: catūhi nayehi paṭimaṇḍetvā cakkhum vavatthāpetum terasa vārāḥ vuttāḥ idha api te tathā iva vuttā ati

original: 620. Saddāyatananiddese bherisaddoti mahābherīpahaṭabherīnaṃ saddo. Mudiṅgasaṅkhapaṇavasaddāpi
analyzed: sadda āyatana niddese bheri saddo ti mahā bherī pahaṭa bherīnam saddaḥ mudiṅga saṅkha paṇava saddā api

original: mudiṅgādipaccayā saddā. Gītasaṅkhāto saddo gītasaddo. Vuttāvasesānaṃ vīṇādīnaṃ tantibaddhānaṃ
analyzed: mud iṅga ādi paccayā saddāḥ gīta saṅkhātaḥ saddaḥ gīta saddaḥ vutta avasesānam vīṇā ādīnam tanti baddhānam

original: saddo vāditasaddo. Sammasaddoti kaṃsatālakaṭṭhatālasaddo. Pāṇisaddoti pāṇippahārasaddo.
analyzed: saddo vādita saddo samma saddo ti kaṃsa tāla kaṭṭha tāla saddo pāṇi saddo ti pāṇippahāra saddo

original: Sattānaṃ nigghosasaddoti bahūnaṃ sannipatitānaṃ apaññāyamānapadabyañjananigghosasaddo.
analyzed: sattānam nigghosa saddo ti bahūnam sannipatitānam a paññāyamāna pada byañjana nigghosa saddo

original: Dhātūnaṃ sannighātasaddoti rukkhānaṃ aññamaññanighaṃsanaghaṇṭikākoṭanādisaddo. Vātassa
analyzed: dhātūnam sannighāta saddaḥ ti rukkhānam aññamañña nighaṃsana ghaṇṭikā koṭana ādi saddaḥ vātassa

original: vāyato saddo vātasaddo. Udakassa sandamānassa vā paṭihatassa vā saddo udakasaddo.
analyzed: vāyataḥ saddaḥ vāta saddaḥ udakassa sandamānassa vā paṭihatassa vā saddaḥ udaka saddaḥ

original: Manussānaṃ sallāpādisaddo manussasaddo. Taṃ ṭhapetvā seso sabbopi amanussasaddo.
analyzed: manussānam sallāpa ādi saddaḥ manussa saddaḥ tam ṭhapetvā sesaḥ sabbaḥ api a manussa saddaḥ

original: Iminā padadvayena sabbopi saddo pariyādinno. Evaṃ santepi vaṃsaphālanapilotikaphālanādīsu
analyzed: iminā pada dvayena sabbaḥ api saddo pariyādinnaḥ evam sante pi vaṃsa phālana pilotika phālana ādīsu

original: pavatto pāḷiyaṃ anāgatasaddo yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhoti veditabbo.
analyzed: pavattaḥ pāḷiyam anāgata saddaḥ yevāpanaka ṭhānam paviṭṭhaḥ iti veditabbo

original: Evamayaṃ bherīsaddādinā bhedena bhinnopi saddo lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva. Sabbopi
analyzed: evam ayam bherī sadda ādinā bhedena bhinnaḥ api saddaḥ lakkhaṇa ādīhi abhinnaḥ yā iva sabbaḥ api

original: hesa sotapaṭihananalakkhaṇo saddo sotaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: hesa sota paṭihanana lakkhaṇo saddo sota viññāṇassa visaya bhāva raso tassa iva gocara paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Sesaṃ cakkhāyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idhāpi hi catūhi catūhi nayehi
analyzed: sesam cakkhāyatana niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbam idha api hi catūhi catūhi nayehi

original: paṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā vuttā. Tesaṃ attho sakkā vuttanayeneva jānitunti na vitthārito.
analyzed: paṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārāḥ vuttā tesam attho sakkā vutta nayena iva jānitun ti na vitthāritaḥ

original: 624. Gandhāyatananiddese mūlagandhoti yaṃ kiñci mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbatto gandho. Sāragandhādīsupi
eseva nayo. Asiddhadusiddhānaṃ ḍākādīnaṃ gandho āmakagandho. Macchasakalikāpūtimaṃsasaṃkiliṭṭhasappiādīnaṃ
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ asiddha dusiddhānam ḍāka ādīnam gandhaḥ āmaka gandhaḥ maccha sakalikā pūti maṃsa saṃkiliṭṭha sappi ādīnam

original: gandho vissagandho. Sugandhoti iṭṭhagandho. Duggandhoti aniṭṭhagandho. Iminā padadvayena
analyzed: gandhaḥ vissa gandho sugandho ti iṭṭha gandhaḥ duggandho ti aniṭṭha gandhaḥ iminā pada dvayena

original: sabbopi gandho pariyādinno. Evaṃ santepi kaṇṇakagandhapilotikagandhādayo pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: sabbaḥ api gandho pariyādinnaḥ evam sante pi kaṇṇaka gandha pilotika gandha ādayaḥ pāḷiyam

original: anāgatā sabbepi gandhā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhāti veditabbā.
analyzed: anāgatā sabbe pi gandhā yeva āpanaka ṭṭhānam paviṭṭhā ati veditabbā

original: Evamayaṃ mūlagandhādinā bhedena bhinnopi gandho lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva. Sabbopi
analyzed: evam ayam mūla gandha ādinā bhedena bhinnaḥ api gandhaḥ lakkhaṇa ādīhi abhinnaḥ yeva sabbaḥ api

original: hesa ghānapaṭihananalakkhaṇo gandho, ghānaviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: hesa ghāna paṭihanana lakkhaṇaḥ gandho ghāna viññāṇassa visaya bhāva raso tassa iva gocara paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Sesaṃ cakkhāyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idhāpi hi tatheva dvipaññāsanayapaṭimaṇḍitā
analyzed: sesam cakkhāyatana niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbam idha api hi tathā iva dvi paññāsa naya paṭimaṇḍitā

original: terasa vārā vuttā. Te atthato pākaṭāyeva.
analyzed: terasa vārāḥ vuttā te atthataḥ pākaṭāya iva

original: 628. Rasāyatananiddese mūlarasoti yaṃkiñci mūlaṃ paṭicca nibbattaraso. Khandharasādīsupi
analyzed: rasa āyatana niddese mūla rasaḥ ti yaṃ kiñci mūlam paṭicca nibbatta rasaḥ khandha rasa ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Ambilanti takkambilādi. Madhuranti ekantato gosappiādi. Madhu pana kasāvayuttaṃ
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ ambilanti takkambila ādi madhuranti ekantataḥ gosappi ādi madhu pana kasāva yuttam

original: ciranikkhittaṃ kasāvaṃ hoti. Phāṇitaṃ khāriyuttaṃ ciranikkhittaṃ khāriyaṃ hoti. Sappi
analyzed: cira nikkhittam kasāvam hoti phāṇitam khāri yuttam cira nikkhittam khāriyam hoti sappi

original: pana ciranikkhittaṃ vaṇṇagandhe jahantampi rasaṃ na jahatīti tadeva ekantamadhuraṃ.
analyzed: pana cira nikkhittam vaṇṇa gandhe jahantam pi rasam na jahati iti tat eva ekanta madhuram

original: Tittakanti nimbapaṇṇādi. Kaṭukanti siṅgiveramaricādi. Loṇikanti sāmuddikaloṇādi.
analyzed: tittakanti nimba paṇṇa ādi kaṭukanti siṅgivera marica ādi loṇikanti sāmuddika loṇa ādi

original: Khārikanti vātiṅgaṇakaḷīrādi. Lambilanti badarāmalakakapiṭṭhasālavādi. Kasāvanti
analyzed: vātiṅgaṇa kaḷīra ādi lambilanti badara āmalaka kapiṭṭha sālava ādi kasāvanti

original: haritakādi. Ime sabbepi rasā vatthuvasena vuttā. Taṃtaṃvatthuto panettha rasova ambilādīhi
analyzed: haritaka ādi ime sabbe pi rasāḥ vatthu vasena vuttā tad tad vatthuto pana ittha rasaḥ uva ambila ādīhi

original: nāmehi vuttoti veditabbo. Sādūti iṭṭharaso, asādūti aniṭṭharaso. Iminā padadvayena
analyzed: nāmehi vuttaḥ ti veditabbo sādu iti iṭṭha rasaḥ asādu iti aniṭṭha rasaḥ iminā pada dvayena

original: sabbopi raso pariyādinno. Evaṃ santepi leḍḍurasabhittirasapilotikarasādayo pāḷiyaṃ
analyzed: sabbaḥ api rasaḥ pariyādinno evam sante pi leḍḍu rasa bhitti rasa pilotika rasa ādayaḥ pāḷiyam

original: anāgatā sabbepi rasā yevāpanakaṭṭhānaṃ paviṭṭhāti veditabbā.
analyzed: anāgatāḥ sabbe pi rasāḥ yeva āpanaka ṭṭhānam paviṭṭhā ati veditabbā

original: Evamayaṃ mūlarasādinābhedena bhinnopi raso lakkhaṇādīhi abhinnoyeva. Sabbopi hesa
analyzed: evam ayam mūla rasa ādinā abhedena bhinnaḥ api rasaḥ lakkhaṇa ādīhi abhinnaḥ yā iva sabbaḥ api ha esa

original: jivhāpaṭihananalakkhaṇo raso, jivhāviññāṇassa visayabhāvaraso, tasseva gocarapaccupaṭṭhāno.
analyzed: jivhā paṭihanana lakkhaṇaḥ rasaḥ jivhā viññāṇassa visaya bhāva raso tassa iva gocara paccupaṭṭhāno

original: Sesaṃ cakkhāyatananiddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Idhāpi hi tatheva dvipaññāsanayapaṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārā vuttā.
analyzed: sesam cakkhāyatana niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbam idha api hi tathā iva dvi paññāsa naya paṭimaṇḍitā terasa vārāḥ vuttā

original: 632. Itthindriyaniddese yanti karaṇavacanaṃ. Yena kāraṇena itthiyā itthiliṅgādīni
analyzed: itthi indriya niddese yanti karaṇa vacanam yena kāraṇena itthiyāḥ itthi liṅga ādīni

original: hontīti ayamettha attho. Tattha ‘liṅga’nti saṇṭhānaṃ. Itthiyā hi hatthapādagīvāurādīnaṃ
analyzed: honti iti ayam ettha atthaḥ tattha liṅganti saṇṭhānam itthiyāḥ hi hattha pāda gīvā aura ādīnam

original: saṇṭhānaṃ na purisassa viya hoti. Itthīnañhi heṭṭhimakāyo visado hoti, uparimakāyo
analyzed: saṇṭhānam na purisassa viya hoti itthīnam hi heṭṭhima kāyaḥ visadaḥ hoti uparima kāyaḥ

original: avisado. Hatthapādā khuddakā, mukhaṃ khuddakaṃ. Nimittanti sañjānanaṃ. Itthīnañhi
analyzed: avisadaḥ hattha pādā khuddakā mukham khuddakam nimittam ti sañjānanam itthīnam hi

original: uramaṃsaṃ avisadaṃ hoti, mukhaṃ nimmassudāṭhikaṃ. Kesabandhavatthaggahaṇampi na purisānaṃ
analyzed: ura maṃsam avisadam hoti mukham nimmassu dāṭhikam kesa bandha vattha gahaṇam pi na purisānam

original: viya hoti. Kuttanti kiriyā. Itthiyo hi daharakāle suppakamusalakehi kīḷanti, cittadhītalikāya
analyzed: viya hoti kiriyā itthiyaḥ hi dahara kāle suppaka musalakehi kīḷanti

original: kīḷanti, mattikavākena suttakaṃ nāma kantanti. Ākappoti gamanādiākāro. Itthiyo hi
analyzed: kīḷanti mattika vākena suttakam nāma kantanti ākappoti gamana ādi ākāraḥ itthiyaḥ hi

original: gacchamānā avisadā gacchanti, tiṭṭhamānā nipajjamānā nisīdamānā khādamānā bhuñjamānā
analyzed: gacchamānā avisadā gacchanti tiṭṭhamānā nipajjamānā nisīdamānā khādamānā bhuñjamānā

original: avisadā bhuñjanti. Purisampi hi avisadaṃ disvā mātugāmo viya gacchati tiṭṭhati nipajjati
analyzed: avisadāḥ bhuñjanti purisam pi hi avisadam disvā mātu gāmaḥ viya gacchati tiṭṭhati nipajjati

original: nisīdati khādati bhuñjatīti vadanti.
analyzed: nisīdati khādati bhuñjati iti vadanti

original: Itthattaṃ itthibhāvoti ubhayampi ekatthaṃ; itthisabhāvoti attho. Ayaṃ kammajo paṭisandhisamuṭṭhito.
analyzed: itthattam itthi bhāvaḥ ti ubhayam pi ekattham itthi sabhāvaḥ ti attho ayam kamma jo paṭisandhi samuṭṭhito

original: Itthiliṅgādīni pana itthindriyaṃ paṭicca pavatte samuṭṭhitāni. Yathā hi bīje sati,
analyzed: itthi liṅga ādīni pana itthi indriyam paṭicca pavatte samuṭṭhitāni yathā hi bīje sati

original: bījaṃ paṭicca, bījapaccayā rukkho vaḍḍhitvā sākhāviṭapasampanno hutvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā
analyzed: bījam paṭicca bīja paccayā rukkhaḥ vaḍḍhitvā sākhā viṭapa sampannaḥ hutvā ākāsam pūretvā

original: tiṭṭhati, evameva itthibhāvasaṅkhāte itthindriye sati itthiliṅgādīni honti. Bījaṃ
analyzed: tiṭṭhati evam eva itthi bhāva saṅkhāte itthi indriye sati itthi liṅga ādīni honti bījam

original: viya hi itthindriyaṃ, bījaṃ paṭicca vaḍḍhitvā ākāsaṃ pūretvā ṭhitarukkho viya itthindriyaṃ
analyzed: viya hi itthi indriyam bījam paṭicca vaḍḍhitvā ākāsam pūretvā ṭhita rukkhaḥ viya itthi indriyam

original: paṭicca itthiliṅgādīni pavatte samuṭṭhahanti. Tattha itthindriyaṃ na cakkhuviññeyyaṃ,
analyzed: paṭicca itthi liṅga ādīni pavatte samuṭṭhahanti tattha itthi indriyam na cakkhu viññeyyam

original: manoviññeyyameva. Itthiliṅgādīni cakkhuviññeyyānipi manoviññeyyānipi.
analyzed: manaḥ viññeyyam eva itthi liṅga ādīni cakkhu viññeyyāni pi manaḥ viññeyyāni pi

original: Idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ itthindriyanti idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ, yathā cakkhundriyādīni purisassāpi honti, na evaṃ; niyamato pana itthiyā eva indriyaṃ ‘itthindriyaṃ’.
analyzed: idam tam rūpam itthi indriyam ti idam tam rūpam yathā cakkhu indriya ādīni purisassa api honti na evam niyamataḥ pana itthiyāḥ eva indriyam itthi indriyam

original: 633. Purisindriyepi eseva nayo. Purisaliṅgādīni pana itthiliṅgādīnaṃ paṭipakkhato
analyzed: purisa indriye pi esa iva nayaḥ purisa liṅga ādīni pana itthi liṅga ādīnam paṭipakkhato

original: veditabbāni. Purisassa hi hatthapādagīvāurādīnaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ na itthiyā viya hoti.
analyzed: veditabbāni purisassa hi hattha pāda gīvā aura ādīnam saṇṭhānam na itthiyā viya hoti

original: Purisānañhi uparimakāyo visado hoti heṭṭhimakāyo avisado, hatthapādā mahantā, mukhaṃ
analyzed: purisānam hi uparima kāyaḥ visadaḥ hoti heṭṭhima kāyaḥ a visadaḥ hattha pādāḥ mahantā mukham

original: mahantaṃ, uramaṃsaṃ visadaṃ, massudāṭhikā uppajjanti. Kesabandhanavatthaggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: mahantam ura maṃsam visadam massu dāṭhikāḥ uppajjanti kesa bandhana vattha ggahaṇam

original: na itthīnaṃ viya hoti. Daharakāle rathanaṅgalādīhi kīḷanti, vālikapāḷiṃ katvā vāpiṃ
analyzed: na itthīnam viya hoti dahara kāle ratha naṅgala ādīhi kīḷanti vālika pāḷim katvā vāpim

original: nāma khananti, gamanādīni visadāni honti. Itthimpi gamanādīni visadāni kurumānaṃ
analyzed: nāma khananti gamana ādīni visadāni honti gamana ādīni visadāni kurumānam

original: disvā ‘puriso viya gacchatī’tiādīni vadanti. Sesaṃ itthindriye vuttasadisameva.
analyzed: disvā purisaḥ viya gacchati iti ādīni vadanti sesam itthi indriye vutta sadisam eva

original: Tattha itthibhāvalakkhaṇaṃ itthindriyaṃ, itthīti pakāsanarasaṃ, itthiliṅganimittakuttākappānaṃ
analyzed: tattha itthi bhāva lakkhaṇam itthi indriyam itthī iti pakāsana rasam itthi liṅga nimitta kuttā kappānam

original: kāraṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Purisabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ purisindriyaṃ, purisoti pakāsanarasaṃ,
analyzed: kāraṇa bhāva paccupaṭṭhānam purisa bhāva lakkhaṇam purisa indriyam purisaḥ ti pakāsana rasam

original: purisaliṅganimittakuttākappānaṃ kāraṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. Ubhayampetaṃ paṭhamakappikānaṃ

original: pavatte samuṭṭhāti. Aparabhāge paṭisandhiyaṃ. Paṭisandhisamuṭṭhitampi pavatte calati parivattati.
analyzed: pavatte samuṭṭhāti apara bhāge paṭisandhiyam paṭisandhi samuṭṭhitam pi pavatte calati parivattati

original: Yathāha –
analyzed: yathā āha

original: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti. Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotī”ti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthi liṅgam pātubhūtam hoti tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisa liṅgam pātubhūtam hoti iti

original: Imesu pana dvīsu purisaliṅgaṃ uttamaṃ, itthiliṅgaṃ hīnaṃ. Tasmā purisaliṅgaṃ balavaakusalena
analyzed: imesu pana dvīsu purisa liṅgam uttamam itthi liṅgam hīnam purisa liṅgam

original: antaradhāyati, itthiliṅgaṃ dubbalakusalena patiṭṭhāti. Itthiliṅgaṃ pana antaradhāyantaṃ
analyzed: antaradhāyati itthi liṅgam dubbala kusalena patiṭṭhāti itthi liṅgam pana antaradhāyantam

original: dubbalaakusalena antaradhāyati, purisaliṅgaṃ balavakusalena patiṭṭhāti. Evaṃ ubhayampi
analyzed: dubbala akusalena antaradhāyati purisa liṅgam balava kusalena patiṭṭhāti evam ubhayam pi

original: akusalena antaradhāyati, kusalena patiṭṭhātīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: akusalena antaradhāyati kusalena patiṭṭhāti iti veditabbam

original: Ubhatobyañjanakassa pana kiṃ ekaṃ indriyaṃ udāhu dveti? Ekaṃ. Tañca kho itthiubhatobyañjanakassa
analyzed: ubhatobyañjanakassa pana kim ekam indriyam udāhu dve iti ekam tat ca kho itthi ubhatobyañjanakassa

original: itthindriyaṃ, purisaubhatobyañjanakassa purisindriyaṃ. ‘Evaṃ sante dutiyabyañjanakassa
analyzed: itthi indriyam purisa aubhatobyañjanakassa purisa indriyam evam sante dutiya byañjanakassa

original: abhāvo āpajjati. Indriyañhi byañjanakāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Tañcassa natthī’ti? ‘Na tassa
analyzed: abhāvaḥ āpajjati indriyam hi byañjana kāraṇam vuttam tat ca ssa natthi iti na tassa

original: indriyaṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ’. ‘Kasmā’? ‘Sadā abhāvato. Itthiubhatobyañjanakassa hi yadā
analyzed: indriyam byañjana kāraṇam kasmā sadā abhāvataḥ itthi ubhatobyañjanakassa hi yadā

original: itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati, tadāva purisabyañjanaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, itthibyañjanaṃ
analyzed: itthiyāḥ rāga cittam uppajjati tadā ava purisa byañjanam pākaṭam hoti itthi byañjanam

original: paṭicchannaṃ guḷhaṃ hoti. Tathā itarassa itaraṃ.
analyzed: paṭicchannam guḷham hoti tathā itarassa itaram

original: Yadi ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya, sadāpi byañjanadvayaṃ tiṭṭheyya.
analyzed: yadi ca tesam indriyam dutiya byañjana kāraṇam bhaveyya sadā api byañjana dvayam tiṭṭheyya

original: Na pana tiṭṭhati. Tasmā veditabbametaṃ na tassa taṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ. Kammasahāyaṃ
analyzed: na pana tiṭṭhati tasmā veditabbam etam na tassa tam byañjana kāraṇam kamma sahāyam

original: pana rāgacittamevettha kāraṇaṃ. Yasmā cassa ekameva indriyaṃ hoti, tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako
analyzed: pana rāga cittam eva itthā kāraṇam yasmā ca ssa ekam eva indriyam hoti tasmā itthi ubhatobyañjanakaḥ

original: sayampi gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti, parampi gaṇhāpeti. Purisaubhatobyañjanako paraṃ gabbhaṃ
analyzed: sayam pi gabbham gaṇhāti param pi param gabbham

original: gaṇhāpeti, sayaṃ pana na gaṇhātīti.
analyzed: gaṇhāpa iti sayam pana na gaṇhāti iti

original: 634. Jīvitindriyaniddese yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ heṭṭhā arūpajīvitindriye vuttameva. Kevalañhi
analyzed: jīvitindriya niddese yam vattabbam tam heṭṭhā arūpa jīvitindriye vuttam eva kevalam hi

original: tattha yo tesaṃ arūpīnaṃ dhammānanti vuttaṃ, idha rūpajīvitindriyattā yo tesaṃ rūpīnaṃ

original: dhammānanti ayameva viseso. Lakkhaṇādīni panassa evaṃ veditabbāni – sahajātarūpānupālanalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: dhammānan ti ayam eva visesaḥ lakkhaṇa ādīni panassa evam veditabbāni sahajāta rūpa anupālana lakkhaṇam

original: jīvitindriyaṃ, tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ, tesaṃ yeva ṭhapanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, yāpayitabbabhūtapadaṭṭhānanti.
analyzed: jīvita indriyam tesam pavattana rasam tesam yeva ṭhapana paccupaṭṭhānam yāpayitabba bhūta padaṭṭhānam ti

original: 635. Kāyaviññattiniddese kāyaviññattīti ettha tāva kāyena attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ

original: tiracchānehipi purisānaṃ, purisehi vā tiracchānānampi kāyagahaṇānusārena gahitāya
analyzed: tiracchānehi pi purisānam purisehi vā kāya gahaṇa anusārena gahitāya

original: etāya bhāvo viññāyatīti ‘viññatti’. Sayaṃ kāyagahaṇānusārena viññāyatītipi ‘viññatti’.

original: “Kāyena saṃvaro sādhū”tiādīsu āgato copanasaṅkhāto kāyova viññatti ‘kāyaviññatti’.
analyzed: kāyena saṃvaro sādhu uti ādīsu āgato copana saṅkhāto kāya uva viññatti kāya viññatti

original: Kāyavipphandanena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā, sayañca tathā viññeyyattā kāyena viññattītipi ‘kāyaviññatti’.
analyzed: kāya vipphandanena adhippāya viññāpana hetu ttā sayam ca tathā viññeyya ttā kāyena viññatti iti pi kāya viññatti

original: Kusalacittassa vātiādīsu aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarehi abhiññācittena cāti navahi kusalacittehi
analyzed: kusala cittassa vā ati ādīsu aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarehi abhiññā cittena ca ati navahi kusala cittehi

original: kusalacittassa vā, dvādasahipi akusalacittehi akusalacittassa vā, aṭṭhahi mahākiriyehi
analyzed: kusala cittassa vā akusala cittehi akusala cittassa vā aṭṭhahi mahā kiriyehi

original: dvīhi ahetukakiriyehi abhiññāppattena ekena rūpāvacarakiriyenāti ekādasahi kiriyacittehi
analyzed: dvīhi ahetuka kiriyehi abhiññā appattena ekena rūpāvacara kiriyena ati ekādasahi kiriya cittehi

original: abyākatacittassa vā. Ito aññāni hi cittāni viññattiṃ na janenti. Sekkhāsekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
analyzed: abyākata cittassa vā itas aññāni hi cittāni viññattim na janenti sekkha asekkha puthujjanānam

original: pana ettakeheva cittehi viññatti hotīti etesaṃ kusalādīnaṃ vasena tīhi padehi ‘hetuto’ dassitā.
analyzed: pana ettakehi iva cittehi viññatti hoti iti etesam kusala ādīnam vasena tīhi padehi hetutaḥ dassitā

original: Idāni chahi padehi ‘phalato’ dassetuṃ abhikkamantassa vātiādi vuttaṃ. Abhikkamādayo

original: hi viññattivasena pavattattā viññattiphalaṃ nāma. Tattha ‘abhikkamantassā’ti purato

original: kāyaṃ abhiharantassa. Paṭikkamantassāti pacchato paccāharantassa. Ālokentassāti ujukaṃ
analyzed: kāyam abhiharantassa paṭikkamantassa ati pacchatas paccāharantassa ālokentassa ati ujukam

original: pekkhantassa. Vilokentassāti ito cito ca pekkhantassa. Samiñjentassāti sandhayo saṅkocentassa.
analyzed: pekkhantassa vilokentassa ati itas citas ca pekkhantassa samiñjentassa ati sandhayaḥ saṅkocentassa

original: Pasārentassāti sandhayo paṭipaṇāmentassa.
analyzed: pasārentassa ati sandhayaḥ paṭipaṇāmentassa

original: Idāni chahi padehi ‘sabhāvato’ dassetuṃ kāyassa thambhanāti ādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘kāyassā’ti

analyzed: sarīrassa kāyam thambhetvā thaddham karoti iti thambhanā tam eva upasaggena vaḍḍhetvā

analyzed: santhambhanā iti āha balavatarā vā thambhanā santhambhanā santhambhita ttanti santhambhita bhāvaḥ

original: Viññāpanavasena viññatti. Viññāpanāti viññāpanākāro. Viññāpitabhāvo viññāpitattaṃ.
analyzed: viññāpana vasena viññatti viññāpanā ati viññāpana ākāraḥ viññāpita bhāvaḥ viññāpita ttam

original: Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ heṭṭhā dvārakathāyaṃ vuttameva. Tathā vacīviññattiyaṃ.
analyzed: sesam ettha yat vattabbam tat heṭṭhā dvāra kathāyam vuttam eva tathā vacī viññattiyam

analyzed: vacī viññatti iti padassa pana niddesa padānam ca atthaḥ tattha na vuttaḥ saḥ evam veditabbo

analyzed: viññatti vacī viññatti vacī ghosena adhippāya viññāpana hetu ttā sayam ca tathā viññeyya ttā

analyzed: vuttam tam heṭṭhā vutta naya ttā uttāna attham eva

original: Idāni viññattisamuṭṭhāpakacittesu asammohatthaṃ dvattiṃsa chabbīsa ekūnavīsati soḷasa
analyzed: idāni viññatti samuṭṭhāpaka cittesu asammoha attham dvattiṃsa chabbīsa ekūnavīsati soḷasa

analyzed: na janenti itara dvayam karonti ekūnavīsati rūpam eva samuṭṭhāpenti itara dvayam

analyzed: na karonti soḷasaḥ imesu tīsu ekam pi na karonti

analyzed: kiriyataḥ dasa cittāni sekkha puthujjanānam abhiññā cittam khīṇāsavānam abhiññā cittanti

analyzed: rūpāvacarato pañca kusalāni pañca kiriyāni arūpāvacarato cattāri kusalāni

original: Aññānipi bahūni arūpe uppannāni anokāsagatattā rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpenti. Na tāneva,

original: kāyavacīviññattiyopi.
analyzed: kāya vacī viññattiyaḥ pi

original: 637. Ākāsadhātuniddese na kassati, na nikassati, kasituṃ vā chindituṃ vā bhindituṃ
analyzed: ākāsa dhātu niddese na kassati na nikassati kasitum vā chinditum vā bhinditum

original: Na haññatīti aghaṃ, aghaṭṭanīyanti attho. Aghameva aghagataṃ. Chiddaṭṭhena vivaro.

original: yāya paricchinnesu rūpesu ‘idamito uddhaṃ adho tiriya’nti ca hoti.

original: 638. Ito pare rūpassalahutādīnaṃ niddesā cittassalahutādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

original: Etā pana tisso na aññamaññaṃ vijahanti. Evaṃ santepi yo arogino viya rūpānaṃ lahubhāvo,
analyzed: etāḥ pana tissaḥ na aññam aññam vijahanti evam sante pi yaḥ aroginaḥ viya rūpānam lahu bhāvaḥ

original: adandhatālahuparivattippakāro, rūpadandhattakaradhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno,
analyzed: a dandha tā lahu parivatti pakāraḥ rūpa dandha tta kara dhātu kkhobha paṭipakkha paccaya samuṭṭhānaḥ

original: so rūpavikāro ‘rūpassalahutā’. Yo suparimadditacammasseva rūpānaṃ mudubhāvo sabbakiriyāvisesesu
analyzed: so rūpa vikāraḥ yaḥ su parimaddita cammassa iva rūpānam mudu bhāvaḥ sabba kiriyā visesesu

original: sarasavattanabhāvo vasavattanabhāvamaddavappakāro rūpathaddhattakaradhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno,
analyzed: sa rasa vattana bhāvaḥ vasa vattana bhāva maddava ppakāraḥ rūpa thaddhatta kara dhātu kkhobha paṭipakkha paccaya samuṭṭhānaḥ

original: so rūpavikāro ‘rūpassa mudutā’. Yo pana sudhantasuvaṇṇasseva rūpānaṃ kammaññabhāvo
analyzed: so rūpa vikāraḥ rūpassa mudu tā yaḥ pana su dhanta suvaṇṇassa iva rūpānam kammañña bhāvaḥ

original: sarīrakiriyānukūlabhāvappakāro sarīrakiriyānaṃ ananukūlakaradhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayasamuṭṭhāno,
analyzed: sarīra kiriyā anukūla bhāva ppakāraḥ sarīra kiriyānam ananukūla kara dhātu kkhobha paṭipakkha paccaya samuṭṭhāno

original: so rūpavikāro ‘rūpassa kammaññatā’ti. Evametāsaṃ viseso veditabbo.
analyzed: saḥ rūpa vikāraḥ rūpassa kammañña tā ti evam etāsam visesaḥ veditabbo

original: Etā pana tissopi kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, āhārādayova karonti. Tathā hi yogino ‘ajja
analyzed: etāḥ pana tissaḥ api kammam kātum na sakkoti āhāra ādayaḥ uva karonti tathā hi yoginaḥ ajja

original: amhehi bhojanasappāyaṃ laddhaṃ, kāyo no lahu mudu kammañño’ti vadanti. ‘Ajja utusappāyaṃ
analyzed: amhehi bhojana sappāyam laddham kāyaḥ no lahu mudu kammañño ti vadanti ajja utu sappāyam

original: laddhaṃ, ajja amhākaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ, kāyo no lahu mudu kammañño’ti vadantīti.
analyzed: laddham ajja amhākam cittam ekaggam kāyaḥ naḥ lahu mudu kammañño ti vadanti iti

original: 641. Upacayasantatiniddesesu āyatanānanti aḍḍhekādasannaṃ rūpāyatanānaṃ. Ācayoti
analyzed: upacaya santati niddesesu

original: nibbatti. So rūpassa upacayoti yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo punappunaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ, sova
analyzed: nibbatti so rūpassa upacayo ti yaḥ āyatanānam ācayo punappunam nibbattamānānam saḥ uva

original: rūpassa upacayo nāma hoti; vaḍḍhīti attho. Yo rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santatīti
analyzed: rūpassa upacayaḥ nāma hoti vaḍḍhi iti attho yaḥ rūpassa upacayaḥ sā rūpassa santati iti

original: yā evaṃ upacitānaṃ rūpānaṃ vaḍḍhi, tato uttaritaraṃ pavattikāle sā rūpassa santati
analyzed: yā evam upacitānam rūpānam vaḍḍhi tatas uttaritaram pavatti kāle sā rūpassa santati

original: nāma hoti; pavattīti attho. Naditīre khatakūpasmiñhi udakuggamanakālo viya ācayo,
analyzed: nāma hoti pavatti iti atthaḥ nadi tīre khatakūpasmin hi udakuggamana kālaḥ viya ācayaḥ

original: nibbatti; paripuṇṇakālo viya upacayo, vaḍḍhi; ajjhottharitvā gamanakālo viya santati,
analyzed: nibbatti paripuṇṇa kālaḥ viya upacayaḥ vaḍḍhi ajjhottharitvā gamana kālaḥ viya santati

original: pavattīti veditabbā.
analyzed: pavattī iti veditabbā

original: Evaṃ kiṃ kathitaṃ hotīti? Āyatanena hi ācayo kathito, ācayena āyatanaṃ kathitaṃ.
analyzed: evam kim kathitam āyatanena hi ācayaḥ kathitaḥ ācayena āyatanam kathitam

original: Ācayova kathito āyatanameva kathitaṃ. Evampi kiṃ kathitaṃ hotīti? Catusantatirūpānaṃ
analyzed: āyatanam eva kathitam evam pi kim kathitam

original: ācayo upacayo nibbatti vaḍḍhi kathitā. Atthato hi ubhayampetaṃ jātirūpasseva adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: ācayaḥ upacayaḥ nibbatti vaḍḍhi kathitā atthataḥ hi ubhayam petam jāti rūpassa iva adhivacanam

original: Ākāranānattena pana veneyyavasena ca upacayo santatīti uddesadesanaṃ katvā yasmā
analyzed: ākāra nānattena pana veneyya vasena ca upacayaḥ santatī iti uddesa desanam katvā yasmā

original: ettha atthato nānattaṃ natthi, tasmā niddese “yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo so rūpassa upacayo,
analyzed: ettha atthataḥ nānattam natthi tasmā niddese yaḥ āyatanānam ācayo so rūpassa upacayo

original: yo rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santatī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santati iti vuttam

original: Yasmā ca ubhayampetaṃ jātirūpasseva adhivacanaṃ tasmā ettha ācayalakkhaṇo rūpassa
analyzed: ca ubhayampetam jāti rūpassa iva adhivacanam tasmai ettha ācaya lakkhaṇaḥ rūpassa

original: upacayo, pubbantato rūpānaṃ ummujjāpanaraso, niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno
analyzed: upacayaḥ pubbantataḥ rūpānam ummujja āpana rasaḥ niyyātana paccupaṭṭhāno paripuṇṇa bhāva paccupaṭṭhāno

original: vā, upacitarūpapadaṭṭhāno. Pavattilakkhaṇā rūpassa santati, anuppabandharasā, anupacchedapaccupaṭṭhānā,
analyzed: vā upacita rūpa padaṭṭhānaḥ pavatti lakkhaṇā rūpassa santati an uppabandha rasā an upaccheda paccupaṭṭhānā

original: anuppabandharūpapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā.
analyzed: an uppabandha rūpa padaṭṭhānā iti veditabbā

original: 643. Jaratāniddese jīraṇakavasena jarā; ayamettha sabhāvaniddeso. Jīraṇākāro jīraṇatā.
analyzed: jaratā niddese jīraṇaka vasena jarā ayam ettha sa bhāva niddesaḥ jīraṇa ākāraḥ jīraṇa tā

original: Khaṇḍiccanti ādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā. Pacchimā dve pakatiniddesā. Ayañhi
analyzed: ādayo tayo kāla atikkame kicca niddesā pacchimā dve pakati niddesā ayan hi

original: ‘jarā’ti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā; tenassāyaṃ sabhāvaniddeso. ‘Jīraṇatā’ti iminā
analyzed: iminā padena sabhāvataḥ dīpitā tena assa ayam sabhāva niddesaḥ iminā

original: ākārato; tenassāyaṃ ākāraniddeso. Khaṇḍiccanti iminā kālātikkame dantanakhānaṃ khaṇḍitabhāvakaraṇakiccato.
analyzed: ākārataḥ iminā kāla atikkame danta nakhānam khaṇḍita bhāva karaṇa kiccato

original: Pāliccanti iminā kesalomānaṃ palitabhāvakaraṇakiccato. Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ
analyzed: iminā kesa lomānam palita bhāva karaṇa kiccataḥ iminā maṃsam

original: milāpetvā tace valibhāvakaraṇakiccato dīpitā. Tenassā ime ‘khaṇḍicca’ntiādayo tayo
analyzed: milāpetvā tace vali bhāva karaṇa kiccataḥ dīpitā tena assāḥ ime

original: kālātikkame kiccaniddesā. Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā
analyzed: kāla atikkame kicca niddesā tehi imesam vikārānam dassana vasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭa jarā

original: dassitā. Yatheva hi udakassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃbhaggapalibhaggatāya
analyzed: dassitāḥ yathā iva hi udakassa vā agginaḥ vā tiṇa rukkha ādīnam saṃbhagga palibhagga tāya

original: vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti, na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni, evameva
analyzed: vā jhāma tāya vā gata maggo pākaṭaḥ hoti na ca saḥ gata maggaḥ tān eva udaka ādīni evam eva

original: jarāya dantādīsu khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo, cakkhuṃ ummīletvāpi gayhati,
analyzed: jarāya danta ādīsu khaṇḍicca ādi vasena gata maggo pākaṭaḥ cakkhum ummīletvā api gayhati

original: na ca khaṇḍiccādīneva jarā. Na hi jarā cakkhuviññeyyā hoti.
analyzed: na ca jarā na hi jarā cakkhu viññeyyā hoti

original: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya
analyzed: āyunaḥ indriyānam imehi pana padehi kāla atikkameya iva abhibyattāya

original: āyukkhayacakkhādiindriyaparipākasaññitāya pakatiyā dīpitā. Tenassime pacchimā dve
analyzed: āyu khaya cakkha ādi indriya paripāka saññitāya pakatiyā dīpitā tenassime pacchimā dve

original: pakatiniddesāti veditabbā. Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati, tasmā jarā ‘āyuno
analyzed: pakati niddesā ti veditabbā tattha yasmā jaram pattassa āyu hāyati tasmā jarā āyuno

original: saṃhānī’ti phalūpacārena vuttā. Yasmā ca daharakāle suppasannāni, sukhumampi attano
analyzed: saṃhāni iti phala upacārena vuttā ca dahara kāle suppasannāni attano

original: visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni jaraṃ pattassa paripakkāni
analyzed: visayam sukhena iva gaṇhana samatthāni cakkha ādīni indriyāni jaram pattassa paripakkāni

original: āluḷitāni avisadāni, oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti, tasmā ‘indriyānaṃ
analyzed: āluḷitāni a visadāni oḷārikam pi attanaḥ visayam gahetum asamatthāni honti tasmai indriyānaṃ

original: paripāko’tipi phalūpacāreneva vuttā.
analyzed: paripākā utipi phala upacārena iva vuttā

original: Sā panāyaṃ evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti. Tattha
analyzed: sā pana ayam evam niddiṭṭhā sabbā api jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannā ati duvidhā hoti tattha

original: dantādīsu khaṇḍabhāvādidassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma. Arūpadhammesu
analyzed: danta ādīsu khaṇḍa bhāva ādi dassanato rūpa dhammesu jarā pākaṭa jarā nāma arūpa dhammesu

original: pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma. Puna avīci savīcīti
analyzed: pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa a dassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma puna avīci savīci iti

original: evampi duvidhā hoti. Tattha maṇikanakarajatapavāḷacandimasūriyādīnaṃ viya, mandadasakādīsu
analyzed: evam pi duvidhā hoti tattha maṇi kanaka rajata pavāḷa candima sūriya ādīnam manda dasaka ādīsu

original: pāṇīnaṃ viya ca, pupphaphalapallavādīsu ca apāṇīnaṃ viya, antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ
analyzed: pāṇīnam viya ca puppha phala pallava ādīsu ca apāṇīnam viya antar antarā vaṇṇa visesa ādīnam

original: duviññeyyattā jarā avīcijarā nāma; nirantarajarāti attho. Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu
analyzed: duviññeyya ttā jarā avīcijarā nāma nirantara jarā ti attho tatas aññesu pana yathā vuttesu

original: antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā savīcijarā nāmāti veditabbā.
analyzed: antar antarā vaṇṇa visesa ādīnam su viññeyya ttā jarā savīcijarā nāma ati veditabbā

original: Lakkhaṇāditopi rūpaparipākalakkhaṇā rūpassa jaratā, upanayanarasā, sabhāvānapagamepi navabhāvāpagamapaccupaṭṭhānā, vīhipurāṇabhāvo viya paripaccamānarūpapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā.
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āditaḥ pi rūpa paripāka lakkhaṇā rūpassa jaratā upanayana rasā sabhāva anapagame api nava bhāva apagama paccupaṭṭhānā vīhi purāṇa bhāvaḥ viya paripaccamāna rūpa padaṭṭhānā ti veditabbā

original: 644. Aniccatāniddese khayagamanavasena khayo, vayagamanavasena vayo, bhijjanavasena
analyzed: anicca tā niddese khaya gamana vasena khayaḥ vaya gamana vasena vayaḥ bhijjana vasena

original: bhedo. Atha vā, yasmā taṃ patvā rūpaṃ khīyati, veti, bhijjati ca, tasmā khīyati etasminti
analyzed: bhedaḥ atha vā yasmai tam patvā rūpam khīyati veti bhijjati ca tasmai khīyati etasmin ti

original: ‘khayo’, veti etasminti ‘vayo’, bhijjati etasminti ‘bhedo’. Upasaggavasena padaṃ
analyzed: khayaḥ vā iti etasmin ti vayaḥ bhijjati etasmin ti bhedaḥ upasagga vasena padam

original: vaḍḍhetvā bhedova paribhedo. Hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena, na niccanti aniccaṃ. Tassa bhāvo
analyzed: vaḍḍhetvā bhedaḥ uva paribhedaḥ hutvā abhāva ṭṭhena na niccanti aniccam tassa bhāvaḥ

original: aniccatā. Antaradhāyati etthāti antaradhānaṃ. Maraṇañhi patvā rūpaṃ antaradhāyati,
analyzed: anicca tā antaradhāyati ettha ati antaradhānam maraṇam hi patvā rūpam antaradhāyati

original: adassanaṃ gacchati. Na kevalañca rūpameva, sabbepi pañcakkhandhā. Tasmā pañcannampi
analyzed: a dassanam gacchati na kevalam ca rūpam eva sabbe pi pañca kkhandhā tasmā pañcannam pi

original: khandhānaṃ aniccatāya idameva lakkhaṇanti veditabbaṃ. Lakkhaṇādito pana paribhedalakkhaṇā
analyzed: khandhānam anicca tāya idam eva lakkhaṇan ti veditabbam lakkhaṇa āditaḥ pana paribheda lakkhaṇā

original: rūpassa aniccatā, saṃsīdanarasā, khayavayapaccupaṭṭhānā, paribhijjamānarūpapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā.
analyzed: rūpassa anicca tā saṃsīdana rasā khaya vaya paccupaṭṭhānā paribhijjamāna rūpa padaṭṭhānā ti veditabbā

original: Heṭṭhā jāti gahitā jarā gahitā, imasmiṃ ṭhāne maraṇaṃ gahitaṃ. Ime tayo dhammā imesaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhā jāti gahitā jarā gahitā imasmin ṭhāne maraṇam gahitam ime tayo dhammā imesaṃ

original: sattānaṃ ukkhittāsikapaccāmittasadisā. Yathā hi purisassa tayo paccāmittā otāraṃ
analyzed: sattānam ukkhitta āsika paccāmitta sadisāḥ yathā hi purisassa tayo paccāmittāḥ otāram

original: gavesamānā vicareyyuṃ. Tesu eko evaṃ vadeyya – ‘etaṃ nīharitvā aṭavipavesanaṃ mayhaṃ
analyzed: gavesamānāḥ vicareyyum tesu ekaḥ evam vadeyya etam nīharitvā aṭavi pavesanam mayham

original: bhāro hotū’ti. Dutiyo ‘aṭavigatakāle pothetvā pathaviyaṃ pātanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro’ti.
analyzed: bhāraḥ hotu uti dutiyaḥ aṭavi gata kāle pothetvā pathaviyam pātanam mayham

original: Tatiyo ‘pathavigatakālato paṭṭhāya asinā sīsacchedanaṃ mayhaṃ bhāro’ti. Evarūpā ime
analyzed: tatiyo pathavi gata kālataḥ paṭṭhāya asinā sīsa chedanam mayham evarūpāḥ ime

original: jāti ādayo. Nīharitvā aṭavipavesanapaccāmittasadisā hettha jāti, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne
analyzed: jāti ādayaḥ nīharitvā aṭa vipa vesana pacca amitta sadisāḥ ha ittha jāti tasmim tasmim ṭhāne

original: nibbattāpanato. Aṭavigataṃ pothetvā pathaviyaṃ pātanapaccāmittasadisā jarā, nibbattakkhandhānaṃ
analyzed: nibbattāpanataḥ aṭavi gatam pothetvā pathaviyam pātana pacca amitta sadisā jarā nibbatta kkhandhānam

original: dubbalaparādhīnamañcaparāyaṇabhāvakaraṇato. Pathavigatassa asinā sīsacchedakapaccāmittasadisaṃ
analyzed: dubbala para adhīna mañca parāyaṇa bhāva karaṇataḥ pathavi gatassa asinā sīsa chedaka pacca amitta sadisam

original: maraṇaṃ, jarāppattānaṃ khandhānaṃ jīvitakkhayapāpanatoti.
analyzed: maraṇam jarā appattānam khandhānam jīvita khaya pāpanato ti

original: 645. Kabaḷīkārāhāraniddese kabaḷaṃ karīyatīti kabaḷīkāro. Āharīyatīti āhāro. Kabaḷaṃ
analyzed: kabaḷīkāra āhāra niddese kabaḷam karīyati iti kabaḷīkāraḥ āharīyati iti āhāraḥ kabaḷam

original: katvā ajjhoharīyatīti attho. Rūpaṃ vā āharatītipi ‘āhāro’. Evaṃ vatthuvasena nāmaṃ
analyzed: katvā ajjhoharīyati iti atthaḥ rūpam vā āharati iti pi āhāraḥ evam vatthu vasena nāmam

original: uddharitvā puna vatthuvasenevetaṃ pabhedato dassetuṃ odano kummāsotiādi vuttaṃ. Odanādīni
analyzed: uddharitvā puna vatthu vasena iva etam pabhedataḥ dassetum odanaḥ kummāsaḥ tiādi vuttam odana ādīni

original: hi phāṇitapariyantāni dvādasa idhādhippetassa āhārassa vatthūni. Pāḷiyaṃ anāgatāni
analyzed: hi phāṇita pariyantāni dvādasa idha adhippetassa āhārassa vatthūni anāgatāni

original: mūlaphalādīni yevāpanakaṃ paviṭṭhāni.
analyzed: mūla phala ādīni yevāpanakam paviṭṭhāni

original: Idāni tāni mūlaphalādīni kattabbato dassetuṃ yamhi yamhi janapadetiādimāha. Tattha
analyzed: idāni tāni mūla phala ādīni kattabbataḥ dassetum yamhi yamhi janapada iti ādim āha tattha

original: mukhena asitabbaṃ bhuñjitabbanti mukhāsiyaṃ. Dantehi vikhāditabbanti dantavikhādanaṃ.
analyzed: mukhena asitabbam bhuñjitabbanti mukha asiyam dantehi vikhāditabbanti danta vikhādanam

original: Galena ajjhoharitabbanti galajjhoharaṇīyaṃ. Idāni taṃ kiccavasena dassetuṃ kucchivitthambhananti
analyzed: galena ajjhoharitabbanti galajjhoharaṇīyam idāni tam kicca vasena dassetum kucchi vitthambhanam ti

original: āha. Tañhi mūlaphalādi odanakummāsādi vā ajjhohaṭaṃ kucchiṃ vitthambheti. Idamassa
analyzed: āha tat hi mūla phala ādi odana kummāsa ādi vā ajjhohaṭam kucchim vitthambheti idam assa

original: kiccaṃ. Yāya ojāya sattā yāpentīti heṭṭhā sabbapadehi savatthukaṃ āhāraṃ dassetvā
analyzed: kiccam ojāya sattāḥ yāpenti iti heṭṭhā sabba padehi sa vatthukam āhāram dassetvā

original: idāni nibbaṭṭitaojameva dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: idāni nibbaṭṭita ojam eva dassetum idam vuttam

original: Kiṃ panettha vatthussa kiccaṃ? Kiṃ ojāya? Parissayaharaṇapālanāni. Vatthuhi parissayaṃ
analyzed: kim pana ittha vatthussa kiccam kim ojāya parissaya haraṇa pālanāni vatthuhi parissayam

original: harati pāletuṃ na sakkoti, ojā pāleti parissayaṃ harituṃ na sakkoti. Dvepi ekato
analyzed: harati pāletum na sakkoti ojā pāleti parissayam haritum na sakkoti dve pi ekatas

original: hutvā pāletumpi sakkonti parissayampi harituṃ. Ko panesa parissayo nāma? Kammajatejo.
analyzed: hutvā pāletum pi sakkonti parissayam pi haritum kaḥ pana isa parissayaḥ nāma kamma ja tejaḥ

original: Antokucchiyañhi odanādivatthusmiṃ asati, kammajatejo uṭṭhahitvā udarapaṭalaṃ gaṇhāti,

analyzed: evam ajjhāsayataḥ saṅkamati nāma

original: 651. Āpodhātuniddese āpoti sabhāvaniddeso. Āpova āpogataṃ. Sinehavasena sineho, sinehova
analyzed: āpas dhātu niddese āpaḥ iti sabhāva niddesaḥ āpaḥ vaḥ āpaḥ gatam sineha vasena sinehaḥ sinehaḥ uva

analyzed: sineha gatam bandhana ttam rūpassa ati pathavī dhātu ādikassa bhūta rūpassa bandhana bhāvaḥ

original: Ayopiṇḍiādīni hi āpodhātu ābandhitvā baddhāni karoti. Tāya ābaddhattā tāni baddhāni
analyzed: ayaḥ piṇḍi ādīni hi āpodhātu ābandhitvā baddhāni karoti tāni baddhāni

analyzed: nāma honti pāsāṇa pabbata tālaṭṭhi hatthi danta gosiṅga ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ sabbāni ha etāni

analyzed: āpodhātu eva ābandhitvā baddhāni karoti āpodhātuyāḥ baddhāni honti

original: Kiṃ pana pathavīdhātu sesadhātūnaṃ patiṭṭhā hoti na hotīti hoti phusitvā hoti udāhu

analyzed: vilīyamāne pi pathavī dhātu na vilīyati kakkhaḷa lakkhaṇā hi pathavī dhātu paggharaṇa lakkhaṇā

analyzed: siyā ānanda catunnam mahābhūtānam aññathattam pathavī dhātuyā āpe vāyu dhātuyā na tu eva buddhe avecca ppasādena samannāgatassa ariya sāvakassa siyā aññathattan ti

analyzed: aṭṭhāna parikappaḥ āgataḥ

original: 652. Ito paresu upādiṇṇarūpādiniddesesu upādiṇṇapadādīnaṃ attho mātikākathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva

analyzed: veditabbo cakkha āyatana ādīni heṭṭhā tattha tattha pana visesa mattam eva vakkhāma

original: pana kevalaṃ anupādiṇṇādiggahaṇena kammādisamuṭṭhānatā paṭikkhittā, naaññapaccayasamuṭṭhānatā
analyzed: pana kevalam anupādiṇṇa ādi gahaṇena kamma ādi samuṭṭhāna tā paṭikkhittā na añña paccaya samuṭṭhāna tā

original: anuññātā. Tasmā tattha gahitānīti veditabbāni.
analyzed: tasmā tattha gahitāni iti veditabbāni

original: 666. Cittasamuṭṭhānaniddese kāyaviññatti vacīviññattīti idaṃ dvayaṃ yasmā ekantacittasamuṭṭhānāni

analyzed: evam idam pi citta samuṭṭhānam nāma jātam

original: 668. Cittasahabhuniddesepi eseva nayo. Yāva cittaṃ tāva paññāyanato idameva dvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Na panetaṃ cittena saha bhūtāni viya, cetanādayo viya ca uppajjati.
analyzed: citta sahabhu niddese pi esā iva nayaḥ yāva cittam tāva paññāyanataḥ idam eva dvayam vuttam na pana etat cittena saha bhūtāni viya cetanā ādayaḥ viya ca uppajjati

original: 670. Cittānuparivattitāyapi eseva nayo. Yāva cittaṃ tāva paññāyanato eva hetaṃ dvayaṃ cittānuparivattīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: citta anuparivatti tāya api esā iva nayaḥ yāva cittam tāva paññāyanataḥ eva ha etam dvayam citta anuparivatti iti vuttam

original: 674. Oḷārikanti vatthārammaṇabhūtattā saṃṅghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbato thūlaṃ. Vuttavipallāsato sukhumaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: oḷārikam ti vattha ārammaṇa bhūta ttā saṃṅghaṭṭana vasena gahetabbataḥ thūlam vutta vipallāsataḥ sukhumam veditabbam

analyzed: dūre ti ghaṭṭana vasena aggahetabba ttā dubbiññeyya bhāvena samīpe ṭhitam pi dūre

original: Itaraṃ pana ghaṭṭanavasena gahetabbattā suviññeyyabhāvena dūre ṭhitampi santike.
analyzed: itaram pana ghaṭṭana vasena gahetabba ttā su viññeyya bhāvena dūre ṭhitam pi santike

original: Cakkhāyatanādiniddesā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva vitthārato veditabbā. Idaṃ tāva duvidhena

original: Catukkaniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: catukka niddesa vaṇṇanā

analyzed: jānitum sakkā ati sutam nāma jātam gandha āyatana ādittayam ghāna jivhā kāyehi patvā gahetabbataḥ

original: munitvā jānitabbaṭṭhena mutaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Phusitvā viññāṇuppattikāraṇato ‘mutaṃ’
analyzed: munitvā jānitabba ṭṭhena mutam nāma jātam phusitvā viññāṇa uppatti kāraṇataḥ mutam

original: nāmātipi vuttaṃ. Sabbameva pana rūpaṃ manoviññāṇena jānitabbanti manasā viññātaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
analyzed: nāma ati pi vuttam sabbam eva pana rūpam manaḥ viññāṇena jānitabbanti manasā viññātam nāma jātam

original: Pañcakaniddesavaṇṇanā
967. Pañcavidhasaṅgahaniddese kakkhaḷanti thaddhaṃ. Kharameva kharagataṃ, pharusanti
analyzed: pañcavidha saṅgaha niddese kakkhaḷanti thaddham kharam eva khara gatam

original: attho. Itare dvepi sabhāvaniddesā eva. Ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ. Bahiddhāti bāhiraṃ.
analyzed: itare dve pi sa bhāva niddesāḥ eva ajjhattam ti niyaka jjhattam bahiddhā ati bāhiram

original: Upādiṇṇanti na kammasamuṭṭhānameva. Avisesena pana sarīraṭṭhakassetaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Sarīraṭṭhakañhi
analyzed: upādiṇṇanti na kamma samuṭṭhānam eva avisesena pana sarīraṭṭhakassa etam gahaṇam sarīraṭṭhakam hi

original: upādiṇṇaṃ vā hotu anupādiṇṇaṃ vā, ādinnagahitaparāmaṭṭhavasena sabbaṃ upādiṇṇameva nāma.
analyzed: upādiṇṇam vā hotu an upādiṇṇam vā ādinna gahita parāmaṭṭha vasena sabbam upādiṇṇam eva nāma

original: 969. Tejogatanti sabbatejesu gataṃ uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ, tejo eva vā tejobhāvaṃ gatanti
analyzed: tejaḥ gatam ti sabba tejesu gatam uṇhatta lakkhaṇam tejaḥ eva vā tejaḥ bhāvam gatam ti

original: ‘tejogataṃ’. Usmāti usmākāro. Usmāgatanti usmābhāvaṃ gataṃ. Usmākārassevetaṃ nāmaṃ.
analyzed: tejaḥ gatam usmā ati usmā kāraḥ usmā gatanti usmā bhāvam gatam nāmaṃ

original: Usumanti balavausmā. Usumameva usumabhāvaṃ gatanti usumagataṃ.
analyzed: usumanti usumam eva usuma bhāvam usuma gatam

original: 970. Vāyanakavasena vāyo. Vāyova vāyobhāvaṃ gatattā vāyogataṃ. Thambhitattanti uppalanāḷatacādīnaṃ viya vātapuṇṇānaṃ thambhitabhāvo rūpassa.
analyzed: vāyanaka vasena vāyo vāyo iva vāyu bhāvam gata ttā vāyo gatam uppala nāḷa taca ādīnam viya vāta puṇṇānam thambhita bhāvaḥ rūpassa

original: Chakkādiniddesavaṇṇanā
analyzed: chakka ādi niddesa vaṇṇanā

original: 972-4. Chabbidhādisaṅgahānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ osānapadassa bhedābhāvato ādito paṭṭhāya apucchitvāva
analyzed: chabbidha ādi saṅgahānam osāna padassa bheda abhāvataḥ āditas paṭṭhāya a pucchitvā ava

original: niddeso kato. Tattha cakkhuviññāṇena jānituṃ sakkāti cakkhuviññeyyaṃ…pe… manoviññāṇena

original: jānituṃ sakkāti manoviññeyyaṃ. Tividhāya manodhātuyā jānituṃ sakkāti manodhātuviññeyyaṃ

original: sabbaṃ rūpanti ettha yasmā ekaṃ rūpampi manoviññāṇadhātuyā ajānitabbaṃ nāma natthi,
analyzed: sabbam rūpanti ettha yasmai ekam rūpam pi manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā a jānitabbam nāma natthi

original: tasmā ‘sabbaṃ rūpa’nti vuttaṃ. Sammāsambuddhena hi abhidhammaṃ patvā nayaṃ kātuṃ
analyzed: tasmā sabbam rūpan ti vuttam sammāsambuddhena hi abhidhammam patvā nayam kātum

original: yuttaṭṭhāne nayo akato nāma natthi. Idañca ekarūpassāpi manoviññāṇadhātuyā ajānitabbassa
analyzed: yutta ṭṭhāne nayaḥ akataḥ nāma natthi idam ca eka rūpassa api manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyā a jānitabbassa

original: abhāvena nayaṃ kātuṃ yuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma, tasmā nayaṃ karonto ‘sabbaṃ rūpa’nti āha.
analyzed: abhāvena nayam kātum yutta ṭṭhānam nāma tasmā nayam karontaḥ sabbam rūpan ti āha

original: 974. Sukhasamphassoti sukhavedanāpaṭilābhapaccayo. Dukkhasamphassoti dukkhavedanāpaṭilābhapaccayo. Idhāpi phoṭṭhabbārammaṇassa sukhadukkhassa sabbhāvato ayaṃ nayo dinno.
analyzed: sukha samphassaḥ ti sukha vedanā paṭilābha paccayaḥ dukkha samphassaḥ ti dukkha vedanā paṭilābha paccayaḥ idha api phoṭṭhabba ārammaṇassa sukha dukkhassa sabbhāvataḥ ayam nayaḥ dinno

original: Navakādiniddesavaṇṇanā
975. Navake pana indriyarūpassa nāma atthitāya nayo dinno. Tasseva sappaṭighaappaṭighatāya
analyzed: navake pana indriya rūpassa nāma atthitāya nayaḥ dinno tassa iva sappaṭigha appaṭigha tāya

original: dasake nayo dinno. Ekādasake aḍḍhekādasa āyatanāni vibhattāni. Tesaṃ niddesavārā
analyzed: dasake nayaḥ dinnaḥ ekādasake aḍḍha ekādasa āyatanāni vibhattāni tesam niddesa vārā

original: heṭṭhā vuttanayena vitthārato veditabbā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthameva.
analyzed: heṭṭhā vutta nayena vitthārataḥ veditabbā sesam sabbattha uttāna attham eva

original: Pakiṇṇakakathā
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka kathā

original: Imesu pana rūpesu asammohatthaṃ samodhānaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ parinipphannañca saṅkhatanti idaṃ ‘pakiṇṇakaṃ’ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: imesu pana rūpesu asammoha attham samodhānam samuṭṭhānam parinipphannam ca saṅkhatan ti idam pakiṇṇakam veditabbam

original: Tattha ‘samodhāna’nti sabbameva hidaṃ rūpaṃ samodhānato cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe… kabaḷīkāro
analyzed: tattha samodhānam ti sabbam eva hi idam rūpam samodhānato kabaḷīkāro

original: āhāro, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ āpodhātūti pañcavīsatisaṅkhyaṃ hoti. Taṃ vatthurūpena saddhiṃ
analyzed: āhāro phoṭṭhabba āyatanam āpodhātu uti pañcavīsati saṅkhyam hoti tam vatthu rūpena saddhim

original: chabbīsatisaṅkhyaṃ veditabbaṃ. Ito aññaṃ rūpaṃ nāma natthi. Keci pana ‘middharūpaṃ
analyzed: chabbīsati saṅkhyam veditabbam itas aññam rūpam nāma natthi keci pana middha rūpam

original: nāma atthī’ti vadanti. Te “addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”tiādīni vatvā
analyzed: nāma atthi iti vadanti te addhā muni isi sambuddhaḥ natthi nīvaraṇā tava ati ādīni vatvā

original: middharūpaṃ nāma natthīti paṭisedhetabbā. Apare balarūpena saddhiṃ sattavīsati, sambhavarūpena
analyzed: middha rūpam nāma natthi iti paṭisedhetabbāḥ apare bala rūpena saddhim sattavīsati sambhava rūpena

original: saddhiṃ aṭṭhavīsati, jātirūpena saddhiṃ ekūnatiṃsati, rogarūpena saddhiṃ samatiṃsati
analyzed: saddhim aṭṭhavīsati jāti rūpena saddhim ekūnatiṃsati roga rūpena saddhim samatiṃsati

original: rūpānīti vadanti. Tepi tesaṃ visuṃ abhāvaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā. Vāyodhātuyā
analyzed: rūpāni iti vadanti te api tesam visum abhāvam dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā vāyodhātuyā

original: hi gahitāya balarūpaṃ gahitameva, aññaṃ balarūpaṃ nāma natthi. Āpodhātuyā sambhavarūpaṃ,
analyzed: hi gahitāya bala rūpam gahitam eva aññam bala rūpam nāma natthi āpodhātuyā sambhava rūpam

original: upacayasantatīhi jātirūpaṃ, jaratāaniccatāhi gahitāhi rogarūpaṃ gahitameva. Aññaṃ
analyzed: upacaya santatīhi jāti rūpam jaratā anicca tāhi gahitāhi roga rūpam gahitam eva aññam

original: rogarūpaṃ nāma natthi. Yopi kaṇṇarogādi ābādho so visamapaccayasamuṭṭhitadhātumattameva.
analyzed: roga rūpam nāma natthi yaḥ api kaṇṇa roga ādi ābādho so visama paccaya samuṭṭhita dhātumattam eva

original: Na añño tattha rogo nāma atthīti samodhānato chabbīsatimeva rūpāni.
analyzed: na aññaḥ tattha rogo nāma atthi iti samodhānato chabbīsatim eva rūpāni

original: ‘Samuṭṭhāna’nti kati rūpāni katisamuṭṭhānāni? Dasa ekasamuṭṭhānāni, ekaṃ dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ, tīṇi tisamuṭṭhānāni, nava catusamuṭṭhānāni, dve na kenaci samuṭṭhahanti.
analyzed: samuṭṭhānanti kati rūpāni kati samuṭṭhānāni dasa eka samuṭṭhānāni ekam dvi samuṭṭhānam tīṇi ti samuṭṭhānāni nava catu samuṭṭhānāni dve na kenacid samuṭṭhahanti

original: Tattha cakkhupasādo…pe… jīvitindriyanti imāni aṭṭha ekantaṃ kammatova samuṭṭhahanti.
analyzed: tattha cakkhu upasāda upe jīvitindriyan ti imāni aṭṭha ekantam kammataḥ va samuṭṭhahanti

original: Kāyaviññattivacīviññattidvayaṃ ekantena cittato samuṭṭhātīti dasa ‘ekasamuṭṭhānāni’
analyzed: kāya viññatti vacī viññatti dvayam ekantena cittataḥ samuṭṭhāti iti dasa eka samuṭṭhānāni

original: nāma. Saddo ututo ca cittato ca samuṭṭhātīti eko ‘dvisamuṭṭhāno’ nāma. Tattha aviññāṇakasaddo
analyzed: nāma saddo ututaḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti iti ekaḥ dvi samuṭṭhānaḥ nāma tattha aviññāṇaka saddo

original: ututo samuṭṭhāti, saviññāṇakasaddo cittato. Lahutādittayaṃ pana utucittāhārehi samuṭṭhātīti
analyzed: ututaḥ samuṭṭhāti sa viññāṇaka saddaḥ cittataḥ pana utu citta āhārehi samuṭṭhāti iti

original: tīṇi ‘tisamuṭṭhānāni’ nāma. Avasesāni nava rūpāni tehi kammena cāti catūhi samuṭṭhahantīti
analyzed: tīṇi tisamuṭṭhānāni nāma avasesāni nava rūpāni tehi kammena ca ati catūhi samuṭṭhahanti iti

original: nava ‘catusamuṭṭhānāni’ nāma. Jaratā aniccatā pana etesu ekatopi na samuṭṭhahantīti
analyzed: nava catu samuṭṭhānāni nāma jara tā anicca tā pana etesu ekatas pi na samuṭṭhahanti iti

original: dve ‘na kenaci samuṭṭhahanti’ nāma. Kasmā? Ajāyanato. Na hi etāni jāyanti. Kasmā?
analyzed: dve na kenacid samuṭṭhahanti nāma kasmai a jāyanataḥ na hi etāni jāyanti kasmai

original: Jātassa pākabhedattā. Uppannañhi rūpaṃ jīrati bhijjatīti avassaṃ panetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ.
analyzed: jātassa pāka bheda ttā uppannam hi rūpam jīrati bhijjati iti avassam pana etat sampaṭicchitabbam

original: Na hi uppannaṃ rūpaṃ arūpaṃ vā akkhayaṃ nāma dissati. Yāva pana na bhijjati tāvassa
analyzed: na hi uppannam rūpam arūpam vā akkhayam nāma dissati yāva pana na bhijjati tāvassa

original: paripākoti siddhametaṃ. ‘Jātassa pākabhedattā’ti yadi ca tāni jāyeyyuṃ tesampi pākabhedā
analyzed: paripāko ti siddham etam jātassa yadi ca tāni jāyeyyum tesam pi pāka bhedā

original: bhaveyyuṃ. Na ca pāko paccati, bhedo vā bhijjatīti jātassa pākabhedattā netaṃ dvayaṃ jāyati.
analyzed: bhaveyyum na ca pākaḥ paccati bhedaḥ vā bhijjati iti jātassa pāka bheda ttā na itam dvayam jāyati

original: Tattha siyā – yathā ‘kammassa katattā’ti ādiniddesesu ‘rūpassa upacayo rūpassa santatī’ti
analyzed: tattha siyā yathā kammassa kata ttā ati ādi niddesesu rūpassa upacayaḥ rūpassa santati iti

original: vacanena ‘jāti’ jāyatīti sampaṭicchitaṃ hoti, evaṃ ‘pāko’pi paccatu ‘bhedo’pi bhijjatūti.
analyzed: vacanena jāti jāyati iti sampaṭicchitam hoti evam pākaḥ api bhedaḥ api bhijjatu uti

original: “Na tattha ‘jāti jāyatī’ti sampaṭicchitaṃ. Ye pana dhammā kammādīhi nibbattanti tesaṃ
analyzed: na tattha jāti jāyati iti sampaṭicchitam ye pana dhammā kamma ādīhi nibbattanti tesam

original: abhinibbattibhāvato jātiyā tappaccayabhāvavohāro anumato. Na pana paramatthato jāti
analyzed: abhinibbatti bhāvataḥ jātiyā tad paccaya bhāva vohāraḥ anumataḥ na pana paramatthataḥ jāti

original: jāyati. Jāyamānassa hi abhinibbattimattaṃ jātī”ti.
analyzed: jāyati jāyamānassa hi abhinibbattimattam jāti iti

original: Tattha siyā – ‘yatheva jāti yesaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca
analyzed: tattha siyā yathā iva jāti yesam dhammānam abhinibbatti tad paccaya bhāva vohāram abhinibbatti vohāram ca

analyzed: labhati tathā pāka bhedā api yesam dhammānam pāka bhedā tad paccaya bhāva vohāram abhinibbatti vohāram ca

original: labhantu. Evaṃ idampi dvayaṃ kammādisamuṭṭhānamevāti vattabbaṃ bhavissatī’ti. ‘Na
analyzed: labhantu evam idam pi dvayam kamma ādi samuṭṭhānam eva ati vattabbam bhavissati iti na

original: pākabhedā taṃ vohāraṃ labhanti. Kasmā? Janakapaccayānubhāvakkhaṇe abhāvato. Janakapaccayānañhi
analyzed: pāka bhedā tam vohāram labhanti kasmā janaka paccaya anubhāva khaṇe abhāvataḥ

original: uppādetabbadhammassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva ānubhāvo, na tato uttari. Tehi abhinibbattitadhammakkhaṇasmiñca
analyzed: uppādetabba dhammassa uppāda khaṇe iya iva ānubhāvaḥ na tatas uttari tehi abhinibbattita dhamma kkhaṇasmin ca

original: jāti paññāyamānā tappaccayabhāvavohāraṃ abhinibbattivohārañca labhati, tasmiṃ khaṇe
analyzed: paññāyamānā tad paccaya bhāva vohāram abhinibbatti vohārañca labhati tasmin khaṇe

analyzed: sabbhāvataḥ na itara dvayam tasmin khaṇe abhāvataḥ ti na iva etam jāyati iti vattabbam

original: “Jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppanna”nti āgatattā idampi

analyzed: dvayam jāyati iti ce na pariyāya desita ttā tattha hi paṭicca samuppannānam dhammānam

original: jarāmaraṇattā pariyāyena taṃ paṭiccasamuppanna’nti vuttaṃ.

original: ‘Yadi evaṃ, tayampetaṃ ajātattā sasavisāṇaṃ viya natthi; nibbānaṃ viya vā nicca’nti
analyzed: yadi evam ajāta ttā sa sa visāṇam viya na atthi nibbānam viya vā

analyzed: ce na nissaya paṭibaddha vuttitaḥ pathavī ādīnam hi nissayānam bhāve jāti ādi ttayam

original: paññāyati, tasmā na natthi. Tesañca abhāve na paññāyati, tasmā na niccaṃ. Etampi
analyzed: paññāyati tasmā na natthi tesam ca abhāve na paññāyati tasmā na niccam etam pi

original: ca abhinivesaṃ paṭisedhetuṃ eva idaṃ vuttaṃ – “jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ

analyzed: paṭicca samuppannanti evamādīhi nayehi tāni dve rūpāni na kehici samuṭṭhahanti iti veditabbam

original: Apica ‘samuṭṭhāna’nti ettha ayamaññopi attho. Tassāyaṃ mātikā – ‘kammajaṃ kammapaccayaṃ
analyzed: apica samuṭṭhānam ti ettha ayam aññaḥ api attho tassa ayam mātikā kamma jam kamma paccayam

original: Āhārato samuṭṭhitaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ ‘āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ’ nāma. Kabaḷīkāro āhāro dvinnampi

original: Ututo samuṭṭhitaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ ‘utusamuṭṭhānaṃ’ nāma. Tasmiṃ utu aññaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ

analyzed: nāma nibbatti upacayaḥ nāma pavatti santati nāma jīraṇa ākāraḥ jaratā nāma

analyzed: aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgaha aṭṭhakathāya

original: Rūpakaṇḍavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

original: 3. Nikkhepakaṇḍo
analyzed: nikkhepa kaṇḍo

original: Tikanikkhepakathā

original: 985. Ettāvatā kusalattiko sabbesaṃ kusalādidhammānaṃ padabhājananayena vitthārito

analyzed: nāma honti vīriye pi

original: 1044. Atītattikaniddese atītāti khaṇattayaṃ atikkantā. Niruddhāti nirodhappattā.

original: Vigatāti vibhavaṃ gatā, vigacchitā vā. Vipariṇatāti pakativijahanena vipariṇāmaṃ

original: gatā. Nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ gatāti atthaṅgatā. Abbhatthaṅgatāti upasaggena padaṃ

analyzed: gaṇanam gatā katame te iti rūpam vedanā saññā saṅkhārāḥ viññāṇam paratas anāgata ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: 1047. Atītārammaṇattikaniddese atīte dhamme ārabbhātiādīsu parittamahaggatāva dhammā veditabbā. Te hi atītādīni ārabbha uppajjanti.

original: 1050. Ajjhattattikaniddese tesaṃ tesanti padadvayena sabbasatte pariyādiyati. Ajjhattaṃ
analyzed: ajjhatta ttika niddese tesam tesam ti pada dvayena sabba satte ajjhattam

original: 1051. Parasattānanti attānaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesasattānaṃ. Parapuggalānanti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttasadisameva. Tadubhayanti taṃ ubhayaṃ.
analyzed: para sattānam ti attānam ṭhapetvā avasesa sattānam para puggalānam ti tassa iva vevacanam sesam heṭṭhā vutta sadisam eva tat ubhayam ti tam ubhayam

original: 1053. Ajjhattārammaṇattikassa paṭhamapade parittamahaggatā dhammā veditabbā. Dutiye
analyzed: ajjhatta ārammaṇa ttikassa paṭhama pade paritta mahaggatāḥ dhammāḥ veditabbāḥ dutiye

original: appamāṇāpi. Tatiye parittamahaggatāva. Appamāṇā pana kālena bahiddhā kālena ajjhattaṃ

original: Dukanikkhepakathā
analyzed: duka nikkhepa kathā

original: dukkhassa nidānanti dukkhanidānaṃ. Taṃ dukkhaṃ ito pabhavatīti dukkhappabhavo. Bandhanaṭṭhena

original: pāso viyāti pāso. Mārassa pāso mārapāso. Duruggilanaṭṭhena baḷisaṃ viyāti baḷisaṃ.
analyzed: pāsaḥ viyāti pāsaḥ mārassa pāsaḥ māra pāsaḥ duruggilana ṭṭhena baḷisam viyāti baḷisam

original: Mārassa baḷisaṃ mārabaḷisaṃ. Taṇhābhibhūtā mārassa visayaṃ nātikkamanti, tesaṃ upari
analyzed: mārassa baḷisam māra baḷisam taṇhā abhibhūtāḥ mārassa visayam na atikkamanti tesam upari

original: māro vasaṃ vattetīti iminā pariyāyena mārassa visayoti māravisayo. Sandanaṭṭhena
analyzed: māraḥ vasam vatteti iti iminā pariyāyena mārassa visayo ti māra visayo sandana ṭṭhena

original: taṇhāva nadī taṇhānadī. Ajjhottharaṇaṭṭhena taṇhāva jālaṃ taṇhājālaṃ. Yathā sunakhā
analyzed: nadī taṇhā nadī ajjhottharaṇa ṭṭhena jālam taṇhā jālam yathā su nakhā

original: gaddulabaddhā yadicchakaṃ nīyanti, evaṃ taṇhābaddhā sattāpīti daḷhabandhanaṭṭhena
analyzed: gaddula baddhāḥ yadicchakam nīyanti evam taṇhā baddhā sattā api iti daḷha bandhana ṭṭhena

original: gaddulaṃ viyāti gaddulaṃ. Taṇhāva gaddulaṃ taṇhāgaddulaṃ. Duppūraṇaṭṭhena taṇhāva
analyzed: gaddulam viyāti gaddulam taṇhāva gaddulam taṇhāgaddulam duppūraṇa ṭṭhena taṇhāva

original: samuddo taṇhāsamuddo.
analyzed: samuddaḥ taṇhā samuddaḥ

original: 1066. Dosaniddese anatthaṃ me acarīti avuḍḍhiṃ me akāsi. Iminā upāyena sabbapadesu
analyzed: dosa niddese anattham me acari iti avuḍḍhim me akāsi iminā upāyena sabba padesu

original: attho veditabbo. Aṭṭhāne vā pana āghātoti akāraṇe kopo – ekacco hi ‘devo ativassatī’ti
analyzed: atthaḥ veditabbaḥ aṭṭhāne vā pana āghāto ti akāraṇe kopaḥ ekaccaḥ hi devaḥ ativassati iti

original: kuppati, ‘na vassatī’ti kuppati, ‘sūriyo tappatī’ti kuppati, ‘na tappatī’ti kuppati,
analyzed: kuppati na vassati iti kuppati sūriyaḥ tappati iti kuppati na tappati iti kuppati

original: vāte vāyantepi kuppati, avāyantepi kuppati, sammajjituṃ asakkonto bodhipaṇṇānaṃ kuppati,
analyzed: vāte vāyante api kuppati avāyante api kuppati sammajjitum a sakkontaḥ bodhi paṇṇānam kuppati

original: cīvaraṃ pārupituṃ asakkonto vātassa kuppati, upakkhalitvā khāṇukassa kuppati idaṃ
analyzed: cīvaram pārupitum a sakkontaḥ vātassa kuppati upakkhalitvā khāṇukassa kuppati idam

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ – aṭṭhāne vā pana āghāto jāyatīti. Tattha heṭṭhā navasu ṭhānesu satte
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam aṭṭhāne vā pana āghāto jāyati iti tattha heṭṭhā navasu ṭhānesu satte

original: ārabbha uppannattā kammapathabhedo hoti. Aṭṭhānāghāto pana saṅkhāresu uppanno kammapathabhedaṃ
analyzed: ārabbha uppanna ttā kamma patha bhedaḥ hoti aṭṭhānāghātaḥ pana saṅkhāresu uppanno kamma patha bhedam

original: na karoti. Cittaṃ āghātento uppannoti cittassa āghāto. Tato balavataro paṭighāto.
analyzed: na karoti cittam āghātento uppanno ti cittassa āghāto tatas balavataraḥ paṭighāto

original: Paṭihaññanavasena paṭighaṃ. Paṭivirujjhatīti paṭivirodho. Kuppanavasena kopo. Pakopo
analyzed: paṭihaññana vasena paṭigham paṭivirujjhati iti paṭivirodhaḥ kuppana vasena kopaḥ pakopaḥ

original: sampakopoti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Dussanavasena doso. Padoso sampadosoti upasaggena
analyzed: upasaggena padam vaḍḍhitam dussana vasena doso padoso sampadoso ti upasaggena

original: padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Cittassa byāpattīti cittassa vipannatā, viparivattanākāro. Manaṃ
analyzed: padam vaḍḍhitam cittassa byāpatti iti cittassa vipanna tā viparivattana ākāraḥ manaṃ

original: padūsayamāno uppajjatīti manopadoso. Kujjhanavasena kodho. Kujjhanākāro kujjhanā.
analyzed: padūsayamānaḥ uppajjati iti manaḥ upadosaḥ kujjhana vasena kodhaḥ kujjhana ākāraḥ kujjhanā

original: Kujjhitassa bhāvo kujjhitattaṃ.
analyzed: kujjhitassa bhāvaḥ kujjhitattam

original: Idāni akusalaniddese vuttanayaṃ dassetuṃ doso dussanātiādi vuttaṃ. Tasmā “yo evarūpo
analyzed: idāni akusala niddese vutta nayam dassetum dosaḥ dussanā tiādi vuttam tasmā yaḥ evarūpo

original: cittassa āghāto…pe… kujjhitatta”nti ca idha vutto, “doso dussanā”tiādinā nayena heṭṭhā
analyzed: cittassa āghāta upe ca idha vuttaḥ dosaḥ dussanā ti ādinā nayena heṭṭhā

original: vutto, ayaṃ vuccati dosoti. Evamettha yojanā kātabbā. Evañhi sati punaruttidoso paṭisedhito
analyzed: vuttaḥ ayam vuccati doso ti evam ettha yojanā kātabbā evam hi sati punarutti doso paṭisedhito

original: hoti. Mohaniddeso amohaniddese vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo. Sabbākārena panesa
analyzed: hoti moha niddesaḥ amoha niddese vutta paṭipakkha nayena veditabbo sabba ākārena pana esa

original: vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
analyzed: vibhaṅga ṭṭhakathā ayam āvi bhavissati

original: 1079. Tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sahetukāti tehi hetudhammehi ye aññe hetudhammā vā
analyzed: tehi dhammehi ye dhammā sa hetukā ati tehi hetu dhammehi ye aññe hetu dhammāḥ vā

original: nahetudhammā vā te sahetukā. Ahetukapadepi eseva nayo. Ettha ca hetu hetuyeva ca
analyzed: na hetu dhammā vā te sa hetukāḥ ahetuka pade pi esā iva nayo ettha ca hetu ca

original: hoti, tiṇṇaṃ vā dvinnaṃ vā ekato uppattiyaṃ sahetuko ca. Vicikicchuddhaccasahagato
analyzed: hoti tiṇṇam vā dvinnam vā ekatas sa hetuko ca vicikicchu dhacca sahagato

original: pana moho hetu ahetuko. Hetusampayuttadukaniddesepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: pana mohaḥ hetu ahetukaḥ hetu sampayutta duka niddese pi esa iva nayo

original: 1091. Saṅkhatadukaniddese purimaduke vuttaṃ asaṅkhatadhātuṃ sandhāya yo eva so dhammoti
analyzed: saṅkhata duka niddese purima duke vuttam asaṅkhata dhātum sandhāya yaḥ eva saḥ dhammaḥ ti

original: ekavacananiddeso kato. Purimaduke pana bahuvacanavasena pucchāya uddhaṭattā ime dhammā
analyzed: ekavacana niddeso kato purima duke pana bahuvacana vasena pucchāya ime dhammā

original: appaccayāti pucchānusandhinayena bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ. Ime dhammā sanidassanātiādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: appaccayā ti puccha anusandhi nayena bahuvacanam katam ime dhammā sani dassanā ati ādīsu pi esā iva nayo

original: 1101. Kenaci viññeyyadukaniddese cakkhuviññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇena vijānitabbā. Sesapadesupi
analyzed: kenaci viññeyya duka niddese cakkhu viññeyyā ti cakkhu viññāṇena vijānitabbā sesa padesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Ettha ca kenaci viññeyyāti cakkhuviññāṇādīsu kenaci ekena cakkhuviññāṇena
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ ettha ca kenaci viññeyyā ti cakkhu viññāṇa ādīsu kenaci ekena cakkhu viññāṇena

original: vā sotaviññāṇena vā vijānitabbā. Kenaci na viññeyyāti teneva cakkhuviññāṇena vā sotaviññāṇena
analyzed: vā sota viññāṇena vā vijānitabbā kenacid na viññeyyā ati tena iva cakkhu viññāṇena vā sota viññāṇena

original: vā na vijānitabbā. ‘Evaṃ sante dvinnampi padānaṃ atthanānattato duko hotī’ti heṭṭhā
analyzed: vā na vijānitabbā evam sante dvinnam pi padānam attha nānattataḥ dukaḥ hoti iti heṭṭhā

original: vuttattā ‘ye te dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā’ti ayaṃ duko na hoti.
analyzed: vutta ttā ye te dhammā cakkhu viññeyyā na te dhammā sota viññeyyā ti ayam dukaḥ na hoti

original: Rūpaṃ pana cakkhuviññeyyaṃ saddo na cakkhuviññeyyoti imamatthaṃ gahetvā ‘ye te dhammā
analyzed: rūpam pana cakkhu viññeyyam saddo na cakkhu viññeyyaḥ ti imam attham gahetvā ye te dhammā

original: cakkhuviññeyyā na te dhammā sotaviññeyyā, ye vā pana te dhammā sotaviññeyyā na te
analyzed: cakkhu viññeyyāḥ na te dhammā sota viññeyyāḥ ye vā pana te dhammā sota viññeyyāḥ na te

original: dhammā cakkhuviññeyyā’ti ayameko dukoti veditabbo. Evaṃ ekekaindriyamūlake cattāro
analyzed: dhammā cakkhu viññeyyā ti ayam ekaḥ duko ti veditabbo evam ekeka aindriya mūlake cattāro

original: cattāro katvā vīsati dukā vibhattāti veditabbā.
analyzed: cattāro katvā vīsati dukā vibhattā ati veditabbā

original: Kiṃ pana ‘manoviññāṇena kenaci viññeyyā kenaci na viññeyyā’ natthi? Tenettha dukā
analyzed: kim pana manaḥ viññāṇena kenaci viññeyyā kenaci na viññeyyā natthi tena ittha dukā

original: na vuttāti? No natthi, vavatthānābhāvato pana na vuttā. Na hi, yathā cakkhuviññāṇena
analyzed: na vuttā ati no natthi vavatthāna abhāvataḥ pana na vuttā na hi yathā cakkhu viññāṇena

original: aviññeyyā evāti vavatthānaṃ atthi, evaṃ manoviññāṇenāpīti vavatthānābhāvato ettha
analyzed: a viññeyyāḥ evā ti vavatthānam atthi evam manaḥ viññāṇena api iti vavatthāna abhāvato ettha

original: dukā na vuttā. Manoviññāṇena pana kenaci viññeyyā ceva aviññeyyā cāti ayamattho atthi.
analyzed: dukā na vuttā manaḥ viññāṇena pana kenacid viññeyyā ca iva aviññeyyā ca ati ayam atthaḥ atthi

original: Tasmā so avuttopi yathālābhavasena veditabbo. Manoviññāṇanti hi saṅkhyaṃ gatehi kāmāvacaradhammehi
analyzed: tasmā saḥ a vuttaḥ api yathā lābha vasena veditabbaḥ manaḥ viññāṇan ti hi saṅkhyam gatehi kāmāvacara dhammehi

original: kāmāvacaradhammā eva tāva kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā. Tehiyeva rūpāvacarādidhammāpi
analyzed: kāmāvacara dhammā eva tāva kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā rūpāvacara ādi dhammā api

original: kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā. Rūpāvacarehipi kāmāvacarā kehici viññeyyā kehici
analyzed: kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā rūpāvacarehi pi kāmāvacarā kehici viññeyyā kehici

original: aviññeyyā. Teheva rūpāvacarādayopi kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā. Arūpāvacarehi
analyzed: aviññeyyā rūpāvacara ādayaḥ api kehici viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyāḥ arūpāvacarehi

original: pana kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā apariyāpannā ca neva viññeyyā. Arūpāvacarā pana kehici
analyzed: pana kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā apariyāpannā ca na iva viññeyyā arūpāvacarā pana kehici

original: viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā. Tepi ca kecideva viññeyyā keci aviññeyyā. Apariyāpannehi
analyzed: viññeyyā kehici aviññeyyā te pi ca kecid eva viññeyyā keci aviññeyyāḥ apariyāpannehi

original: kāmāvacarādayo neva viññeyyā. Apariyāpannā pana nibbānena aviññeyyattā kehici viññeyyā
analyzed: kāmāvacara ādayaḥ na iva viññeyyāḥ apariyāpannā pana nibbānena aviññeyya ttā kehici viññeyyā

original: kehici aviññeyyā. Tepi ca maggaphalānaṃ aviññeyyattā kecideva viññeyyā keci aviññeyyāti.
analyzed: kehici aviññeyyā ca magga phalānaṃ aviññeyya ttā kecid eva viññeyyā keci aviññeyyā ati

original: 1102. Āsavaniddese pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo kāmāsavo nāma. Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo
analyzed: āsava niddese pañca kāmaguṇikaḥ rāgo kāma āsavaḥ nāma rūpa arūpa bhavesu chanda rāgo

original: jhānanikanti sassatadiṭṭhisahajāto rāgo bhavavasena patthanā bhavāsavo nāma. Dvāsaṭṭhi
diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhāsavo nāma. Aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇaṃ avijjāsavo nāma. Tattha tattha
analyzed: diṭṭhiyaḥ diṭṭhāsavaḥ nāma aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇam avijjāsavaḥ nāma tattha tattha

original: āgatesu pana āsavesu asammohatthaṃ ekavidhādibhedo veditabbo. Atthato hete cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena
analyzed: āgatesu pana āsavesu asammoha attham ekavidha ādi bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ atthataḥ ha ete cirapārivāsiya ṭṭhena

original: āsavāti evaṃ ekavidhāva honti. Vinaye pana “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya
analyzed: evam ekavidhā ava honti vinaye pana diṭṭhadhammikānam āsavānam saṃvarāya

original: samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti duvidhena āgatā. Suttante saḷāyatane tāva
analyzed: samparāyikānam āsavānam paṭighātāya ati duvidhena āgatā suttante

original: “tayome, āvuso, āsavā – kāmāsavo bhavāsavo avijjāsavo”ti tividhena āgatā. Nibbedhikapariyāye
analyzed: tayo me āvuso āsavā kāma āsavaḥ bhava āsavaḥ avijja āsavaḥ ti tividhena āgatāḥ nibbedhika pariyāye

original: “atthi, bhikkhave, āsavā nirayagamanīyā, atthi āsavā tiracchānayonigamanīyā, atthi
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave āsavā niraya gamanīyā atthi āsavā tiracchāna yoni gamanīyā atthi

original: āsavā pettivisayagamanīyā, atthi āsavā manussalokagamanīyā, atthi āsavā devalokagamanīyā”ti
analyzed: āsavā petti visaya gamanīyā atthi āsavā manussa loka gamanīyā atthi āsavā deva loka gamanīyā ati

original: pañcavidhena āgatā. Chakkanipāte āhuneyyasutte – “atthi āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā,
analyzed: pañcavidhena āgatā chakkanipāte āhuneyya sutte atthi āsavā saṃvarā pahātabbā

original: atthi āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā parivajjanā
analyzed: atthi āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā atthi āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā atthi āsavā parivajjanā

original: pahātabbā, atthi āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā, atthi āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā”ti chabbidhena
analyzed: pahātabbāḥ atthi āsavāḥ vinodanā pahātabbāḥ atthi āsavāḥ bhāvanā pahātabbā ati chabbidhena

original: āgatā. Sabbāsavapariyāye ‘dassanapahātabbehi’ saddhiṃ sattavidhena āgatā. Idha panete
analyzed: āgatā sabba āsava pariyāye dassana pahātabbehi saddhim sattavidhena āgatāḥ idha pana ete

original: kāmāsavādibhedato catubbidhena āgatā. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhāte
analyzed: kāma āsava ādi bhedataḥ catubbidhena āgatā tatra ayam vacana atthaḥ pañca kāmaguṇa saṅkhāte

original: kāme āsavo ‘kāmāsavo’. Rūpārūpasaṅkhāte kammato ca upapattito ca duvidhepi bhave
analyzed: kāme āsavo kāma āsavaḥ rūpa arūpa saṅkhāte kammataḥ ca upapattitaḥ ca duvidhe api bhave

original: āsavo ‘bhavāsavo’. Diṭṭhi eva āsavo ‘diṭṭhāsavo’. Avijjāva āsavo ‘avijjāsavo’.
analyzed: āsavaḥ bhava āsavaḥ diṭṭhi eva āsavaḥ diṭṭha āsavaḥ avijjāva āsavaḥ avijja āsavaḥ

original: 1103. Kāmesūti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu. Kāmacchandoti kāmasaṅkhāto chando, na kattukamyatāchando,
analyzed: kāmesu iti pañcasu kāma guṇesu kāma chandaḥ iti kāma saṅkhātaḥ chandaḥ na kattu kamyatā chandaḥ

original: na dhammacchando. Kāmanavasena rajjanavasena ca kāmoyeva rāgo kāmarāgo. Kāmanavasena
analyzed: na dhammacchando kāmana vasena rajjana vasena ca rāgo kāma rāgo kāmana vasena

original: nandanavasena ca kāmova nandīti kāmanandī. Evaṃ sabbattha kāmatthaṃ viditvā taṇhāyanaṭṭhena
analyzed: nandana vasena ca kāmaḥ uva nandī iti kāma nandī evam sabbattha kāmattham viditvā taṇhāyana ṭṭhena

original: kāmataṇhā, sinehanaṭṭhena kāmasineho, pariḍayhanaṭṭhena kāmapariḷāho, mucchanaṭṭhena
analyzed: kāma taṇhā sinehana ṭṭhena kāma sinehaḥ pariḍayhana ṭṭhena kāma pariḷāhaḥ mucchana ṭṭhena

original: kāmamucchā, gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena kāmajjhosānanti veditabbaṃ. Ayaṃ vuccatīti
analyzed: kāma mucchāḥ gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpana ṭṭhena kāma jjhosānam ti veditabbam ayam vuccati iti

original: ayaṃ aṭṭhahi padehi vibhatto kāmāsavo nāma vuccati.
analyzed: ayam aṭṭhahi padehi vibhatto kāmāsavaḥ nāma vuccati

original: 1104. Bhavesu bhavachandoti rūpārūpabhavesu bhavapatthanāvaseneva pavatto chando ‘bhavachando’. Sesapadānipi imināva nayena veditabbāni.
analyzed: bhavesu bhava chandaḥ ti rūpa arūpa bhavesu bhava patthanā vasena iva pavatto chandaḥ bhava chando sesa padāni pi iminā ava nayena veditabbāni

original: 1105. Sassato lokoti vātiādīhi dasahākārehi diṭṭhippabhedova vutto. Tattha sassato
analyzed: sassataḥ loko ti vā ati ādīhi dasa hākārehi diṭṭhi ppabhedaḥ va vuttaḥ tattha sassataḥ

original: lokoti ettha khandhapañcakaṃ lokoti gahetvā ‘ayaṃ loko nicco dhuvo sabbakāliko’ti
analyzed: loko ti ettha khandha pañcakam loko ti gahetvā ayam lokaḥ niccaḥ dhuvaḥ sabbakāliko ti

original: gaṇhantassa ‘sassata’nti gahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi. Asassatoti tameva lokaṃ ‘ucchijjati
analyzed: gaṇhantassa gahaṇa ākāra ppavattā diṭṭhi tam eva lokam ucchijjati

original: vinassatī’ti gaṇhantassa ucchedagahaṇākārappavattā diṭṭhi. Antavāti parittakasiṇalābhino
analyzed: vinassati iti gaṇhantassa uccheda gahaṇa ākāra ppavattā diṭṭhi paritta kasiṇa lābhino

original: ‘suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā’ kasiṇe samāpannassa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavattitarūpārūpadhamme
analyzed: su ppamatte vā sarāva matte vā kasiṇe samāpannassa antosamāpattiyam pavattita rūpa arūpa dhamme

original: lokoti ca kasiṇaparicchedantena ca ‘antavā’ti gaṇhantassa ‘antavā loko’ti gahaṇākārappavattā
analyzed: loko ti ca kasiṇa pariccheda antena ca antavā ati gaṇhantassa antavā loko ti gahaṇa ākāra ppavattā

original: diṭṭhi. Sā sassatadiṭṭhipi hoti ucchedadiṭṭhipi. Vipulakasiṇalābhino pana tasmiṃ
analyzed: sā hoti uccheda diṭṭhi pi vipula kasiṇa lābhino pana tasmiṃ

original: kasiṇe samāpannassa antosamāpattiyaṃ pavattitarūpārūpadhamme lokoti ca kasiṇaparicchedantena

original: hoti, ucchedadiṭṭhipi.

original: 1121. Saṃyojanesu mānaniddese seyyohamasmīti mānoti uttamaṭṭhena ‘ahaṃ seyyo’ti evaṃ
analyzed: saṃyojanesu māna niddese seyyo ham asmi iti uttama aṭṭhena aham seyyo ti evam

analyzed: janānam uppajjati iti kathitaḥ

original: Mānakaraṇavasena māno. Maññanā maññitattanti ākārabhāvaniddesā. Ussitaṭṭhena unnati.

analyzed: yassa uppajjati tam puggalam unnāmeti ukkhipitvā ṭhapeti iti unnamaḥ samussita ṭṭhena

analyzed: paṭilābhaḥ garukāra iti garukiriyā bhāriya karaṇam

analyzed: parihīnam passati tadā atta manaḥ hoti evam para sampatti khiyyana lakkhaṇā issā ti veditabbā

original: 1127. Macchariyaniddese vatthuto macchariyadassanatthaṃ ‘pañca macchariyāni āvāsamacchariya’ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha āvāse macchariyaṃ āvāsamacchariyaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

original: Vaṇṇo nāma sarīravaṇṇopi guṇavaṇṇopi. Tattha sarīravaṇṇe maccharipuggalo ‘paro pāsādiko
analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ nāma sarīra vaṇṇaḥ api guṇa vaṇṇaḥ api tattha sarīra vaṇṇe macchari puggalo paraḥ pāsādiko

original: rūpavā’ti vutte taṃ na kathetukāmo hoti. Guṇavaṇṇamaccharī sīlena dhutaṅgena paṭipadāya

original: ācārena vaṇṇaṃ na kathetukāmo hoti.

original: Dhammoti pariyattidhammo ca paṭivedhadhammo ca. Tattha ariyasāvakā paṭivedhadhammaṃ

original: Taṃ pana paṭivedhaṃ ‘pare jānantū’ti icchanti. Tantidhammeyeva pana dhammamacchariyaṃ

original: nāma hoti. Tena samannāgato puggalo yaṃ guḷhaṃ ganthaṃ vā kathāmaggaṃ vā jānāti taṃ

original: Tattha ekacco puggalo lolo hoti, kālena samaṇo hoti, kālena brāhmaṇo, kālena nigaṇṭho.

original: Yo hi bhikkhu ‘ayaṃ puggalo paveṇiāgataṃ tantiṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ dhammantaraṃ bhinditvā

original: āluḷissatī’ti na deti, ayaṃ puggalaṃ upaparikkhitvā dhammānuggahena na deti nāma.

original: Yo pana ‘ayaṃ dhammo saṇho sukhumo, sacāyaṃ puggalo gaṇhissati aññaṃ byākaritvā attānaṃ

original: bhavissatī’ti na deti, ayaṃ dhammamaccharī nāma hoti.
analyzed: bhavissati iti na deti ayam dhammamaccharī nāma hoti
