original: panetaṃ ‘kappati na kappatī’ti vīmaṃsanasaṅkhātaṃ vinayakukkuccaṃ nāma.
analyzed: pana itam kappati na kappati iti vīmaṃsana saṅkhātam vinayakukkuccam nāma

original: 1176. “Katame dhammā nīvaraṇā ceva nīvaraṇasampayuttā cā”ti padassa niddese yasmā
analyzed: katame dhammā nīvaraṇā ca iva nīvaraṇa sampayuttā ca ati padassa niddese yasmā

original: thinamiddhaṃ aññamaññaṃ na vijahati, tasmā thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇena
analyzed: thinam iddham aññam aññam na vijahati tasmā thinam iddha nīvaraṇam avijjā nīvaraṇena

original: nīvaraṇañceva nīvaraṇasampayuttañcāti abhinditvā vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana uddhacce satipi
analyzed: nīvaraṇam ca iva nīvaraṇa sampayuttam ca ati a bhinditvā vuttam yasmā pana uddhacce sati pi

original: kukkuccassa abhāvā kukkuccena vināpi uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, tasmā taṃ bhinditvā vuttaṃ.
analyzed: kukkuccassa abhāvā kukkuccena vinā api uddhaccam uppajjati tasmā tam bhinditvā vuttam

original: Yañca yena sampayogaṃ na gacchati, taṃ na yojitanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: yat ca yena sampayogam na gacchati tam na yojitam iti veditabbam

original: Ime pana nīvaraṇe kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi. Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: ime pana nīvaraṇe kilesa paṭipāṭiyā api āharitum vaṭṭati magga paṭipāṭiyā api kilesa paṭipāṭiyā

original: kāmacchandabyāpādā anāgāmimaggena pahīyanti, thinamiddhuddhaccāni arahattamaggena,
analyzed: kāma chanda byāpādāḥ anāgāmi maggena pahīyanti thinam iddha uddhaccāni arahatta maggena

original: kukkuccavicikicchā sotāpattimaggena, avijjā arahattamaggena. Maggapaṭipāṭiyā sotāpattimaggena
analyzed: kukkucca vicikicchā sotāpatti maggena avijjā arahatta maggena magga paṭipāṭiyā sotāpatti maggena

original: kukkuccavicikicchā pahīyanti, anāgāmimaggena kāmacchandabyāpādā, arahattamaggena
analyzed: kukkucca vicikicchā pahīyanti anāgāmi maggena kāmacchanda byāpādāḥ arahatta maggena

original: thinamiddhuddhaccāvijjāti.
analyzed: thinam id hud hacca avijjāti

original: 1182. Parāmāsagocchake te dhamme ṭhapetvāti pucchāsabhāgena bahuvacanaṃ kataṃ.
analyzed: parāmāsa gocchake te dhamme ṭhapetvā iti pucchāsa bhāgena bahuvacanam katam

original: 1219. Upādānaniddese vatthusaṅkhātaṃ kāmaṃ upādiyatīti kāmupādānaṃ kāmo ca so upādānañcātipi
analyzed: upādāna niddese vatthu saṅkhātam kāmam upādiyati iti kāmupādānam kāmo ca upādānam ca atipi

original: kāmupādānaṃ. Upādānanti daḷhaggahaṇaṃ. Daḷhattho hi ettha upasaddo upāyāsaupakaṭṭhādīsu
analyzed: kāma upādānam upādānam ti daḷha ggahaṇam daḷha atthaḥ hi ettha upasaddaḥ upāyāsa aupakaṭṭha ādīsu

original: viya. Tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānañcāti diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Diṭṭhiṃ upādiyatīti diṭṭhupādānaṃ.
analyzed: tathā diṭṭhi ca sā upādānam ca ati diṭṭhupādānam diṭṭhim upādiyati iti diṭṭhupādānam

original: ‘Sassato attā ca loko cā’tiādīsu hi purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyahi. Tathā sīlabbataṃ
analyzed: sassataḥ attā ca loko ca ati ādīsu hi purima diṭṭhim uttara diṭṭhi tathā sīlabbatam

original: upādiyatīti sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcātipi sīlabbatupādānaṃ. Gosīlagovatādīni
analyzed: upādiyati iti sīlabbata upādānam sīlabbatam ca tam upādānam ca atipi sīlabbata upādānam gosīla govata ādīni

original: hi ‘evaṃ suddhī’ti abhinivesato sayameva upādānāni. Tathā, vadanti etenāti ‘vādo’;
analyzed: hi evam suddhī iti abhinivesataḥ sayam eva upādānāni tathā vadanti etena ati vādaḥ

original: upādiyanti etenāti ‘upādānaṃ’. Kiṃ vadanti, upādiyanti vā? Attānaṃ. Attano vādupādānaṃ
analyzed: upādiyanti etena ati upādānam kim vadanti upādiyanti vā attānam attanaḥ

original: attavādupādānaṃ; ‘attavādamattameva vā attā’ti upādiyanti etenāti attavādupādānaṃ.
analyzed: attavād upādānam attavādam attam eva vā attā iti upādiyanti etena ati attavād upādānam

original: 1220. Yo kāmesu kāmacchandoti etthāpi vatthukāmāva anavasesato kāmāti adhippetā.
analyzed: yaḥ kāmesu kāmacchandaḥ ti ettha api anavasesato kāmā ati adhippetā

original: Tasmā vatthukāmesu kāmacchando idha kāmupādānanti anāgāminopi taṃ siddhaṃ hoti. Pañcakāmaguṇavatthuko
analyzed: tasmā vatthu kāmesu kāmacchandaḥ anāgāminaḥ api tam siddham hoti pañca kāmaguṇa vatthuko

original: panassa kāmarāgova natthīti.
analyzed: panassa kāma rāgaḥ uva natthi iti

original: 1221. Diṭṭhupādānaniddese natthi dinnanti. Dinnaṃ nāma atthi, sakkā kassaci kiñci
analyzed: diṭṭhupādāna niddese na atthi dinnan ti dinnam nāma atthi sakkā kassaci kiñci

original: dātunti jānāti; dinnassa pana phalaṃ vipāko natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi yiṭṭhanti. Yiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: dātunti jānāti dinnassa pana phalam vipākaḥ natthi iti gaṇhāti natthi yiṭṭhanti yiṭṭham

original: vuccati mahāyāgo. Taṃ yajituṃ sakkāti jānāti; yiṭṭhassa pana phalaṃ vipāko natthīti
analyzed: vuccati mahā yāgaḥ tam yajitum sakkā ati jānāti yiṭṭhassa pana phalam vipākaḥ na atthi iti

original: gaṇhāti. Natthi hutanti āhunapāhunamaṅgalakiriyā. Taṃ kātuṃ sakkāti jānāti; tassa
analyzed: gaṇhāti na atthi hutanti āhuna pāhuna maṅgala kiriyā tam kātum sakkā ati jānāti tassa

original: pana phalaṃ vipāko natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi, sukatadukkaṭānanti ettha dasa kusalakammapathā
analyzed: pana phalam vipākaḥ natthi iti gaṇhāti natthi su kata dukkaṭānanti ettha dasa kusala kammapathāḥ

original: sukatakammāni nāma. Dasa akusalakammapathā dukkaṭakammāni nāma. Tesaṃ atthibhāvaṃ
analyzed: sukata kammāni nāma dasa akusala kammapathāḥ dukkaṭa kammāni nāma tesaṃ atthi bhāvaṃ

original: jānāti phalaṃ vipāko pana natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi ayaṃ lokoti paraloke ṭhito imaṃ
analyzed: jānāti phalam vipāko pana natthi iti gaṇhāti na atthi ayam loko iti para loke ṭhito imaṃ

original: lokaṃ natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi paralokoti idha loke ṭhito paralokaṃ natthīti gaṇhāti.
analyzed: lokam natthi iti gaṇhāti natthi para loko ti idha loke ṭhitaḥ para lokam natthi iti gaṇhāti

original: Natthi mātā natthi pitāti mātāpitūnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ jānāti, tesu katapaccayena koci
analyzed: na atthi mātā na atthi pitā ati mātā pitūnam atthi bhāvam jānāti tesu kata paccayena koci

original: phalaṃ vipāko natthīti gaṇhāti. Natthi sattā opapātikāti cavanakaupapajjanakā sattā
analyzed: phalam vipākaḥ natthi iti gaṇhāti natthi sattā opapātikā ati cavanaka aupapajjanakā sattā

original: natthīti gaṇhāti. Sammaggatā sammā paṭipannāti anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā
analyzed: na atthi iti gaṇhāti sammaggatā sammā paṭipannā ati anuloma paṭipadam paṭipannāḥ dhammika samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ

original: lokasmiṃ natthīti gaṇhāti. Ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā
analyzed: lokasmin na atthi iti gaṇhāti ye iman ca lokam paran ca lokam sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā

original: pavedentīti imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ attanāva abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena ñatvā pavedanasamattho
analyzed: pavedenti iti imam ca lokam param ca lokam attanāva abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena ñatvā pavedana samatthaḥ

original: sabbaññū buddho nāma natthīti gaṇhāti.
analyzed: sabbaññū buddhaḥ nāma na atthi iti gaṇhāti

original: Imāni pana upādānāni kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi. Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: imāni pana upādānāni kilesa paṭipāṭiyā api āharitum vaṭṭati magga paṭipāṭiyā api kilesa paṭipāṭiyā

original: kāmupādānaṃ catūhi maggehi pahīyati, sesāni tīṇi sotāpattimaggena. Maggapaṭipāṭiyā
analyzed: kāma upādānam catūhi maggehi pahīyati sesāni tīṇi sotāpatti maggena magga paṭipāṭiyā

original: sotāpattimaggena diṭṭhupādānādīni pahīyanti, catūhi maggehi kāmupādānanti.
analyzed: sotāpatti maggena diṭṭhupādāna ādīni pahīyanti catūhi maggehi kāma upādānam ti

original: 1235. Kilesagocchake kilesā eva kilesavatthūni. Vasanti vā ettha akhīṇāsavā sattā
analyzed: kilesagocchake kilesāḥ eva kilesa vatthūni vasanti vā ettha akhīṇa āsavā sattā

original: lobhādīsu patiṭṭhitattāti ‘vatthūni’. Kilesā ca te tappatiṭṭhānaṃ sattānaṃ vatthūni
analyzed: lobha ādīsu patiṭṭhita ttā ati vatthūni kilesā ca te tad patiṭṭhānam sattānam vatthūni

original: cāti ‘kilesavatthūni’. Yasmā cettha anantarapaccayādibhāvena uppajjamānā kilesāpi
analyzed: ca ati kilesa vatthūni yasmā ca ittha anantara paccaya ādi bhāvena uppajjamānā kilesā api

original: vasanti eva nāma, tasmā kilesānaṃ vatthūnītipi ‘kilesavatthūni’.
analyzed: vasanti eva nāma tasmai kilesānam kilesa vatthūni

original: 1236. Tattha katamo lobho? Yo rāgo sārāgoti ayaṃ pana lobho hetugocchake ganthagocchake
analyzed: tattha katamaḥ lobhaḥ yaḥ rāgo sārāgo ti ayam pana lobhaḥ hetu gocchake gantha gocchake

original: imasmiṃ kilesagocchaketi tīsu ṭhānesu atirekapadasatena niddiṭṭho. Āsavasaṃyojanaoghayoganīvaraṇaupādānagocchakesu
analyzed: imasmin kilesa gocchaka iti tīsu ṭhānesu atireka pada satena niddiṭṭhaḥ āsava saṃyojana ogha yoga nīvaraṇa aupādāna gocchakesu

original: aṭṭhahi aṭṭhahi padehi niddiṭṭho. Svāyaṃ atirekapadasatena niddiṭṭhaṭṭhānepi aṭṭhahi
analyzed: aṭṭhahi aṭṭhahi padehi niddiṭṭhaḥ svāyam atireka pada satena niddiṭṭha ṭhāne pi aṭṭhahi

original: aṭṭhahi padehi niddiṭṭhaṭṭhānepi nippadesatova gahitoti veditabbo. Tesu hetuganthanīvaraṇaupādānakilesagocchakesu
analyzed: aṭṭhahi padehi niddiṭṭha ṭhāne pi nippadesataḥ va gahito ti veditabbo tesu hetu gantha nīvaraṇa aupādāna kilesa gocchakesu

original: catumaggavajjhā taṇhā ekeneva koṭṭhāsena ṭhitā. Āsavasaṃyojanaoghayogesu catumaggavajjhāpi
analyzed: catu magga vajjhā taṇhā ekena iva koṭṭhāsena ṭhitā āsava saṃyojana ogha yogesu catu magga vajjhā api

original: dve koṭṭhāsā hutvā ṭhitā. Kathaṃ? Āsavesu kāmāsavo bhavāsavoti, saṃyojanesu kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ
analyzed: dve koṭṭhāsā hutvā ṭhitā katham āsavesu kāma āsavaḥ bhava āsavaḥ iti saṃyojanesu kāma rāga saṃyojanam

original: bhavarāgasaṃyojananti, oghesu kāmogho bhavoghoti, yogesu kāmayogo bhavayogoti.
analyzed: oghesu kāma oghaḥ bhava oghaḥ iti yogesu kāma yogaḥ bhava yogaḥ iti

original: Imāni pana kilesavatthūni kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi.
analyzed: imāni pana kilesa vatthūni kilesa paṭipāṭiyā api āharitum vaṭṭati magga paṭipāṭiyā api

original: Kilesapaṭipāṭiyā lobho catūhi maggehi pahīyati, doso anāgāmimaggena, mohamānā arahattamaggena,
analyzed: kilesa paṭipāṭiyā lobho catūhi maggehi pahīyati dosaḥ anāgāmi maggena mohamānāḥ arahatta maggena

original: diṭṭhivicikicchā sotāpattimaggena, thinādīni arahattamaggena. Maggapaṭipāṭiyā sotāpattimaggena
analyzed: diṭṭhi vicikicchā sotāpatti maggena thina ādīni arahatta maggena magga paṭipāṭiyā sotāpatti maggena

original: diṭṭhivicikicchā pahīyanti, anāgāmimaggena doso, arahattamaggena sesā sattāti.
analyzed: diṭṭhi vicikicchā pahīyanti anāgāmi maggena dosaḥ arahatta maggena sesā sattā ati

original: 1287. Kāmāvacaraniddese heṭṭhatoti heṭṭhābhāgena. Avīcinirayanti vā aggijālānaṃ vā
analyzed: kāmāvacara niddese heṭṭhatas ti heṭṭhābhāgena vā

original: sattānaṃ vā dukkhavedanāya vīci, antaraṃ, chiddaṃ ettha natthīti avīci. Sukhasaṅkhāto
analyzed: sattānam vā dukkha vedanāya vīci antaram chiddam ettha natthi iti avīci sukha saṅkhāto

original: ayo ettha natthīti nirayo. Niratiatthenapi nirassādatthenapi nirayo. Pariyantaṃ karitvāti
analyzed: ayaḥ ettha na atthi iti nirayaḥ nirati atthena api nirassāda atthena api nirayaḥ pariyantam karitvā ati

original: taṃ avīcisaṅkhātaṃ nirayaṃ antaṃ katvā. Uparitoti uparibhāgena. Paranimmitavasavattideveti
analyzed: tam avīci saṅkhātam nirayam antam katvā uparitas ti upari bhāgena

original: paranimmitesu kāmesu vasaṃ vattanato evaṃladdhavohāre deve. Anto karitvāti anto pakkhipitvā.
analyzed: para nimmitesu kāmesu vasam vattanataḥ evaṃladdha vohāre deve antar karitvā ati antar pakkhipitvā

original: Yaṃ etasmiṃ antareti ye etasmiṃ okāse. Etthāvacarāti iminā yasmā etasmiṃ antare aññepi
analyzed: yam etasmin antareti ye etasmin okāse etthā avacarāti iminā yasmai etasmin antare aññe pi

original: caranti kadāci katthaci sambhavato, tasmā tesaṃ asaṅgaṇhanatthaṃ ‘avacarā’ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: caranti kadāci katthaci sambhavataḥ tasmā tesam a saṅgaṇhana attham avacara ati vuttam

original: Tena ye etasmiṃ antare ogāḷhā hutvā caranti sabbattha sadā ca sambhavato, adhobhāge
analyzed: tena ye etasmin antare ogāḷhāḥ hutvā caranti sabbattha sadā ca sambhavataḥ adhobhāge

original: caranti avīcinirayassa heṭṭhā bhūtupādāyapavattibhāvena, tesaṃ saṅgaho kato hoti.
analyzed: caranti avīcinirayassa heṭṭhā bhūta upādāya pavatti bhāvena tesam saṅgahaḥ kataḥ hoti

original: Te hi avagāḷhāva caranti, adhobhāgeva carantīti avacarā. Ettha pariyāpannāti iminā
analyzed: te hi avagāḍha ava caranti adhobhāgā iva caranti iti avacarāḥ ettha pariyāpannā ati iminā

original: pana yasmā ete etthāvacarā aññatthāpi avacaranti, na pana tattha pariyāpannā honti,
analyzed: pana yasmai ete etthāvacarāḥ aññattha api avacaranti na pana tattha pariyāpannāḥ honti

original: tasmā tesaṃ aññatthāpi avacarantānaṃ pariggaho kato hoti. Idāni te ettha pariyāpannadhamme
analyzed: tasmā tesam aññattha api avacarantānam pariggahaḥ kataḥ hoti idāni te ettha pariyāpanna dhamme

original: rāsisuññatapaccayabhāvato ceva sabhāvato ca dassento khandhātiādimāha.
analyzed: rāsi suññata paccaya bhāvataḥ ca iva sabhāvataḥ ca dassentaḥ khandha ati ādim āha

original: 1289. Rūpāvacaraniddese brahmalokanti paṭhamajjhānabhūmisaṅkhātaṃ brahmaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: rūpāvacara niddese brahma lokam ti paṭhama jhāna bhūmi saṅkhātam brahmaṭṭhānam

original: Sesamettha kāmāvacaraniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Samāpannassa vātiādīsu paṭhamapadena
analyzed: sesam ettha kāmāvacara niddese vutta nayena iva veditabbam samāpannassa vā āti ādīsu paṭhama padena

original: kusalajjhānaṃ vuttaṃ, dutiyena vipākajjhānaṃ, vuttaṃ tatiyena kiriyajjhānaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: kusala jjhānam vuttam dutiyena vipāka jjhānam vuttam tatiyena kiriya jjhānam vuttan ti veditabbam

original: 1291. Arūpāvacaraniddese ākāsānañcāyatanūpageti ākāsānañcāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ bhavaṃ upagate. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: arūpāvacara niddese ākāsa anañcāyatana upagā iti ākāsa anañcāyatana saṅkhātam bhavam upagate dutiya pade pi esa iva nayaḥ sesam heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva veditabbam

original: 1301. Saraṇadukaniddese yvāyaṃ tīsu akusalamūlesu moho, so lobhasampayutto ca lobhena
analyzed: saraṇa duka niddese yvā ayam tīsu akusala mūlesu moho so lobha sampayutto ca lobhena

original: saraṇo, dosasampayutto ca dosena saraṇo. Vicikicchuddhaccasampayutto pana moho diṭṭhisampayuttena
analyzed: saraṇaḥ dosa sampayutto ca dosena saraṇaḥ vicikicchu ddhacca sampayutto pana moho diṭṭhi sampayuttena

original: ceva rūparāgaarūparāgasaṅkhātena ca rāgaraṇena pahānekaṭṭhabhāvato saraṇo sarajoti veditabbo.
analyzed: ca iva rūpa rāga arūpa rāga saṅkhātena ca rāgaraṇena saraṇo veditabbo

original: Suttantikadukanikkhepakathā
analyzed: suttantika duka nikkhepa kathā

original: 1303. Suttantikadukesu mātikākathāyaṃ atthato vivecitattā yāni ca nesaṃ niddesapadāni
analyzed: suttantika dukesu mātikā kathā ayam atthataḥ vivecita ttā yāni ca nesam niddesa padāni

original: tesampi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva suviññeyyattā yebhuyyena uttānatthāni eva. Idaṃ panettha
analyzed: tesam pi heṭṭhā vutta nayena iva su viññeyya ttā yebhuyyena uttāna atthāni eva idam pana ittha

original: visesamattaṃ – vijjūpamaduke tāva cakkhumā kira puriso meghandhakāre rattiṃ maggaṃ
analyzed: visesa mattam vijjūpamaduke tāva cakkhumā kira puriso megha andhakāre rattim maggam

original: paṭipajji. Tassa andhakāratāya maggo na paññāyi. Vijju niccharitvā andhakāraṃ viddhaṃsesi.
analyzed: paṭipajji tassa andhakāra tāya maggo na paññāyi vijju niccharitvā andhakāram viddhaṃsesi

original: Athassa andhakāravigamā maggo pākaṭo ahosi. So dutiyampi gamanaṃ abhinīhari. Dutiyampi
analyzed: athassa andhakāra vigamā maggo pākaṭaḥ ahosi saḥ dutiyam pi gamanam dutiyam pi

original: andhakāro otthari. Maggo na paññāyi. Vijju niccharitvā taṃ viddhaṃsesi. Vigate andhakāre
analyzed: andhakāraḥ otthari maggaḥ na paññāyi vijju niccharitvā tam viddhaṃsesi vigate andhakāre

original: maggo pākaṭo ahosi. Tatiyampi gamanaṃ abhinīhari. Andhakāro otthari. Maggo na paññāyi.
analyzed: maggo pākaṭaḥ ahosi tatiyam pi gamanam abhinīhari andhakāraḥ otthari maggaḥ na paññāyi

original: Vijju niccharitvā andhakāraṃ viddhaṃsesi.
analyzed: vijju niccharitvā andhakāram viddhaṃsesi

original: Tattha cakkhumato purisassa andhakāre maggapaṭipajjanaṃ viya ariyasāvakassa sotāpattimaggatthāya
analyzed: tattha cakkhumataḥ purisassa andhakāre magga paṭipajjanam viya ariya sāvakassa sotāpatti magga tthāya

original: vipassanārambho. Andhakāre maggassa apaññāyanakālo viya saccacchādakatamaṃ. Vijjuyā
analyzed: vipassanā ārambhaḥ andhakāre maggassa a paññāyana kālo viya saccacchādakatamam

original: niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsitakālo viya sotāpattimaggobhāsena uppajjitvā saccacchādakatamassa
analyzed: niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsita kālaḥ viya sotāpatti magga ubhāsena uppajjitvā saccacchādakatamassa

original: vinoditakālo. Vigate andhakāre maggassa pākaṭakālo viya sotāpattimaggassa catunnaṃ
analyzed: vinodita kālaḥ vigate andhakāre maggassa pākaṭa kālaḥ viya sotāpatti maggassa

original: saccānaṃ pākaṭakālo. Maggassa pākaṭaṃ pana maggasamaṅgipuggalassa pākaṭameva. Dutiyagamanābhinīhāro
analyzed: saccānam pākaṭa kālaḥ maggassa pākaṭam pana magga samaṅgi puggalassa pākaṭam eva dutiya gamana abhinīhāraḥ

original: viya sakadāgāmimaggatthāya vipassanārambho. Andhakāre maggassa apaññāyanakālo viya
analyzed: viya sakadāgāmi magga tthāya vipassanā ārambhaḥ andhakāre maggassa a paññāyana kālo viya

original: saccacchādakatamaṃ. Dutiyaṃ vijjuyā niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsitakālo viya
analyzed: dutiyam vijjuyā niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsita kālaḥ

original: sakadāgāmimaggobhāsena uppajjitvā saccacchādakatamassa vinoditakālo. Vigate andhakāre
analyzed: sakadāgāmi maggo bhāsena uppajjitvā saccacchādakatamassa vinodita kālaḥ vigate andhakāre

original: maggassa pākaṭakālo viya sakadāgāmimaggassa catunnaṃ saccānaṃ pākaṭakālo. Maggassa
analyzed: maggassa pākaṭa kālaḥ viya sakadāgāmi maggassa catunnam saccānam pākaṭa kālaḥ maggassa

original: pākaṭaṃ pana maggasamaṅgipuggalassa pākaṭameva. Tatiyagamanābhinīhāro viya anāgāmimaggatthāya
analyzed: pākaṭam pana magga samaṅgi puggalassa pākaṭam eva tatiya gamana abhinīhāraḥ viya anāgāmi magga tthāya

original: vipassanārambho. Andhakāre maggassa apaññāyanakālo viya saccacchādakatamaṃ. Tatiyaṃ
analyzed: vipassanā ārambhaḥ andhakāre maggassa a paññāyana kālaḥ viya saccacchādakatamam tatiyam

original: vijjuyā niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsitakālo viya anāgāmimaggobhāsena uppajjitvā
analyzed: vijjuyā niccharitvā andhakārassa viddhaṃsita kālaḥ viya anāgāmi magga ubhāsena uppajjitvā

original: saccacchādakatamassa vinoditakālo. Vigate andhakāre maggassa pākaṭakālo viya anāgāmimaggassa
analyzed: saccacchādakatamassa vinodita kālaḥ vigate andhakāre maggassa pākaṭa kālaḥ viya anāgāmi maggassa

original: catunnaṃ saccānaṃ pākaṭakālo. Maggassa pākaṭaṃ pana maggasamaṅgipuggalassa pākaṭameva.
analyzed: catunnam saccānam pākaṭa kālaḥ maggassa pākaṭam pana magga samaṅgi puggalassa pākaṭam eva

original: Vajirassa pana pāsāṇo vā maṇi vā abhejjo nāma natthi. Yattha patati taṃ vinividdhameva
analyzed: vajirassa pana pāsāṇaḥ vā maṇi vā abhejjaḥ nāma natthi yattha patati tam vinividdham eva

original: hoti. Vajiraṃ khepentaṃ asesetvā khepeti. Vajirena gatamaggo nāma puna pākatiko na
analyzed: hoti vajiram khepentam a sesetvā khepeti vajirena gata maggaḥ nāma puna pākatikaḥ na

original: hoti. Evameva arahattamaggassa avajjhakileso nāma natthi. Sabbakilese vinivijjhati
analyzed: hoti evam eva arahatta maggassa avajjha kileso nāma natthi sabba kilese vinivijjhati

original: vajiraṃ viya. Arahattamaggopi kilese khepento asesetvā khepeti. Vajirena gatamaggassa
analyzed: vajiram viya arahatta maggaḥ api kilese khepentaḥ a sesetvā khepeti vajirena gata maggassa

original: puna pākatikattābhāvo viya arahattamaggena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna paccudāvattanaṃ nāma natthīti.
analyzed: puna pākatika ttā abhāvaḥ viya arahatta maggena pahīna kilesānam puna paccudāvattanam nāma natthi iti

original: 1307. Bāladukaniddese bālesu ahirikānottappāni pākaṭāni, mūlāni ca sesānaṃ bāladhammānaṃ.
analyzed: bāla duka niddese bālesu ahirika anottappāni pākaṭāni mūlāni ca sesānam bāla dhammānam

original: Ahiriko hi anottappī ca na kiñci akusalaṃ na karoti nāmāti. Etāni dve paṭhamaṃyeva
analyzed: ahirikaḥ hi anottappī ca na kiñci akusalam na karoti nāma ati etāni dve

original: visuṃ vuttāni. Sukkapakkhepi ayameva nayo. Tathā kaṇhaduke.
analyzed: visum vuttāni sukka pakkhe pi ayam eva nayaḥ tathā kaṇha duke

original: 1311. Tapanīyadukaniddese katattā ca akatattā ca tapanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Kāyaduccaritādīni
analyzed: tapanīya duka niddese kata ttā ca a kata ttā ca tapanam veditabbam kāya duccarita ādīni

original: hi katattā tapanti, kāyasucaritādīni akatattā. Tathā hi puggalo ‘kataṃ me kāyaduccarita’nti
analyzed: hi kata ttā tapanti kāya su carita ādīni a kata ttā tathā hi puggalaḥ katam me kāya duccaritan ti

original: tappati, ‘akataṃ me kāyasucarita’nti tappati. ‘Kataṃ me vacīduccarita’nti tappati…pe…
analyzed: tappati a katam me tappati katam me tappati pe

original: ‘akataṃ me manosucarita’nti tappati. Atapanīyepi eseva nayo. Kalyāṇakārī hi puggalo
analyzed: a katam me manaḥ su caritam ti tappati a tapanīye pi eṣa iva nayaḥ kalyāṇa kārī hi puggalaḥ

original: ‘kataṃ me kāyasucarita’nti na tappati, ‘akataṃ me kāyaduccarita’nti na tappati…pe…
analyzed: katam me kāya su caritanti na tappati a katam me kāya duccaritanti na tappati pe

original: ‘akataṃ me manoduccarita’nti na tappatīti.
analyzed: a katam me manaḥ uduccaritam ti na tappati iti

original: 1313. Adhivacanadukaniddese yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānanti sabbadhammaggahaṇaṃ. Saṅkhāyatīti
analyzed: adhivacana duka niddese yā tesam tesam dhammānam ti sabba dhamma ggahaṇam saṅkhāyati iti

original: saṅkhā, saṃkathiyatīti attho. Kinti saṃkathiyati? Ahanti mamanti paroti parassāti
analyzed: saṅkhā saṃkathiyati iti attho kinti saṃkathiyati ahanti mamanti parassa ati

original: sattoti bhāvoti posoti puggaloti naroti māṇavoti tissoti dattoti, ‘mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi
analyzed: satto ti bhāvo ti poso ti puggalo ti naro ti māṇavo ti tisso ti datto ti mañcaḥ pīṭham bhisi

original: bimbohanaṃ’ ‘vihāro pariveṇaṃ dvāraṃ vātapāna’nti evaṃ anekehi ākārehi saṃkathiyatīti
analyzed: bimbohanam vihāraḥ pariveṇam dvāram evam anekehi ākārehi saṃkathiyati iti

original: ‘saṅkhā’. Samaññāyatīti samaññā. Kinti samaññāyati? ‘Ahanti…pe… vātapāna’nti samaññāyatīti
analyzed: saṅkhā samaññāyati iti samaññā kinti samaññāyati ahantipe vāta pānanti samaññāyati iti

original: ‘samaññā’. Paññāpiyatīti paññatti. Vohariyatīti vohāro. Kinti vohariyati? ‘Aha’nti…pe…
analyzed: samaññā paññāpiyati iti paññatti vohariyati iti vohāro kinti vohariyati

original: ‘vātapāna’nti vohariyatīti vohāro.
analyzed: vohāro

original: Nāmanti catubbidhaṃ nāmaṃ – sāmaññanāmaṃ guṇanāmaṃ kittimanāmaṃ opapātikanāmanti.
analyzed: nāmanti catubbidham nāmam sāmañña nāmam guṇa nāmam kittima nāmam opapātika nāmanti

original: Tattha paṭhamakappikesu mahājanena sammannitvā ṭhapitattā mahāsammatoti rañño nāmaṃ
analyzed: tattha paṭhama kappikesu mahājanena sammannitvā ṭhapita ttā mahāsammato ti raññaḥ nāmam

original: ‘sāmaññanāmaṃ’ nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “mahājanasammatoti kho, vāseṭṭha, mahāsammato
analyzed: sāmañña nāmam nāma yam sandhāya vuttam mahā jana sammataḥ iti kho vāseṭṭha mahā sammataḥ

original: tveva paṭhamaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti. Dhammakathiko paṃsukūliko vinayadharo tepiṭako
analyzed: tu eva paṭhamam akkharam upanibbattanti dhamma kathiko paṃsukūlikaḥ vinaya dharo tepiṭako

original: saddho pasannoti evarūpaṃ guṇato āgatanāmaṃ ‘guṇanāmaṃ’ nāma. Bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddhotiādīnipi
analyzed: saddhaḥ pasannaḥ ti evarūpam guṇataḥ āgata nāmam guṇa nāmam nāma bhagavā araham sammāsambuddha iti ādīni pi

original: tathāgatassa anekāni nāmasatāni guṇanāmāneva. Tena vuttaṃ –
analyzed: tathāgatassa anekāni nāma satāni guṇa nāmāni iva tena vuttam

original: “Asaṅkhyeyyāni nāmāni, saguṇena mahesino;
analyzed: asaṅkhyeyyāni nāmāni saguṇena mahesino

original: Guṇena nāmamuddheyyaṃ, api nāmasahassato”ti.
analyzed: guṇena nāmam uddheyyam api

original: Yaṃ pana jātassa kumārakassa nāmaggahaṇadivase dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ sakkāraṃ katvā samīpe
analyzed: yam pana jātassa kumārakassa nāma ggahaṇa divase dakkhiṇeyyānam sakkāram katvā samīpe

original: ṭhitā ñātakā kappetvā pakappetvā ‘ayaṃ asukonāmā’ti nāmaṃ karonti, idaṃ ‘kittimanāma’
analyzed: ṭhitāḥ ñātakā kappetvā pakappetvā ayam asukaḥ nāmā ati nāmam karonti idam kittima nāma

original: nāma. Yā pana purimapaññatti pacchimapaññattiyaṃ patati, purimavohāro pacchimavohāre
analyzed: nāma yā pana purima paññatti pacchima paññattiyam patati purima vohāraḥ pacchima vohāre

original: patati, seyyathidaṃ – purimakappepi cando candoyeva nāma, etarahipi candova. Atīte
analyzed: patati sā iyyathidam purima kappe pi cando candoyā iva nāma etarahi pi atīte

original: sūriyo… samuddo… pathavī… pabbato pabbatoyeva, nāma, etarahipi pabbatoyevāti idaṃ
analyzed: sūriyaḥ samuddaḥ pathavī pabbataḥ pabbataḥ yā iva nāma etarahi pi pabbataḥ yā iva ati idam

original: ‘opapātikanāmaṃ’ nāma. Idaṃ catubbidhampi nāmaṃ ettha nāmameva hoti.
analyzed: opapātika nāmam nāma idam catubbidham pi nāmam ettha nāmam eva hoti

original: Nāmakammanti nāmakaraṇaṃ. Nāmadheyyanti nāmaṭṭhapanaṃ. Niruttīti nāmanirutti. Byañjananti
analyzed: nāmakammanti nāmakaraṇam nāmadheyyanti nāmaṭṭhapanam nirutti iti nāma nirutti byañjananti

original: nāmabyañjanaṃ. Yasmā panetaṃ atthaṃ byañjeti tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Abhilāpoti nāmābhilāpova.
analyzed: nāma byañjanam pana itam attham byañjeti tasmai evam vuttam abhilāpo ti nāma abhilāpaḥ uva

original: Sabbeva dhammā adhivacanapathāti adhivacanassa nopathadhammo nāma natthi. Ekadhammo
analyzed: sabbe eva dhammā adhivacana pathā ati adhivacanassa no patha dhammo nāma natthi eka dhammo

original: sabbadhammesu nipatati, sabbadhammā ekadhammasmiṃ nipatanti. Kathaṃ? Ayañhi nāmapaññatti
analyzed: sabba dhammesu nipatati sabba dhammāḥ eka dhammasmin nipatanti katham ayam hi nāmapaññatti

original: ekadhammo, so sabbesu catubhūmakadhammesu nipatati. Sattopi saṅkhāropi nāmato muttako nāma natthi.
analyzed: eka dhammo so sabbesu catu bhūmaka dhammesu nipatati sattaḥ api saṅkhāraḥ api nāmataḥ muttakaḥ nāma natthi

original: Aṭavīpabbatādīsu rukkhopi jānapadānaṃ bhāro. Te hi ‘ayaṃ kiṃ rukkho nāmā’ti puṭṭhā
analyzed: aṭavī pabbata ādīsu rukkhaḥ api jānapadānam bhāraḥ te hi ayam kim rukkhaḥ nāma ati puṭṭhāḥ

original: ‘khadiro’ ‘palāso’ti attanā jānanakanāmaṃ kathenti. Yassa nāmaṃ na jānanti tampi
analyzed: khadiro palāsaḥ iti attanā jānanaka nāmam kathenti yassa nāmam na jānanti tam pi

original: ‘anāmako’ nāmāti vadanti. Tampi tassa nāmadheyyameva hutvā tiṭṭhati. Samudde macchakacchapādīsupi
analyzed: anāmakaḥ nāma ati vadanti tam pi tassa nāmadheyyam eva hutvā tiṭṭhati samudde maccha kacchapa ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Itare dve dukā iminā samānatthā eva.
analyzed: itare dve dukā iminā samānatthāḥ eva

original: 1316. Nāmarūpaduke nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena ca namanaṭṭhena ca nāmanaṭṭhena ca nāmaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: nāma rūpa duke nāma karaṇa ṭṭhena ca namana ṭṭhena ca nāmana ṭṭhena ca nāmam tattha

original: cattāro khandhā tāva nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena ‘nāmaṃ’. Yathā hi mahājanasammatattā mahāsammatassa
analyzed: cattāro khandhāḥ tāva nāma karaṇa ṭṭhena nāmam yathā hi mahā jana sammata ttā mahāsammatassa

original: mahāsammatoti nāmaṃ ahosi, yathā vā mātāpitaro ‘ayaṃ tisso nāma hotu, phusso nāma
analyzed: mahāsammato ti nāmam ahosi yathā vā mātā pitaraḥ ayam tissaḥ nāma hotu phussaḥ nāma

original: hotū’ti evaṃ puttassa kittimanāmaṃ karonti, yathā vā ‘dhammakathiko’ ‘vinayadharo’ti
analyzed: hotu uti evam puttassa kittima nāmam karonti yathā vā dhamma kathikaḥ vinaya dharaḥ ti

original: guṇato nāmaṃ āgacchati, na evaṃ vedanādīnaṃ. Vedanādayo hi mahāpathavīādayo viya
analyzed: guṇataḥ nāma āgacchati na evam vedanā dīnam vedanā ādayaḥ hi mahā pathavī ādayaḥ

original: attano nāmaṃ karontāva uppajjanti. Tesu uppannesu tesaṃ nāmaṃ uppannameva hoti. Na
analyzed: attanaḥ nāmam karontā ava uppajjanti tesu uppannesu tesam nāmam uppannam eva hoti na

original: hi vedanaṃ uppannaṃ ‘tvaṃ vedanā nāma hohī’ti koci bhaṇati. Na ca tassā nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ
analyzed: hi vedanam uppannam tvam vedanā nāma hohi iti koci bhaṇati na ca tassāḥ nāma ggahaṇa kiccam

original: atthi. Yathā pathaviyā uppannāya ‘tvaṃ pathavī nāma hohī’ti nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi,
analyzed: atthi yathā pathaviyai uppannāya tvam pathavī nāma hohi iti nāma ggahaṇa kiccam natthi

original: cakkavāḷasinerucandimasūriyanakkhattesu uppannesu ‘tvaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ nāma hohi tvaṃ
analyzed: cakkavāḷa sineru candima sūriya nakkhattesu uppannesu tvam cakkavāḷam nāma hohi tvam

original: nakkhattaṃ nāma hohī’ti nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi, nāmaṃ uppannameva hoti, opapātikapaññattiyaṃ
analyzed: nakkhattam nāma hohi iti nāma ggahaṇa kiccam natthi nāmam uppannam eva hoti opapātika paññattiyam

original: nipatati, evaṃ vedanāya uppannāya ‘tvaṃ vedanā nāma hohī’ti nāmaggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi.
analyzed: nipatati evam vedanāya uppannāya tvam vedanā nāma hohi iti nāma ggahaṇa kiccam natthi

original: Tāya uppannāya vedanāti nāmaṃ uppannameva hoti. Opapātikapaññattiyaṃ nipatati. Saññādīsupi
analyzed: tāya uppannāya vedanā ati nāmam uppannam eva hoti opapātika paññattiyam nipatati saññā ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Atītepi hi vedanā vedanāyeva, saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ viññāṇameva.
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ atīte pi hi vedanā vedanāya iva saññā saṅkhārāḥ viññāṇam viññāṇam eva

original: Anāgatepi, paccuppannepi. Nibbānaṃ pana sadāpi nibbānamevāti. ‘Nāmakaraṇaṭṭhena’ nāmaṃ.
analyzed: anāgate pi paccuppanne pi nibbānam pana sadā api nibbānam eva ati nāma karaṇa ṭṭhena nāmam

original: ‘Namanaṭṭhenā’pi cettha cattāro khandhā nāmaṃ. Te hi ārammaṇābhimukhā namanti. ‘Nāmanaṭṭhena’
analyzed: namana ṭṭhena api ca ittha cattāro khandhāḥ nāmam te hi ārammaṇa abhimukhāḥ namanti nāmana ṭṭhena

original: sabbampi nāmaṃ. Cattāro hi khandhā ārammaṇe aññamaññaṃ nāmenti. Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇādhipatipaccayatāya
analyzed: sabbam pi nāmam cattāraḥ hi khandhāḥ ārammaṇe aññamaññam nāmenti nibbānam ārammaṇa adhipati paccaya tāya

original: attani anavajjadhamme nāmeti.
analyzed: attani anavajja dhamme nāma iti

original: 1318. Avijjābhavataṇhā vaṭṭamūlasamudācāradassanatthaṃ gahitā.
analyzed: avijjā bhava taṇhā vaṭṭa mūla samudācāra dassana attham gahitā

original: 1320. Bhavissati attā ca loko cāti khandhapañcakaṃ attā ca loko cāti gahetvā ‘taṃ
analyzed: bhavissati attā ca loko ca ati khandha pañcakam attā ca loko ca ati gahetvā tam

original: bhavissatī’ti gahaṇākārena niviṭṭhā sassatadiṭṭhi. Dutiyā ‘na bhavissatī’ti ākārena
analyzed: bhavissati iti gahaṇa ākārena niviṭṭhā sassata diṭṭhi dutiyā na bhavissati iti ākārena

original: niviṭṭhā ucchedadiṭṭhi.
analyzed: niviṭṭhā uccheda diṭṭhi

original: 1326. Pubbantaṃ ārabbhāti atītakoṭṭhāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā. Iminā brahmajāle āgatā
analyzed: pubbantam ārabbhāti atīta koṭṭhāsam ārammaṇam karitvā iminā brahmajāle āgatā

original: aṭṭhārasa pubbantānudiṭṭhiyo gahitā. Aparantaṃ ārabbhāti anāgatakoṭṭhāsaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa pubbanta anudiṭṭhiyaḥ gahitāḥ aparantam ārabbhāti anāgata koṭṭhāsam ārammaṇam

original: karitvā. Iminā tattheva āgatā catucattālīsa aparantānudiṭṭhiyo gahitā.
analyzed: karitvā iminā tattha iva āgatā catucattālīsa gahitā

original: 1332. Dovacassatāniddese sahadhammike vuccamāneti sahadhammikaṃ nāma yaṃ bhagavatā
analyzed: dovacassatā niddese sahadhammike vuccamāne iti sahadhammikam nāma yam bhagavatā

original: paññattaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ, tasmiṃ vatthuṃ dassetvā āpattiṃ āropetvā ‘idaṃ nāma tvaṃ āpattiṃ
analyzed: paññattam sikkhāpadam tasmim vatthum dassetvā āpattim āropetvā idam nāma tvam āpattim

original: āpanno, iṅgha desehi vuṭṭhāhi paṭikarohī’ti vuccamāne. Dovacassāyantiādīsu evaṃ codiyamānassa
analyzed: āpannaḥ desehi vuṭṭhāhi paṭikarohi iti vuccamāne evam codiyamānassa

original: paṭicodanāya vā appadakkhiṇagāhitāya vā dubbacassa kammaṃ dovacassāyaṃ. Tadeva dovacassantipi
analyzed: paṭicodanāya vā appadakkhiṇa gāhitāya vā dubbacassa kammam dovacassa ayam tat eva dovacassa antipi

original: vuccati. Tassa bhāvo dovacassiyaṃ. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Vippaṭikūlagāhitāti
analyzed: vuccati tassa bhāvaḥ dovacassiyam itaram tassa iva vevacanam vippaṭikūla gāhitā ati

original: vilomagāhitā. Vilomagahaṇasaṅkhātena vipaccanīkena sātaṃ assāti vipaccanīkasāto.
analyzed: viloma gāhitā viloma gahaṇa saṅkhātena vipaccanīkena sātam assāti vipaccanīka sātaḥ

original: ‘Paṭāṇikagahaṇaṃ gahetvā ekapadeneva taṃ nissaddamakāsi’nti sukhaṃ paṭilabhantassetaṃ
analyzed: paṭāṇika gahaṇam gahetvā eka padena iva tam nissaddam akāsinti sukham paṭilabhantassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Tassa bhāvo vipaccanīkasātatā. Ovādaṃ anādiyanavasena anādarassa bhāvo
analyzed: adhivacanam tassa bhāvaḥ vipaccanīka sāta tā ovādam anādiyana vasena anādarassa bhāvaḥ

original: anādariyaṃ. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Anādiyanākāro vā anādaratā. Garuvāsaṃ avasanavasena
analyzed: itaram tassa iva vevacanam vā an ādara tā a vasana vasena

original: uppanno agāravabhāvo agāravatā. Sajeṭṭhakavāsaṃ avasanavasena uppanno appaṭissavabhāvo
analyzed: uppannaḥ agārava bhāvaḥ agāravatā sa jeṭṭhaka vāsam a vasana vasena uppannaḥ appaṭissava bhāvaḥ

original: appaṭissavatā. Ayaṃ vuccatīti ayaṃ evarūpā dovacassatā nāma vuccati. Atthato panesā
analyzed: appaṭissava tā ayam vuccati iti ayam evarūpā dovacassatā nāma vuccati atthato pana esā

original: tenākārena pavattā cattāro khandhā, saṅkhārakkhandhoyeva vāti. Pāpamittatādīsupi
analyzed: tena ākārena pavattā cattāraḥ khandhā saṅkhāra kkhandhaḥ yā iva vāti

original: eseva nayo. Dovacassatā pāpamittatādayo hi visuṃ cetasikadhammā nāma natthi.
analyzed: esā iva nayaḥ dovacassatā pāpamittatā ādayaḥ hi visum cetasika dhammāḥ nāma natthi

original: 1333. Natthi etesaṃ saddhāti assaddhā; buddhādīni vatthūni na saddahantīti attho.
analyzed: na atthi etesam saddhā ati assaddhāḥ buddha ādīni vatthūni na saddahanti iti attho

original: Dussīlāti sīlassa dunnāmaṃ natthi, nissīlāti attho. Appassutāti sutarahitā. Pañca
analyzed: dussīlā ati sīlassa dunnāmam natthi nissīlā ati attho appassutā ati suta rahitā pañca

original: macchariyāni etesaṃ atthīti maccharino. Duppaññāti nippaññā. Sevanakavasena sevanā.
analyzed: macchariyāni etesam atthi iti maccharinaḥ duppaññā ati nippaññā sevanaka vasena sevanā

original: Balavasevanā nisevanā. Sabbatobhāgena sevanā saṃsevanā. Upasaggavasena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
analyzed: balava sevanā nisevanā sabbatobhāgena sevanā saṃsevanā upasagga vasena vā padam vaḍḍhitam

original: Tīhipi sevanāva kathitā. Bhajanāti upasaṅkamanā. Sambhajanāti sabbatobhāgena bhajanā.
analyzed: kathitā bhajanā ati upasaṅkamanā sambhajanā ati sabbatobhāgena bhajanā

original: Upasaggavasena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Bhattīti daḷhabhatti. Sambhattīti sabbatobhāgena
analyzed: upasagga vasena vā padam vaḍḍhitam bhatti iti daḷhabhatti sambhatti iti sabbatobhāgena

original: bhatti. Upasaggavasena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Dvīhipi daḷhabhatti eva kathitā. Taṃsampavaṅkatāti
analyzed: upasagga vasena vā padam vaḍḍhitam eva kathitā

original: tesu puggalesu kāyena ceva cittena ca sampavaṅkabhāvo; tanninnatā tappoṇatā tappabbhāratāti attho.
analyzed: tesu puggalesu kāyena ca iva cittena ca sampavaṅka bhāvaḥ tad ninna tā tad poṇa tā tad pabbhāra tā ati attho

original: 1334. Sovacassatādukaniddesopi vuttapaṭipakkhanayena veditabbo.
1336. Pañcapi āpattikkhandhāti mātikāniddesena ‘pārājikaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ pācittiyaṃ
analyzed: pañca api āpatti khandhā ti mātikā niddesena pārājikam saṅgha ādisesam pācittiyam

original: pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭa’nti imā pañca āpattiyo. Sattapi āpattikkhandhāti vinayaniddesena
analyzed: pāṭidesanīyam dukkaṭanti imāḥ pañca āpattiyaḥ vinaya niddesena

original: ‘pārājikaṃ saṅghādisesaṃ thullaccayaṃ pācittiyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ dukkaṭaṃ dubbhāsita’nti
analyzed: pārājikam saṅgha ādisesam thullaccayam pācittiyam pāṭidesanīyam dukkaṭam dubbhāsitanti

original: imā satta āpattiyo. Tattha saha vatthunā tāsaṃ āpattīnaṃ paricchedajānanakapaññā
analyzed: imāḥ satta āpattiyaḥ tattha saha vatthunā tāsam āpattīnam pariccheda jānanaka paññā

original: āpattikusalatā nāma. Saha kammavācāya āpattivuṭṭhānaparicchedajānanakapaññā pana
analyzed: āpatti kusala tā nāma saha kamma vācāya āpatti vuṭṭhāna pariccheda jānanaka paññā pana

original: āpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā nāma.
analyzed: āpatti vuṭṭhāna kusala tā nāma

original: 1338. Samāpajjitabbato samāpatti. Saha parikammena appanāparicchedajānanakapaññā
analyzed: samāpajjitabbataḥ samāpatti saha parikammena appanā pariccheda jānanaka paññā

original: pana samāpattikusalatā nāma. ‘Cande vā sūriye vā nakkhatte vā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate
analyzed: pana samāpatti kusala tā nāma cande vā sūriye vā nakkhatte vā ettakam ṭhānam gate

original: vuṭṭhahissāmī’ti avirajjhitvā tasmiṃyeva samaye vuṭṭhānakapaññāya atthitāya samāpattivuṭṭhānakusalatā nāma.
analyzed: vuṭṭhahissāmi iti a virajjhitvā tasmin yeva samaye vuṭṭhānaka paññāya atthitāya samāpatti vuṭṭhāna kusala tā nāma

original: 1340. Aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ uggahamanasikārasavanadhāraṇaparicchedajānanakapaññā dhātukusalatā nāma. Tāsaṃyeva uggahamanasikārajānanakapaññā manasikārakusalatā nāma.
analyzed: dhātūnam uggaha manasikāra savana dhāraṇa pariccheda jānanaka paññā dhātu kusala tā nāma tāsam yeva uggaha manasikāra jānanaka paññā manasikāra kusala tā nāma

original: 1342. Dvādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ uggahamanasikārasavanadhāraṇaparicchedajānanakapaññā
analyzed: āyatanānam uggaha manasikāra savana dhāraṇa pariccheda jānanaka paññā

original: latā nāma. Tīsupi vā etāsu kusalatāsu uggaho manasikāro savanaṃ sammasanaṃ paṭivedho
analyzed: latā nāma tīsu pi vā etāsu kusala tāsu uggahaḥ manasikāraḥ savanam sammasanam paṭivedho

original: paccavekkhaṇāti sabbaṃ vaṭṭati. Tattha savanauggahapaccavekkhaṇā lokiyā, paṭivedho
analyzed: paccavekkhaṇā ti sabbam vaṭṭati tattha savana oggaha paccavekkhaṇā lokiyā paṭivedhaḥ

original: lokuttaro. Sammasanamanasikārā lokiyalokuttaramissakā. ‘Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’tiādīni
analyzed: lokuttaraḥ sammasana manasikārāḥ lokiya lokuttara missakāḥ avijjā paccayā saṅkhāra ati ādīni

original: paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge āvibhavissanti. ‘Iminā pana paccayena idaṃ hotī’ti jānanakapaññā
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppāda vibhaṅge āvibhavissanti iminā pana paccayena idam hoti iti jānanaka paññā

original: paṭiccasamuppādakusalatā nāma.
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppāda kusala tā nāma

original: 1344. Ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalatādukaniddese hetū paccayāti ubhayampetaṃ aññamaññavevacanaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhāna aṭṭhāna kusala tā duka niddese hetū paccayā ati ubhayam petam aññamañña vevacanam

original: Cakkhupasādo hi rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjanakassa cakkhuviññāṇassa hetu ceva paccayo
analyzed: cakkhu pasādaḥ hi rūpam ārammaṇam katvā uppajjanakassa cakkhu viññāṇassa hetu ca iva paccayo

original: ca. Tathā sotapasādādayo sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ, ambabījādīni ca ambaphalādīnaṃ. Dutiyanaye
analyzed: ca tathā sota pasāda ādayo sota viññāṇa ādīnam amba bīja ādīni ca amba phala ādīnam dutiya naye

original: ye ye dhammāti visabhāgapaccayadhammānaṃ nidassanaṃ. Yesaṃ yesanti visabhāgapaccayasamuppannadhammanidassanaṃ.
analyzed: ye ye dhammā ati visabhāga paccaya dhammānam nidassanam yesam yesam ti visabhāga paccaya samuppanna dhamma nidassanam

original: Na hetū na paccayāti cakkhupasādo saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjanakassa sotaviññāṇassa
analyzed: na hetū na paccayā ati cakkhu pasādaḥ saddam ārammaṇam katvā uppajjanakassa sota viññāṇassa

original: na hetu na paccayo. Tathā sotapasādādayo avasesaviññāṇādīnaṃ. Ambādayo ca tālādīnaṃ
analyzed: na hetu na paccayo tathā sota pasāda ādayo avasesa viññāṇa ādīnam amba ādayo ca tāla ādīnam

original: uppattiyāti evamattho veditabbo.
analyzed: uppattiyā ti evamatthaḥ veditabbo

original: 1346. Ajjavamaddavaniddese nīcacittatāti padamattameva viseso. Tassattho – mānābhāvena
nīcaṃ cittaṃ assāti nīcacitto. Nīcacittassa bhāvo nīcacittatā. Sesaṃ cittujukatācittamudutānaṃ
analyzed: nīcam cittam assa ati nīca cittaḥ nīca cittassa bhāvaḥ nīca citta tā sesam

original: padabhājanīye āgatameva.
analyzed: padabhājanīye āgatam eva

original: 1348. Khantiniddese khamanakavasena khanti. Khamanākāro khamanatā. Adhivāsenti etāya,
analyzed: khanti niddese khamanaka vasena khanti khamana ākāraḥ khamana tā adhivāsenti etāya

original: attano upari āropetvā vāsenti, na paṭibāhanti, na paccanīkatāya tiṭṭhantīti adhivāsanatā.
analyzed: attanaḥ upari āropetvā vāsenti na paṭibāhanti na paccanīka tāya tiṭṭhanti iti adhivāsana tā

original: Acaṇḍikassa bhāvo acaṇḍikkaṃ. Anasuropoti asuropo vuccati na sammāropitattā duruttavacanaṃ.
analyzed: acaṇḍikassa bhāvaḥ acaṇḍikkam anasuropaḥ iti asuropaḥ vuccati na sammā āropita ttā durutta vacanam

original: Tappaṭipakkhato anasuropo suruttavācāti attho. Evamettha phalūpacārena kāraṇaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: tad paṭipakkhato an asuropaḥ surutta vācā iti attho evam ettha phala upacārena kāraṇam niddiṭṭham

original: Attamanatā cittassāti somanassavasena cittassa sakamanatā, attano cittasabhāvoyeva,
analyzed: attamana tā cittassa ati somanassa vasena cittassa sa kamana tā

original: na byāpannacittatāti attho.
analyzed: na byāpanna citta tā ati attho

original: 1349. Soraccaniddese kāyiko avītikkamoti tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ. Vācasiko avītikkamoti
analyzed: soracca niddese kāyikaḥ avītikkamo ti tividham kāya su caritam vācasikaḥ avītikkamo ti

original: catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ. Kāyikavācasikoti iminā kāyavacīdvārasamuṭṭhitaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ
analyzed: catubbidham vacī su caritam iminā kāya vacī dvāra samuṭṭhitam ājīva ṭhamaka sīlam

original: pariyādiyati. Idaṃ vuccati soraccanti idaṃ pāpato suṭṭhu oratattā soraccaṃ nāma vuccati.
analyzed: idam vuccati soraccanti idam pāpato suṭṭhu oratattā soraccam nāma vuccati

original: Sabbopi sīlasaṃvaroti idaṃ yasmā na kevalaṃ kāyavācāheva anācāraṃ ācarati manasāpi
analyzed: idam yasmai na kevalam anācāram ācarati manasā api

original: ācarati eva, tasmā mānasikasīlaṃ pariyādāya dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ācarati eva tasmai mānasika sīlam pariyādāya dassetum vuttam

original: 1350. Sākhalyaniddese aṇḍakāti yathā sadose rukkhe aṇḍakāni uṭṭhahanti, evaṃ sadosatāya
analyzed: sākhalya niddese aṇḍakā ti yathā sa dose rukkhe aṇḍakāni uṭṭhahanti evam sa dosa tāya

original: khuṃsanavambhanādivacanehi aṇḍakā jātā. Kakkasāti pūtikā sā yathā nāma pūtirukkho
analyzed: khuṃsana vambhana ādi vacanehi aṇḍakā jātā kakkasāti pūtikā sā yathā nāma pūti rukkhaḥ

original: kakkaso hoti paggharitacuṇṇo evaṃ kakkasā hoti. Sotaṃ ghaṃsayamānā viya pavisati.
analyzed: kakkasaḥ hoti paggharita cuṇṇaḥ evam kakkasā hoti sotam ghaṃsayamānā viya pavisati

original: Tena vuttaṃ ‘kakkasā’ti. Parakaṭukāti paresaṃ kaṭukā amanāpā dosajananī. Parābhisajjanīti
analyzed: tena vuttam kakkasā ati para kaṭukā ati paresam kaṭukā amanāpā dosa jananī para abhisajjanī iti

original: kuṭilakaṇṭakasākhā viya cammesu vijjhitvā paresaṃ abhisajjanī, gantukāmānampi gantuṃ
analyzed: kuṭila kaṇṭaka sākhāḥ viya cammesu vijjhitvā paresam abhisajjanī gantu kāmānam pi gantum

original: adatvā lagganakārī. Kodhasāmantāti kodhassa āsannā. Asamādhisaṃvattanikāti appanāsamādhissa
analyzed: a datvā laggana kārī kodha sāmantā ati kodhassa āsannā asamādhi saṃvattanikā ati appanā samādhissa

original: vā upacārasamādhissa vā asaṃvattanikā. Iti sabbānevetāni sadosavācāya vevacanāni.
analyzed: vā upacāra samādhissa vā asaṃvattanikā iti sabbān eva etāni sa dosa vācāya vevacanāni

original: Tathārūpiṃ vācaṃ pahāyāti idaṃ pharusavācaṃ appajahitvā ṭhitassa antarantare pavattāpi
analyzed: tathārūpim vācam pahāya ati idam pharusa vācam appajahitvā ṭhitassa antarantare pavattā api

original: saṇhavācā asaṇhavācā eva nāmāti dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: saṇha vācā asaṇha vācā eva nāma ati dīpana attham vuttam

original: Neḷāti eḷaṃ vuccati doso. Nāssā eḷanti neḷā; niddosāti attho. “Neḷaṅgo setapacchādo”ti
analyzed: neḷā ati eḷam vuccati dosaḥ na assā eḷanti neḷā niddosā ati attho neḷaṅgo seta pacchādo ti

original: ettha vuttaneḷaṃ viya. Kaṇṇasukhāti byañjanamadhuratāya kaṇṇānaṃ sukhā, sūcivijjhanaṃ
analyzed: ettha vutta neḷam viya byañjana madhura tāya kaṇṇānam sukhā

original: viya kaṇṇasūlaṃ na janeti. Atthamadhuratāya sarīre kopaṃ ajanetvā pemaṃ janetīti
analyzed: viya kaṇṇa sūlam na janeti attha madhura tāya sarīre kopam a janetvā pa imam janeti iti

original: pemanīyā. Hadayaṃ gacchati, appaṭihaññamānā sukhena cittaṃ pavisatīti hadayaṅgamā.
analyzed: pemanīyā hadayam gacchati a paṭihaññamānā sukhena cittam pavisati iti hadayaṅgamā

original: Guṇaparipuṇṇatāya pure bhavāti porī. Pure saṃvaḍḍhanārī viya sukumārātipi porī. Purassa
analyzed: guṇa paripuṇṇa tāya pure bhavāti porī pure porī purassa

original: esātipi porī; nagaravāsīnaṃ kathāti attho. Nagaravāsino hi yuttakathā honti. Pitimattaṃ
analyzed: porī nagara vāsīnam kathā ati atthaḥ nagara vāsinaḥ hi yutta kathāḥ honti

original: pitāti bhātimattaṃ bhātāti vadanti. Evarūpī kathā bahuno janassa kantā hotīti bahujanakantā.
analyzed: pitā ati bhātimattam bhātā ati vadanti evarūpī kathā bahunaḥ janassa kantā hoti iti bahu jana kantā

original: Kantabhāveneva bahuno janassa manāpā cittavuḍḍhikarāti bahujanamanāpā. Yā tatthāti
analyzed: kanta bhāvena iva bahunaḥ janassa manāpā citta vuḍḍhi karā ati bahu jana manāpā yā tattha ati

original: yā tasmiṃ puggale. Saṇhavācatāti maṭṭhavācatā. Sakhilavācatāti muduvācatā. Apharusavācatāti akakkhaḷavācatā.
analyzed: yā tasmin puggale saṇha vāca tā ati maṭṭha vāca tā sa khila vāca tā ati mudu vāca tā a pharusa vāca tā ati a kakkhaḷa vāca tā

original: 1351. Paṭisanthāraniddese āmisapaṭisanthāroti āmisaalābhena attanā saha paresaṃ chiddaṃ
analyzed: paṭisanthāra niddese āmisa paṭisanthāro ti āmisa alābhena attanā saha paresam chiddam

original: yathā pihitaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ evaṃ āmisena paṭisantharaṇaṃ. Dhammapaṭisanthāroti
analyzed: yathā pihitam hoti paṭicchannam evam āmisena paṭisantharaṇam dhamma paṭisanthāro ti

original: dhammassa appaṭilābhena attanā saha paresaṃ chiddaṃ yathā pihitaṃ hoti paṭicchannaṃ,
analyzed: dhammassa appaṭilābhena attanā saha paresam chiddam yathā pihitam hoti paṭicchannam

original: evaṃ dhammena paṭisantharaṇaṃ. Paṭisanthārako hotīti dveyeva hi lokasannivāsassa
analyzed: evam dhammena paṭisantharaṇam paṭisanthārakaḥ hoti iti dveyā iva hi loka sannivāsassa

original: chiddāni, tesaṃ paṭisanthārako hoti. Āmisapaṭisanthārena vā dhammapaṭisanthārena
analyzed: chiddāni tesam paṭisanthārakaḥ hoti āmisa paṭisanthārena vā dhamma paṭisanthārena

original: vāti iminā duvidhena paṭisanthārena paṭisanthārako hoti, paṭisantharati, nirantaraṃ karoti.
analyzed: vāti iminā duvidhena paṭisanthārena paṭisanthārakaḥ hoti paṭisantharati nirantaram karoti

original: Tatrāyaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya kathā – paṭisanthārakena hi bhikkhunā āgantukaṃ āgacchantaṃ
analyzed: tatra ayam āditaḥ paṭṭhāya kathā paṭisanthārakena hi bhikkhunā āgantukam āgacchantam

original: disvāva paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetabbaṃ, āsanaṃ dātabbaṃ, tālavaṇṭena bījitabbaṃ,
analyzed: disvā ava paccuggantvā patta cīvaram gahetabbam āsanam dātabbam tāla vaṇṭena bījitabbam

original: pādā dhovitvā makkhetabbā, sappiphāṇite sati bhesajjaṃ dātabbaṃ, pānīyena pucchitabbo,
analyzed: pādā dhovitvā makkhetabbā sappi phāṇite sati bhesajjam dātabbam pānīyena pucchitabbaḥ

original: āvāso paṭijaggitabbo. Evaṃ ekadesena āmisapaṭisanthāro kato nāma hoti.
analyzed: āvāsaḥ paṭijaggitabbo evam eka desena āmisa paṭisanthāraḥ kataḥ nāma hoti

original: Sāyaṃ pana navakatarepi attano upaṭṭhānaṃ anāgateyeva, tassa santikaṃ gantvā nisīditvā
analyzed: sāyam pana navakatare pi attanaḥ upaṭṭhānam tassa santikam gantvā nisīditvā

original: avisaye apucchitvā tassa visaye pañho pucchitabbo. ‘Tumhe katarabhāṇakā’ti apucchitvā

original: 1355. Bhojane mattaññutāniddese paṭisaṅkhā yoniso āhāraṃ āhāretīti paṭisaṅkhānapaññāya jānitvā upāyena āhāraṃ paribhuñjati. Idāni taṃ upāyaṃ dassetuṃ neva davāyātiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: bhojane mattaññu tā niddese paṭisaṅkhā yonisas āhāram āhāreti iti paṭisaṅkhāna paññāya jānitvā upāyena āhāram paribhuñjati idāni tam upāyam dassetum na iva davāya atiādi vuttaṃ

original: Tattha ‘neva davāyā’ti davatthāya na āhāreti. Tattha naṭalaṅghakādayo davatthāya

original: ñāṇaṃ phalasamaṅgissa ñāṇanti maggañāṇaphalañāṇāniyeva.

original: 1374. ‘Diṭṭhivisuddhi kho panā’tipadassa niddese yā paññā pajānanātiādīhi padehi heṭṭhā vuttāni kammassakataññāṇādīneva cattāri ñāṇāni vibhattāni.
analyzed: diṭṭhi visuddhi kho pana ati padassa niddese yā paññā pajānanā ati ādīhi padehi heṭṭhā vuttāni kammassa kata ñāṇa ādīnam eva cattāri ñāṇāni vibhattāni

original: 1375. ‘Yathādiṭṭhissa ca padhāna’nti padassa niddese yo cetasiko vīriyārambhotiādīhi
analyzed: yathā diṭṭhissa ca padhānanti padassa niddese yaḥ cetasikaḥ vīriya ārambha uti ādīhi

original: padehi niddiṭṭhaṃ vīriyaṃ paññāgatikameva; paññāya hi lokiyaṭṭhāne lokiyaṃ lokuttaraṭṭhāne
analyzed: padehi niddiṭṭham vīriyam paññāgatikam eva paññāya hi lokiya ṭṭhāne lokiyam lokuttara ṭṭhāne

original: lokuttaranti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: lokuttaram ti veditabbam

original: 1376. Saṃvegadukaniddese jātibhayanti jātiṃ bhayato disvā ṭhitañāṇaṃ. Jarāmaraṇabhayādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: saṃvega duka niddese jāti bhayanti jātim bhayataḥ disvā ṭhita ñāṇam jarā maraṇa bhaya ādīsu pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: 1377. Anuppannānaṃ pāpakānantiādīhi jātiādīni bhayato disvā jātijarābyādhimaraṇehi
analyzed: anuppannānam jāti ādīni bhayataḥ disvā jāti jarā byādhi maraṇehi

original: muccitukāmassa upāyapadhānaṃ kathitaṃ. Padabhājanīyassa panattho vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ āvi bhavissati.
analyzed: muccitu kāmassa upāya padhānam kathitam pada bhājanīyassa pana atthaḥ vibhaṅga ṭṭhakathāyam āvi bhavissati

original: 1378. ‘Asantuṭṭhitā ca kusalesu dhammesū’ti padaniddese bhiyyokamyatāti visesakāmatā.
analyzed: asantuṭṭhi tā ca kusalesu dhammesu iti pada niddese bhiyyokamyatā ati visesa kāma tā

original: Idhekacco hi āditova pakkhikabhattaṃ vā salākabhattaṃ vā uposathikaṃ vā pāṭipadikaṃ
analyzed: idha ekaccaḥ hi āditas va pakkhika bhattam vā salāka bhattam vā uposathikam vā pāṭipadikam

original: vā deti, so tena asantuṭṭho hutvā puna dhurabhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ vassāvāsikaṃ deti,
analyzed: vā deti saḥ tena a santuṭṭhaḥ hutvā puna dhura bhattam saṅgha bhattam vassāvāsikam deti

original: āvāsaṃ kāreti, cattāropi paccaye deti. Tatrāpi asantuṭṭho hutvā saraṇāni gaṇhāti,
analyzed: āvāsam kāreti cattāraḥ api paccaye deti tatra api a santuṭṭhaḥ hutvā saraṇāni gaṇhāti

original: pañca sīlāni samādiyati. Tatrāpi asantuṭṭho hutvā pabbajati. Pabbajitvā ekaṃ nikāyaṃ

original: dve nikāyeti tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ gaṇhāti, aṭṭha samāpattiyo bhāveti, vipassanaṃ

analyzed: yāva arahattā visesa kāma tā bhiyyokamyatā nāma

original: 1379. ‘Appaṭivānitā ca padhānasmi’nti padassa niddese yasmā pantasenāsanesu adhikusalānaṃ

original: nāma, tasmā taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ yā kusalānaṃ dhammānantiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sakkaccakiriyatāti
analyzed: nāma tasmā tam nayam dassetum yā kusalānam dhammānam tiādi vuttam tattha

original: kusalānaṃ karaṇe sakkaccakāritā. Sātaccakiriyatāti satatameva karaṇaṃ. Aṭṭhitakiriyatāti

analyzed: khaṇḍam a katvā aṭṭhapetvā karaṇam anolīna vutti tā ati alīna jīvi tā alīna pavatti tā vā

original: Anikkhittachandatāti kusalacchandassa anikkhipanaṃ. Anikkhittadhuratāti kusalakaraṇe

original: vīriyadhurassa anikkhipanaṃ.
analyzed: vīriya dhurassa a nikkhipanaṃ

original: vijjhatīti vijjā. Taṃ tamaṃ vijjhitvā te khandhe vidite pākaṭe karotīti viditakaraṇaṭṭhenāpi vijjā.
analyzed: vijjhati iti vijjā tam tamam vijjhitvā te khandhe vidite pākaṭe karoti iti vidita karaṇa ṭṭhena api vijjā

analyzed: saccāni viditāni pākaṭāni karoti iti vidita karaṇa ṭṭhena api vijjā

original: 4. Aṭṭhakathākaṇḍo
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā kaṇḍaḥ

analyzed: akusalānam pana bhūmi vasena bheda abhāvataḥ dvādasa akusala cittuppādā ti āha tattha

analyzed: vā ārammaṇam karoti pavattiyam bhavaṅga vasena pariyosāne cuti vasena pavattamānam pi

original: tadeva ārammaṇaṃ karotīti parittārammaṇaṃ. Aṭṭha pana sahetukavipākacittuppādā ettha
analyzed: tat eva ārammaṇam karoti iti paritta ārammaṇam aṭṭha pana sa hetuka vipāka cittuppādāḥ ettha

original: vuttanayeneva tadārammaṇavasena paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena ca parittadhammeyeva
analyzed: vutta nayena iva tad ārammaṇa vasena paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena ca

original: ārabbha pavattanti. Kiriyamanodhātu pañcadvāre rūpādīni ārabbha pavattati. Somanassasahagatāhetukakiriyamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: ārabbha pavattanti kiriya manaḥ dhātu pañca dvāre rūpa ādīni ārabbha pavattati somanassa sahagata ahetuka kiriya manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: chasu dvāresu paccuppanne manodvāre atītānāgatepi paritte rūpādidhammeyeva ārabbha
analyzed: chasu dvāresu paccuppanne manaḥ dvāre atīta anāgate pi paritte rūpa ādi dhamme iva ārabbha

original: khīṇāsavānaṃ pahaṭṭhākāraṃ kurumānā pavattatīti parittārammaṇā. Evamime pañcavīsati
analyzed: khīṇāsavānam pahaṭṭha ākāram kurumānā pavattati iti paritta ārammaṇāḥ evam ime pañcavīsati

original: cittuppādā ekanteneva parittārammaṇāti veditabbā.
analyzed: cittuppādāḥ ekantena iva paritta ārammaṇā ti veditabbā

original: 1421. Viññāṇañcāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhammā attano attano heṭṭhimaṃ samāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattanato mahaggatārammaṇā. Eva maggaphaladhammā nibbānārammaṇattā appamāṇārammaṇā.
analyzed: viññāṇañcāyatana nevasaññānāsaññāyatana dhammāḥ attanaḥ attanaḥ heṭṭhimam samāpattim ārabbha pavattanataḥ mahaggata ārammaṇāḥ eva magga phala dhammāḥ nibbāna ārammaṇa ttā appamāṇa ārammaṇāḥ

original: Kusalato cattāro kiriyato cattāroti aṭṭha ñāṇavippayuttacittuppādā sekkhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ
analyzed: kusalataḥ cattāraḥ kiriyataḥ cattāro ti aṭṭha ñāṇa vippayutta cittuppādā sekkha puthujjana khīṇa āsavānam

original: asakkaccadānapaccavekkhaṇadhammasavanādīsu kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattikāle parittārammaṇā.
analyzed: asakkacca dāna paccavekkhaṇa dhamma savana ādīsu kāmāvacara dhamme ārabbha pavatti kāle paritta ārammaṇā

original: Atipaguṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle mahaggatārammaṇā. Kasiṇanimittādipaññattipaccavekkhaṇakāle
analyzed: ati paguṇānam paṭhama jhāna ādīnam paccavekkhaṇa kāle mahaggata ārammaṇā kasiṇa nimitta ādi paññatti paccavekkhaṇa kāle

original: navattabbārammaṇā. Akusalato cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādā pañcapaṇṇāsāya
analyzed: navattabba ārammaṇāḥ akusalato cattāro diṭṭhigata sampayutta cittuppādā pañca paṇṇāsāya

original: kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ ‘satto satto’ti parāmasanaassādanābhinandanakāle parittārammaṇā.
analyzed: kāmāvacara dhammānam satto satto ti parāmasana assādana abhinandana kāle paritta ārammaṇā

original: Tenevākārena sattavīsati mahaggatadhamme ārabbha pavattikāle mahaggatārammaṇā. Paṇṇattidhamme
analyzed: tena iva ākārena sattavīsati mahaggata dhamme ārabbha pavatti kāle mahaggata ārammaṇā paṇṇatti dhamme

original: ārabbha pavattanakāle siyā navattabbārammaṇā. Diṭṭhivippayuttānaṃ teyeva dhamme ārabbha
analyzed: ārabbha pavattana kāle siyā na vattabba ārammaṇāḥ diṭṭhi vippayuttānam te yeva dhamme ārabbha

original: kevalaṃ assādanābhinandanavasena, pavattiyaṃ paṭighasampayuttānaṃ domanassavasena,
analyzed: kevalam assādana abhinandana vasena pavattiyam paṭigha sampayuttānam domanassa vasena

original: vicikicchāsampayuttacittuppādassa aniṭṭhaṅgatavasena, uddhaccasahagatassa vikkhepavasena
analyzed: vicikicchā sampayutta cittuppādassa aniṭṭhaṅgata vasena uddhacca sahagatassa vikkhepa vasena

original: avūpasamavasena ca pavattiyaṃ parittamahaggatanavattabbārammaṇatā veditabbā. Etesu
analyzed: avūpasama vasena ca pavattiyam paritta mahaggata nava ttabba ārammaṇa tā veditabbā etesu

original: pana ekadhammopi appamāṇe ārabbha pavattituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā na appamāṇārammaṇā.
analyzed: pana eka dhammaḥ api appamāṇe ārabbha pavattitum na sakkoti tasmā na appamāṇa ārammaṇā

original: Kusalato cattāro kiriyato cattāroti aṭṭha ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā sekkhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ
analyzed: kusalataḥ cattāraḥ kiriyataḥ cattāro ti aṭṭha ñāṇa sampayutta cittuppādā sekkha puthujjana khīṇa āsavānam

original: sakkaccadānapaccavekkhaṇadhammasavanādīsu yathāvuttappakāre dhamme ārabbha pavattikāle
analyzed: sakkacca dāna paccavekkhaṇa dhamma savana ādīsu yathā vutta ppakāre dhamme ārabbha pavatti kāle

original: parittamahaggatanavattabbārammaṇā honti. Gotrabhukāle lokuttaradhamme paccavekkhaṇakāle
analyzed: paritta mahaggata nava ttabba ārammaṇāḥ honti gotrabhu kāle lokuttara dhamme paccavekkhaṇa kāle

original: ca nesaṃ appamāṇārammaṇatā veditabbā.
analyzed: ca nesam appamāṇa ārammaṇa tā veditabbā

original: Yaṃ panetaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ taṃ sabbatthapādakacatutthaṃ ākāsakasiṇacatutthaṃ
analyzed: yam pana itam rūpāvacara catuttha jhānam tam sabbattha pādaka catuttham ākāsa kasiṇa catuttham

original: ālokakasiṇacatutthaṃ brahmavihāracatutthaṃ ānāpānacatutthaṃ iddhividhacatutthaṃ dibbasotacatutthaṃ
analyzed: āloka kasiṇa catuttham brahmavihāra catuttham āna apāna catuttham iddhividha catuttham dibba sota catuttham

original: cetopariyañāṇacatutthaṃ yathākammupagañāṇacatutthaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇacatutthaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇacatutthaṃ
analyzed: cetas upariya ñāṇa catuttham yathākammupaga ñāṇa catuttham dibba cakkhu ñāṇa catuttham pubbenivāsa ñāṇa catuttham

original: anāgataṃsañāṇacatutthanti kusalatopi kiriyatopi dvādasavidhaṃ hoti.
analyzed: kusala topi kiriyatopi dvādasavidham hoti

original: Tattha ‘sabbatthapādakacatutthaṃ’ nāma aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu catutthajjhānaṃ. Tañhi vipassanāyapi
analyzed: tattha sabbatthapādakacatuttham nāma aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu catuttha jhānam tat hi vipassanāya api

original: pādakaṃ hoti, abhiññānampi, nirodhassāpi, vaṭṭassāpi pādakaṃ hotiyevāti sabbatthapādakanti
analyzed: pādakam hoti abhiññānam pi nirodhassa api vaṭṭassa api pādakam hotiyeva ati sabbattha pādakam ti

original: vuttaṃ. ‘Ākāsakasiṇaālokakasiṇacatutthāni’ pana vipassanāyapi abhiññānampi vaṭṭassāpi
analyzed: vuttam ākāsa kasiṇa āloka kasiṇa catutthāni pana vipassanāya api abhiññānam pi vaṭṭassa api

original: pādakāni honti, nirodhapādakāneva na honti. ‘Brahmavihāraānāpānacatutthāni’ vipassanāya
analyzed: pādakāni honti nirodha pādakāni eva na honti brahmavihāra āna apāna catutthāni vipassanāya

original: ceva vaṭṭassa ca pādakāni honti, abhiññānaṃ pana nirodhassa ca pādakāni na honti.
analyzed: ca iva vaṭṭassa ca pādakāni honti abhiññānam pana nirodhassa ca pādakāni na honti

original: Tattha dasavidhampi kasiṇajjhānaṃ kasiṇapaṇṇattiṃ ārabbha pavattattā, brahmavihāracatutthaṃ

original: sattapaṇṇattiṃ ārabbha pavattattā, ānāpānacatutthaṃ nimittaṃ ārabbha pavattattā parittādivasena
analyzed: satta paṇṇattim ārabbha pavattattā āna apāna catuttham nimittam ārabbha pavattattā paritta ādi vasena

original: navattabbadhammārammaṇato navattabbārammaṇaṃ nāma hoti.
analyzed: navattabba dhamma ārammaṇataḥ navattabba ārammaṇam nāma hoti

original: ‘Iddhividhacatutthaṃ’ parittamahaggatārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Tañhi yadā kāyaṃ cittasannissitaṃ
analyzed: iddhividha catuttham paritta mahaggata ārammaṇam hoti katham tat hi yadā kāyam citta sannissitam

original: katvā adissamānena kāyena gantukāmo cittavasena kāyaṃ pariṇāmeti, mahaggatacitte
analyzed: katvā a dissamānena kāyena gantu kāmaḥ citta vasena kāyam pariṇāmeti mahaggata citte

original: samodahati, samāropeti, tadā upayogaladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā rūpakāyārammaṇato
analyzed: samodahati samāropeti tadā upayoga laddham ārammaṇam hoti iti katvā rūpa kāya ārammaṇato

original: parittārammaṇaṃ hoti. Yadā cittaṃ kāyasannissitaṃ katvā dissamānena kāyena gantukāmo
analyzed: paritta ārammaṇam hoti yadā cittam kāya sannissitam katvā dissamānena kāyena gantu kāmo

original: kāyavasena cittaṃ pariṇāmeti, pādakajjhānacittaṃ rūpakāye samodahati, samāropeti,
analyzed: kāya vasena cittam pariṇāmeti pādakajjhāna cittam rūpa kāye samodahati samāropeti

original: tadā upayogaladdhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā mahaggatacittārammaṇato mahaggatārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tadā upayoga laddham ārammaṇam hoti iti katvā mahaggata citta ārammaṇataḥ mahaggata ārammaṇam hoti

original: ‘Dibbasotacatutthaṃ’ saddaṃ ārabbha pavattattā ekantaparittārammaṇameva. ‘Cetopariyañāṇacatutthaṃ’
analyzed: dibba sota catuttham saddam ārabbha pavatta ttā ekanta paritta ārammaṇam eva cetaḥ pariya ñāṇa catuttham

original: parittamahaggataappamāṇārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Tañhi paresaṃ kāmāvacaracittajānanakāle
analyzed: paritta mahaggata appamāṇa ārammaṇam hoti katham tat hi paresam kāmāvacara citta jānana kāle

original: parittārammaṇaṃ hoti, rūpāvacarārūpāvacaracittajānanakāle mahaggatārammaṇaṃ, maggaphalajānanakāle
analyzed: paritta ārammaṇam hoti rūpāvacara arūpāvacara citta jānana kāle mahaggata ārammaṇam magga phala jānana kāle

original: appamāṇārammaṇaṃ hoti. Ettha ca puthujjano sotāpannassa cittaṃ na jānāti, sotāpanno
analyzed: appamāṇa ārammaṇam hoti ettha ca puthujjanaḥ sotāpannassa cittam na jānāti sotāpannaḥ

original: vā sakadāgāmissāti evaṃ yāva arahato netabbaṃ. Arahā pana sabbesaṃ cittaṃ jānāti.
analyzed: vā sakadāgāmissa ati evam yāva arahataḥ netabbam arahā pana sabbesam cittam jānāti

original: Aññopi ca uparimo heṭṭhimassāti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo. ‘Yathākammupagañāṇacatutthaṃ’
analyzed: aññaḥ api ca uparimaḥ heṭṭhimassa ati ayam visesaḥ veditabbaḥ yathā kamma upaga ñāṇa catuttham

original: kāmāvacarakammajānanakāle parittārammaṇaṃ hoti, rūpāvacarārūpāvacarakammajānanakāle mahaggatārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: kāmāvacara kamma jānana kāle paritta ārammaṇam hoti rūpāvacara arūpāvacara kamma jānana kāle mahaggata ārammaṇam

original: ‘Dibbacakkhuñāṇacatutthaṃ’ rūpārammaṇattā ekantaparittārammaṇameva. ‘Pubbenivāsañāṇacatutthaṃ’
analyzed: dibba cakkhu ñāṇa catuttham rūpa ārammaṇa ttā ekanta paritta ārammaṇam eva pubbenivāsa ñāṇa catuttham

original: parittamahaggataappamāṇanavattabbārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ? Tañhi kāmāvacarakkhandhānussaraṇakāle
analyzed: paritta mahaggata appamāṇa nava ttabba ārammaṇam hoti katham tat hi kāmāvacara kkhandha anussaraṇa kāle

analyzed: paritta ārammaṇam hoti rūpāvacara arūpāvacara khandha anussaraṇa kāle mahaggata ārammaṇam

original: Atīte attanā vā parehi vā bhāvitamaggaṃ sacchikataphalañca anussaraṇakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: atīte attanā vā parehi vā bhāvita maggam sacchikata phalam ca anussaraṇa kāle appamāṇa ārammaṇam

original: Atīte buddhā maggaṃ bhāvayiṃsu, phalaṃ sacchākaṃsu, nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyiṃsūti

original: chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇavasena maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇatopi appamāṇārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: chinna vaṭumaka anussaraṇa vasena magga phala nibbāna paccavekkhaṇataḥ pi appamāṇa ārammaṇam

original: Atīte ‘vipassī nāma bhagavā’ ahosi. Tassa ‘bandhumatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi, bandhumā
analyzed: atīte vipassī nāma bhagavā ahosi tassa bandhumatī nāma nagaram ahosi bandhumā

original: nāma rājā pitā, bandhumatī nāma mātā’tiādinā nayena nāmagottapathavīnimittādianussaraṇakāle
analyzed: nāma rājā pitā bandhumatī nāma mātā ati ādinā nayena nāma gotta pathavī nimitta ādi anussaraṇa kāle

original: navattabbārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: navattabba ārammaṇam hoti

original: ‘Anāgataṃsañāṇacatutthe’pi eseva nayo. Tampi ayaṃ anāgate ‘kāmāvacare nibbattissatī’ti

original: jānanakāle parittārammaṇaṃ hoti. ‘Rūpāvacare vā arūpāvacare vā nibbattissatī’ti jānanakāle
analyzed: jānana kāle paritta ārammaṇam hoti rūpāvacare vā arūpāvacare vā nibbattissati iti jānana kāle

original: mahaggatārammaṇaṃ. ‘Maggaṃ bhāvessati phalaṃ sacchikarissati’ ‘nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyissatī’ti
analyzed: mahaggata ārammaṇam maggam bhāvessati phalam sacchikarissati nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyissati iti

original: jānanakāle appamāṇārammaṇaṃ. Anāgate “metteyyo nāma bhagavā uppajjissati, subrahmā
analyzed: jānana kāle appamāṇa ārammaṇam anāgate metteyyaḥ nāma bhagavā uppajjissati su brahmā

original: nayena nāmagottajānanakāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ hoti.
analyzed: nayena nāma gotta jānana kāle nava ttabba ārammaṇam hoti

original: Arūpāvacaracatutthaṃ pana āsavānaṃ khayacatutthañca pāḷiyaṃ āgataṭṭhāneyeva kathessāmi.
analyzed: arūpāvacara catuttham pana āsavānam khaya catuttham ca pāḷiyam āgata ṭṭhāneya iva kathessāmi

original: Kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu upekkhāsahagatā sabbesampi etesaṃ kusalākusalakiriyacittānaṃ
analyzed: kiriyā hetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu upekkhā sahagatā sabbesam pi etesam kusala akusala kiriya cittānam

pavattiyaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇāva hoti. Rūpāvacaratikacatukkajjhānādīni parittādibhāvena
analyzed: pavattiyam ekanta paritta ārammaṇā ava hoti rūpāvacara tika catukka jhāna ādīni paritta ādi bhāvena

analyzed: navattabba dhammam ārabbha pavattitaḥ navattabba ārammaṇāni ettha hi rūpāvacarāni pathavī kasiṇa ādīsu

analyzed: pavattanti ākāsānañcāyatanam ugghāṭim ākāse ākiñcaññāyatanam viññāṇa apagame ti

original: 1429. Maggārammaṇattike ādimhi vuttā aṭṭha ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā sekkhāsekkhānaṃ
analyzed: magga ārammaṇa ttike ādimhi vuttāḥ aṭṭha ñāṇa sampayutta cittuppādāḥ sekkha asekkhānam

original: attanā paṭividdhamaggānaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇā, maggena pana asahajātattā
analyzed: attanā paṭividdha maggānam paccavekkhaṇa kāle magga ārammaṇā maggena pana asahajāta ttā

original: na maggahetukā, attanā paṭividdhamaggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhaṇakāle ārammaṇādhipativasena

original: maggādhipatino, aññadhammārammaṇakāle na vattabbā maggārammaṇātipi maggādhipatinotipi.

original: Cattāro ariyamaggā maggasaṅkhātassa maggasampayuttassa vā hetuno atthitāya ekantato
analyzed: cattāro ariyamaggāḥ magga saṅkhātassa magga sampayuttassa vā hetuno atthitāya ekantato

original: maggahetukāva. Vīriyaṃ pana vīmaṃsaṃ vā jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā maggabhāvanākāle sahajātādhipatinā

analyzed: siyā chanda cittānam aññatara jeṭṭhaka kāle siyā na vattabbā magga adhipatino ti

original: Dvādasavidhe rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne sabbatthapādakacatutthādīni nava jhānāni neva
analyzed: dvādasavidhe rūpāvacara catuttha jjhāne sabbattha pādaka catuttha ādīni nava jhānāni na iva

original: maggārammaṇāni na maggahetukāni na maggādhipatīni. Cetopariyañāṇapubbenivāsañāṇaanāgataṃsañāṇacatutthāni
analyzed: magga ārammaṇāni na magga hetukāni na magga adhipatīni cetas upariya ñāṇa pubbenivāsa ñāṇa anāgataṃsa ñāṇa catutthāni

original: pana ariyānaṃ maggacittajānanakāle maggārammaṇāni honti, maggena pana asahajātattā
analyzed: pana ariyānam magga citta jānana kāle magga ārammaṇāni honti maggena pana asahajāta ttā

original: na maggahetukāni, maggaṃ garuṃ katvā appavattito na maggādhipatīni. Kasmā panetāni
analyzed: na magga hetukāni maggam garum katvā appavattitaḥ na magga adhipatīni kasmā pana itāni

original: na maggaṃ garuṃ karontīti? Attano mahaggatatāya. Yathā hi rājānaṃ sabbo loko garuṃ
analyzed: na maggam garum karonti iti attanaḥ mahaggata tāya yathā hi rājānam sabbaḥ lokaḥ garum

original: karoti, mātāpitaro pana na karonti. Na hi te rājānaṃ disvā āsanā vuṭṭhahanti, na
analyzed: karoti mātā pitaraḥ pana na karonti na hi te rājānam disvā āsanā vuṭṭhahanti na

original: añjalikammādīni karonti, daharakāle voharitanayeneva voharanti. Evametānipi attano
analyzed: añjali kamma ādīni karonti dahara kāle voharitanayena iva voharanti evam etāni pi

original: mahaggatatāya na maggaṃ garuṃ karonti.
analyzed: mahaggata tāya na maggam garum karonti

original: Kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātupi ariyānaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇakāle paccavekkhaṇapurecārikattā
analyzed: kiriyā hetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātupi ariyānam magga paccavekkhaṇa kāle paccavekkhaṇa purecārika ttā

original: maggārammaṇā hoti, maggena asahajātattā pana na maggahetukā, maggaṃ garuṃ katvā appavattito
analyzed: magga ārammaṇā hoti maggena asahajāta ttā pana na magga hetukā maggam garum katvā appavattito

original: na maggādhipati. Kasmā garuṃ na karotīti? Attano ahetukatāya hīnatāya jaḷatāya. Yathā
analyzed: na magga adhipati kasmai garum na karoti iti attanaḥ ahetuka tāya hīna tāya jaḷa tāya yathā

original: hi rājānaṃ sabbo loko garuṃ karoti, attano parijanā pana khujjavāmanakaceṭakādayo
analyzed: hi rājānam sabbaḥ lokaḥ garum karoti attanaḥ parijanāḥ pana khujja vāmanaka ceṭaka ādayo

original: attano aññāṇatāya paṇḍitamanussā viya nātigaruṃ karonti, evameva idampi cittaṃ attano
analyzed: attanaḥ aññāṇa tāya paṇḍita manussāḥ viya na ati garum karonti evam eva idam pi cittam attanaḥ

original: ahetukatāya hīnatāya jaḷatāya maggaṃ garuṃ na karoti.
analyzed: ahetuka tāya hīna tāya jaḷa tāya maggam garum na karoti

original: Ñāṇavippayuttakusalādīni ñāṇābhāvena ceva lokiyadhammārammaṇatāya ca maggārammaṇādibhāvaṃ na labhanti, navattabbārammaṇāneva hontīti veditabbānīti.
analyzed: ñāṇa vippayutta kusala ādīni ñāṇa abhāvena ca iva lokiya dhamma ārammaṇa tāya ca magga ārammaṇa ādi bhāvam na labhanti navattabba ārammaṇāni eva honti iti veditabbāni iti

original: 1432. Atītārammaṇattike viññāṇañcāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanadhammā heṭṭhā atītasamāpattiṃ ārabbha pavattitā ekantena atītārammaṇāva.
analyzed: atīta ārammaṇa ttike viññāṇañcāyatana nevasaññānāsaññāyatana dhammāḥ heṭṭhā atīta samāpattim ārabbha pavatti tā ekantena atīta ārammaṇā ava

original: 1433. Niyogā anāgatārammaṇā natthīti niyamena pāṭiyekkaṃ cittaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ nāma
analyzed: niyogāḥ anāgata ārammaṇāḥ natthi iti niyamena pāṭiyekkam cittam anāgata ārammaṇam nāma

original: natthi. Nanu ca anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ ekantena anāgatārammaṇaṃ, cetopariyañāṇampi anāgataṃ
analyzed: natthi nanu ca anāgataṃsañāṇam ekantena anāgata ārammaṇam cetas pariya ñāṇam pi anāgatam

original: ārabbha pavattatīti? No na pavattati. Pāṭiyekkaṃ pana etaṃ ekaṃ cittaṃ nāma natthi.
analyzed: ārabbha pavattati iti no na pavattati pāṭiyekkam pana etam ekam cittam nāma natthi

original: Rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānena saṅgahitattā aññehi mahaggatacittehi missakaṃ hoti. Tena
analyzed: rūpāvacara catuttha jhānena saṅgahita ttā aññehi mahaggata cittehi missakam hoti tena

original: vuttaṃ ‘niyogā anāgatārammaṇā natthī’ti.
analyzed: vuttam niyogā anāgata ārammaṇā natthi iti

original: 1434. Dvipañcaviññāṇāni, tisso manodhātuyo ca paccuppannesu rūpādīsu pavattito paccuppannārammaṇā
analyzed: dvi pañca viññāṇāni tissaḥ manaḥ dhātuyo ca paccuppannesu rūpa ādīsu pavattitaḥ paccuppanna ārammaṇā

original: nāma. Dasa cittuppādāti ettha aṭṭha tāva sahetukā devamanussānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle
analyzed: nāma dasa cittuppādā ti ettha aṭṭha tāva sa hetukā deva manussānam paṭisandhi ggahaṇa kāle

original: kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha pavattiyaṃ atītārammaṇā. Bhavaṅgacutikālesupi
analyzed: kammam vā kamma nimittam vā ārabbha pavattiyam atīta ārammaṇāḥ bhavaṅga cuti kālesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Gatinimittaṃ pana ārabbha paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle tato paraṃ bhavaṅgakāle
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ gati nimittam pana ārabbha paṭisandhi ggahaṇa kāle tato param bhavaṅga kāle

original: ca paccuppannārammaṇā. Tathā pañcadvāre tadārammaṇavasena pavattiyaṃ. Manodvāre pana
analyzed: ca paccuppanna ārammaṇā tathā pañca dvāre tad ārammaṇa vasena pavattiyam manaḥ dvāre pana

original: atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇānaṃ javanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā pavattito atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā.
analyzed: atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇānam javanānam ārammaṇam gahetvā pavattitaḥ atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇā

original: ‘Kusalavipākāhetukaupekkhāsahagatamanoviññāṇadhātuya’mpi eseva nayo. Kevalañhi sā
analyzed: kusala vipāka ahetuka aupekkhā sahagata manaḥ viññāṇa dhātuyam pi esa eva nayaḥ kevalam hi sā

original: manussesu jaccandhādīnaṃ paṭisandhi hoti. Pañcadvāre ca santīraṇavasenāpi paccuppannārammaṇā
analyzed: manussesu hoti pañca dvāre ca santīraṇa vasena api paccuppanna ārammaṇā

original: hotīti ayamettha viseso. ‘Somanassasahagatā’ pana pañcadvāre santīraṇavasena tadārammaṇavasena
analyzed: hoti iti ayam ettha visesaḥ somanassa sahagatā pana pañca dvāre santi īraṇa vasena tad ārammaṇa vasena

original: ca paccuppannārammaṇā hoti. Manodvāre tadārammaṇavasena sahetukavipākā viya atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇāti veditabbā.
analyzed: ca paccuppanna ārammaṇā hoti manaḥ dvāre tad ārammaṇa vasena sa hetuka vipākā viya atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇā ti veditabbā

original: ‘Akusalavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu’ pana kusalavipākāya upekkhāsahagatāhetukāya
analyzed: akusala vipāka ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu pana kusala vipākāya upekkhā sahagata ahetukāya

original: samānagatikā eva. Kevalañhi sā āpāyikānaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattatīti
analyzed: samāna gatikā eva kevalam hi sā āpāyikānam paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena pavattati iti

original: ayamettha viseso. ‘Kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu’ somanassasahagatā khīṇāsavānaṃ pañcadvāre
analyzed: ayam ettha visesaḥ kiriyā hetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu somanassa sahagatā khīṇāsavānam pañca dvāre

original: pahaṭṭhākāraṃ kurumānā paccuppannārammaṇā hoti. Manodvāre atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha

original: hasituppādavasena pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā hoti.
analyzed: hasita uppāda vasena pavattiyam atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇā hoti

original: Kāmāvacarakusalantiādīsu kusalato tāva cattāro ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā. Sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusala nti ādīsu kusalataḥ tāva cattāro ñāṇa sampayutta cittuppādā sekkha puthujjanānam

original: atītādibhedāni khandhadhātuāyatanāni sammasantānaṃ paccavekkhantānaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā
analyzed: atīta ādi bhedāni khandha dhātu āyatanāni sammasantānam paccavekkhantānam atīta anāgata paccuppanna ārammaṇā

original: honti. Paṇṇattinibbānapaccavekkhaṇe navattabbārammaṇā. Ñāṇavippayuttesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: honti paṇṇatti nibbāna paccavekkhaṇe nava ttabba ārammaṇāḥ ñāṇa vippayuttesu pi esa eva nayo

original: Kevalañhi tehi maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇā natthi. Ayamevettha viseso.
analyzed: kevalañhi tehi magga phala nibbāna paccavekkhaṇā natthi ayam eva ittha visesaḥ

original: Akusalato cattāro diṭṭhisampayuttacittuppādā atītādibhedānaṃ khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ
analyzed: akusalato cattāro diṭṭhi sampayutta cittuppādāḥ atīta ādi bhedānam khandha dhātu āyatanānam

original: assādanābhinandanaparāmāsakāle atītādiārammaṇā honti. Paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha assādentassa
analyzed: assādana abhinandana parāmāsa kāle atīta ādi ārammaṇāḥ honti paṇṇattim ārabbha assādentassa

original: abhinandantassa ‘satto satto’ti parāmasitvā gaṇhantassa navattabbārammaṇā honti.
analyzed: abhinandantassa satto satto ti parāmasitvā gaṇhantassa navattabba ārammaṇāḥ honti

original: Diṭṭhivippayuttesupi eseva nayo. Kevalañhi tehi parāmāsaggahaṇaṃ natthi. Dve paṭighasampayuttacittuppādā
analyzed: diṭṭhi vippayuttesu pi esa eva nayaḥ kevalam hi tehi parāmāsa ggahaṇam natthi dve paṭigha sampayutta cittuppādā

original: atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha domanassitānaṃ atītādiārammaṇā, paṇṇattiṃ ārabbha domanassitānaṃ
analyzed: atīta ādi bhede dhamme ārabbha domanassi tānam atīta ādi ārammaṇā paṇṇattim ārabbha domanassi tānam

original: navattabbārammaṇā. Vicikicchuddhaccasampayuttā tesu eva dhammesu aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvena
analyzed: nava ttabba ārammaṇā vicikicchu ddhacca sampayuttā tesu eva dhammesu aniṭṭhaṅgata bhāvena

analyzed: aṭṭha sa hetuka cittuppādā kusala cittuppāda gatikā eva kiriyā hetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

analyzed: upekkhā sahagatā pañca dvāre voṭṭhabbana vasena pavattiyam paccuppanna ārammaṇā ava manaḥ dvāre

original: atītānāgatapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇā.
analyzed: atīta anāgata paccuppanna nava ttabba ārammaṇā

original: Yathāvuttappabhede rūpāvacarajjhāne sabbatthapādakacatutthaṃ ākāsakasiṇacatutthaṃ
analyzed: yathāvutta ppabhede rūpāvacara jhāne sabbattha pādaka catuttham ākāsa kasiṇa catuttham

original: Cetopariyañāṇacatutthaṃ atīte sattadivasabbhantare anāgate sattadivasabbhantare paresaṃ

original: pana paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti.

original: Paccuppannañca nāmetaṃ tividhaṃ – khaṇapaccuppannaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ addhāpaccuppannañca.

original: Tattha uppādaṭṭhitibhaṅgappattaṃ ‘khaṇapaccuppannaṃ’. Ekadvisantativārapariyāpannaṃ

analyzed: pākaṭam hoti yāva pana tam pākaṭam hoti etthantare eka dvi santati vārā veditabbā

original: Ālokaṭṭhāne vicaritvā ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassāpi na tāva sahasā rūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti; yāva

original: taṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, etthantare ekadvisantativārā veditabbā. Dūre ṭhatvā pana rajakānaṃ

original: hatthavikāraṃ ghaṇḍibherīādiākoṭanavikārañca disvāpi na tāva saddaṃ suṇāti; yāva

original: pana taṃ suṇāti, etasmimpi antare ekadvisantativārā veditabbā. Evaṃ tāva majjhimabhāṇakā.

original: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana ‘rūpasantati arūpasantatī’ti dve santatiyo vatvā, ‘udakaṃ akkamitvā

analyzed: gatassa yāva tīre akkanta odaka lekhā na vippasīdati addhānataḥ āgatassa yāva kāye

original: na vigacchati, antogabbhe kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikaritvā divā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokentassa

original: yāva akkhīnaṃ phandanabhāvo na vūpasammati, ayaṃ rūpasantati nāma; dve tayo javanavārā

analyzed: arūpa santati nāma ati vatvā tat ubhayam pi santati paccuppannam nāma ati vadanti

original: Ekabhavaparicchinnaṃ pana addhāpaccuppannaṃ nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya bhaddekarattasutte
analyzed: eka bhava paricchinnam pana addhāpaccuppannam nāma yam sandhāya bhaddekaratta sutte

original: paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīratī”ti vuttaṃ. Santatipaccuppannañcettha aṭṭhakathāsu
analyzed: paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīrati iti vuttam santati paccuppannam ca ittha aṭṭhakathāsu

original: āgataṃ. Addhāpaccuppannaṃ sutte.
analyzed: āgatam addhā paccuppannam sutte

analyzed: tattha keci khaṇa paccuppannam cittam cetas pariya ñāṇassa ārammaṇam hoti iti vadanti

original: Kiṃkāraṇā? Yasmā iddhimassa ca parassa ca ekakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppajjatīti. Idañca nesaṃ
analyzed: kiṃkāraṇā yasmai ca parassa ca eka khaṇe cittam uppajjati iti idam ca nesam

original: opammaṃ – yathā ākāse khitte pupphamuṭṭhimhi avassaṃ ekaṃ pupphaṃ ekassa vaṇṭaṃ paṭivijjhati

original: citte āvajjite avassaṃ ekassa cittaṃ ekena cittena uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā

original: Tattha yaṃ vattamānajavanavīthito atītānāgatavasena dvitijavanavīthiparimāṇakāle

analyzed: nirujjhati tato cattāri pañca javanāni yesam pacchimam iddhi cittam sesāni kāmāvacarāni

original: Tesaṃ sabbesampi tadeva niruddhaṃ cittamārammaṇaṃ hoti. Na ca tāni nānārammaṇāni
analyzed: tesam sabbesam pi tat eva niruddham cittam ārammaṇam hoti na ca tāni nānārammaṇāni
