analyzed: ārabbha pavattiyam ajjhatta ārammaṇā parassa rūpa ādīsu pavattā bahiddha ārammaṇā tad ubhaya vasena

original: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā. Somanassasahagataahetukavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu pañcadvāre
analyzed: ajjhatta bahiddhā ārammaṇā somanassa sahagata ahetuka vipāka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu pañca dvāre

original: santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena attano pañca rūpādidhamme, manodvāre tadārammaṇavaseneva
analyzed: santi īraṇa tad ārammaṇa vasena pañca rūpa ādi dhamme manaḥ dvāre tad ārammaṇa vasena iva

original: aññepi ajjhattike kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā, paresaṃ dhammesu
analyzed: aññe api ajjhattike kāmāvacara dhamme ārabbha pavattiyam ajjhatta ārammaṇā paresam dhammesu

original: pavattamānā bahiddhārammaṇā, ubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā. Upekkhāsahagatavipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātudvayepi
analyzed: pavattamānāḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇāḥ ubhaya vasena ajjhatta bahiddhā ārammaṇāḥ upekkhā sahagata vipāka ahetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu dvaye pi

original: eseva nayo. Kevalaṃ panetā sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasenāpi
analyzed: esā iva nayo kevalam pana itā sugatiyam duggatiyam ca paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena api

original: ajjhattādibhedesu kammādīsu pavattanti.
analyzed: ajjhatta ādi bhedesu kamma ādīsu pavattanti

original: Aṭṭha mahāvipākacittānipi tāsaṃyeva dvinnaṃ samānagatikāni. Kevalaṃ panetāni santīraṇavasena
analyzed: aṭṭha mahā vipāka cittāni pi dvinnam samāna gatikāni kevalam santi īraṇa vasena

original: na pavattanti. Paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivaseneva etāni sugatiyaṃyeva pavattanti. Somanassasahagatāhetukakiriyā
analyzed: na pavattanti paṭisandhi bhavaṅga cuti vasena iva etāni sugatiyam yeva pavattanti somanassa sahagatā ahetuka kiriyā

original: pañcadvāre attano rūpādīni ārabbha pahaṭṭhākārakaraṇavasena pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā,
analyzed: pañca dvāre attanaḥ rūpa ādīni ārabbha pahaṭṭha ākāra karaṇa vasena pavattiyam ajjhatta ārammaṇā

original: parassa rūpādīsu pavattā bahiddhārammaṇā. Manodvāre tathāgatassa jotipālamāṇavamaghadevarājakaṇhatāpasādikālesu
analyzed: parassa rūpa ādīsu pavattā bahiddha ārammaṇā manaḥ dvāre tathāgatassa jotipāla māṇava maghadeva rāja kaṇha tāpasa ādi kālesu

original: attanā katakiriyaṃ paccavekkhantassa hasituppādavasena pavattā ajjhattārammaṇā.
analyzed: attanā kata kiriyam paccavekkhantassa hasita uppāda vasena pavattā ajjhatta ārammaṇā

original: Mallikāya deviyā santatimahāmattassa sumanamālākārassāti evamādīnaṃ kiriyākaraṇaṃ
analyzed: mallikāya deviyā santati mahā mattassa sumana mālākārassa ati evamādīnam kiriyā karaṇam

original: ārabbha pavattikāle bahiddhārammaṇā. Ubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā. Upekkhāsahagatakiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
analyzed: ārabbha pavatti kāle bahiddha ārammaṇā ubhaya vasena ajjhatta bahiddha ārammaṇā upekkhā sahagata kiriyā hetuka manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu

original: pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanavasena manodvāre ca āvajjanavasena pavattiyaṃ ajjhattādiārammaṇā.
analyzed: pañca dvāre voṭṭhabbana vasena manaḥ dvāre ca āvajjana vasena pavattiyam ajjhatta ādi ārammaṇā

original: Aṭṭha mahākiriyā kusalacittagatikā eva. Kevalañhi tā khīṇāsavānaṃ uppajjanti, kusalāni
analyzed: aṭṭha mahā kiriyā kusala citta gatikāḥ eva kevalam hi tā khīṇāsavānam uppajjanti kusalāni

original: sekkhaputhujjanānanti ettakamevettha nānākaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: ettakam eva ittha nānākaraṇam

original: Vuttappakāre rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne sabbatthapādakacatutthādīni pañca jhānāni imasmiṃ tike okāsaṃ labhanti. Etāni hi kasiṇapaṇṇattinimittārammaṇattā bahiddhārammaṇāni.
analyzed: vutta ppakāre rūpāvacara catuttha jjhāne sabbattha pādaka catuttha ādīni pañca jhānāni imasmim tike okāsam labhanti etāni hi kasiṇa paṇṇatti nimitta ārammaṇa ttā bahiddha ārammaṇāni

original: ‘Iddhividhacatutthaṃ’ kāyavasena cittaṃ, cittavasena vā kāyaṃ pariṇāmanakāle attano
analyzed: iddhividha catuttham kāya vasena cittam citta vasena vā kāyam pariṇāmana kāle

original: kumārakavaṇṇādinimmānakāle ca sakāyacittānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇato ajjhattārammaṇaṃ, bahiddhā
analyzed: kumāraka vaṇṇa ādi nimmāna kāle ca sa kāya cittānam ārammaṇa karaṇataḥ ajjhatta ārammaṇam bahiddhā

original: hatthiassādidassanakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṃ, kālena ajjhattaṃ kālena bahiddhā, pavattiyaṃ
analyzed: hatthi assa ādi dassana kāle bahiddha ārammaṇam kālena ajjhattam kālena bahiddhā pavattiyam

original: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: ajjhatta bahiddha ārammaṇam

original: ‘Dibbasotacatutthaṃ’ attano kucchisaddasavanakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṃ, paresaṃ saddasavanakāle
analyzed: dibba sota catuttham attanaḥ kucchi sadda savana kāle ajjhatta ārammaṇam paresam sadda savana kāle

original: bahiddhārammaṇaṃ, ubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ. ‘Cetopariyañāṇacatutthaṃ’
analyzed: bahiddhā ārammaṇam ubhaya vasena ajjhatta bahiddhā ārammaṇam cetas pariyañāṇa catuttham

original: paresaṃ cittārammaṇato bahiddhārammaṇameva. Attano cittajānane pana tena payojanaṃ
analyzed: paresam citta ārammaṇato bahiddhā ārammaṇam eva citta jānane pana tena payojanam

original: natthi. ‘Pubbenivāsacatutthaṃ’ attano khandhānussaraṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṃ, parassa
analyzed: natthi pubbenivāsa catuttham attanaḥ khandha anussaraṇa kāle ajjhatta ārammaṇam parassa

original: khandhe, anidriyabaddharūpaṃ, tisso ca paṇṇattiyo anussaraṇato bahiddhārammaṇaṃ,
analyzed: khandhe anidriya baddha rūpam tissaḥ ca paṇṇattiyaḥ anussaraṇataḥ bahiddha ārammaṇam

original: ubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: ubhaya vasena ajjhatta bahiddha ārammaṇam

original: ‘Dibbacakkhucatutthaṃ’ attano kucchigatādirūpadassanakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṃ, avasesarūpadassanakāle
analyzed: dibba cakkhu catuttham attanaḥ kucchi gata ādi rūpa dassana kāle ajjhatta ārammaṇam avasesa rūpa dassana kāle

original: bahiddhārammaṇaṃ, ubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ. ‘Anāgataṃsañāṇacatutthaṃ’
analyzed: bahiddhā ārammaṇam ubhaya vasena ajjhatta bahiddhā ārammaṇam anāgataṃsañāṇa catuttham

original: attano anāgatakkhandhānussaraṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇaṃ, parassa anāgatakkhandhānaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ anāgata khandha anussaraṇa kāle ajjhatta ārammaṇam parassa anāgata kkhandhānam

original: vā anindriyabaddhassa vā rūpassa anussaraṇakāle bahiddhārammaṇaṃ, ubhayavasena ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: vā anindriya baddhassa vā rūpassa anussaraṇa kāle bahiddha ārammaṇam ubhaya vasena ajjhatta bahiddha ārammaṇam

original: Ākiñcaññāyatanassa navattabbārammaṇatāya kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
analyzed: ākiñcaññāyatanassa navattabba ārammaṇa tāya kāraṇam heṭṭhā vuttam eva

original: Dukaatthuddhāravaṇṇanā
1441. Hetugocchakaniddese tayo kusalahetūtiādinā nayena hetū dassetvā puna teyeva
analyzed: hetu gocchaka niddese tayo kusala hetu uti ādinā nayena hetū dassetvā puna teyeva

original: uppattiṭṭhānato dassetuṃ catūsu bhūmīsu kusalesu uppajjantītiādi vuttaṃ. Iminā upāyena
analyzed: uppatti ṭṭhānataḥ dassetum catūsu bhūmīsu kusalesu uppajjanti itiādi vuttam iminā upāyena

original: sesagocchakesupi desanānayo veditabbo.
analyzed: sesa gocchakesu pi desanā nayaḥ veditabbo

original: 1473. Yattha dve tayo āsavā ekato uppajjantīti ettha tividhena āsavānaṃ ekato uppatti
analyzed: yattha dve tayaḥ āsavāḥ ekatas uppajjanti iti ettha tividhena āsavānam ekatas uppatti

original: veditabbā. Tattha catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttesu avijjāsavena, diṭṭhisampayuttesu diṭṭhāsavaavijjāsavehi
analyzed: veditabbā tattha catūsu diṭṭhi vippayuttesu avijjā āsavena diṭṭhi sampayuttesu diṭṭhāsava avijjāsavehi

original: saddhinti kāmāsavo duvidhena ekato uppajjati. Bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttesu
analyzed: saddhinti kāma āsavaḥ duvidhena ekatas uppajjati bhava āsavaḥ catūsu diṭṭhi vippayuttesu

original: avijjāsavena saddhinti ekadhāva ekato uppajjati. Yathā cettha evaṃ yattha dve tīṇi
analyzed: avijjā āsavena ekatas uppajjati yathā ca ittha evam yattha dve tīṇi

original: saṃyojanāni ekato uppajjantīti etthāpi saṃyojanānaṃ uppatti ekato dasadhā bhave.
analyzed: saṃyojanāni ekatas uppajjanti iti ettha api saṃyojanānam uppattiḥ ekatas dasadhā bhave

original: Tattha kāmarāgo catudhā ekato uppajjati, paṭigho tidhā, māno ekadhā. Tathā vicikicchā
analyzed: tattha kāma rāgaḥ catudhā ekatas uppajjati paṭighaḥ tidhā māno ekadhā tathā vicikicchā

original: ceva bhavarāgo ca. Kathaṃ? Kāmarāgo tāva mānasaṃyojanaavijjāsaṃyojanehi ceva, diṭṭhisaṃyojanaavijjāsaṃyojanehi
analyzed: ca iva bhava rāgo ca katham kāma rāgo tāva māna saṃyojana avijjā saṃyojanehi ca iva diṭṭhi saṃyojana avijjā saṃyojanehi

original: ca, sīlabbataparāmāsaavijjāsaṃyojanehi ca, avijjāsaṃyojanamatteneva ca saddhinti
analyzed: ca sīla bbata parāmāsa avijjā saṃyojanehi ca avijjā saṃyojana mattena iva ca

original: evaṃ catudhā ekato uppajjati. Paṭigho pana issāsaṃyojanaavijjāsaṃyojanehi ceva, macchariyasaṃyojanaavijjāsaṃyojanehi
analyzed: evam catudhā ekatas uppajjati paṭighaḥ pana issā saṃyojana avijjā saṃyojanehi ca iva macchariya saṃyojana avijjā saṃyojanehi

original: ca, avijjāsaṃyojanamatteneva ca saddhinti evaṃ tidhā ekato uppajjati. Māno bhavarāgāvijjāsaṃyojanehi
analyzed: ca avijjā saṃyojana mattena iva ca saddhinti evam tidhā ekatas uppajjati mānaḥ bhava rāga avijjā saṃyojanehi

original: saddhiṃ ekadhāva ekato uppajjati. Tathā vicikicchā. Sā hi avijjāsaṃyojanena saddhiṃ
analyzed: saddhim ekadhāva ekatas uppajjati tathā vicikicchā sā hi avijjā saṃyojanena saddhim

original: ekadhā uppajjati. Bhavarāgepi eseva nayoti. Evamettha dve tīṇi saṃyojanāni ekato uppajjanti.
analyzed: ekadhā uppajjati bhava rāge pi esā iva evam ettha dve tīṇi saṃyojanāni ekatas uppajjanti

original: 1511. Yaṃ panetaṃ nīvaraṇagocchake yattha dve tīṇi nīvaraṇāni ekato uppajjantīti
analyzed: yam pana itam nīvaraṇa gocchake yattha dve tīṇi nīvaraṇāni ekatas uppajjanti iti

original: vuttaṃ, tatthāpi aṭṭhadhā nīvaraṇānaṃ ekato uppatti veditabbā. Etesu hi kāmacchando
analyzed: vuttam tattha api aṭṭhadhā nīvaraṇānam ekatas uppatti veditabbā etesu hi kāmacchandaḥ

original: duvidhā ekato uppajjati, byāpādo catudhā, uddhaccaṃ ekadhā. Tathā vicikicchā. Kathaṃ?
analyzed: duvidhā ekatas uppajjati byāpādaḥ catudhā uddhaccam ekadhā tathā vicikicchā katham

original: Kāmacchando tāva asaṅkhārikacittesu uddhaccanīvaraṇaavijjānīvaraṇehi, sasaṅkhārikesu
analyzed: asaṅkhārika cittesu uddhacca nīvaraṇa avijjā nīvaraṇehi sa saṅkhārikesu

original: thinamiddhauddhaccaavijjānīvaraṇehi saddhiṃ duvidhā ekato uppajjati. Yaṃ panetaṃ
analyzed: thinam iddha auddhacca avijjā nīvaraṇehi saddhim duvidhā ekatas uppajjati yam pana itam

original: dve tīṇīti vuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhimaparicchedavasena vuttaṃ. Tasmā catunnampi ekato uppajjatīti
analyzed: dve tīṇi iti vuttam tam heṭṭhima pariccheda vasena vuttam tasmā catunnam pi ekatas uppajjati iti

original: vacanaṃ yujjati eva. Byāpādo pana asaṅkhārikacitte uddhaccaavijjānīvaraṇehi, sasaṅkhārike
analyzed: vacanam yujjati eva asaṅkhārika citte uddhacca avijjā nīvaraṇehi sa saṅkhārike

original: thinamiddhauddhaccaavijjānīvaraṇehi, asaṅkhārikeyeva uddhaccakukkuccaavijjānīvaraṇehi,
analyzed: thinam iddha auddhacca avijjā nīvaraṇehi uddhacca kukkucca avijjā nīvaraṇehi

original: sasaṅkhārikeyeva thinamiddhauddhaccakukkuccaavijjānīvaraṇehi saddhinti catudhā ekato
analyzed: catudhā ekatas

original: uppajjati. Uddhaccaṃ pana avijjānīvaraṇamattena saddhiṃ ekadhāva ekato uppajjati.
analyzed: uppajjati uddhaccam pana avijjā nīvaraṇa mattena saddhim ekadhāva ekatas uppajjati

original: Vicikicchuddhaccaavijjānīvaraṇehi saddhiṃ ekadhāva ekato uppajjati.
analyzed: vicikicchu ddhacca avijjā nīvaraṇehi saddhim ekadhāvaḥ ekatas uppajjati

original: 1577. Yampidaṃ kilesagocchake yattha dve tayo kilesā ekato uppajjantīti vuttaṃ, tattha
analyzed: yat pi idam kilesa gocchake yattha dve tayo kilesāḥ ekatas uppajjanti iti vuttam tattha

original: ‘dve kilesā aññehi, tayo vā kilesā aññehi kilesehi saddhiṃ uppajjantī’ti evamattho
analyzed: dve kilesāḥ aññehi tayaḥ vā kilesāḥ aññehi kilesehi saddhim uppajjanti iti evamattho

original: veditabbo. Kasmā? Dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃyeva vā ekato uppattiyā asambhavato.
analyzed: veditabbaḥ kasmā dvinnam tiṇṇam yeva vā ekatas uppattiyāḥ asambhavato

original: Tattha dasadhā kilesānaṃ ekato uppatti hoti. Ettha hi lobho chadhā ekato uppajjati.
analyzed: tattha dasadhā kilesānaṃ ekatas uppatti hoti ettha hi lobho chadhā ekatas uppajjati

original: Paṭigho dvidhā. Tathā mohoti veditabbo. Kathaṃ? Lobho tāva asaṅkhārike diṭṭhivippayutte
analyzed: paṭighaḥ dvidhā tathā moho ti veditabbo katham lobho tāva asaṅkhārike diṭṭhi vippayutte

original: mohauddhaccaahirikānottappehi, sasaṅkhārike mohathinauddhaccaahirikānottappehi, asaṅkhārikeyeva
analyzed: moha auddhacca ahirika anottappehi sa saṅkhārike moha thina auddhacca ahirika anottappehi

original: mohamānuddhaccāhirikānottappehi, sasaṅkhārikeyeva mohamānathinauddhaccaahirikānottappehi,
analyzed: moham an uddhacca ahirikān na uttappehi

original: diṭṭhisampayutte pana asaṅkhārike mohauddhaccadiṭṭhiahirikānottappehi, sasaṅkhārike
analyzed: diṭṭhi sampayutte pana asaṅkhārike moha auddhacca diṭṭhi ahirika anottappehi sa saṅkhārike

original: mohadiṭṭhithinauddhaccaahirikānottappehi saddhinti chadhā ekato uppajjati.
analyzed: saddhin ti chadhā ekatas uppajjati

original: Paṭigho pana asaṅkhārike mohauddhaccaahirikānottappehi, sasaṅkhārike mohathinauddhaccaahirikānottappehi
analyzed: paṭighaḥ pana asaṅkhārike moha auddhacca ahirika anottappehi sasaṅkhārike

original: saddhinti evaṃ dvidhā ekato uppajjati. Moho pana vicikicchāsampayutte vicikicchuddhaccaahirikānottappehi,
analyzed: evam dvidhā ekatas uppajjati mohaḥ pana vicikicchā sampayutte

original: uddhaccasampayutte uddhaccaahirikānottappehi saddhinti evaṃ dvidhā ekato uppajjati.
analyzed: uddhacca sampayutte uddhacca ahirika anottappehi saddhinti evam dvidhā ekatas uppajjati

original: Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
analyzed: sesam sabbattha uttāna attham eva ati

original: Aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgahaaṭṭhakathāya
analyzed: aṭṭhasāliniyā dhammasaṅgaha aṭṭhakathāya

original: Aṭṭhakathākaṇḍavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā kaṇḍa vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Cittaṃ rūpañca nikkhepaṃ, atthuddhāraṃ manoramaṃ;
analyzed: cittam rūpañca nikkhepam atthuddhāram manoramam

original: Yaṃ lokanātho bhājento, desesi dhammasaṅgaṇiṃ.
analyzed: yam loka nāthaḥ bhājentaḥ desesi dhamma saṅgaṇim

original: Abhidhammassa saṅgayha, dhamme anavasesato;
analyzed: abhidhammassa saṅgayha dhamme anavasesato

original: Ṭhitāya tassā āraddhā, yā mayā atthavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: ṭhitāya tassai āraddhā yā mayā attha vaṇṇanā

original: Anākulānamatthānaṃ, sambhavā aṭṭhasālinī;
analyzed: sambhavā aṭṭhasālinī

original: Iti nāmena sā esā, sanniṭṭhānamupāgatā.
analyzed: iti nāmena sā esā sanniṭṭhānam upāgatā

original: Ekūnacattālīsāya, pāḷiyā bhāṇavārato;
analyzed: ekūnacattālīsāya pāḷiyāḥ bhāṇa vārato

original: Ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ dhammassa, niṭṭhāpentena taṃ mayā.
analyzed: cira ṭṭhita ttham dhammassa niṭṭhāpentena tam mayā

original: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tassa, ānubhāvena pāṇino;
analyzed: yam pattam kusalam tassa ānubhāvena pāṇinaḥ

original: Sabbe saddhammarājassa, ñatvā dhammaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
analyzed: sabbe saddhammarājassa ñatvā dhammam sukha āvaham

original: Pāpuṇantu visuddhāya, sukhāya paṭipattiyā;
analyzed: pāpuṇantu visuddhāya sukhāya paṭipattiyā

original: Asokamanupāyāsaṃ, nibbānasukhamuttamaṃ.
analyzed: asokam anupāyāsam nibbāna sukham uttamam

original: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, dhamme hontu sagāravā;
analyzed: ciram tiṭṭhatu saddhammaḥ dhamme hontu sa gāravā

original: Sabbepi sattā kālena, sammā devo pavassatu.
analyzed: sabbe api sattā kālena sammā devaḥ pavassatu

original: Yathā rakkhiṃsu porāṇā, surājāno tathevimaṃ;
analyzed: yathā rakkhiṃsu porāṇā su rājāno

original: Rājā rakkhatu dhammena, attanova pajaṃ pajanti.
analyzed: rājā rakkhatu dhammena attanā uva pajam pajanti

original: Paramavisuddhasaddhābuddhivīriyapaṭimaṇḍitena sīlācārajjavamaddavādiguṇasamudayasamuditena
analyzed: parama visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriya paṭimaṇḍitena sīla ācāra java maddava ādi guṇa samudaya samuditena

original: sakasamayasamayantaragahanajjhogāhaṇasamatthena paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena tipiṭakapariyattippabhede
analyzed: saka samaya samaya antara gahana ajjhogāhaṇa samatthena paññā veyyattiya samannāgatena ti piṭaka pariyat tippa bhede

original: sāṭṭhakathe satthusāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvena mahāveyyākaraṇena karaṇasampattijanitasukhaviniggatamadhurodāravacanalāvaṇṇayuttena
analyzed: sa aṭṭhakathe satthu sāsane appaṭihata ñāṇa ppabhāvena mahā veyyākaraṇena karaṇa sampatti janita sukha viniggata madhura udāra vacana lāvaṇṇa yuttena

original: yuttamuttavādinā vādīvarena mahākavinā pabhinnapaṭisambhidāparivāre chaḷabhiññādippabhedaguṇapaṭimaṇḍite
analyzed: yutta mutta vādinā vādīvarena mahā kavinā pabhinna paṭisambhidā parivāre chaṣ abhiññā ādi pabheda guṇa paṭimaṇḍite

original: uttarimanussadhamme suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
analyzed: uttari manussa dhamme su patiṭṭhita buddhīnam thera vaṃsa ppadīpānam therānam mahāvihāra vāsīnam

original: vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena
analyzed: vaṃsa alaṅkāra bhūtena vipula visuddha buddhinā buddha ghosaḥ iti garūhi gahita nāmadheyyena

original: therena katā ayaṃ aṭṭhasālinī nāma dhammasaṅgahaṭṭhakathā.
analyzed: therena katā ayam aṭṭhasālinī nāma dhamma saṅgaha aṭṭha kathā

original: Tāva tiṭṭhatu lokasmiṃ, lokanittharaṇesinaṃ;
analyzed: tāva tiṭṭhatu lokasmim loka nittharaṇa īsinam

original: Dassentī kulaputtānaṃ, nayaṃ paññāvisuddhiyā.
analyzed: dassentī kula puttānam nayam paññā visuddhiyā

original: Yāva ‘buddho’ti nāmampi, suddhacittassa tādino;
analyzed: yāva buddhaḥ ti nāmam pi suddhacittassa tādinaḥ

original: Lokamhi lokajeṭṭhassa, pavattati mahesinoti.
analyzed: lokamhi loka jeṭṭhassa pavattati mahesino ti

original: Aṭṭhasālinī nāma
analyzed: aṭṭhasālinī nāma

original: Dhammasaṅgaha-aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dhammasaṅgaha aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā
